targetString: शनिवारको दिन, अनलाइन भिडियो घोषणामा बङ्गलादेशी सडक यातायात र पुल मन्त्री, Obaidul Quader ले यस आगामी शनिवारसम्मलाई प्रारम्भिक रूपमा योजना गरिएको भन्दा लामो समयसम्म सार्वजनिक यातायात बन्द हुनेछन् भनेर भन्नुभयो।
en-mt: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladesh's Minister of Road Transport and Bridges, Obaidul Quader, said that public transport would be closed for longer than initially planned by this coming Saturday.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: यो सार्वजनिक यातायात बन्द गर्ने काम सुरुमा मार्च 26 मा सुरु गरिएको थियो र शनिबार, अप्रिल 4 मा समाप्त गर्ने योजना गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: The work to close this public transportation was initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: अत्यावश्यक सामानको यातायात -- चिकित्सा, इन्धन र खाद्यान्नका लागि -- अझै पनि अनुमति दिइएको थियो।
en-mt: Transportation of essential goods — for medical, fuel and food — was still permitted.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: बङ्गलादेशमा पहिलो रेकर्ड गरिएको COVID-19 सङ्क्रमण मार्च 8 मा दुई जनामा जो इटालीबाट फर्किएका थिए र तीमध्ये एककी श्रीमतीलाई पनि भएको थियो।
en-mt: The first recorded COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh occurred on March 8 in two people who had returned from Italy and the wife of one of them.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: मार्च 19 सम्म, यी तीन पहिले नै निको भइसकेका छन्।
en-mt: As of March 19, these three have already recovered.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ले विश्वव्यापी एक मिलियन सङ्क्रमण गरायो
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 caused one million infections worldwide

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: विहीवार, SARS-CoV-2 कोरोनाभाइरसका सङ्क्रमणहरूको कुल केसहरू जोन्स हप्किन्स विश्वविद्यालयले सङ्केत गरेको डाटा अनुसार विश्वव्यापी एक मिलियन पुग्यो।
en-mt: On Thursday, the total cases of SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections reached one million worldwide, according to data indicated by Johns Hopkins University.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: कम्तीमा 52 हजार मृत्यु COVID-19 संग जोडिएका थिए, जुन कोरोनाभाइरसले गर्दा लाग्ने रोग हो।
en-mt: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, a disease caused by the coronavirus.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: कोशेढुङ्गा त्यही दिन आयो जुन दिन मलावीले यसको पहिलो कोरोनाभाइरस सङ्क्रमण र जाम्बियाले यसको पहिलो कोरोनाभाइरस-सम्बन्धित मृत्यु पुष्टि गर्‍यो।
en-mt: The milestone came on the day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infection and Zambia confirmed its first coronavirus-related death.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: उत्तर कोरियाले बिहिबारसम्म यो कोरोनाभाइरस सङ्क्रमणबाट मुक्त हुने केही राष्ट्रहरूमध्ये एक थियो भनेर दाबी गर्‍यो।
en-mt: As of Thursday, North Korea claimed it was one of the few countries to recover from coronavirus infection.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: हिजोसम्म, विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठनले 1,051,635 केसहरू पुष्टि गर्‍यो, जसमा अप्रिल 4 को केन्द्रीय युरोपेली समय (08:00 UTC) को बिहान 10 बजेअघिको चौबिस घन्टामा 79,332 केसहरू थिए।
en-mt: Until yesterday, the World Health Organization confirmed 1,051,635 cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty-four hours before 10 a.m. of Central European Time (08:00 UTC) on April 4.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: संयुक्त राज्यमा, कम्तीमा 5,900 मृत्युहरू लिङ्क गर्दै 244 हजारभन्दा धेरै कोरोनाभाइरका केसहरू रेकर्ड गरिएका थिए।
en-mt: In the United States, more than 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking at least 5,900 deaths.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS समाचारले रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो, जोन्स होप्किन्स विश्वविद्यालयको डाटा उद्धृत गर्दा, कोरोनाभारस सङ्क्रमणद्वारा बुधबार US मा 1,000 भन्दा बढीको मृत्यु भएको थियो।
en-mt: CBS News reported, citing data from Johns Hopkins University, that more than 1,000 people died in the US on Wednesday from coronavirus infection.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: संसारभरि, रोगलाई फैलनबाट रोक्न देशहरूले अझै कडा उपायहरू घोषणा गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Around the world, countries have announced more stringent measures to prevent the spread of the disease.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: बिहीवार, Sergei Sobyanin, मकाउको मेयरले मे 1 सम्म सहरको लकडाउन विस्तार गर्नु भयो।
en-mt: On Thursday, the Mayor of Sergei Sobyanin, Macau, extended the city's lockdown until May 1.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: राष्ट्रिय रूपमा, राष्ट्रपति भ्लादिमिर पुटिनले रूसका मानिसहरूलाई अप्रिल 30 सम्म काममा नगइकन तलब दिन जारी राखिनेछ भनी घोषणा गर्नुभयो।
en-mt: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin announced that the people of Russia would continue to pay salaries until April 30 without going to work.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: पोर्चुगलको संसदले 15 दिनसम्म राष्ट्रिय आकस्मिक स्थिति विस्तार गर्न मतदान गरे; दश एब्सटेन्सन र एक विरूद्ध मतमा 215 ले मतदान पास गरे।
en-mt: Portugal's parliament voted to extend the national contingency for 15 days; Ten abstentions and one against 215 passed the vote.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: साउदी अरबले मक्का र मदिनाका पवित्र सहरहरूमा कर्फ्यु बढाएर दिनभरि बनायो; अघिल्लो पटक, कर्फ्यु दिउँसोको 3 बजेबाट बिहानको 6 बजेको बीचमा मात्र प्रभावकारी थियो।
en-mt: Saudi Arabia extended the curfew in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina throughout the day; Last time, the curfew was effective only between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: थाइल्यान्डले रातिको 10 बजे र बिहानको 4 बजेको बीचमा कर्फ्यु कार्यान्वयन गर्ने योजना गर्‍यो।
en-mt: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: ओहायो, माइक डेवाइनको गभर्नरले मे 1 सम्मको घरमा बस्ने आदेश विस्तार गरेको स्थिति घोषणा गर्नुभयो।
en-mt: In Ohio, the governor of Mike Devine announced the status of extending the stay-at-home order until May 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: अस्ट्रेलियामा स्टोरहरूले प्रति कारोबार ट्वाइलेट पेपरको सीमा लाई घटाए।
en-mt: Stores in Australia reduced the limit of toilet paper per transaction.

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: आइतबार र शनिबार साँझमा, अष्ट्रेलीयाको स्टोर चेन वूलवर्थ्स र कोल्सले राष्ट्रिय स्तरमा सबै स्टोरहरूमा ट्वाइलेट पेपर को खरिद प्रतिबन्ध लाई क्रमशः दुई र एक प्याकेज प्रति कारोबार मा घटाए।
en-mt: On Sunday and Saturday evenings, Australia's store chains Woolworths and Coles reduced the purchase ban on toilet paper at all stores nationally to two and one packages per transaction, respectively.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI ले पनि सोमबार एक-प्याक सीमा सुरु गर्‍यो।
en-mt: ALDI also launched a one-pack limit on Monday.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: यी सीमितताहरू चेकआउटमा र चेनका फेसबुक पृष्ठहरूमा सन्देशको रूपमा पोष्ट गरिएका थिए।
en-mt: These limitations were posted as messages on checkouts and on the chain's Facebook pages.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: COVID-19 ले गर्दा व्यक्तिहरूले आफूलाई स्वयम्-अलग राख्न आवश्यक पर्ने डरका कारण खरीददारहरूले कथित रूपमा स्टक बढाइरहेका थिए।
en-mt: Buyers were reportedly raising stocks due to fears that people would need to self-isolate due to COVID-19.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: बुधबार, वुलवर्थ्सले होम डेलिभरीका लागि ट्वाइलेट पेपरको खरिद पनि प्रति कारोबार एक प्याकेटमा सीमित गर्यो।
en-mt: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited purchases of toilet paper for home delivery to one packet per transaction.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: वुलवर्थ्स र कोल्सद्वारा प्रस्तुत क्रमशः 4 र 5 मार्चमा सुरु गरिएको अघिल्लो चार-प्याक प्रति कारोबार प्रतिबन्धको पछि यी परिवर्तनले पछ्याए।
en-mt: These changes followed after the previous four-pack per-transaction ban introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5, respectively.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: कोल्स, उसको मार्च 8 को मिडिया रिलीजमा, ले रिपोर्ट गरेको छ कि चार-प्याकेट प्रतिबन्धका साथमा, “धेरै स्टोरहरू अझै पनि एक घन्टा को वितरण भित्र बिक्री भइसक्दै छन्”, र यो मागलाई “अभूतपूर्व” भन्यो, जब कि ALDI, ले, मङ्गलबारको एक फेसबुक पोस्टमा, यसलाई “अप्रत्याशित” भन्यो।
en-mt: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-packet ban, "many stores are still selling within an hour's distribution", calling the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unpredictable".

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: वुलवर्थ्सका प्रवक्ताका अनुसार गत हप्ता “ज्यादै वृद्धि” को रूपमा बढेको थियो।
en-mt: According to a Woolworths spokesman, it grew as a "huge increase" last week.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: क्यानबेरामा कस्टकोज स्टोरले पनि पछिल्लो हप्ता अनुमति दिइएको मात्रालाई दुई प्याकमा सीमित गर्‍यो।
en-mt: The Costcose store in Canberra also limited the quantity allowed last week to two packs.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: अभावलाई थप कम गर्नका लागि कोल्सले आपूर्तिकर्ताहरूबाट ठूला प्याकेजहरू अर्डर गर्‍यो र वितरणको आवृत्ति बढायो, वुलवर्थ्सले अतिरिक्त स्टकको अर्डर गर्‍यो, जबकि ALDI ले बुधबार विशेष योजनाका लागि स्टकको चाँडै उपलब्धता गरायो।
en-mt: To further ease the shortage, Coles ordered large packages from suppliers and increased the frequency of distribution, Woolworths ordered additional stocks, while ALDI made the stock available early for the special plan on Wednesday.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: अस्ट्रेलियाली खुद्रा व्यापारी सङ्घका कार्यकारी निर्देशक रूसेल जिम्मरम्यानले खुद्रा विक्रेताहरूले स्टक बढाउन खोजेको, तर ट्रकको वितरणको समयमा स्थानीय परिषद्को प्रतिबन्धले गाह्रो बनाएको बताएका थिए।
en-mt: Russel Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers' Association, said retailers were trying to raise stocks, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck delivery made it difficult.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: उनी बढ्दो उत्पादन लागतको अपेक्षा गर्छन्, किनकि आपूर्तिकर्ताहरूले माग पूरा गर्ने प्रयास गर्छन् र केही मात्र विशेष हुन्छन्।
en-mt: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand and only a few are special.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: मङ्गलबार, ALDI ले घोषणा गर्‍यो कि स्टकको प्रारम्भिक वितरणपछि, केही स्टोरहरूले बुधबार विशेष सञ्चालन गर्न सक्दैनन्।
en-mt: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that after the initial distribution of the stock, some stores will not be able to operate exclusively on Wednesday.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: News.com.au को एक रिपोर्टमा, डा. ग्यारी मोर्टिमर, क्वीन्सल्याण्ड टेक्नोलोजी विश्वविद्यालयका खुद्रा विज्ञ ले भने, स्टोरहरू हरेक रात स्टक भर्छन्।
en-mt: In a report to News.com.au, Dr. Gary Mortimer, a retail expert at the University of Queensland Technology, said stores fill stock every night.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: उनले टिप्पणी गरे कि ट्वाइलेट पेपर एक ठूलो आकारको वस्तु हो, जसले स्टक को संख्यामा कमी गर्छ, र, जब बिक्री हुन्छ, ठूलो सेल्फ ठाउँ खाली छोड्छ, जसले अभावको भावनालाई अझ मजबुत पार्दछ।
en-mt: He commented that toilet paper is a large-sized commodity, which reduces the number of stocks, and, when sold, leaves a large self space empty, which reinforces the feeling of scarcity.

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: “कोल र उलवर्थ्सको दृष्टिकोण यो छ [कि] यदि तखतामा प्रशस्त सामानहरू थिए्, शौचालय रोल र स्यानिटाइजर जस्ता उत्पादनहरू [खरीद गर्ने] सकिन्थ्यो र त्यहाँ पर्याप्त मात्रामा छन् भने, तपाईँ त्रासलाई कम गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ” एबिसी समाचारका रसेल जिमरम्यानले भने।
en-mt: "Cole and Ulworths's view is [that] if there were plenty of stuff on the plank, products like toilet rolls and sanitizers could [be purchased] and there are enough, you could ease the panic," said Russell Zimmerman of ABC News.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: पुर्ननविकरणीय ट्वाइलेट पेपर उत्पादक हु गिभ्स अ क्र्याप ले पछिल्लो बुधबार भन्यो कि उनीहरूको स्टक सकियो।
en-mt: Renovative toilet paper maker Hu Gives a Crop said last Wednesday that they ran out of stock.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: News.com.au को रिपोर्ट अनुसार, क्लिनेक्स टोइलेट टिस्यु बनाउने किम्बर्ली-क्लार्क र सर्बेन्ट बनाउने सोलारिस पेपरके आपूर्ति गरिराख्न 24/7 काम गरिरहेका थिए।
en-mt: According to a News.com.au report, Kimberly-Clark, who makes Clinex toilet tissue, and Solaris, the sorbent maker, were working 24/7 to keep supplying paper.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: एक रियल इस्टेट साइट Domain.com ले केही सम्पत्ति विक्रेताहरूले मेलबर्नमा लिलामीमा पहिलो बिडकर्तालाई निःशुल्क ट्वाइलेट पेपर प्रस्ताव गरेको जनाएको थियो, श्रमिक दिवसको लामो सप्ताहान्तमा खरिदकर्ताहरूले समय छुट्याएको कारण लिलामी आयोजनालाई कम गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: A real estate site Domain.com said some property vendors offered free toilet paper to the first bidder at an auction in Melbourne, with the auction event being curtailed due to buyers allocating time on the long weekend of Labor Day.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: डार्विनमा छापिएको, दैनिक NT न्यूजको बिहीबार सँस्करणमा, 8 अतिरिक्त पृष्ठ सम्मिलित गरिएको थियो जसको प्रयोजन काटेर र शौचालय कागजको रूपमा प्रयोग गर्नका लागि थियो।
en-mt: Printed in Darwin, the Thursday edition of the Daily NT News, included 8 additional pages intended for cutting and using toilets as paper.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: ABC अस्ट्रेलियाको मार्च 3 को एक रिपोर्ट अनुसार, स्टोरहरू मूल रूप मा प्रतिबन्ध लगाउन अनिच्छुक थिए, जसमा उनीहरूले खरिदमा प्रतिबन्ध लगाउने कुनै योजना नभएको भनेका थिए।
en-mt: According to a Report by ABC Australia on March 3, stores were originally reluctant to ban, in which they said they had no plans to ban purchases.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: रसेल जिम्मरम्यानले भने कि उत्पादनहरू पनि उच्च मागमा छन्, जसमा मास्क, स्यानिटाइजर, सुक्खा सामान, ह्यान्डवास र पिठो पनि पर्छन्।
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman said products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitizers, dry goods, handwashes and flour.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: त्यस्तै अस्ट्रेलियाबाहिर आइतबार साँझ अनलाइन ब्रिटिस सुपरमार्केट ओकाडोले एन्ड्रेस ट्वाइटेट पेपर खरीदलाई दुई ओटा 12-रोल प्याकमा सीमित गरेको पाइएको छ।
en-mt: On Sunday evening outside Australia, online British supermarket Okado was found to have limited the purchase of Andres Toilet Paper to two 12-roll packs.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: विश्व स्वास्थ्य संगठनले COVID-19 महामारीको घोषणा गर्‍यो
en-mt: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: बुधबार, विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठन (WHO) ले कोरोनाभाइरस SARS-CoV-2 बाट लाग्ने रोग— COVID-19 को जारी प्रकोपलाई — विश्वमहामारी घोषित गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — a disease caused by the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — a global pandemic.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: यद्यपि “विश्वमहामारी” शब्दले रोग कति व्यापक भइ फैलिएको छ भनी जनाउँछ, सङ्क्रमण कति खतरनाक छ भनेर होइन, WHO ले सरकारहरूलाई निम्न कामहरू गराउनुपर्ने आवश्यकतातर्फ ध्यान दियो:
en-mt: Although the term "pandemic" refers to how widespread the disease has spread, not how dangerous the infection is, WHO noted the need for governments to do the following:

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: "सबै देशहरूले अझै पनि यो विश्वमहामारीको मार्ग परिवर्तन गर्न सक्छन्।
en-mt: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: यदि देशहरूले पत्ता लगाउने, परीक्षण गर्ने, उपचार गर्ने, अलग गर्ने, ट्रेस गर्ने र जवाफमा आफ्ना नागरिकहरूलाई परिचालन गरे भन", WHO का महानिर्देशक टेड्रोस अधानम घेब्रेयससले भने।
en-mt: If countries find, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their citizens in response" said WHO Director General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: “हामी प्रसार र गम्भीरताको खतरनाक स्तर र असक्रियताको खतरनाक स्तर दुवै सँग गहिरो रूपले चिन्तित छौँ।”
en-mt: "We are deeply concerned with both dangerous levels of prevalence and severity and dangerous levels of inactivity. ”

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: डा. टम फ्रेडनका अनुसार, पूर्व संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका रोग नियन्त्रण र रोकथाम केन्द्रका निर्देशक, यो महामारी “अभूतपूर्व” हो।
en-mt: Dr. According to Tom Freden, director of the former United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: उनले भने, फेब्रुअरीमा CNN द्वारा प्रकाशित टिप्पणीमा, “इन्फ्लुएन्जा बाहेक अन्य कुनै श्वासप्रश्वासको भाइरस उदय देखि निरन्तर विश्वव्यापी प्रसारमा भएको ट्रयाक गरिएको छैन।”
en-mt: "No respiratory virus other than influenza has been tracked in continuous global spread since its emergence," he said in comments published by the CNN in February. ”

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: गेब्रेयसस ले पनि यस्तै दृष्टिकोण व्यक्त गर्दै भने, “कोरोनाभाइरसबाट फैलिएको महामारी हामीले यसभन्दा पहिले कहिल्यै देखेका थिएनौं।”
en-mt: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying, "We have never seen a coronavirus pandemic before. ”

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: उनले जारी राखे, “र हामीले पहिले कहिल्यै यो महामारी देखेनौँ जुन एकै समयमा नियन्त्रण गर्न सकिन्छ।”
en-mt: "And we've never seen this pandemic before that can be controlled at the same time," he continued. ”

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: विश्वमहामारीको रूपमा नयाँ स्थिति लिएसँगै जनवरीमा प्रकोपलाई अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य आपतकाल घोषणा गर्नका लागि WHO को निर्णयको अनुसरण गर्दछ।
en-mt: It follows WHO's decision to declare the outbreak an international public health emergency in January, as it takes a new status as a global pandemic.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: संयुक्त राज्यका नेशनल इन्स्टिच्युट अफ एलर्जी र सङ्क्रामक रोगका निर्देशक, डा. एन्थोनी फौसी, ले यस प्रकोपको बारेमा भने, “तल्लो रेखा, यो झन् खराब हुँदै गइरहेको छ।”
en-mt: Director of the United States National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "The bottom line, it's getting worse. ”

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: बिहीबारसम्म, एसोसियटेड प्रेसले विश्वव्यापी रूपमा COVID-19 को 126,000 केसहरू र परिणामस्वरूप 4,600 को मृत्यु भएको रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो।
en-mt: As of Thursday, the Associated Press reported 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide and 4,600 deaths as a result.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: 2019–20 कोरोनाभाइरस विश्वमहामारी 2019 (COVID-19) रोगको हाल भइरहेको विश्वमहामारी हो, जुन गम्भीर तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी सिन्ड्रोम कोरोनाभाइरस 2 को (SARS-CoV-2) कारणले हुन्छ।
en-mt: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is the current global epidemic of 2019 (COVID-19) disease, caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: प्रकोप डिसेम्बर 2019 मा चीनको वुहानमा पहिचान भएको थियो, 30 जनवरी 2020 मा अन्तराष्ट्रिय चासोको सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य आपतकालको रूपमा घोषणा गरियो, र 11 मार्च 2020 मा एक महामारीको रूपमा मान्यता प्राप्त गर्यो।
en-mt: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China in December 2019, declared a public health emergency of international concern on 30 January 2020, and was recognized as an epidemic on 11 March 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: 10 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, 210 देश र क्षेत्रहरूमा COVID-19 का लगभग 1.61 मिलियन मामिलाहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएका छन्, जसको कारण लगभग 97,000 जना मारिएका छन्।
en-mt: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and regions, resulting in nearly 97,000 deaths.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: करिब 364,000 मानिसहरू निको भएका छन्।
en-mt: About 364,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: चीनमा केसको मृत्युदर 4% भएको अनुमान गरिएको छ, जबकि विश्वव्यापी रूपमा अल्जेरीयामा 13.04% देखि न्युजिल्यान्डमा .08% सम्म छ।
en-mt: The case fatality rate in China is estimated to be 4%, while globally it ranges from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: सामान्य लक्षणहरूमा ज्वरो, खोकी र सास फेर्न कठिनाई समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and difficulty breathing.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: जटिलताहरूमा निमोनिया र तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धि तनाव सिन्ड्रोम समावेश हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory stress syndrome.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: सम्पर्कदेखि लक्षणको सुरुवात हुने समय सामान्यतया पाँच दिनको आसपास हो, तर यो दायरा दुईदेखि चौध दिनसम्म हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: The time from contact to onset of symptoms is usually around five days, but this range can range from two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: कुनै ज्ञात खोप वा विशिष्ट एन्टिभाइरल उपचार छैन।
en-mt: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: प्राथमिक उपचार लक्षणात्मक र सहयोगी थेरापी हो। सिफारिस गरिएका रोकथाम उपायहरूमा हात धुनु, खोक्ने बेलामा आफ्नो मुख ढाक्नु, अन्य मानिसहरूबाट दूरी कायम राख्नु र सङ्क्रमित भएको आशंका भएका व्यक्तिहरू ले लाई अनुगमन र आत्म-अलगाव समावेश छन्।
en-mt: First aid is symptomatic and supportive therapy. Recommended preventive measures include washing hands, covering one's mouth while coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation of people suspected of being infected.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: अधिकारीहरूले विश्वव्यापी रूपमा यात्रा प्रतिबन्ध, क्वारेन्टाइन, कर्फ्यु, कार्यस्थल जोखिम नियन्त्रण र विभिन्न सुविधाहरू बन्द गरेर प्रतिक्रिया व्यक्त गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Authorities have responded globally by imposing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace risk control and closure of various facilities.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: विश्व महामारीले गम्भीर सामाजिक आर्थिक खलबली, खेलकुद, धार्मिक, राजनीतिक र सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रमहरूको स्थगन वा रद्दता, किन्न हाहाकार हुनाले थप कष्ट हुने आपूर्तिहरूको अभावमा पुर्‍याएको छ।
en-mt: The global pandemic has led to severe socio-economic turmoil, the postponement or cancellation of sports, religious, political and cultural events, and a shortage of supplies that will cause further suffering due to a shortage of purchases.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: विद्यालय र विश्वविद्यालयहरू 193 देशहरूमा राष्ट्रव्यापी वा स्थानीय आधारमा बन्द भएका छन्, जसले विश्वको विद्यार्थी जनसङ्ख्याको 99.4 प्रतिशतलाई प्रभाव पारेको छ।
en-mt: Schools and universities have been closed on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting 99.4 percent of the world's student population.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: भाइरसको बारेमा गलत जानकारी अनलाइनमा फैलिएको छ, र त्यहाँ चिनियाँ नागरिकहरू, अन्य पूर्वी र दक्षिण पूर्व एशियाई वर्ण र आवरण का नागरिकहरू, र महत्वपूर्ण संख्यामा भाइरस का मामिलाहरू भएको क्षेत्रका अन्य व्यक्तिहरू बिरूद्ध ज़ेनोफोबिया र भेदभाव का घटनाहरू भएका छन्।
en-mt: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been cases of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese citizens, citizens of other East and Southeast Asian races and coverings, and others in areas with a significant number of virus cases.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: यात्रामा कमी र ठूला उद्योग बन्द हुनाले, वायु प्रदूषण र कार्बन उत्सर्जन घटेका छन्।
en-mt: Due to the reduction in travel and the closure of large industries, air pollution and carbon emissions have decreased.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: चीनको वुहान, (हुबेई प्रान्तको राजधानी) मा स्वास्थ्य अधिकारीहरूले 31 डिसेम्बर 2019 मा अज्ञात कारणहरूको निमोनियाका मामिलाहरूको समूह रिपोर्ट गरे र अनुसन्धान जनवरी 2020 को सुरुवातमा सुरु भयो।
en-mt: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei Province) reported a group of pneumonia cases of unknown causes on 31 December 2019 and the investigation began in early January 2020.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: यी मामिलाहरूको ज्यादातर हुआनन समुद्री खाना थोक बजारसँग सम्बन्ध थियो र त्यसैले यो भाइरसको जुनोटिक मूल भएको मानिन्छ।
en-mt: Most of these cases were related to the Huanan seafood wholesale market and therefore are thought to have zoonotic origins of the virus.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: यस प्रकोपको कारक भाइरसलाई SARS-CoV-2 को रूपमा चिनिन्छ, एक नयाँ पत्ता लागेको भाइरस जुन चमेरो कोरोनाभाइरस, सालक कोरोनाभाइरस र SARS-CoV सँग नजिकबाट सम्बन्धित छ। लक्षणहरू भएको सबैभन्दा पहिले चिनिने व्यक्ति पछि 1 डिसेम्बर 2019 मा बिरामी परेको पत्ता लागेको थियो र उक्त व्यक्तिको सम्बन्ध पछिल्लो वेट मार्केट समूहसँग थिएन।
en-mt: The virus that caused this outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus that is closely related to bat coronavirus, salk coronavirus and SARS-CoV. The person first known with symptoms was later diagnosed with illness on December 1, 2019, and the person was not related to the latest Wet Market group.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: डिसेम्बर 2019 मा रिपोर्ट गरिएको प्रारम्भिक मामिलाहरूको समूहमध्ये, दुई तिहाइको बजारसँग सम्बन्ध भएको भेटिएको थियो।
en-mt: Of the initial cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have market connections.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: 13 मार्च 2020 मा, साउथ चाइना मर्निङ पोस्टबाट अप्रमाणित रिपोर्टले सुझाव दियो कि घटना 17 नोभेम्बर 2019 पछाडिसम्म ट्रेस गरिएको छ, हुबेई प्रान्तको 55 वर्षे व्यक्तिमा, यो नै पहिलो मामिला हुन सक्छ। 26 फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा, WHO ले रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो कि चीनमा नयाँ मामिलाहरू कथित रूपमा घटे तर इटाली, इरान र दक्षिण कोरियामा अचानक बढे, चीन बाहिर नयाँ मामिलाको सङ्ख्याले पहिलो पटक चीनमा नयाँ मामिलाहरूको सङ्ख्यालाई पार गरेको थियो।
en-mt: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that the incident has been traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old man from Hubei Province, this may be the first case. On 26 February 2020, WHO reported that new cases reportedly decreased in China but increased suddenly in Italy, Iran and South Korea, with the number of new cases outside China surpassing the number of new cases in China for the first time.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: त्यहाँ अवस्था हल्का लक्षण भएका व्यक्तिहरूको उल्लेखनीय रूपमा कम प्रतिवेदित हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: There the condition may be significantly less responsive to people with mild symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: 26 फेब्रुअरी सम्ममा, युवाहरूमा तुलनात्मक रूपमा थोरै घटनाहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएका थिए जसमा ती 19 वर्ष र सोभन्दा कम उमेर भएकाहरूले विश्वव्यापी मामिलाहरूको 2.4% ओगटेका छन्। संयुक्त अधिराज्यका प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक सल्लाहकार, प्याट्रिक भालान्सले अनुमान गरे कि प्रभावकारी बथान प्रतिरोध क्षमता हासिल गर्नुअघि 60% बेलायती जनसङ्ख्या सङ्क्रमित हुनु पर्ने छ।
en-mt: As of February 26, relatively few cases were reported among young people with those aged 19 years and younger accounting for 2.4% of global affairs. The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would have to be infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: सङ्क्रमणका घटनाहरूले COVID-19 को लागि परीक्षण गरिएको व्यक्तिहरूको सङ्ख्यालाई जनाउँछ र जसको परीक्षण आधिकारिक प्रोटोकलको अनुसार सकारात्मक पुष्टि भएको छ।
en-mt: The incidence of infection refers to the number of people tested for COVID-19 and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: 23 मार्च सम्म, कुनै पनि देशले आफ्नो जनसङ्ख्याको 3% भन्दा बढी परीक्षण गरेको थिएन, र धेरै देशहरू जस्तै इटाली, नेदरल्यान्ड, स्पेन, र स्विट्जरल्यान्ड का केवल हल्का लक्षणहरू भएकाहरूको परीक्षण नगर्ने आधिकारिक नीतिहरू थिए।
en-mt: As of March 23, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland had official policies not to test only those with mild symptoms.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: 16 मार्चमा प्रकाशित एक अध्ययनले यो पत्ता लगायो कि 23 जनवरीसम्म COVID-19 सङ्क्रमणमध्ये अनुमानित 86% पत्ता लागेका थिएनन् र यी दस्तावेजीकरण नगरिएका सङ्क्रमणहरू दस्तावेजीकरण गरिएका 79% केसहरूका सङ्क्रमण स्रोत थिए।
en-mt: A study published on March 16 found that as of January 23, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected and that these undocumented infections were the infection source of 79% of documented cases.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: 30 मार्चमा प्रकाशित तथ्याङ्कीय विश्लेषणले अनुमान लगायो कि इटालीमा सङ्क्रमणको संख्या रिपोर्ट भएका घटनाहरू भन्दा निकै बढी थियो।
en-mt: A statistical analysis published on March 30 estimated that the number of infections in Italy was much higher than the reported cases.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: COVID-19 का लागि आधारभूत प्रजनन सङ्ख्या (R0) को प्रारम्भिक अनुमानहरू 1.4 देखि 2.4 थिए।
en-mt: Initial estimates of baseline reproduction numbers (R0) for COVID-19 ranged from 1.4 to 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: रोग नियन्त्रण र रोकथामका लागि अमेरिकी केन्द्र द्वारा प्रकाशित एक अध्ययनले यो 5.7 हुन सक्छ भन्ने निष्कर्ष निकालेको छ।
en-mt: A study published by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention concluded that it could be 5.7.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: COVID-19 भएका अधिकांश व्यक्तिहरू निको हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Most people with COVID-19 recover.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: ती नगर्नेहरूको लागि, लक्षणहरूको विकासदेखि मृत्युसम्मको समय 6 देखि 41 दिनका बीचमा रहेको छ, र सबैभन्दा सामान्यतः 14 दिन रहेको छ।
en-mt: For those who do not, the time from the development of symptoms to death ranges between 6 and 41 days, and most commonly 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: 10 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, COVID-19 का कारण लगभग 97,000 मृत्यु भएको थियो।
en-mt: As of 10 April 2020, about 97,000 deaths had occurred due to COVID-19.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: चीनमा, 5 फेब्रुअरी सम्‍ममा 80% मृत्यु 60 वर्ष भन्दा बढीमा थियो र 75% लाई हृदय रोग र मधुमेह जस्ता पूर्व अवस्थित स्वास्थ्य स्थिति थियो। COVID-19 महामारीको कारण मृत्युको आधिकारिक गणनाले सामान्यतः ती मृत व्यक्तिलाई जनाउँछ जसले आधिकारिक प्रोटोकलका अनुसार COVID का लागि सकारात्मक परीक्षण गरे।
en-mt: In China, as of February 5, 80% of deaths were over the age of 60 and 75% had pre-existing health conditions such as heart disease and diabetes. The official count of deaths due to the COVID-19 pandemic usually refers to those dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: COVID-19 बाट मृत्यु भएको साँचो सङ्ख्या धेरै उच्च हुन सक्छ, जबकि यसले परीक्षण नगरी मृत्यु भएका मानिस समावेश गर्न सक्दैन - जस्तै घरमा, नर्सिङ होममा, आदि।
en-mt: The true number of deaths from COVID-19 can be very high, while it may not include people who have died without being tested – such as at home, in nursing homes, etc.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: इटालीबाट आंशिक तथ्याङ्कले पत्ता लगायो कि महामारीको क्रममा अधिक मृत्युको संख्या आधिकारिक COVID मृत्यु संख्या भन्दा 4-5 गुणा बढी थियो।
en-mt: Partial data from Italy found that the number of deaths higher during the pandemic was 4-5 times higher than the official COVID death toll.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: अमेरिकी रोग नियन्त्रण र रोकथाम केन्द्र (CDC) का एक प्रवक्ताले स्वीकार गरे “हामीलाई थाहा छ त्यो [वर्णन गरिएको मृत्यु सङ्ख्या] गलत आँकलन हो”, अमेरिकामा न्यून अनुमान गरिएको अवैज्ञानिक रिपोर्टको अनुसार एक बयान। यस प्रकारका न्यून अनुमान प्राय विश्वमहामारीहरूमा हुन्छन्, जस्तै 2009 H1N1 स्वाइन फ्लु महामारी। 9 जनवरी 2020 मा वुहानमा पहिलो मृत्यु पुष्टि भएको थियो।
en-mt: A spokesman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) admitted that "we know that [the number of deaths described] is a miscalculation", according to an under-estimated unscientific report in the U.S. This type of under-estimation often occurs in global epidemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic. The first death was confirmed in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: चीनको मुख्य भूमि बाहिर पहिलो मृत्यु फिलिपिन्स मा 1 फेब्रुअरी मा भएको थियो, र एसिया बाहिर पहिलो मृत्यु 14 फेब्रुअरीमा फ्रान्समा भएको थियो।
en-mt: The first deaths outside mainland China occurred in the Philippines on 1 February, and the first deaths outside Asia occurred in France on 14 February.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: 28 फेब्रुअरीसम्ममा, मुख्य भूमि चीन बाहिर, इरान, दक्षिण कोरिया र इटाली प्रत्येकमा एक दर्जन भन्दा बढी व्यक्तिको मृत्यु रेकर्ड गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: As of 28 February, more than a dozen deaths had been recorded outside mainland China, in Iran, South Korea and Italy each.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: 13 मार्चसम्म, अन्टार्कटिका बाहेक प्रत्येक महादेशमा चालिसभन्दा बढी देश तथा क्षेत्रहरूले मृत्युको रिपोर्ट दिएका थिए। मृत्युदरलाई निर्धारण गर्न सामान्यतया विभिन्न उपायहरूको प्रयोग गरिएको छ।
en-mt: As of March 13, more than forty countries and territories on each continent, except Antarctica, had reported deaths. Various measures have generally been used to determine mortality.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: यी सङ्ख्याहरू क्षेत्र र समयअनुसार भिन्न हुन्छन् र परीक्षणको मात्रा, स्वास्थ्य स्याहार प्रणालीको गुणस्तर, उपचार विकल्पहरू, प्रारम्भिक प्रकोपको समय र उमेर, लिङ्ग र समग्र स्वास्थ्य जस्ता जनसङ्ख्याका विशेषताहरूद्वारा प्रभावित हुन्छन्। केस-मा-मृत्युको अनुपातले दिएको समयको अन्तरालमा मृत्युको सङ्ख्यालाई निको भएका केसहरूको भाग गरिएको नतिजा देखाउँछ।
en-mt: These numbers vary by region and time and are influenced by population characteristics such as the amount of testing, the quality of the health care system, treatment options, the time and age of the initial outbreak, gender, and overall health. The case-to-death ratio shows the number of deaths over a given time interval as a part of the recovered cases.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: जोन्स हपकिन्स विश्वविद्यालयको तथ्याङ्कको आधारमा, विश्वव्यापी मृत्यु र मामिलाको अनुपात 10 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) छ।
en-mt: Based on Johns Hopkins University data, the global death to case ratio stands at 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: क्षेत्र अनुसार सङ्ख्या फरक हुन्छ।
en-mt: The number varies by region.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: चीनमा, मृत्यु-मामिला अनुपातको अनुमान 17.3% बाट (1-10 जनवरी 2020 सम्म लक्षणको सुरुवात भएकाहरूका लागि) 0.7% (1 फेब्रुअरी 2020 पछि लक्षण सुरु हुनेहरूका लागि) मा घटेको छ। अन्य उपायहरूमा मामिला मृत्यु दर (CFR), जसले कुनै रोगबाट मर्ने निदान गरिएका व्यक्तिहरूको प्रतिशत प्रतिबिम्बित गर्दछ र सङ्क्रमण मृत्यु दर (IFR), जसले रोगबाट मर्ने सङ्क्रमित (निदान भएका र निदान नभएका) को प्रतिशत प्रतिबिम्बित गर्छ।
en-mt: In China, estimates of the death-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset from 1-10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those who started symptoms after 1 February 2020). Other measures include case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percentage of people diagnosed to die from a disease and infection mortality rate (IFR), which reflects the percentage of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from the disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: यी तथ्याङ्कहरू समयमा आधारित छैनन् र केस रिजोल्युसनको मार्फत सङ्क्रमणबाट निश्चित जनसङ्ख्यालाई पछ्याउँदछन्।
en-mt: These data are not based on time and follow a certain population from infection through case resolution.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: धेरै शिक्षाविद्हरूले विशिष्ट जनसङ्ख्याको लागि यी सङ्ख्याहरूको गणना गर्न प्रयास गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Many academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: अक्सफोर्ड विश्वविद्यालयको प्रमाणमा आधारित औषधीको  आँकलन छ कि समग्रमा महामारीको को सङ्क्रमण मृत्यु दर 0.1% र 0.39% का बीच छ।
en-mt: Oxford University's evidence-based drug estimates that the overall epidemic infection mortality rate is between 0.1% and 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: यस श्रेणीको माथिल्लो अनुमान जर्मनीमा COVID-19 को लागि गरिएको पहिलो अनियमित परीक्षण र CFR आकलनमा परीक्षणको प्रभावको विश्लेषण गर्ने एउटा तथ्याङ्कीय अध्ययन को परीक्षणको नतीजाहरूसँग मिल्दो छ।
en-mt: The upper estimate of this category is consistent with the results of the first randomized trial conducted for COVID-19 in Germany and a statistical study analyzing the effect of the test on CFR assessments.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: WHO ले विश्वमहामारीलाई नियन्त्रण गर्न सकिन्छ भनेर जोड दिएको छ।
en-mt: WHO has emphasized that the global epidemic can be controlled.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: प्रकोपको चरम र अन्तिम अवधि अनिश्चित हुन्छ र ठाउँ अनुसार फरक हुन सक्दछ।
en-mt: The peak and final duration of the outbreak is uncertain and may vary from place to place.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: पेन स्टेट युनिभर्सिटीका मासिएज बोनीले बताए, "परीक्षण नगरिएको, सङ्क्रामक प्रकोपहरू सामान्यतया रोग निम्त्याउने आयोजक उपलब्ध नभएमा हराएर जान्छन्।
en-mt: "Untested, infectious outbreaks usually disappear if disease-causing organizers are not available," said Massiz Boni from Penn State University.

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: तर त्यो कहिले हुनेछ भन्नेबारे अहिले कुनै पनि समझदार अनुमान गर्न लगभग असम्भव जस्तै छ।
en-mt: But it is almost impossible to make any sensible guesses about when that will happen.

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: चिनियाँ सरकारका वरिष्ठ चिकित्सा सल्लाहकार Zhong Nanshan ले भाइरसको फैलावटलाई रोक्नका लागि WHO को सल्लाह अनुसरण गर्न सबै देशहरू परिचालन गर्न सकिएमा "यो जुन सम्ममा सकिने" तर्क गरेका थिए।
en-mt: Zhong Nanshan, a senior medical adviser to the Chinese government, had argued that "it would be over by June" if all countries could be mobilized to follow who's advice to contain the spread of the virus.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: 17 मार्चमा, लन्डन स्कुल अफ हाइजिन एन्ड ट्रपिकल मेडिसिनका एडम कुचार्स्कीले भने कि SARS-CoV-2 “सम्भावित रूपमा एक वा दुई वर्षसम्म फैलिने छ”।
en-mt: On March 17, Adam Kucharsky of the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine said that SARS-CoV-2 "will potentially extend to a year or two".

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: निल फर्ग्युसनको नेतृत्वमा इम्पेरियल कलेजको अध्ययन अनुसार "खोप उपलब्ध नभएसम्म (सम्भावित 18 महिना वा सोभन्दा बढी)" शारीरिक दूरी र अन्य उपायहरूको आवश्यक पर्दछ।
en-mt: According to an Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures are needed "until a vaccine is available (potentially 18 months or more)".

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: भ्यान्डरबिल्ट विश्वविद्यालयका विलियम शेफनरले भने, “मलाई लाग्छ यो कोरोनाभाइरस—यो सजिलै सर्ने भएकोले—पूर्ण रूपमा लोप हुने सम्भावना कम छ” र यो “हरेक वर्ष पुनः आगमन हुने गरी, मौसमी रोगमा परिणत हुन सक्दछ।”
en-mt: "I think this coronavirus—because it's easily transmitted—is unlikely to disappear completely," said William Schefner of Vanderbilt University. ”

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: पहिलेकै स्थितिमा फिर्ता हुने अवस्था रोग प्रतिरोधात्मक क्षमता र उत्परिवर्तनको सीमामा निर्भर गर्दछ।
en-mt: The state of returning to the previous state depends on the extent of the immune system and mutations.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: COVID-19 को लक्षण सापेक्षित रूपमा निश्चित नहुन सक्छ र सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरू लक्षण नभएका हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Symptoms of COVID-19 may not be relatively certain and infected people may be asymptomatic.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: दुईवटा सबैभन्दा सामान्य लक्षण ज्वरो (88%) र सुख्खा खोकी (68%) हो।
en-mt: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: कम सामान्य लक्षणहरूमा थकान, श्वासप्रश्वासमा थुक वा र्‍यालको उत्पादन (खकार), सुँघ्ने क्षमतामा कमी, श्वासप्रश्वासमा कमी, मांसपेशी र हाड जोर्नीको पीडा, घाँटी दुख्ने, टाउको दुख्ने, चिसो लाग्ने, वान्ता हुने, रक्तचाप, पखाला वा साइनोसिस समावेश हुन्छन्। WHO ले लगभग छ जना मध्ये एक व्यक्ति गम्भीर बिरामी हुने र श्वास फेर्न गाह्रो हुने बताएको छ।
en-mt: Less common symptoms include fatigue, the production of saliva or saliva in the breathing ,decreased sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and bone joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, blood pressure, diarrhea or cyanosis. WHO said about one in six people would be seriously ill and had difficulty breathing.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: अमेरिकी रोग नियन्त्रण तथा रोकथाम केन्द्रहरू (CDC) ले आकस्मिक लक्षणहरूमा स्वास फेर्न गाह्रो हुनु, लगातार छाती दुख्नु वा दबाव महसुस हुनु, अचानक भ्रममा पर्नु, हिँड्न असजिलो हुनु, अनुहार वा ओठहरू नीलो हुनुलाई सूचीमा राखेको छ; यदि यी लक्षण देखिएमा तुरून्त चिकित्सकको सल्लाह लिन सुझाव गरिएको छ। रोगको अधिक विकासले गम्भीर निमोनिया, तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास तनाव सिन्ड्रोम, सेप्सिस, सेप्टिक झट्का र मृत्यु हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms such as shortness of breath, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, discomfort in walking, blue face or lips; If these symptoms appear, it is advisable to consult a doctor immediately. Over-development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory stress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock, and death.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: यी मध्ये केही सङ्क्रमित लक्षणविहीन हुन सक्छन्, जसमा कुनै क्लिनिकल लक्षणहरू हुँदैन तर परीक्षणको नतिजाले सङ्क्रमणको पुष्टि गर्दछ, त्यसैले अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरूले सल्लाह जारी गरेका छन् कि सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरूसँग नजिकको सम्पर्क भएका व्यक्तिहरूलाई सङ्क्रमणको सम्भावना समाप्त गर्नका लागि नजिकबाट निरीक्षण र जाँच गरिनुपर्दछ।
en-mt: Some of these infected people may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but test results confirm the infection, so researchers have issued an advisory that people who have close contact with infected people should be closely monitored and screened to eliminate the possibility of infection.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: चिनियाँले लक्षणरहितको अनुपात केहीदेखि 44% सम्म रहेको अनुमान गर्छन्।
en-mt: The Chinese estimate that the proportion of asymptomatic people ranges from a few to 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: सामान्य इन्क्युबेसन अवधि (सङ्क्रमण र लक्षणको सुरुवातको बीचको समय) एकदेखि 14 दिनसम्म हुन्छ; यो सामान्यतया पाँच दिनको हुन्छ। अनिश्चितताको एक उदाहरणमा, सुँघ्ने क्षमता हराएका COVID-19 रोग लागेका मानिसहरूका अंशको अनुमान सुरुमा 30% थियो तर यो दर पछि 15% मा झरेको थियो।
en-mt: The normal incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; It usually lasts for five days. In an example of uncertainty, estimates of the fraction of people with COVID-19 disease who lost their sense of smell were initially 30% but this rate later dropped to 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: रोग कसरी फैलिन्छ भनेर केही विवरणहरू अझै निर्धारण भइरहेका छन्।
en-mt: Some details of how the disease spread are still being determined.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: यो रोग प्राथमिक रूपमा नजिकको सम्पर्कमा खोक्दा, हाच्छ्युँ गर्दा वा कुरा गर्दा उत्पादन हुने सानो छिटाबाट फैलिएको हो भन्ने विश्वास गरिन्छ; जुन 1 देखि 2 मिटर (3 देखि 6 फिट) सम्मको दूरीको नजिकको सम्पर्कबाट हो।
en-mt: The disease is believed to have originated primarily from small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking in close contact; Which is from close contact with distances ranging from 1 to 2 meters (3 to 6 feet).

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: अध्ययनले पत्ता लगाएको छ कि एउटा नछोपी गरिएको खोकीले 4.5 मिटर (15 फिट) देखि 8.2 मिटर (27) फिट सम्‍मको यात्रा गर्न सक्ने थोपाहरुको सिर्जना गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: Studies have found that an unfounded cough can create droplets that can travel from 4.5 meters (15 feet) to 8.2 meters (27) feet.

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: केहीले भाइरस बोल्दा उत्पादन हुन सक्ने साना छिटाहरूद्वारा प्रसारण हुन सक्छ जुन हावामा थप लामो समयको लागि रहन्छ भन्ने प्रस्ताव गरेका छन्। श्वासप्रश्वासका छिटाहरू श्वास फेर्दा पनि उत्पादन हुन सक्छन्, जुन कुरा गर्दा पनि हुन सक्छ, तथापि भाइरस साधारणतया हावाबाट सरेको होइन।
en-mt: Some have proposed that the virus can be transmitted by small droplets that can be produced when speaking, which lasts in the air for a longer period of time. Respiratory droplets can also be produced by breathing, which can happen when talked, however, the virus is not usually transmitted through the air.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: छिटाहरू ती मानिसको मुख वा नाकमा रहन सक्छन् जो नजिक छन् वा सम्भवतः सास लिँदा फोक्सोमा पुग्न सक्छन्।
en-mt: Droplets can live in the mouth or nose of people who are close or possibly reach the lungs while inhaling.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: केहि चिकित्सा प्रक्रियाहरू जस्तै इन्टुबेशन र कार्डियोपल्मोनरी रिससिटेसन (CPR) ले श्वासप्रश्वासको स्रावलाई एरोसोलाइज गराउन सक्छ र यसैले हावाद्वारा हुने प्रसार गराउँछ।
en-mt: Certain medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) can aerosolize respiratory secretions and thus cause airborne diffusion.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: यो जब कुनै व्यक्तिले दूषित सतहमा छुन्छ, छाला सहित, र त्यसपछि आफ्नो आँखा, नाक वा मुख छोएमा पनि फैलिन सक्छ।
en-mt: It can also spread when a person touches a contaminated surface, including the skin, and then even if they touch their eyes, nose, or mouth.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: यो दिशाद्वारा फैलिन सक्छ कि भन्ने चिन्तामा, यसको जोखिम कम हुने विश्वास गरिएको छ।
en-mt: Concerns about whether it could spread in this direction, its risk is believed to be reduced.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: चीन सरकारले SARS-CoV-2 को मल-मौखिक प्रसारणको सम्भावनालाई अस्वीकार गर्‍यो। लक्षणहरूको सुरुवात पछि पहिलो तीन दिनहरूमा भाइरस अत्यन्त सङ्क्रामक हुन्छ, यद्यपि लक्षण देखा पर्नु अघि र रोगको पछिल्ला चरणहरूमा पनि यो फैलिनु सम्भव छ।
en-mt: The Chinese government ruled out the possibility of stool-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2. The virus is highly contagious in the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although it is possible to spread before symptoms appear and later stages of the disease.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: महत्त्वपूर्ण लक्षणहरू देखिनु भन्दा पहिले सङ्क्रमणको सुझाव दिने लक्षणहरू सुरु हुनुअघि मानिसहरूले तीन दिनसम्म रोगका लागि गरिएको परीक्षण सकारात्मक देखिएको छ।
en-mt: People have tested positive for the disease for three days before the onset of symptoms that suggest infection before significant symptoms appear.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: प्रयोगशालामा लक्षणरहितका पुष्टि भएका थोरै मात्रामा घटनाहरू रहेका छन् तर सम्पर्क ट्रेस अनुसन्धानको क्रममा लक्षणरहित अवस्थामा पनि रोग सरेको केही देशहरूद्वारा पहिचान गरिएको छ।
en-mt: There have been a small number of confirmed cases of asymptomatic transmission in the laboratory, but contact trace research has been identified by some countries where the disease has been transmitted even in asymptomatic conditions.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: रोग रोकथाम र नियन्त्रणका लागि युरोपेली केन्द्र (ECDC) भन्छ कि यो रोग कति सजिलै फैलिन्छ भन्ने पूर्ण रूपमा स्पष्ट छैन, एक व्यक्ति सामान्यतः दुई देखि तीन अन्यलाई सङ्क्रमित गर्दछ। भाइरस सतहहरूमा घण्टौँ देखि धेरै दिनसम्म जीवित रहन्छ।
en-mt: The European Center for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, with one person typically infecting two to three others. The virus survives on surfaces for hours to several days.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: विशेष रूपमा, भाइरसलाई प्लास्टिक (पोलिप्रोपाइलिन) र 304 स्टेनलेस स्टिलमा तीन दिनसम्म, कार्डबोर्डमा एक दिनको लागि, र तामामा चार घण्टासम्म पत्ता लगाउन सकिने तथ्य फेला पर्‍यो।
en-mt: Specifically, the fact that the virus can be detected in plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel for up to three days, for a day on cardboard, and up to four hours in copper was found.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: यद्यपि यो आद्रता र तापक्रमको आधारमा फरक हुन्छ। COVID-19 को लागि परीक्षणमा पाल्तु जनावर र अरू जनावरहरूलाई सकारात्मक नतिजा आएको छ।
en-mt: However, it varies depending on humidity and temperature. Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: कुनै प्रमाण छैन कि जनावरहरूले भाइरसलाई मानवमा सार्न सक्दछन्, यद्यपि बेलायती अधिकारीहरूले जनावरहरूसँगको सम्पर्कपछि आफ्नो हात धुने सल्लाह दिन्छन्, जसरी सङ्क्रमित मानिसहरूले छोएका हुन सक्ने अन्य सतहहरूसँग सम्पर्कपछि धुने गरिन्छ।
en-mt: There is no evidence that animals can transmit the virus to humans, although British authorities recommend washing their hands after contact with animals, just as washing after contact with other surfaces that may have been touched by infected people.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: गम्भीर तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सिन्ड्रोम कोरोनाभाइरस 2 (SARS-CoV-2) एक नयाँ भाइरस हो, जुन पहिले वुहान का तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वासको विरामीका केसहरूको समूहसँग जोडिएको निमोनियाँ भएको तीन मानिसबाट छुट्टिएको थियो।
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a new virus, previously isolated from three people with pneumonia linked to a group of cases of acute respiratory illness from Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: नोभेल SARS-CoV-2 भाइरसका सबै सुविधाहरू प्रकृतिमा सम्बन्धित कोरोनाभाइरसमा देखा पर्दछन्। मानव शरीर बाहिर, भाइरसलाई घरेलु साबुनद्वारा मार्न सकिन्छ, जसले यसको सुरक्षात्मक संरचनालाई विघटन गर्दछ। SARS-CoV-2 यसको मूल SARS-CoV सँग घनिष्ट रूपमा सम्बन्धित छ।
en-mt: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus appear in the corresponding coronavirus in nature. Outside the human body, the virus can be killed by homemade soap, which disrupts its protective structure. SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to its original SARS-CoV.

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: यो एक जुनोटिक मूलको हो भनेर सोचिन्छ।
en-mt: It is thought to be of a zoonotic origin.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: आनुवंशिक विश्लेषणले कोरोनाभाइरस वंशाणुगत रूपमा दुई चमेरोबाट-व्युत्पन्न प्रयासको साथमा जिनस बिटाकोरोनाभाइरस, उपजिनस सार्बिकोभाइरस (वंश B) मा समूहमा बस्ने खुलासा गरेको छ।
en-mt: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus lives in groups in the genus Betacoronavirus, the subgenus sarbicovirus (lineage B) with a genetically-derived attempt from two bats.

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: यो अन्य ब्याट कोरोनाभाइरस नमुनाहरू संग पूरा जीनोम स्तरमा 96% समान छ (BatCov RaTG13)।
en-mt: This is 96% identical at the whole genome level with other Bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा, चिनियाँ अन्वेषकहरूले पत्ता लगाए कि जीनोम अनुक्रमको केहि भागहरूमा पाइनोलिनका भाइरसहरू र मानवबाट आएका भाइरसबीच एउटा मात्र एमिनो एसिड को फरक छ।
en-mt: In February 2020, Chinese investigators discovered that parts of the genome sequence contained a single amino acid difference between viruses of pynoline and viruses that came from humans.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: यो मितिसम्म पूर्ण-जिनोम तुलनाले सालक कोरोनाभाइरस र SARS-CoV-2 बीच आनुवंशिक सामग्रीको अधिकतम 92% साझा गरिएको भेट्टाएको छ, जुन सालकहरू मध्यवर्ती होस्ट भएको प्रमाणित गर्न अपर्याप्त छ।
en-mt: A full-genome comparison to this date has found that a maximum of 92% of the genetic material is shared between salk coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove that the salks are intermediate hosts.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: सङ्क्रमितको निष्कासन वा CT इमेजिङको रिभर्स ट्रान्स्क्रिप्सन पोलिमरेज चेन रियाक्सन (rRT-PCR) द्वारा अन्तिम पुष्टि हुने भएता पनि भाइरसद्वारा सङ्क्रमणको निदान अस्थायी रूपमा लक्षणहरूको आधारमा गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: Although the removal of an infected person or reverse transcription of CT imaging is finally confirmed by polymerase chain reaction (RRT-PCR), the diagnosis of infection by the virus can be made temporarily based on symptoms.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: PCR सँग CT तुलना गर्ने एउटा अध्ययनले CT PCR भन्दा उल्लेखनीय रूपमा धेरै संवेदनशील तथापि कम विशिष्ट रहेको सुझाव दिएको थियो, यसका धेरै चित्राङ्कन सुविधाहरूले निमोनिया र अन्य रोग प्रक्रियासँग समायोजन गर्दछन्।
en-mt: One study comparing CT with PCR suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive yet less specific than PCR, with many of its drawing features modulating pneumonia and other disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: मार्च 2020 सम्म, अमेरिकन कलेज अफ रेडियोलोजीले सिफारिस गर्छ कि, COVID-19 को स्क्रिन वा निदान का निम्ति पहिलो लाइनको परीक्षणको रूपमा CT को प्रयोग गर्नु हुँदैन।
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that CT should not be used as a screen or first-line test for diagnosis of COVID-19.

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: WHO ले SARS-CoV-2 का लागि थुप्रै RNA परीक्षण प्रोटोकल प्रकाशित गरेको छ, यो पहिलो 17 जनवरीमा जारी गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, it was first released on January 17.

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: यो परीक्षणले रियल-टाइम रिभर्स ट्रान्स्क्रिप्सन पोलिमरेज चेन रियाक्सन (rRT-PCR) प्रयोग गर्छ।
en-mt: This test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: परीक्षण श्वासप्रश्वास वा रगत नमुनाहरूमा गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: परिणामहरू सामान्यतया केही घण्टादेखि दिनसम्ममा उपलब्ध हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Results are usually available from a few hours to days.

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: सामान्यतः यो परीक्षण नासोफरेन्जियल स्वाबमा गरिन्छ जब कि घाँटीको स्वाब पनि प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ। धेरै प्रयोगशाला र कम्पनीहरूले सेरोलोजिकल परीक्षणहरू विकास गरिरहेका छन्, जसले एन्टिबडीहरू पत्ता लगाउँदछन्।
en-mt: Usually this test is done in nasopharyngeal swabs while throat swabs can also be used. Many laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: 6 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, यीमध्ये कुनै पनि व्यापक रूपमा प्रयोगको लागि स्वीकृत हुनको लागि पर्याप्त रूपमा सही प्रमाणित भएको छैन।
en-mt: As of 6 April 2020, none of these have been proven to be sufficiently accurate to be widely accepted for use.

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: अमेरिकामा सेलेक्सद्वारा विकसित एक सेरोलोजिकल परीक्षण मात्र प्रमाणित प्रयोगशालाहरूद्वारा आपतकालीन उपयोगका लागि अनुमोदित गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: Only a serological test developed by Selex in the U.S. was approved for emergency use by certified laboratories.

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: लक्षण देखिएका मानिसको रेडियोग्राफमा विशेषतागत तस्विर लिने सुविधा र कम्प्युटेड टोमोग्राफी (CT) मा एसिमेट्रिक पेरिफेरल ग्राउन्ड ग्लास ओप्यासिटिज र एब्सेन्ट प्ल्युरल इफ्युजन्स समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Radiographs of symptomatic people include characteristic imagery and computed tomography (CT) includes asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacetes and absent pleural effusions.

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: इटालियन रेडियोलोजिकल सोसाइटीले पुष्टि भएका मामिलाहरुका लागि इमेजिङ निष्कर्षको एक अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय अनलाइन डाटाबेस सङ्कलन गर्दै छ।
en-mt: The Italian Radiological Society is collecting an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: एडेनोभायरस जस्ता अन्य सङ्क्रमणहरूसँग अधिव्यापनको कारण, PCR द्वारा पुष्टिबिना इमेजिङबाट COVID-19 पहिचान गर्नु सीमित विशिष्टता हो।
en-mt: Due to overlapping with other infections such as adenoviruses, identifying COVID-19 from imaging without confirmation by PCR is limited specificity.

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: चीनमा एक ठूलो अध्ययनले छातीको CT परिणामहरूलाई PCR सँग दाँज्यो र यो प्रदर्शित गर्‍यो कि यद्यपि सङ्क्रमणका लागि इमेजिङ कम विशिष्ट छ, यो छिटो र अधिक संवेदनशील छ, महामारी क्षेत्रमा एक स्क्रिनिङ उपकरणको रूपमा यसको विचार गर्न सुझाव दियो।
en-mt: A large study in China compared chest CT results with PCR and demonstrated that although imaging is less specific for infections, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: रेडियोग्राफ र CT दुबैले भाइरसको तस्विर लिने सुविधा पहिचान गर्न कृत्रिम बुद्धिमत्ता-आधारित कन्भोल्युसनल न्युरल नेटवर्कहरूको विकास गरिएको छ।
en-mt: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to identify the feature of both radiographs and CT taking pictures of viruses.

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: रोगको सञ्चारलाई रोक्ने रणनीतिहरूमा समग्र व्यक्तिगत सरसफाइ गर्नु, हात धुनु, नधोएको हातले आँखा, नाक र मुखमा नछुनु र टिस्युमा खोक्नु र हाच्छयुँ गर्नु र टिस्युलाई सिधै फोहोर फाल्ने भाँडोमा राख्नु पर्दछन्।
en-mt: Strategies to prevent the transmission of the disease include overall personal hygiene, washing hands, not touching eyes, nose and mouth with unwashed hands, coughing and sneezing into tissues, and placing the tissue directly in a garbage bin.

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: पहिले नै सङ्क्रमण हुन सक्ने मानिसहरूलाई सार्वजनिक स्थानहरूमा सर्जिकल मास्क लगाउन सुझाव दिइन्छ।
en-mt: People who may already be infected are advised to wear surgical masks in public places.

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: प्रसारण रोक्नका लागि भौतिक दूरीको उपायहरू पनि सिफारिस गरिएको छ। धेरै सरकारहरूले प्रकोपबाट प्रभावित देश र क्षेत्रहरूमा वा त्यहाँबाट सबै अनावश्यक यात्रा विरुद्ध प्रतिबन्ध वा सल्लाह दिएका छन्।
en-mt: Physical distancing measures have also been recommended to stop transmission. Many governments have banned or advised against all unnecessary travel to or from countries and territories affected by the outbreak.

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: यद्यपि, भाइरस विश्वको ठूला भागहरूमा समुदाय प्रसारको अवस्थामा पुगेको छ।
en-mt: However, the virus has reached a stage of community spread in large parts of the world.

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: यसको मतलब भाइरस समुदायहरूमा फैलिरहेको छ, र केही समुदायका सदस्यहरूलाई थाहा छैन कि कहाँ र कसरी उनीहरू सङ्क्रमित भएका थिए। सङ्क्रमित कसैको हेरचाह गरिरहेका स्वास्थ्य सेवा प्रदायकहरू लाई मानक सावधानी, सम्पर्क सावधानी, र आँखा को सुरक्षा प्रयोग गर्न सिफारिस गरिन्छ। सम्पर्क ट्रेसिंग स्वास्थ्य अधिकारीहरूका लागि सङ्क्रमणको स्रोत निर्धारण गर्न र थप प्रसारण रोक्ने एक महत्त्वपूर्ण विधि हो।
en-mt: This means the virus is spreading in communities, and some community members don't know where and how they were infected.
