sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: 20 मार्चमा, सरकारले घोषणा गर्‍यो कि पब र जिम जस्ता सबै मनोरञ्जन प्रतिष्ठानहरू सकेसम्म चाँडो बन्द हुनु पर्यो, र संकटमा बेरोजगारी रोक्नका लागि प्रति महिना £2,500 को सीमामा मजदुरको ज्याला 80% सम्म भुक्तान गर्ने वाचा गर्यो। 23 मार्चमा प्रधानमन्त्रीले कडा सामाजिक दूरीको घोषणा गरे, दुई भन्दा बढी व्यक्तिको भेलामा प्रतिबन्ध लगाए र अत्यावश्यक रहेको अवस्था बाहेक यात्रा र बाहिरी गतिविधिलाई कडाइका साथ प्रतिबन्ध लगाए।
en-mt: On March 20, the government announced that all entertainment establishments such as pubs and gyms had to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages in the range of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis. On March 23, the prime minister announced strict social distancing, banned gatherings of more than two people, and strictly banned travel and outdoor activities except when necessary.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: पहिलेका उपायहरू जस्तो नभई यी प्रतिबन्धहरूलाई प्रहरीले जरिवाना तिर्न लगाउने र जम्मा गर्ने लगायतका कार्यहरू मार्फत लागू गरेका थिए।
en-mt: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforced by the police through actions, including fines and deposits.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: सुपरमार्केट, औषधि पसल, बैङ्क, हार्डवेयर पसल, पेट्रोल स्टेसन र ग्यारेजहरू लगायत "अत्यावश्यक" भनिएका व्यवसायबाहेक धेरै व्यवसायहरू बन्द गर्ने आदेश दिइयो।
en-mt: Many businesses were ordered to close except for what were called "essential" businesses, including supermarkets, drug stores, banks, hardware stores, petrol stations, and garages.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: 20 जनवरीमा, COVID-19 को पहिलो ज्ञात घटना वासिङ्टनको प्रशान्त उत्तर पश्चिम राज्यमा 15 जनवरीमा वुहानबाट फर्केका एक व्यक्तिमा पुष्टि भएको थियो।
en-mt: On January 20, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in a person who returned from Wuhan on January 15 in washington's Pacific northwest state.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: ह्वाइटहाउसको कोरोना भाइरस विशेष कार्यदल 29 जनवरीमा स्थापना भएको थियो।
en-mt: The White House Coronavirus Special Task Force was established on January 29.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: 31 जनवरीमा, ट्रम्प प्रशासनले सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य आपतकाल घोषणा गर्‍यो, र चीनबाट यात्रीहरूको प्रवेशमा प्रतिबन्ध लगायो।
en-mt: On January 31, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and banned the entry of travelers from China.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: 28 जनवरी 2020 मा, संयुक्त राज्य सरकारको प्रमुख सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य संस्था, रोग नियन्त्रण केन्द्रद्वारा उनीहरूले आफ्नै परीक्षण किट विकास गरेको घोषणा गरेको थियो।
en-mt: On January 28, 2020, the United States government's premier public health institution, the Centers for Disease Control, announced that they had developed their own test kits.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: त्यसो गर्नुको बावजूद, संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाले परीक्षणमा ढिलो सुरुवात गर्‍यो, जसले त्यस समयमा प्रकोपको वास्तविक हदलाई अस्पष्ट बनायो।
en-mt: Despite doing so, the United States made a slow start to testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: फेब्रुअरीमा सङ्घीय सरकारद्वारा उत्पादित दोषपूर्ण परीक्षण किटहरूद्वारा परीक्षण गरिएको थियो, फेब्रुअरीको अन्तसम्ममा गैर-सरकारी परीक्षण किटहरूको (शिक्षाविद्, कम्पनी र अस्पतालहरूद्वारा) लागि सङ्घीय सरकारको अनुमतिको अभाव र मार्चको प्रारम्भसम्म (त्यसपछि डाक्टरको सिफारिस आवश्यक पर्ने) मानिसहरूको लागि प्रतिबन्धात्मक मापदण्ड परीक्षणको लागि योग्य थियो।
en-mt: Tests were carried out by faulty testing kits produced by the federal government in February, with the lack of federal government permission for non-government testing kits (by academics, companies and hospitals) by the end of February, and restrictive standards for people eligible for testing until early March (then requiring a doctor's recommendation).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: 27 फेब्रुअरीसम्ममा, वासिङ्टन पोष्टले संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा 4,000 भन्दा कम परीक्षणहरू गरिएको रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो।
en-mt: As of February 27, the Washington Post reported that fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: 13 मार्चसम्म, एट्लान्टिकले 14,000 भन्दा कम परीक्षणहरू भइसकेको रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो।
en-mt: As of March 13, the Atlantic reported that fewer than 14,000 tests had been conducted.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: रोगको लक्षण देखिएका मानिसहरू डाक्टरको आदेशमा परीक्षणको लागि घण्टा वा दिन कुर्दै आएका छन् भनी 22 मार्चका दिन एसोसिएटेड प्रेसले प्रतिवेदन दिएको थियो। संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा पहिलो मृत्यु 29 फेब्रुअरीका दिन वासिङ्टन राज्यमा भएको भनिएपछि गभर्नर जे इन्सलीले आपतकालीन अवस्थाको घोषणा गरेका थिए भने आपतकालीन अवस्था अन्य राज्यहरूद्वारा पनि अनुसरण गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: On March 22, the Associated Press reported that people with symptoms of the disease had been waiting for hours or days for tests ordered by a doctor. Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency after the first death in the United States was said to have occurred in Washington state on February 29, while a state of emergency was followed by other states as well.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: सियाटल क्षेत्रका विद्यालयहरूले 3 मार्चमा कक्षा रद्द गरे, मार्चको मध्यसम्ममा, देश भरका विद्यालयहरू बन्द भइरहेका थिए। 6 मार्च 2020 मा, संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकालाई इम्पेरियल कलेज लन्डन का महामारी रोग विशेषज्ञहरूको एक समूहले नयाँ कोरोनाभाइरसको देशमा पार्ने प्रभावको प्रक्षेपणको सुझाव दियो।
en-mt: Schools in the Seattle area canceled classes on March 3, by mid-March, schools across the country were closing. On March 6, 2020, a group of epidemiologists from Imperial College London to the United States suggested a projection of the impact the new coronavirus would have on the country.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: सोही दिन राष्ट्रपति ट्रम्पले कोरोनाभाइरस पूर्व तयारी र प्रतिक्रिया पूरक विनियोजन ऐनमा हस्ताक्षर गरे जसले यस प्रकोपलाई सम्बोधन गर्न सङ्घीय एजेन्सीहरूलाई $8.3 अर्बको आपतकालिन रकम प्रदान गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On the same day, President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided an emergency amount of $8.3 billion to federal agencies to address this outbreak.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: निगमहरूले कर्मचारी यात्रामा प्रतिबन्ध गर्दै सम्मेलनहरू रद्द गरेका छन् र कामदारहरूलाई घरबाटै काम गर्न प्रोत्साहित गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Corporations have canceled conferences banning employee travel and encouraged workers to work from home.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: खेलकुद प्रतियोगिताहरू र सिजनहरु रद्द गरिए। 11 मार्चमा, ट्रम्पले 13 मार्चदेखि प्रभावकारी हुने गरी, 30 दिनका लागि संयुक्त अधिराज्य बाहेक धेरै जसो युरोपका लागि यात्रा प्रतिबन्धको घोषणा गरे।
en-mt: Sporting events and seasons were canceled. On March 11, Trump announced a travel ban for most of Europe, except the United Kingdom, for 30 days, with effect from March 13.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: भोलिपल्ट उहाँले युनाइटेड किंगडम र आयरल्यान्ड लाई सामेल गर्न प्रतिबन्धहरू विस्तार गर्नु भयो।
en-mt: The next day he extended restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: 13 मार्चमा, उनले राष्ट्रिय आपतकालको घोषणा गरे, जसले सङ्कटको सामना गर्न सङ्घीय कोषहरू उपलब्ध गरायो।
en-mt: On March 13, he declared a national emergency, which provided federal funds to combat the crisis.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: 15 मार्चको सुरुवातदेखि, अमेरिका भरि धेरै व्यवसायहरू भाइरसको फैलावट घटाउने प्रयास स्वरूप बन्द भए वा कार्य समय घटाए।
en-mt: Since the beginning of March 15, many businesses across the U.S. have closed or reduced working hours in an effort to slow the spread of the virus.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: 17 मार्चसम्ममा, सबै 50 राज्य र कोलम्बिया जिल्लामा महामारीको पुष्टि भइसकेको थियो। 23 मार्चमा, यो रिपोर्ट गरियो कि न्युयोर्क सहरमा कोरोनाभाइरसका 10,700 मामिलाहरू थिए, जुन दक्षिण कोरियामा भएका केस सङ्ख्या भन्दा बढी थियो।
en-mt: By March 17, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and Districts of Columbia. On March 23, it was reported that There were 10,700 cases of coronavirus in New York City, which was more than the number of cases in South Korea.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: 25 मार्चमा, गभर्नरले भने कि सामाजिक दूरीले काम गरिरहेको देखिन्छ, किनकि घटनाको दोब्बर हुने अनुमान 2.0 दिनबाट 4.7 दिनमा घट्यो।
en-mt: On March 25, the governor said that social distancing appears to be working, as estimates of doubling of events decreased from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: 28 मार्च सम्म, न्युयोर्क शहरमा, 32,308 पुष्टि भएका मामिलाहरू थिए र भाइरसबाट 672 जना मरेका थिए। 26 मार्चमा, संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा चीन र इटालीलगायत विश्वका अन्य कुनै पनि देशहरूको तुलनामा अधिक पुष्टि भएका कोरोनाभाइरस सङ्क्रमण भएको रिपोर्ट गरियो। 8 अप्रिल सम्म, संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा 400,335 मामिलाहरू पुष्टि भइसकेका छन्, र 12,841 मानिस मरेका छन्।
en-mt: As of March 28, in New York City, there were 32,308 confirmed cases and 672 deaths from the virus. On March 26, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infections than any other country in the world, including China and Italy. As of April 8, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: 30 मार्चमा मिडिया रिपोर्टहरू अनुसार, अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति ट्रम्पले 30 अप्रिलसम्म सामाजिक दूरी निर्देशनहरू लम्ब्याउने निर्णय गरे।
en-mt: According to media reports on March 30, US President Trump decided to extend social distancing guidelines until April 30.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: त्यही दिन, USNS कम्फर्ट, लगभग 1000 शैय्या भएको अस्पताल जहाजले न्युयोर्कमा लंगर गर्यो।
en-mt: On the same day, USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, anchored in New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: 3 अप्रिलमा, संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा 24 घण्टाको अवधिमा कोरोनाभाइरसका कारण 884 जनाको मृत्यु भएको थियो।
en-mt: On April 3, 884 people died of coronavirus in the United States in a span of 24 hours.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: 3 अप्रिलसम्ममा अमेरिकाको न्युयोर्क राज्यमा 100,000 भन्दा बढी मानिसहरूमा सङ्क्रमण सार्वजनिक भएको थियो। स्वास्थ्य अधिकारी र वैज्ञानिकहरूलाई भाइरस सम्बन्धी सार्वजनिक बयानहरू र भाइरस सम्बन्धी प्रकाशनहरू समन्वय गर्न निर्देशन दिएका कारण उपराष्ट्रपति माइक पेन्सको कार्यालयसँगै उक्त बयानहरूलाई कम गर्ने र मेसेजिङ नियन्त्रण गरेका कारण ह्वाइट हाउसको आलोचना गरिएको छ।
en-mt: By April 3, more than 100,000 people had tested positive for the virus in New York State. The White House has been criticised for downplaying statements and controlling messaging, along with Vice President Mike Pence's office for directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and virus-related publications.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: ट्रम्पको सङ्कट व्यवस्थापनको समग्र अनुमोदनलाई पक्षपाती रेखामा ध्रुवीकरण गरिएको छ।
en-mt: Trump's overall approval of crisis management has been polarised along partisan lines.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: केही अमेरिकी अधिकारी र टिप्पणी कर्ताहरूले चीनबाट आवश्यक मेडिकल आपूर्ति, सहित महत्वपूर्ण सामग्रीको आयातमा अमेरिकाको निर्भरताको आलोचना गरे।
en-mt: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on imports of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: हवाई यात्राको ढाँचाको विश्लेषण फैलावटको मानचित्र र ढाँचा पत्ता लगाउन प्रयोग गरिएको थियो र मध्य-जनवरी 2020 मा द जर्नल अफ ट्राभल मेडिसिनमा प्रकाशित गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: Analysis of the pattern of air travel was used to map and find patterns of dispersion and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय हवाई यातायात सङ्गठनको 2018 को जानकारी अनुसार बैङ्कक, हङकङ, टोकियो र ताइपेईमा वुहानबाट सबैभन्दा बढी मात्रामा यात्रुहरू गएका थिए।
en-mt: According to the 2018 information of the International Air Transport Organization, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo and Taipei had the highest number of passengers from Wuhan.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: दुबई, सिड्नी र मेलबर्न पनि वुहानबाट यात्रा गर्ने व्यक्तिहरूका लागि लोकप्रिय गन्तव्यस्थलहरूको रूपमा रिपोर्ट गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: Dubai, Sydney and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people traveling from Wuhan.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: तयारीका हिसाबले 20 सबैभन्दा लोकप्रिय गन्तव्य सहरहरूमा बाली कम्तिमा सक्षम सहरको रूपमा चिनिन्छ, जबकि अष्ट्रेलियाका सहरहरू सबैभन्दा सक्षम मानिन्छन्। अस्ट्रेलियाले नोभेम्बर कोरोनाभाइरसको लागि आपतकालीन प्रतिक्रिया योजना (COVID-19) 7 फेब्रुअरीमा जारी गरेको थियो।
en-mt: Among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, Bali is known as the least capable city, while cities in Australia are considered the most capable. Australia released the Emergency Response Plan (COVID-19) for the November coronavirus on February 7.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: यसले बतायो कि COVID-19 को बारेमा अझै धेरै कुरा खोज्न बाँकी छ र अस्ट्रेलियाले विश्वमहामारीको प्रतिक्रियामा सीमाना नियन्त्रण र सञ्चारमा जोड दिन्छ।
en-mt: It pointed out that there is still much to be discovered about COVID-19 and australia's emphasis on border control and communication in response to the global pandemic.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: 21 मार्चमा, अस्ट्रेलियामा मानव सुरक्षाको आपतकालीन स्थितिको घोषणा गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: On March 21, a state of emergency of human security was declared in Australia.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: वुहान र हुबेईमा सार्वजनिक यातायातको प्रभावकारी क्वारेन्टाइनका कारण, धेरै देशहरूले मुख्यतया गृह राष्ट्रको चार्टर्ड उडानहरूको माध्यमबाट आफ्ना नागरिकहरू र कूटनीतिक कर्मचारीहरूलाई यस क्षेत्रबाट बाहिर निकाल्ने योजना बनाएका छन्, जसमा चिनियाँ अधिकारीहरूले निकासी दिएका छन्।
en-mt: Due to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, many countries plan to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the region mainly through chartered flights to the home country, in which Chinese authorities have evacuated.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: क्यानडा, संयुक्त राज्य, जापान, भारत, श्रीलङ्का, अष्ट्रेलिया, फ्रान्स, अर्जेन्टीना, जर्मनी र थाइल्याण्ड हरू आफ्नो नागरिकलाई निकाल्ने योजना बनाउने मध्येका प्रथम देशहरू थिए।
en-mt: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany and Thailand were among the first countries to plan to evacuate their citizens.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: पाकिस्तानले भनेको छ कि यसले चीनबाट कुनै पनि नागरिकलाई विस्थापित गराउनेछैन।
en-mt: Pakistan has said that it will not displace any citizen from China.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: 7 फेब्रुअरीमा, ब्राजिलले 34 ब्राजिलियन वा परिवारका सदस्यहरूलाई चार पोलिस, एक चिनियाँ व्यक्ति र एक भारतीय नागरिकसहित उद्धार गरे।
en-mt: On February 7, Brazil rescued 34 Brazilians or family members, including four Polishes, a Chinese man and an Indian citizen.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: पोल्याण्ड, चीन र भारतका नागरिकहरू पोल्याण्डमा विमानबाट तल झरे, जहाँ ब्राजिलियन विमानले ब्राजिल को लागि आफ्नो मार्ग अनुसरण गर्नु अघि एक स्टपओभर गर्यो।
en-mt: Citizens of Poland, China and India got off the plane in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: वुहान गएका ब्राजिलका नागरिकहरूलाई ब्राजिलिया नजिकको एक सैन्य अड्डामा क्वारेन्टाइनमा राखिएको थियो।
en-mt: Brazilians who had gone to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brazilia.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: त्यही दिनमा, 215 क्यानेडियालीहरू (पहिलो विमानबाट 176 र दोस्रो संयुक्त राज्य सरकारको चार्टर्ड विमानबाट 39) लाई वुहानबाट निकास गरी CFB ट्रेन्टनमा दुई हप्ताका लागि क्वारेन्टाइन मा राखिएको थियो।
en-mt: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane and 39 from the second United States government chartered plane) were evacuated from Wuhan and quarantined at CFB Trenton for two weeks.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: 11 फेब्रुअरीमा, वुहानबाट 185 क्यानडियनहरू बोकेको अर्को प्लेन CFB ट्रेन्टनमा अवतरण गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On February 11, another plane carrying 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: अस्ट्रेलियाका अधिकारीहरूले 277 नागरिकलाई खाली गराएर 3 र 4 फेब्रुअरीमा क्रिसमस टापु हिरासत केन्द्रमा पुर्याए, जो क्वारेन्टाइन सुविधाको रूपमा पुनः निर्माण गरिएको थियो, जहाँ तिनीहरू 14 दिनसम्म रहे।
en-mt: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens and took them to the Christmas Island detention center on February 3 and 4, which was rebuilt as a quarantine facility, where they stayed for 14 days.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: न्युजिल्यान्डको निकासी उडान 5 फेब्रुअरीमा अकल्याण्ड आइपुग्यो; यसका यात्रुहरू (अस्ट्रेलिया र प्यासिफिकका केही सहित) लाई अकल्याण्डको उत्तरमा ह्वाङ्गापारोआमा रहेको एउटा नौसेना बेसमा क्वारेन्टाइन गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: New Zealand's evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; Its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Hwangaparoa, north of Auckland.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: 15 फेब्रुअरीमा, संयुक्त राज्य पर्यटन जहाज डायमण्ड प्रिन्सेसमा सवार अमेरिकीलाई निकाल्ने घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On February 15, the United States announced the evacuation of americans aboard the tourism ship Diamond Princess.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: 21 फेब्रुअरीमा, डायमन्ड प्रिन्सेसबाट छोडेर हिँडेका 129 क्यानडियन यात्रु बोकेको एक प्लेन ट्रेन्टन, ओन्टारियोमा अवतरण गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On February 21, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers leaving the Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: मार्चको सुरुमा, भारत सरकारले इरानबाट आफ्ना नागरिकहरूलाई निकाल्न सुरु गर्‍यो। 14 मार्चमा दक्षिण अफ्रिकी सरकारको चार्टर्ड दक्षिण अफ्रिकी एयरवेजको विमान द्वारा 112 दक्षिण अफ्रिकी नागरिकलाई स्वदेश फिर्ता गर्‍यो।
en-mt: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran. On 14 March, 112 South African nationals were repatriated by a Chartered South African Airways flight of the South African government.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: मेडिकल स्क्रिनिंग प्रस्थान गर्नुअघि गरिएको थियो र चार दक्षिण अफ्रिकीहरू जो कोरोनाभाइरसको सङ्केत देखाइरहेका थिए, उनीहरूलाई जोखिम कम गर्नका निम्ति छोडिएको थियो।
en-mt: Medical screening was carried out before departure and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were released to reduce the risk.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: दक्षिण अफ्रिकीहरू जसले नकारात्मक परीक्षण गरेका थिए उनीहरूलाई मात्र स्वदेश फिर्ता गरियो।
en-mt: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: परीक्षण नतिजाहरूले मानवीय मिसनमा संलग्न भएका फ्लाइट चालक दल, पाइलट, होटलका कर्मचारी, प्रहरी र सैनिकहरू लगायत सबै दक्षिण अफ्रिकीहरूलाई पूर्वसावधानीको उपायका लागि, सबै जना द रेन्च रिसोर्टमा 14-दिनको अवधिको लागि अवलोकन र क्वारेन्टाइनमा रहने स्पष्ट गरेका छन्।
en-mt: The test results made it clear that all South Africans, including flight crews, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission, will be observed and quarantined for a period of 14-day period at The Wrench Resort, for precautionary measures.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: 20 मार्चमा, संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका ले महामारीका कारण इराकबाट आफ्नो सेना लाई आंशिक रुपमा फिर्ता लैजान सुरू गर्यो।
en-mt: On March 20, the United States began withdrawing its troops from Iraq partially due to the pandemic.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: 5 फेब्रुअरीमा चिनियाँ विदेश मन्त्रालयले भन्यो कि 21 देशहरू (बेलारूस, पाकिस्तान, ट्रिनिडाड र टोबागो, इजिप्ट र इरान लगायत) ले चीनलाई सहयोग पठाएका थिए।
en-mt: On 5 February, the Chinese Foreign Ministry said that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt and Iran) had sent assistance to China.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: अमेरिकी विश्वविद्यालयका केही चिनियाँ मूलका विद्यार्थीहरू चीनको भाइरस ग्रस्त ठाउँहरूका लागि सहयोग पठाउन मद्दत गर्न एकैसाथ जोडिए र ग्रेटर सिकागो क्षेत्रको एक संयुक्त समूहले 30 जनवरीमा हुबेई प्रान्तका अस्पतालहरूका लागि 50,000 N95 मास्कहरू पठाउन प्रबन्ध गरेको बताइएको छ। मानवीय सहायता संस्था प्रत्यक्ष राहतले, फेडएक्स सँगको समन्वयमा, अन्य व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षा उपकरणको साथ 200,000 फेस मास्कहरू, पन्जाहरू र गाउनहरू सहित, आपतकालिन एयरलिफ्टद्वारा 30 जनवरीसम्म वुहान युनियन अस्पतालमा पठायो।
en-mt: Some Chinese-origin students from U.S. universities joined together to help send aid to China's virus-ridden places, and a joint group from the Greater Chicago area reportedly arranged to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in Hubei province on January 30. Humanitarian aid agency Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, dispatched 200,000 face masks, including gloves and gowns, along with other personal protective equipment, to Wuhan Union Hospital by emergency airlift until January 30.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: 5 फेब्रुअरीमा, बिल र मेलिन्डा गेट्सले “अफ्रिका र दक्षिण एसियामा जोखिममा रहेका जनसङ्ख्या” को सुरक्षाका साथै खोप अनुसन्धान र उपचार प्रयासलाई सहयोग गर्न WHO लाई $100 मिलियन दान दिने घोषणा गरे।
en-mt: On February 5, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to WHO to support vaccine research and treatment efforts as well as protect "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia."

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: इन्टरएक्सियन ले रिपोर्ट गरेको छ कि, सिनेटर रिचार्ड जोर्डनले 3.16 मिलियन मास्क वुहानलाई पठाएपछि, चिनियाँ सरकारले 6 फेब्रुअरीमा फिलिपिन्सलाई 200,000 मास्क चन्दा दिएको थियो।
en-mt: Interaxian reported that, after Senator Richard Jordan sent 3.16 million masks to Wuhan, the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on February 6.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: 19 फेब्रुअरीमा, सिङ्गापुर रेडक्रसले घोषणा गर्‍यो कि उसले चीनलाई $2.26 मिलियनको सहायता पठाउनेछ।
en-mt: On February 19, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million in aid to China.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: जापानले वुहानलाई दश लाख अनुहारको मास्क अनुदान दियो, टर्कीले चिकित्सा उपकरण चलानी गर्‍यो, रूसले 13 टनभन्दा बढी चिकित्सा आपूर्ति वुहान पठायो, मलेसियाले चीनमा 180 लाख चिकित्सा पन्जा दान दिने घोषणा गर्‍यो, जर्मनीले 10,000 हजमत सुटहरू लगायत विभिन्न चिकित्सा आपूर्ति प्रदान गर्‍यो र संयुक्त राज्यले 17.8 टन चिकित्सा आपूर्ति चीनलाई दान गर्‍यो र प्रभावित देशहरूमा वित्तीय सहायताको लागि थप $100 मिलियन दिने वाचा गर्‍यो। चीनका केसहरू स्थिर भएको देखिएपछि, यो देशले विश्व महामारी भएका विभिन्न देशहरूमा सहायता पठाइरहेको छ।
en-mt: Japan donated a million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey challaned medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tons of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced to donate 180 million medical gloves to China, Germany provided various medical supplies, including 10,000 hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million for financial assistance to affected countries. After china's cases stabilized, the country is sending aid to various countries with global epidemics.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: मार्चमा, चीन, क्युबा र रूसले इटालीलाई कोरोनाभाइरसको प्रकोपलाई सामना गर्न चिकित्सकीय सामग्रीहरू र विज्ञहरू पठाए।
en-mt: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to Italy to combat the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: व्यवसायी ज्याक मा ले 11 लाख परीक्षण किट, 60 लाख अनुहारको मास्क र 60,000 सुरक्षात्मक सुटहरू अफ्रिकी युनियनद्वारा वितरण गर्ने गरी एडिस अबाबा, इथियोपियामा पठाए।
en-mt: Businessman Jack Ma shipped 1.1 million test kits, 6 million face masks and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, to be distributed by the African Union.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: पछि उनले 5,000 टेस्ट किट्स, 100,000 फेस मास्क र 5 भेन्टिलेटरहरू पानामा पठाए।
en-mt: He later sent 5,000 test kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: माले पनि क्यानडामा चिकित्सा आपूर्तिहरू दान गर्‌यो। नेदरल्यान्ड, स्पेन, टर्की, जर्जिया र चेक गणतन्त्रले चिनियाँ निर्मित मास्क र टेस्ट किटका बारेमा आफ्नो चिन्ता व्यक्त गरे।
en-mt: Male also donated medical supplies to Canada. The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns about Chinese-made masks and test kits.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: उदाहरणका लागि, स्पेनले मात्र 30% को सटीकता दर भएका 58,000 चिनियाँ निर्मित कोरोनाभाइरस परीक्षण कीटहरू फिर्ता पठायो, यसै बीच, नेदरल्यान्डले 600,000 चिनियाँ फेस-मास्क लाई फिर्ता पठायो जो दोषपूर्ण रहेका थिए।
en-mt: Spain, for example, sent back 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus test kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands sent back 600,000 Chinese face-masks that remained defective.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: बेल्जियमले 100,000 अनुपयोगी मास्कहरू फिर्ता गरायो, जुन चीनबाट आएको ठानिएको थियो, तर वास्तवमा कोलोम्बियाबाट आएका थिए।
en-mt: Belgium returned 100,000 unusable masks, which were thought to have come from China, but actually came from Colombia.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: अर्को तर्फ, चिनियाँ सहायता ल्याटिन अमेरिका र अफ्रिकाका भागहरूमा पुगेका छन्। 2 अप्रिलमा, विश्व बैंकले विकासशील देशहरूको लागि आपतकालिन सहायता परिचालनहरू सुरु गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On the other hand, Chinese aid has reached parts of Latin America and Africa. On April 2, the World Bank launched emergency assistance operations for developing countries.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO ले महामारीको प्रबन्ध गर्न र रोकथाम गर्नमा चिनियाँ अधिकारीहरूको प्रयासको सराहना गरेको छ।
en-mt: WHO appreciated the efforts of the Chinese authorities in managing and preventing the epidemic.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO ले 2002-2004 SARS प्रकोपको बीचको भिन्नतालाई ध्यान दियो, जहाँ चिनियाँ अधिकारीहरू लाई गोपनीयता को आरोप लगाइएको थियो जसले रोकथाम र रोकथाम प्रयासमा बाधा पुर्‍यायो, र वर्तमान संकट जहाँ केन्द्रीय सरकारले “चन्द्र नयाँ वर्षको छुट्टीको अगाडि त्रासदेखि बच्न नियमित अपडेटहरू प्रदान गरेको छ”।
en-mt: WHO noted the difference between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that hindered prevention and prevention efforts, and the current crisis where the central government has "provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of the Lunar New Year holiday".

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: 23 जनवरीमा, वुहानमा यातायात प्रतिबन्धको कार्यान्वयनको केन्द्रीय अधिकारीहरूको निर्णयको प्रतिक्रियामा, WHO का प्रतिनिधि Gauden Galea ले टिप्पणी गरे कि जब यो “निश्चित रूपमा WHO ले गरेको सिफारिस होइन” यो पनि “यो त्यो ठाउँमा महामारी रोकथाम गर्ने प्रतिबद्धताको धेरै महत्त्वपूर्ण सङ्केत थियो जहाँ यो सबभन्दा बढी केन्द्रित छ” र यसलाई “सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य इतिहासमा अभूतपूर्व” भन्यो। 30 जनवरीमा, चीन बाहिर मान्छेबाट मान्छेमा सर्ने पुष्टि र अन्य देशहरूमा सङ्क्रमणको सङ्ख्यामा वृद्धि भएपछि, WHO ले प्रकोपको सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य आपतकाल (PHEIC) को छैठौँ PHEIC घोषणा गर्‍यो, यो उपाय पहिलो पटक 2009 स्वाइन फ्लुको विश्वमहामारीको बेलादेखि नै लागू गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: On January 23, in response to the central authorities' decision to implement the transport ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea commented that while it was "certainly not a recommendation made by WHO" it was also "a very important sign of a commitment to prevent the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history". On January 30, after confirmed human-to-human transmission outside China and a surge in the number of infections in other countries, WHO declared the sixth FEIC of the outbreak's Public Health Emergency (FEIC), a measure first implemented since the 2009 global pandemic of swine flu.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: WHO का महानिर्देशक टेड्रोस अडानोमले भने कि “खास गरी मजबुत स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली नभएका कम र मध्यम आय भएका देशहरूमा, PHEIC विश्वव्यापी प्रसारको जोखिमको कारण हो।”
en-mt: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said that "Especially in low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems, FEIC is due to the risk of global spread. ”

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: यात्रा प्रतिबन्धहरूको कार्यान्वयनको प्रतिक्रियामा, टेड्रोसले भने "उपायको लागि अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय यात्रा र व्यापारमा अनावश्यक रूपमा हस्तक्षेप गर्नुपर्ने कुनै कारण छैन" र "WHO ले व्यापार र चाललाई सीमित गर्ने सिफारिस गर्दैन।"
en-mt: In response to the implementation of travel restrictions, Tedros said "there is no reason for the measure to unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and "WHO does not recommend limiting trade and movement." "

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: 5 फेब्रुअरीमा WHO ले कम आय भएका देशहरूमा रणनीतिक तयारीको लागि $675 मिलियन योगदानका लागि विश्वव्यापी समुदायलाई अपील गर्यो, जसमा ती देशहरूलाई सहयोग पुर्‍याउनु जरुरी रहेको उल्लेख गरिएको थियो “जससँग भाइरस देखा परे पनि त्यसबाट सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरू पत्ता लगाउनका लागि प्रणालीको व्यवस्था छैन।”
en-mt: On February 5, WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to strategic preparedness in low-income countries, noting the need to support countries that "do not have systems in place to detect people infected with the virus even if they appear." ”

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: टेड्रोसले थप बयान गर्दै घोषणा गर्‍यो कि “हामी केवल हाम्रो कमजोर कडी जत्तिकै बलिया छौँ” र अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय समुदायलाई “आज लगानी गर्न वा पछि अधिक तिर्न” आग्रह गर्‍यो। 11 फेब्रुअरीमा, WHO ले एक प्रेस सम्मेलनमा COVID-19 लाई यस रोगको नामका रूपमा स्थापित गर्‍यो।
en-mt: Tedros further stated that "we are only as strong as our weak link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later". On February 11, WHO at a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: सोही दिन, टेड्रोसले भने कि संयुक्त राष्ट्रका महासचिव - एन्टोनियो गुटेरेसले प्रतिक्रियामा “सम्पूर्ण संयुक्त राष्ट्र प्रणालीको शक्ति” प्रदान गर्न सहमति जनाएका थिए।
en-mt: On the same day, Tedros said that UN Secretary-General - Antonio Guterres had agreed to provide "the power of the entire UN system" in response.

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: एक UN सङ्कट व्यवस्थापन टोली सक्रिय गरिएको थियो, सम्पूर्ण संयुक्त राष्ट्र संघको प्रतिक्रियाको समन्वयको अनुमति दिँदै, WHO का राज्यले “स्वास्थ्य प्रतिक्रियामा ध्यान केन्द्रित गर्न, जबकि अन्य एजेन्सीहरूले आफ्नो विशेषज्ञता प्रकोपको फराकिलो सामाजिक, आर्थिक र विकासात्मक प्रभावहरूमा ल्याउन” अनुमति दिनेछ।
en-mt: An UN crisis management team was activated, allowing coordination of the entire UN response, allowing the state of WHO to "focus on health response, while other agencies bring their expertise to the broader social, economic and developmental impacts of the outbreak."

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: 14 फेब्रुअरीमा, चीनको साथ WHO को नेतृत्वमा संयुक्त मिसन टोली सक्रिय भयो जुन चीनको भूमिमा अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय र WHO विशेषज्ञहरूलाई घरेलु व्यवस्थापनमा सहयोग पुर्‍याउन र “रोगको गम्भीरता र सङ्क्रामकताको मूल्याङ्कन गर्न” र प्रमुख राष्ट्रिय स्तरका संस्थाहरूसँग कार्यशाला र बैठकहरू गर्न र प्रतिक्रिया गतिविधिहरूको सहरी र ग्रामीण सेटिङहरू सहित प्रान्तीय र काउन्टी स्तरमा प्रभावको मूल्याङ्कन गर्न फिल्ड आक्रमणहरू गर्न सहयोग पुर्‍याउन स्थापित गरिएको थियो। 25 फेब्रुअरीमा WHO ले घोषणा गर्‍यो कि “सम्भावित कोरोनाभाइरस विश्वमहामारीका लागि संसारले अझ बढी तयारी गर्नुपर्दछ”, यो भन्यो कि यसलाई महामारी भन्न अझ चाँडै नै छ, तर पनि देशहरू “तयारीको चरणमा” हुनु पर्छ।
en-mt: On 14 February, a joint mission team led by WHO with China became active that was established to assist international and WHO experts on Chinese soil in domestic management and to "assess disease severity and contagion" and conduct workshops and meetings with major national-level institutions and conduct field attacks to evaluate the impact of response activities at the provincial and county level, including urban and rural settings. On February 25, WHO announced that "the world must prepare more for a possible coronavirus pandemic", saying it is too early to call it a pandemic, but also countries should be "in the preparatory stage".

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: इरानमा विकास भइरहेको प्रकोपको प्रतिक्रियामा, WHO ले स्थिति आकलन गर्न त्यहाँ एक संयुक्त अभियान टोली पठायो। 28 फेब्रुअरीमा WHO अधिकारीहरूले भने कि विश्वव्यापी स्तरमा कोरोनाभाइरस खतराको मूल्याङ्कन लाई “उच्च” बाट “अति उच्च” मा बढाइनेछ, यो सतर्कता र जोखिम मूल्याङ्कनको उच्च स्तर हो।
en-mt: In response to the ongoing outbreak in Iran, WHO sent a joint campaign team there to assess the situation. On February 28, WHO officials said that the assessment of the coronavirus threat on a global scale will be increased from "high" to "very high", a high level of vigilance and risk assessment.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: माइक रायन, WHO का स्वास्थ्य आपतकाल कार्यक्रमका कार्यकारी निर्देशकले एक बयानमा चेतावनी दिए कि "यो यस ग्रहमा सबै सरकारको लागि एक वास्तविक जाँच हो: जाग।
en-mt: Mike Ryan, executive director of who's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "this is a real check for all governments on this planet: wake up.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: यो भाइरस आफ्नो बाटोमा हुन सक्छ र तपाईँ तयार हुनु जरुरी छ", यो आग्रह गर्दै कि सही प्रतिक्रियाका उपायहरूले संसारलाई "यसको सबभन्दा खराब कुरा" बाट बचाउन मद्दत गर्न सक्नेछ।
en-mt: This virus can be on its way and you need to be prepared", urging that the right response measures can help save the world from "its worst".

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: रायनले अगाडि भने कि वर्तमान तथ्याङ्कले सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य अधिकारीहरूलाई विश्वव्यापी महामारीको घोषणा गर्न को लागी वारेन्टी दिँदैन, भने कि यस्तो घोषणाको अर्थ हुनेछ कि “हामी अनिवार्य रूपमा स्वीकार गर्दछौं कि यस ग्रहका सबै मानिस त्यस भाइरसको चपेटामा पर्नेछन्।”
en-mt: Ryan further said that the current data does not warrant public health authorities to declare a global pandemic, adding that such an announcement would mean that "we essentially accept that all people on this planet will be exposed to that virus." ”

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: 11 मार्चका दिन WHO ले कोरोना भाइरस प्रकोपलाई विश्वमहामारी घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On March 11, WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a global pandemic.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: महानिर्देशकले WHO "भाइरस फैलिन र गम्भीरताका चिन्ताजनक स्तरहरू र निष्क्रियताको भयङ्कर स्तरबाट चिन्तित भएको छ” भनी बताएका थिए। WHO ले यस विश्व महामारीको नियन्त्रणमा देखिएको अपर्याप्त कामका लागि महत्त्वपूर्ण आलोचनाको सामना गरेको थियो जसमा ढिलो सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य आपतकालको घोषणा र विश्वमहामारीको रूपमा भाइरसको वर्गीकरण समावेश छ।
en-mt: The director-general said who was "concerned about the alarming levels of virus spread and severity and the alarming levels of inaction." WHO has faced significant criticism for its inadequate work in controlling this global pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a global pandemic.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: प्रतिक्रियामा एउटा याचिका सामिल थियो जसमा WHO का महानिर्देशक टेड्रोस अधानोमको राजीनामाको माग गरिएको थियो र 6 अप्रिलसम्म 733,000 व्यक्तिद्वारा हस्ताक्षर गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: The response included a petition seeking the resignation of WHO Director General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus and was signed by 733,000 people as of April 6.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: 26 मार्च 2020 मा, संयुक्त राष्ट्र संघका दर्जनौँ मानव अधिकार विशेषज्ञहरूले COVID-19 महामारीको समयमा प्रत्येक व्यक्तिको अधिकारको सम्मान गर्न जोड दिए।
en-mt: On March 26, 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts stressed the need to respect the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: विज्ञ समूहले भन्यो कि सबै जना जीवन-बचाउने हस्तक्षेपका लागि हकदार छन् र सरकारले यो जिम्मेवारी लिन्छ।
en-mt: The expert group said that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government takes responsibility for it.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: समूहले जोड दियो कि संसाधनको अभाव वा स्वास्थ्य वीमाले कहिले पनि कुनै विशेष समूहको बिरूद्ध भेदभावको औचित्यको रूपमा काम गर्नुहुँदैन।
en-mt: The group emphasized that lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a particular group.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: विशेषज्ञहरूले अशक्तता भएका मानिस, अल्पसङ्ख्यक समूहमा पर्नेहरू, वृद्ध मानिस, आन्तरिक रूपमा विस्थापित मानिस, घरबारबिहिन, अत्यन्तै गरिब अवस्थामा बाँच्नेहरू, कारागारका मानिस, साथै सरकारी सहायता आवश्यक भएका शरणार्थी र अन्य अनिर्दिष्ट समूहहरू लगायतका हरेक व्यक्तिसँग स्वास्थ्यको अधिकार हुने कुरामा जोड दिए।
en-mt: Experts emphasized that everyone has the right to health, including people with disabilities, those in minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, homeless, extremely poor survivors, prison people, as well as refugees in need of government assistance and other undocumented groups.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय सरकारी सङ्गठनहरू COVID-19 सङ्कटका आर्थिक र सामाजिक प्रभावहरूलाई सम्बोधन गर्दैछन्।
en-mt: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: आर्थिक सहकार्य र विकास सङ्गठनले संसारभरिका देशहरूका नीति प्रतिक्रियाहरूको साथै दृष्टिकोण र सुझाव समयमै र व्यापक जानकारी प्रदान गर्न एक प्लेटफर्म सुरुवात गरेको छ।
en-mt: The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses as well as perspectives and suggestions from countries around the world.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली र विश्व अर्थतन्त्रलाई मजबुत गर्ने नीतिदेखि बन्दाबन्दी र यात्रामा गरिएको प्रतिबन्धको प्रभावहरू सम्बोधन गर्न, डिजिटल हबले एक देशको नीति ट्र्याकर समावेश गर्छ र यसको उद्देश्य देशहरूलाई एक अर्काबाट सिक्न मद्दत गर्न र कोरोनाभाइरस चुनौतीका लागि एक समन्वययुक्त विश्वव्यापी प्रतिक्रियालाई सहयोग गर्नु हो।
en-mt: From policies that strengthen the health system and the global economy to addressing the effects of lockdowns and restrictions on travel, Digital Hub incorporates a country's policy tracker and aims to help countries learn from each other and support a coordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: चीनको राज्य हुबेईबाट सुरु भएको विश्वमहामारीको नियन्त्रणका लागि संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका, बेलायती मन्त्रीमण्डलका मन्त्री माइकल गोभ र ब्राजिलका राष्ट्रपति जइर बोल्सनारोको छोरा एडुआर्डो बोल्सोनारोले चिनियाँ सरकारको आलोचना गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Eduardo Bolsonaro, son of Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro and the United States, British Cabinet Minister Michael Gove, have criticised the Chinese government for controlling the pandemic that began in the Chinese state of Hubei.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: चीनको कम्युनिष्ट पार्टी (CPC) का धेरै प्रान्तीय स्तरका प्रशासकहरू लाई मध्य चीनमा उनीहरूको क्वारेन्टाइन प्रयास संभालने तरिकाहरूको कारण बर्खास्त गरियो, ती क्षेत्रहरूमा राजनीतिक प्रतिष्ठानको प्रकोप प्रतिको प्रतिक्रियासँग असन्तुष्टिको संकेत हो।
en-mt: Several provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were sacked for their handling of their quarantine efforts in central China, a sign of dissatisfaction with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: केही टिप्पणीकर्ताहरू यो कदम चिनियाँ कम्युनिष्ट पार्टीका महासचिव सि जिनपिङलाई कोरोनाभाइरस प्रकोपको बारेमा जनताको क्रोधबाट जोगाउनका लागि अभिप्रेत थियो भन्ने विश्वास गर्छन्।
en-mt: Some commentators believe the move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party General Secretary Xi Jinping from public anger over the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: केही चिनियाँ अधिकारीहरू, जस्तै झाओ लिजियान ले COVID-19 U.S. वा इटालीबाट सुरु भएको बारेमा षड्यन्त्र सिद्धान्तहरूको पक्षमा वुहानमा सुरु भएको कोरोनाभाइरसको प्रारम्भिक स्वीकृति अस्वीकार गरे।
en-mt: Some Chinese officials, such as Zhao Lijian, declined initial approval of the coronavirus that originated in Wuhan in favor of conspiracy theories about COVID-19 originating in U.S. or Italy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: डोनाल्ड ट्रम्पको अमेरिकी प्रशासनले कोरोनाभाइरसलाई “चिनियाँ भाइरस” वा “वुहान भाइरस” को रूपमा जनाउँदै भनेको छ, चीनको “सेन्सरसिपले एक भाइरस सुपरचार्ज गर्‍यो जुन अब विश्वव्यापी महामारीमा परिणत भएको छ”, जसलाई केही आलोचकहरूले जातीय भेदभावको संज्ञा दिँदै र “रोग नियन्त्रण गर्न प्रशासनको असफलताबाट ध्यान विचलित” गर्ने प्रयास को रुपमा आलोचना गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Donald Trump's US administration has described the coronavirus as a "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus", saying China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which some critics have criticized as an attempt to "divert attention from the administration's failure to control the disease" by calling it racial discrimination.

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: डेली बिस्टले अमेरिकी सरकारको केबल प्राप्त गर्‍यो जुन राष्ट्रिय सुरक्षा परिषद्मा स्पष्ट उत्पत्ति भएको सञ्चार रणनीतिको रूपरेखा थियो, यस रणनीतिलाई "सबै कुरा चीनको बारेमा छ" भनेर उद्धृत गरिएको छ।
en-mt: The Daily Beast received a U.S. government cable outlining a communications strategy with clear origins in the National Security Council, a strategy cited as "everything is about China."

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: हामीलाई प्रेस सम्मेलनहरू र टेलिभिजन उपस्थितिहरू सहित कुनै पनि तरिकामा यो सन्देश बाहिर निकाल्नका लागि कोसिस गर्न भनिएको छ। पोलिटिको, विदेश नीति र ब्लूमबर्ग जस्ता संस्थाहरूले दाबी गरेका छन् कि भाइरसबाट ग्रस्त देशहरूमा सहयोग पुर्‍याउन चीनले गरेको प्रयास विश्वव्यापी प्रभावका लागि सङ्गठित प्रचारको हिस्सा हो।
en-mt: We have been asked to try to get this message out in any way, including press conferences and television appearances. Organizations such as Politico, Foreign Policy and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to help countries affected by the virus are part of an organized propaganda for global impact.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: EU का विदेश नीति प्रमुख जोसेप बोरेलले चेतावनी दिएका छन् कि “एक भू-राजनीतिक घटक छ जसमा कताई मार्फत प्रभावको लागि संघर्ष र ‘उदारताको राजनीति’ सामिल रहेको छ।”
en-mt: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that "there is a geopolitical component that includes the struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of liberalisation'." ”

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: बोरेलले यो पनि भने कि “अमेरिकाको विपरीत, चीन आक्रामक रूपमा यो सन्देश अगाडि बढाइरहेको छ कि यो एक जिम्मेवार र विश्वसनीय साझेदार हो।”
en-mt: Borrell also said that "unlike the US, China is aggressively pushing the message that it is a responsible and trusted partner." ”

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: चीनले अमेरिकालाई सिरिया, भेनेजुएला र इरानबाट आफ्नो प्रतिबन्ध हटाउन पनि आग्रह गरेको छ र पछिल्ला दुई देशहरूलाई सहयोग पठाएको बताइएको छ।
en-mt: China has also urged the US to lift its sanctions from Syria, Venezuela and Iran and has sent aid to the last two countries.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: ज्याक मा को क्युबालाई दिइएको 100,000 मास्कको दान 3 अप्रिलमा अमेरिकी प्रतिबन्धद्वारा अवरुद्ध गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by U.S. sanctions on April 3.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: अमेरिकी अधिकारीहरू पनि अन्य देशहरूका लागि आएको सहायतालाई आफ्नै देशमा मोडेकोमा आरोपित भएका छन्।
en-mt: U.S. officials have also been accused of diverting aid to other countries into their own country.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: जस्तै जर्मनी, अष्ट्रिया र स्विट्जरल्यान्ड; र चेक गणतन्त्र र इटाली जस्ता र अन्य राष्ट्रहरूबीच मास्क-सम्बन्धित विवादहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएका छन्।
en-mt: such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; And mask-related disputes have been reported between and other nations such as the Czech Republic and Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: यसबाहेक, टर्कीले स्पेनका लागि निर्धारण गरिएका सयौं भेन्टिलेटरहरू जफत गर्यो।
en-mt: In addition, Turkey confiscated hundreds of ventilators scheduled for Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: मार्चको सुरुमा इटाली सरकारले कोरोनाभाइरस-प्रभावित इटाली संग युरोपेली संघको एकजुटता को कमी को आलोचना गर्‍यो।
en-mt: In early March, the Italian government criticised the EU's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-hit Italy.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: EU का लागि इटालीका राजदूत मौरिजियो मसारीले भने, "केवल चीनले द्विपक्षीय रूपमा जवाफ दियो।
en-mt: "Only China responded bilaterally," said Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to EU.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: निश्चित रूपमा, यो युरोपेली एकताको राम्रो सङ्केत होइन।"
en-mt: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European unity. "

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: 22 मार्चमा, इटालीका प्रधानमन्त्री ग्युसेप कोन्टेसँगको फोन वार्तापछि, रूसी राष्ट्रपति भ्लादिमिर पुटिनले रूसी सेनालाई सैन्य मेडिक्स, विशेष किटाणुशोधन वाहनहरू र अन्य चिकित्सकीय सामग्रीहरू इटाली पठाउने व्यवस्था गरे।
en-mt: On 22 March, after a phone conversation with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian President Vladimir Putin arranged for the Russian army to send military Medics, specialized disinfection vehicles and other medical supplies to Italy.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: इटालीका ला स्टाम्पा पत्रिकाले एक बेनामीको “उच्च-स्तरीय राजनैतिक स्रोत” लाई उद्धृत गरे कि रूसको 80 प्रतिशत सहायता “इटालीको लागि अनुपयोगी वा थोरै उपयोगी” थियो।
en-mt: Italy's La Stampa magazine quoted an anonymous "high-level political source" as saying that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "unusable or slightly useful to Italy".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: स्रोतले रूसलाई "भू-राजनीतिक र कूटनीतिक" आकर्षण आपत्तिजनक बनाएको आरोप लगाएको थियो।
en-mt: The source accused Russia of making "geopolitical and diplomatic" attractions objectionable.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: लोम्बार्डीका राष्ट्रपति, एटिलियो फोन्टाना र इटालीका परराष्ट्र मन्त्री लगी डी माइयोले सञ्चार माध्यमका रिपोर्टहरू खारेज गरे र आफ्नो आभार व्यक्त गरे।
en-mt: Lombardy's President, Attilio Fontana, and Italy's Foreign Minister Lagi Di Maio dismissed media reports and expressed their gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: रसियाले संयुक्त राज्यमा मेडिकल सहायता सहित एक कार्गो विमान पनि पठायो।
en-mt: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical assistance to the United States.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: क्रेमलिनका प्रवक्ता दिमित्री पेस्कोभले भने कि "जब अमेरिकी सहकर्मीहरूलाई सहायता प्रदान गरिन्छ, [पुटिन] मान्दछन् कि जब चिकित्सा उपकरण र सामग्रीहरूका अमेरकी निर्माताहरू गति प्राप्त गर्दछन्, यदि आवश्यक पर्‍यो भने उनीहरू पनि गर्न सक्दछन्।"
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when assistance is provided to American colleagues, [Putin] believes that when American manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, if necessary, they can too." "

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: जर्मनी, पोल्याण्ड र बाल्टिक राज्यहरूमा योजना गरिएको NATO “डिफेन्डर 2020”, शीतयुद्धको अन्त्य पछि सबैभन्दा ठूलो NATO युद्ध अभ्यास, घटाइएको मापदण्डमा आयोजित गरिनेछ।
en-mt: The NATO "Defender 2020", the largest NATO combat exercise since the end of the Cold War, planned in Germany, Poland and the Baltic states, will be conducted on reduced standards.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: आणविक निशस्त्रीकरण अभियानका महासचिव केट हड्सनले डिफेन्डर 2020 अभ्यासको आलोचना गरेः “वर्तमान सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य सङ्कटमा, यसले अमेरिका र युरोपका धेरै संलग्न देशका सैनिकहरूको मात्र होइन बरु उनीहरू सञ्चालन गरिरहेका देशका बासिन्दाहरूको ज्यान समेत जोखिममा पार्छ।” इरानी सरकार भाइरसबाट धेरै प्रभावित भएको छ, अन्य वर्तमान वा पूर्व राजनीतिक श्रष्ठाहरूका साथसाथै लगभग दुई दर्जन संसद सदस्य सङ्क्रमित भएका छन्।
en-mt: Kate Hudson, secretary-general of the Nuclear Disarmament Campaign, criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public health crisis, it puts at risk not only the lives of the soldiers of many involved countries in the United States and Europe, but also the lives of the residents of the countries they operate in. The Iranian government has been severely affected by the virus, with other current or former political figures as well as nearly two dozen members of parliament infected.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: इरानका राष्ट्रपति हसन रूहानीले 14 मार्च 2020 मा विश्व नेताहरूलाई सहयोगको माग गर्दै एक सार्वजनिक पत्र लेखे, जसमा भनिएको थियो कि उनको देश, इरानको बिरूद्ध संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाको प्रतिबन्धको कारण अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय बजारमा पहुँचको अभावका कारण प्रकोपसँग लड्न संघर्ष गरिरहेको छ। यस प्रकोपले संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकालाई अन्य धनी देशहरूमा सामान्य रहेका सामाजिक नीतिहरू अपनाउन संकेत दिएको छ, जसमा विश्वव्यापी स्वास्थ्य सेवा, विश्वव्यापी बाल हेरचाह, भुक्तानी युक्त पारिवारिक विदा, र सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्यका लागि उच्च स्तरको कोष समावेश छन्।
en-mt: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders on 14 March 2020 seeking help, stating that his country, due to the lack of access to the international market due to U.S. sanctions against Iran, is struggling to fight the outbreak. The outbreak has prompted the United States to adopt social policies that are common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and high levels of funding for public health.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: राजनीतिक विश्लेषकहरूले अनुमान गरे कि यसले 2020 को राष्ट्रपति पदको निर्वाचनमा डोनाल्ड ट्रम्पको पुनः निर्वाचित हुने संभावनामा नकारात्मक असर पार्न सक्छ। जापान र दक्षिण कोरिया बीचको कूटनीतिक सम्बन्ध महामारीका कारण बिग्रियो।
en-mt: Political analysts speculated that this could have a negative impact on Donald Trump's chances of being re-elected in the 2020 presidential election. Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea deteriorated due to the pandemic.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: जापानले दक्षिण कोरियाबाट आउने जो कोहीलाई पनि सरकारले तोकेको स्थानमा दुई हप्ता क्वारेन्टाइनमा राखिने घोषणा गरेसँगै दक्षिण कोरियाले जापानको "अस्पष्ट र निष्क्रिय क्वारेन्टाइन प्रयास" को आलोचना गरेको थियो।
en-mt: South Korea criticised Japan's "vague and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced that anyone arriving from South Korea would be quarantined for two weeks at a government-designated location.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: दक्षिण कोरियाली समाज सुरूमा राष्ट्रपति मुन जाइ-इनको सङ्कटको प्रतिक्रियालाई लिएर ध्रुवीकरण भएको थियो।
en-mt: South Korean society was initially polarized by President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: धेरै कोरियालीहरूले उनीहरूले दाबी गरेको कुराको सट्टा चन्द्रमाको महाभियोगको आह्वान प्रकोपको सरकारी अव्यवस्थापन हुने वा उसको प्रतिक्रियाको कदरको लागि याचना पत्र हस्ताक्षर गरे। विश्वमहामारीले देशहरूलाई प्रतिक्रियामा आपतकालिन विधान पारित गर्न अनुमति दिएको छ।
en-mt: Many Koreans signed a petition asking for the moon's call for impeachment to be a government mismanagement of the outbreak, or to appreciate its response, instead of what they claimed. The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: केही टिप्पणीकारहरूले चिन्ता व्यक्त गरेका छन् कि यसले सरकारहरूलाई शक्तिमा आफ्नो पकड बलियो बनाउन मद्दत पुर्‍याउन सक्दछ।
en-mt: Some commentators have expressed concern that it could help governments strengthen their grip on power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: हङ्गेरीमा, यसको संसदले प्रधानमन्त्री भिक्टर ओरवानलाई अपरिभाषित रूपमा आदेशद्वारा शासन गर्न, संसदको साथै चुनावहरू निलम्बन गर्न र भाइरस र सङ्कटको सरकारी व्यवस्थापनमा गलत जानकारी फैलाउने पुष्टि भएकालाई सजाय दिन अनुमति दिन मतदान गर्‍यो।
en-mt: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow Prime Minister Victor Orban to rule by order undefined, suspend parliament as well as elections, and punish those who have been confirmed to spread misinformation in government management of the virus and crisis.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: प्रकोपसँग लड्न विश्वव्यापी रूपमा उपकरणहरूको बढ्दो प्रयोगले गर्दा उब्जेका आपूर्ति अभावहरू, किन्नलाई हाहाकार र कलकारखाना र व्यवस्थापन परिचालनहरूमा खलबल हुनुका धेरै उदाहरणहरूको लागि कोरोनाभाइरस प्रकोपलाई आरोप लगाइएको छ।
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages arising out of the increased use of equipment worldwide to fight the outbreak, the outcry to buy, and the disruption of factories and management operations.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: संयुक्त राज्यको खाद्य र औषधि प्रशासनले बढ्दो उपभोक्ताको माग र आपूर्तिकर्ताको अवरोधका कारण औषधि र चिकित्सा उपकरणको अभावको बारेमा चेतावनी जारी गरेको छ।
en-mt: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to rising consumer demand and supplier disruptions.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: धेरै इलाकामा संत्रासयुक्त किनमेल प्रवृत्ति देखिएको छ जसले खाद्यान्न, ट्वाइलेट पेपर र बोतलको पानी जस्ता खाद्यान्न वस्तुहरूको तखता खाली गर्यो जसले गर्दा आपूर्ति अभाव भयो।
en-mt: Panic shopping trends have been seen in many areas that emptied the stacks of food items such as food, toilet paper and bottled water, leading to supply shortages.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: विशेष गरी प्रविधि उद्योगले विद्युतीय सामानहरूको ढुवानीको ढिलाइको बारेमा चेतावनी दिइरहेका छन्।
en-mt: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays in the shipment of electronic goods.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: WHO का महानिर्देशक टेड्रोस अडानोमका अनुसार व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षा उपकरणको माग 100 गुणा बढेको छ।
en-mt: According to WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the demand for personal protective equipment has increased 100 times.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: यस मागले सामान्य मूल्यमा बीस गुणा सम्म मूल्य बृद्धि गरेको छ र चार देखि छ महिनासम्म मेडिकल सामाग्रीहरुको आपूर्तिमा ढिलाइ पनि गराएको छ।
en-mt: This demand has increased prices by up to 20 times in normal prices and delayed the supply of medical supplies for four to six months.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: यसले विश्वव्यापी व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षा उपकरणको अभाव पनि निम्त्याएको छ, WHO ले चेतावनी दिएको छ कि यसले स्वास्थ्यकर्मीहरूलाई जोखिममा पार्नेछ।
en-mt: It has also led to a global shortage of personal protective equipment, with WHO warning that it would put healthcare workers at risk.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: अष्ट्रेलियामा, विश्वमहामारीले खरिदारी गर्ने पसलेहरूका लागि अस्ट्रेलियाली उत्पादनलाई चीनमा बेच्न नयाँ मौका दियो।
en-mt: In Australia, the global pandemic gave shoppers a new opportunity to sell Australian products to China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: यस गतिविधिले केही सुपरमार्केटमा बच्चाको खानाको अभाव सिर्जना गरेको छ र त्यसपछि अष्ट्रेलिया सरकारले यसलाई प्रतिबन्ध लगाएको थियो। उत्तरी इटाली र वुहान क्षेत्रमा COVID-19 केसहरूको व्यापकता र खाद्य उत्पादनहरूको आगामी उच्च मागका बाबजुद, दुवै क्षेत्रहरूलाई गम्भीर खाद्य अभावबाट बचाइएको छ।
en-mt: The activity has created a shortage of baby food in some supermarkets and was then banned by the Australian government. Despite the prevalence of COVID-19 cases in northern Italy and the Wuhan region and the ensuing high demand for food products, both regions have been protected from severe food shortages.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: चीन र इटालीले महत्वपूर्ण उत्पादनहरूको जमाखोरी र अवैध व्यापारको विरुद्ध गरेका उपायहरू सफल भएका छन्, जसकारण युरोप र उत्तर अमेरिकामा पूर्वानुमान गरिएको तीव्र खाद्यान्न अभावबाट जोगिन सकिएको छ।
en-mt: Measures taken by China and Italy against hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, thus avoiding the predicted acute food shortages in Europe and North America.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: उत्तरी इटालीको महत्त्वपूर्ण कृषि उत्पादनको साथमा ठूलो कटौती देखिएको छैन, तर उद्योग प्रतिनिधिहरूको अनुसार मूल्य बढ्न पनि सक्दछ।
en-mt: Northern Italy's significant agricultural output has not seen a major cut, but according to industry representatives prices could also rise.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: वुहान सहरमा समेत खाली खाद्यान्नका तखताहरू अस्थायी रूपमा मात्र देखिएका थिए, जबकि चिनियाँ सरकारी अधिकारीहरूले जनसङ्ख्याको पर्याप्त पोषण सुनिश्चित गर्न पोर्क भण्डारहरू जारी गरे।
en-mt: Even in Wuhan city, empty food stockpiles were seen only temporarily, while Chinese government officials released pork stores to ensure adequate nutrition of the population.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: इटालीमा खाद्यान्न उत्पादकहरूले त्यस्ता आपतकालहरूको लागि भण्डार राख्नु पर्ने आवश्यकता युक्त यस्तै कानुनहरू अवस्थित छन्।
