en-mt: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to store for such emergencies.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: चीनमा विश्वव्यापी अर्थतन्त्रलाई क्षति भएको महसुस भएको छः 16 मार्च को एक मिडिया रिपोर्ट अनुसार, ​2020 ​को पहिलो दुई महिनामा सरकारले भाइरस फैलन नदिन गरेको उपायका कारण चीनको अर्थतन्त्रमा एकदमै ठूलो चोट पुगेको थियो र खुद्रा बिक्री 20.5% ले गिरावट भयो।
en-mt: According to a media report on March 16, China's economy suffered a huge blow in the first two months of 2020 due to measures taken by the government to contain the spread of the virus and retail sales fell by 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: चीनको मुख्य-भूमि एक प्रमुख अर्थव्यवस्था र उत्पादन केन्द्र हुनाले, यस भाइरल प्रकोपलाई विश्वव्यापी अर्थव्यवस्था मा ठूलो अस्थिरता उत्पन्न गराउने खतराको रूपमा हेरिएको छ।
en-mt: Since China's mainland is a major economy and manufacturing hub, this viral outbreak is seen as threatening to cause major instability in the global economy.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: इकोनोमिस्ट इन्टेलिजेन्स सङ्घका अगाथे डेमाराइसले पूर्वानुमान गरेकी छन् कि सम्भावित नतिजाहरूमा स्पष्ट छवि नउठुन्जेल बजार अस्थिर रहनेछ।
en-mt: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Association predicts that the market will remain volatile until a clear image emerges on the possible outcomes.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: जनवरी 2020 मा, केही विश्लेषकहरूले अनुमान गरे कि विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक वृद्धिमा महामारीको प्रभाव को नतिजा ले 2002-2004 को SARS को प्रकोपलाई पार गर्न सक्दछ।
en-mt: In January 2020, some analysts speculated that the impact of the pandemic on global economic growth could surpass the 2002-2004 SARS outbreak.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: सेन्ट लुइसको वासिङ्टन विश्वविद्यालयका एक विशेषज्ञले गरेको एक अनुमानले विश्वको आपूर्ति श्रृङ्खलामा $300+ अर्ब डलरको प्रभाव पारेको छ जुन दुई वर्षसम्म रहन सक्छ।
en-mt: An estimate by an expert at Washington University in St. Louis has an impact of $300 billion on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: चीनबाट मागको कमीका कारण तेलको मूल्यमा ठूलो गिरावट आएको ले गर्दा पेट्रोलियम निर्यात गर्ने देशहरूको सङ्गठन (OPEC) कथित रुपले संघर्षरत छ।
en-mt: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) is reportedly struggling due to a sharp drop in oil prices due to a lack of demand from China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: विश्वव्यापी सेयर बजारमा 24 फेब्रुअरीमा चीनको मुख्य भूभाग बाहिर COVID-19 सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरूको संख्यामा उल्लेखनीय वृद्धि भएको कारण गिरावट आयो।
en-mt: Global stock markets fell on February 24 due to a significant increase in the number of PEOPLE infected with COVID-19 outside mainland China.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: 27 फेब्रुअरीमा, कोरोनाभाइरस प्रकोपको बारेमा बढ्दो चिन्ताको कारण, NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 सूचक र डो जोन्स औद्योगिक औसत सहित विभिन्न अमेरिकी स्टक इन्डेक्सहरूले 2008 भन्दा पछि डो 1,191 अङ्कले गिरावट सहित उनीहरूको सबभन्दा बढी गिरावट पोस्ट गरे, जुन 2007-08 को आर्थिक सङ्कटपछिको एक दिनको सबभन्दा बढी गिरावट थियो।
en-mt: On February 27, due to growing concerns about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indices, including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 index and the Dow Jones industrial average, posted their highest decline since 2008, with do 1,191 points falling, the highest fall in a day since the 2007-08 economic crisis.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: साताको अन्त्यमा सबै तीन सूचकाङ्कहरू 10% भन्दा कममा समाप्त भएका थिए।
en-mt: At the end of the week all three indices ended at less than 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: 28 फेब्रुअरीमा, स्कोप रेटिंग GmbH ले चीनको सार्वभौम क्रेडिट रेटिंग को पुष्टि गर्‍यो, तर एक नकारात्मक दृष्टिकोण कायम राख्यो।
en-mt: On February 28, scope rating GmbH confirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a negative outlook.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: कोरोनाभाइरस आशंका को आधारमा स्टक मा फेरी ठूलो गिरावट आयो, सबैभन्दा ठूलो गिरावट 16 मार्च मा भयो।
en-mt: The stock again fell sharply based on coronavirus fears, with the biggest fall occurring on March 16.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: धेरैले आर्थिक मन्दीलाई सम्भाव्य ठान्दछन्।
en-mt: Many see an economic slowdown as possible.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: अर्थशास्त्री मोहम्मद एल-एरियनले केन्द्रीय बैङ्क र राज्यहरूका समयमै आपतकालीन उपायहरूको प्रशंसा गरे।
en-mt: Economist Mohamed El-Arian praised the central bank and the states' timely emergency measures.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: केन्द्रीय बैङ्कहरू उनीहरूले 2008 को वित्तीय गिरावटमा गरेको जस्तै थप छिटो प्रतिक्रिया जनाइरहेका छन्।
en-mt: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did in the financial fall of 2008.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: यात्रामा प्रतिबन्ध, यात्रा आकर्षणसहित सार्वजनिक स्थानहरू बन्द हुनु र संसारभरि कुनै पनि यात्राको विरोधमा सरकारहरूको सुझावका कारण पर्यटन सबभन्दा धेरै नराम्रोसँग प्रभावित क्षेत्रमध्ये एक हो।
en-mt: Tourism is one of the worst-hit sectors due to travel restrictions, closure of public places, including travel attractions, and suggestions from governments against any travel around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: परिणामस्वरूप, ब्रिटिस एयरवेज, चाइना इस्टर्न एयरलाइन्स र कान्टास लगायतका धेरै एयरलाइन्सले कम मागका कारण उडानहरू रद्द गरेका छन्, जबकि ब्रिटिस क्षेत्रीय एयरलाइन्स फ्लाइबीको पतन भयो।
en-mt: As a result, many airlines, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines and Qantas, have canceled flights due to low demand, while British regional airline Flyby collapsed.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: क्रुज लाइन उद्योगमा प्रभाव यस्तो स्तरमा थियो जुन पहिले कहिल्यै देखिएको थिएन।
en-mt: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: धेरै रेल स्टेसनहरू र फेरि बन्दरगाहहरू पनि बन्द गरिएका छन्।
en-mt: Many railway stations and again ports have also been closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: यो महामारी चुन्युन सँग मेल खान्छ, जुन चिनियाँ नयाँ वर्षको विदासँग सम्बन्धित एक प्रमुख यात्राको मौसम हो।
en-mt: The pandemic coincides with Chunyun, which is a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: राष्ट्रिय र क्षेत्रीय सरकारहरूले ठूलो भीड जम्मा हुने धेरै कार्यक्रमहरू रद्द गरे, वार्षिक नयाँ वर्षका चाडहरू सहित, साथमा निजी कम्पनीहरूले पनि स्वतन्त्र रूपमा उनीहरूका पसलहरु र हङकङ डिज्नील्यान्ड र सांघाई डिज्नील्यान्ड जस्ता पर्यटक आकर्षणहरू बन्द गरे।
en-mt: National and regional governments cancelled many events that gathered large crowds, including annual New Year's festivals, as well as private companies that independently shut down their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: कयौँ नयाँ वर्षका कार्यक्रम र पर्यटक आकर्षणहरू बेइजिङको फरबिडन सिटी लगायतमा परम्परागत मेलाहरू सहित विशाल जनसभालाई रोक्नको लागि बन्द गरिएको छ।
en-mt: Several New Year's events and tourist attractions have been closed in Beijing's Forbidden City to prevent large public gatherings, including traditional fairs.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: चीनको 31 प्रान्तहरू, नगरपालिका र क्षेत्रहरू मध्ये 24 मा अधिकारीहरूले नयाँ वर्षको विदा 10 फेब्रुअरीसम्म थपे जसमा अधिकांश कार्यस्थलहरूलाई त्यस मितिसम्म फेरि नखोल्न निर्देशन दिइयो।
en-mt: Authorities in 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions extended the New Year's holiday until February 10, instructing most workplaces not to reopen until that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: यी क्षेत्रहरूले देशको GDP को 80% र निर्यातको 90% प्रतिनिधित्व गर्थे।
en-mt: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: हङकङले आफ्नो सङ्क्रामक रोगको प्रतिक्रियाको स्तरलाई माथि उठाउँदै मार्च सम्ममा सबै विद्यालयहरू बन्द गरी नयाँ सालको समारोह रद्द गर्दै आपतकालको घोषणा गरेको थियो। स्टोरहरूको सञ्चालन समयमा कमी वा अस्थायी रूपमा बन्द भएपछि खुद्रा क्षेत्र विश्वव्यापी रूपमा प्रभावित भएको छ।
en-mt: Hong Kong declared a state of emergency by canceling New Year's celebrations by closing all schools by March, raising levels of its response to the infectious disease. The retail sector has been affected globally due to a decrease in the operating time of stores or temporary closure.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: युरोप र ल्याटिन अमेरिकाका खुद्रा बिक्रेताहरूकहाँ भ्रमण 40% ले घट्यो।
en-mt: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America dropped by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: उत्तर अमेरिका र मध्य पूर्वका खुद्रा बिक्रेताहरूले 50-60% को गिरावट पाए।
en-mt: Retailers in North America and the Middle East saw a decline of 50-60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: यसको परिणाम स्वरूप फेब्रुअरीको तुलनामा मार्चमा किनमेल केन्द्रहरूमा पैदल यातायातमा 33-43% को कमी पनि आएको छ।
en-mt: This also resulted in a 33-43% decrease in pedestrian traffic at shopping centers in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: विश्वभरिका सपिङ मलका सञ्चालकहरूले अतिरिक्त उपायको रूपमा सरसफाई, दोकनदारहरूको तापक्रम जाँच गर्नका लागि थर्मल स्क्यानरको स्थापना र समारोह तथा कार्यक्रमहरू रद्द गरेका थिए। ल्याटिन अमेरिकाको संयुक्त राष्ट्र सङ्घको आर्थिक आयोगको अनुमान अनुसार यस विश्वमहामारीको कारण ल्याटिन अमेरिकामा 14 देखि 22 मिलियन जनसङ्ख्या चरम गरिबीको स्थितिमा छोड्न सक्थ्यो विश्वमहामारीबिना त्यस्तो स्थितिमा परेको हुन सक्थ्यो।
en-mt: Shopping mall operators around the world canceled sanitation, installations of thermal scanners to check the temperature of dokandars, and ceremonies and events as an additional measure. The United Nations Economic Commission in Latin America estimates that the pandemic could have left 14 to 22 million people in Latin America in a state of extreme poverty.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: जनवरी र फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा, वुहानमा महामारीको उचाइको बेला, चीनमा करिब 5 लाख मानिसहरूले आफ्नो जागिर गुमाए।
en-mt: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people lost their jobs in China.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: चीनका करिब 300 मिलियन मध्ये धेरैजसो ग्रामीण आप्रवासी कामदारहरू आन्तरिक प्रान्तहरूमा घरमै फसेका छन् वा हुबेई प्रान्तमा फसेका छन्। मार्च 2020 मा, 10 मिलियन भन्दा धेरै अमेरिकीहरूले आफ्नो जागिर गुमाए र सरकारी सहायताका लागि आवेदन दिए।
en-mt: Most of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers are stranded at home in the interior provinces or in Hubei province. In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: सेन्ट लुइसको फेडरल रिजर्भ बैंकले गरेको अनुमान अनुसार, कोरोनाभाइरसको प्रकोपले संयुक्त राज्यमा 47 मिलियन रोजगारी गुमाउन सक्ने र बेरोजगारी दर 32% सम्म पुग्न सक्दछ। भारतमा बन्दाबन्दीले करोडौं भारतीय आप्रवासी कामदार (जसलाई दैनिक ज्यालामा भुक्तानी गरिन्छ) ती बेरोजगार भएका छन्। एङ्गस रिड संस्थानको सर्वेक्षणले पत्ता लगायो कि 44% क्यानाडाली परिवारले केही प्रकारको बेरोजगारी अनुभव गरेका छन्। मार्च 2020 को मध्यमा बन्दाबन्दीमा भएदेखि स्पेनमा लगभग 900,000 कामदारहरूले आफ्नो जागिर गुमाए।
en-mt: According to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, the coronavirus outbreak could lead to 47 million job losses in the United States and an unemployment rate of up to 32%. Millions of Indian migrant workers (paid for daily wages) have been rendered jobless due to the lockdown in India. A survey by the Angus Reed Institute found that 44% of Canadian families have experienced some type of unemployment. Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since the lockdown was imposed in mid-March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: मार्चको दोस्रो भागमा, 4 मिलियन फ्रान्सेली कामदारहरूले अस्थायी बेरोजगारी लाभका लागि र 1 मिलियन ब्रिटिस कामदारहरूले सार्वभौमिक क्रेडिट योजनाको लागि आवेदन दिए। जर्मनीका करीव आधा मिलियन कम्पनीहरूले आफ्ना कामदारहरूलाई कुर्जबिट भनेर चिनिने सरकारी अनुदानमा सञ्चालित अल्पकालिक कार्य योजना मा पठाएको छ।
en-mt: In the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme. About half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers to a government-funded short-term action plan known as Kurzbit.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: जर्मनीको छोटो समय कार्य मुआब्जा योजना फ्रान्स र बेलायतले अपनाएका छन्।
en-mt: France and The United Kingdom have adopted Germany's short-term action compensation plan.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: प्रदर्शन कला र सांस्कृतिक विरासत क्षेत्रहरू महामारी द्वारा गहन रुपमा प्रभावित छन्, जसले विश्वव्यापी रुपमा संगठनहरूको सन्चालन सँगसँगै व्यक्तिहरू - दुवै कार्यरत र स्वतन्त्र - मा पनि प्रभाव पारेको छ।
en-mt: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been deeply impacted by the pandemic, which has impacted the operation of organizations worldwide as well as individuals – both employed and independent.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: कला र संस्कृति क्षेत्र संगठनहरूले समुदायमा सांस्कृतिक सम्पदामा पहुँच प्रदान गर्न, उनीहरूका कर्मचारीहरू र जनताको सुरक्षा कायम गर्न, र सम्भव भएसम्म कलाकारहरूलाई सहयोग पुर्‍याउन तिनीहरूको (प्रायः सार्वजनिक वित्त पोषित) अभियानलाई जारी राख्ने प्रयास गरे।
en-mt: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to continue their (often publicly funded) campaign to provide access to cultural heritage in the community, to maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and to support artists as much as possible.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: मार्च 2020 सम्ममा, विश्वभर र विभिन्न मात्रामा, सङ्ग्रहालयहरू, पुस्तकालयहरू, प्रदर्शन स्थलहरू र अन्य सांस्कृतिक संस्थानहरू उनीहरूको प्रदर्शनी, कार्यक्रम र प्रदर्शनहरू रद्द वा स्थगित भएसँगै अनिश्चित कालका लागि बन्द गरिएका थिए।
en-mt: As of March 2020, museums, libraries, exhibition sites and other cultural institutions around the world and on various scales were closed indefinitely, with their exhibitions, events and exhibitions cancelled or postponed.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: प्रतिक्रियामा त्यहाँ डिजिटल प्लेटफर्महरू मार्फत वैकल्पिक सेवाहरू प्रदान गर्न गहन प्रयासहरू भएका थिए। रोगको अर्को नयाँ र द्रुत गतिमा बृद्धि भइरहेको परिणाम भनेका धार्मिक सेवाहरू, खेलकुदका ठूला घटनाहरू र अन्य सामाजिक घटनाहरू जस्तै सङ्गीत महोत्सव हरू र कन्सर्टहरू, प्रविधि सम्मेलनहरू, र फेसन शोहरू रद्द हुनु हुन्।
en-mt: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms. Another new and rapidly growing consequence of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, big sporting events and other social events such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: चलचित्र उद्योगले पनि खलबली अनुभव गरेको छ। भ्याटिकनले जुन लेन्टको क्रिस्चियन शोकसूचक समयको अन्तिम हप्ताको अवधिमा पर्ने रोमको पवित्र हप्ताको उत्सव रद्द गरिएको छ।
en-mt: The film industry has also experienced turmoil. The Vatican has canceled the celebration of Rome's Holy Week, which falls during the last week of The Christian Mourning Period of June Lent.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: धेरै चर्चहरूका समूहले बुढेसकालका क्रिश्चियनहरूलाई आइतबारको भीडभाडमा भाग लिनुको सट्टा घरमा नै बस्न सल्लाह दिएका छन्; केही चर्चहरूले चर्च सेवा हरू रेडियो, अनलाइन लाइभ स्ट्रिमिंग वा टेलिभिजन मार्फत उपलब्ध गराएका छन् जब कि अन्य ले ड्राइभ-इन पूजा को प्रस्ताव गरिरहेका छन्।
en-mt: Several church groups have advised aging Christians to stay at home instead of attending Sunday gatherings; Some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: रोमको रोमन क्याथोलिक डायोसीजले चर्च र चैपलहरू बन्द गराएपछि र सेन्ट पिटर्स स्क्वायरले ईसाई तीर्थ यात्रीहरूलाई खाली गराएपछि, अन्य धार्मिक निकायहरूले पनि चर्चहरू, मस्जिदहरू, सभाघरहरू, मन्दिरहरू र गुरुद्वाराहरूमा सेवाहरू रद्द गरे र सार्वजनिक जमघटहरू सीमित पारे।
en-mt: After Rome's Roman Catholic Diocese closed churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square evacuated Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also canceled services at churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras and restricted public gatherings.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: इरानको स्वास्थ्य मन्त्रालयले यस प्रकोपबाट प्रभावित क्षेत्रहरूमा शुक्रवारको प्रार्थना रद्द गर्ने घोषणा गर्‍यो र पछि तीर्थ स्थानहरू पनि बन्द गरियो, जब कि साउदी अरेबियाले विदेशी तीर्थयात्रीहरू साथै त्यहाँका बासिन्दाहरूलाई मक्का र मदीनाको पवित्र स्थलहरूमा प्रवेश प्रतिबन्ध लगायो।
en-mt: Iran's health ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and later closed shrines, while Saudi Arabia banned foreign pilgrims as well as residents from entering holy sites in Mecca and Medina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: महामारीको कारण दोस्रो विश्वयुद्ध पछि विश्वव्यापी खेल क्यालेन्डरमा सबैभन्दा महत्त्वपूर्ण अवरोध आएको छ।
en-mt: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the global sports calendar since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: 2019–20 UEFA च्याम्पियन्स लिग, 2019–20 प्रिमियर लिग, UEFA युरो 2020, 2019-20 NBA सिज़न र 2019-20 NHL सिजनसहित अधिकांश खेलकुद गतिविधिहरू रद्द वा स्थगित गरिएका छन्।
en-mt: Most sporting activities have been canceled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season and 2019–20 NHL season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: यस प्रकोपले 2020 ग्रीष्मकालीन ओलम्पिकका योजनाहरूमा अवरोध पुर्‍यायो, जुन मूल रूपमा जुलाईको अन्त्यमा सुरु गर्नका लागि निर्धारित थियो; अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय ओलम्पिक समितिले 24 मार्चमा यो कार्यक्रम “2020 पछाडिको मितिमा पुनर्निर्धारित गरिनेछ तर 2021 को ग्रीष्म पछि हुनेछैन” भनेर घोषणा गर्‍यो। क्यासिनो र अन्य खेल स्थलहरू विश्वव्यापी रूपमा बन्द भएका छन् र प्रत्यक्ष पोकर प्रतियोगिता स्थगित वा रद्द गरिएको छ।
en-mt: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start in late July; The International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event "will be rescheduled at a later date than 2020 but not after the summer of 2021". Casinos and other sporting venues have been closed worldwide and live poker competitions have been postponed or canceled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: यसले धेरै जुवा खेल्नेहरूलाई अनलाइनमा सर्न प्रेरित गरेको छ, धेरै अनलाइन जुवा स्थलहरूले उनीहरूको नयाँ साइन-अपको दरहरूमा उल्लेखनीय वृद्धि भएको रिपोर्ट गरेका छन्। मनोरञ्जन उद्योग पनि प्रभावित भएको छ, विभिन्न सङ्गीत समूहहरूले कन्सर्ट भ्रमणहरू स्थगित वा रद्द गरेका छन्।
en-mt: This has prompted many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling venues reporting a significant increase in rates of their new sign-up. The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups postponing or cancelling concert tours.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: धेरै ठूला थिएटरहरू जस्तै ब्रोडवेमा भएकाहरूले पनि सबै प्रदर्शनहरू स्थगित गरे।
en-mt: Like many big theaters on Broadway, all performances were postponed.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: केही कलाकारहरूले परम्परागत प्रत्यक्ष प्रदर्शनको विकल्पको रूपमा आफ्ना रचना उत्पादन र साझा कार्य जारी राख्न इन्टरनेटमा नयाँ तरिकाहरू पत्ता लगाएका छन्, जस्तै प्रत्यक्ष स्ट्रिमिंग कन्सर्टहरू वा कलाकारहरूको प्रदर्शनका लागि वेब-आधारित “उत्सवहरू” सिर्जना गर्ने , वितरण गर्ने र तिनीहरूको काम प्रचारप्रसार गर्ने।
en-mt: Some artists have found new ways on the Internet to continue producing and sharing their compositions as an alternative to traditional live performances, such as creating, distributing, and publicizing their work in live streaming concerts or web-based "festivals" for artists' performances.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: अनलाइनमा, असङ्ख्य कोरोनाभाइरस-आधारित इन्टरनेट मिम्स फैलिएका छन् किनकि अनिश्चितताको बीचमा धेरै मानिसहरू हास्य र विचलनतिर मोडिएका छन्।
en-mt: Online, countless coronavirus-based internet memes have spread as many people turn to humour and deviance amid uncertainty.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: COVID -19 को प्रकोपपछि, चिनियाँ र पूर्वी एसियाली मुलुकका मानिसतर्फ र युरोप, संयुक्त राज्य र अन्य देशहरूमा हट्स्पटबाट मानिसहरूको विरूद्ध बढ्दै गएको पूर्वाग्रह, जेनोफोबिया र जातिवादलाई उल्लेख गरिएको छ।
en-mt: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, there has been a growing prejudice, xenophobia, and racism toward people from Chinese and East Asian countries and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: डर, शङ्का र शत्रुताका घटनाहरू धेरै देशहरूमा विशेष गरी यूरोप, पूर्वी एसिया, उत्तरी अमेरिका र एसिया प्रशान्त क्षेत्रमा देखिएका छन्।
en-mt: Cases of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been seen in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia Pacific.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: फेब्रुअरीबाट प्राप्त रिपोर्टले (जब बहुसङ्ख्यक घटनाहरू अझै चीनमा सीमित रहेका थिए) चिनियाँहरू भाइरसका लायक पात्र बताइएका जुन उचित प्रतिशोधको रूपमा दावी गरिएको कुरा विश्वव्यापी रूपमा विभिन्न समूहमा नस्लवादी भावनाहरूको अभिव्यक्त भएको अभिलेख गरेको छ।
en-mt: Reports from February (when the majority of cases were still confined to China) recorded that the Chinese were being described as worthy characters of the virus that was claimed as a proper retaliation to the expression of racist sentiments in different groups worldwide.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: अफ्रिकाका केही देशहरूमा पनि चिनियाँ विरोधी भावना बढेको छ।
en-mt: Anti-Chinese sentiment has also increased in some African countries.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: वुहान र हुबेईका धेरै बासिन्दाहरूले उनीहरूको क्षेत्रीय मूलमा आधारित भेदभाव रिपोर्ट गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: चिनियाँहरूका लागि दुबै अनलाइन र अफलाइनमा भाइरस ग्रस्त क्षेत्रहरूमा उनीहरूको लागि सहयोग गरिएको छ।
en-mt: For the Chinese, support has been provided for them in virus-prone areas, both online and offline.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: नयाँ हटस्पट देशहरूमा प्रकोपको प्रगतिपछि, इटालीका मानिसहरू, युरोपमा COVID-19 को गम्भीर प्रकोप अनुभव गर्ने पहिलो देश, शङ्का र जेनोफोबियाको अधीनमा पनि हुन सक्दछन्। मलेसिया, न्युजिल्यान्ड, सिङ्गापुर र दक्षिण कोरियालगायतका देशका नागरिकहरूले यस रोगलाई रोक्नका लागि चिनियाँ नागरिकहरूलाई आफ्नो देशमा प्रवेश गर्न प्रतिबन्ध लगाउन याचिकाहरुमा हस्ताक्षर गरे।
en-mt: As outbreaks progress in new hotspot countries, people in Italy, the first country to experience a severe outbreak of COVID-19 in Europe, may also be subject to suspicion and xenophobia. Citizens of countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea signed petitions to ban Chinese nationals from entering their country to prevent the disease.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: जापानमा, #चिनियाँजापाननआउ ह्याशट्याग ट्विटरमा प्रवृत्त भयो।
en-mt: In Japan, #चिनियाँजापाननआउ hashtag trended on Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: चिनियाँ मानिसका साथसाथै संयुक्त अधिराज्य र संयुक्त राज्यका अन्य एसियालीहरूले बढ्दो स्तरको जातीय दुर्व्यवहारका साथसाथै हमलाको रिपोर्ट गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Chinese people, as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States, have reported increasing levels of racial abuse as well as attacks.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति डोनाल्ड ट्रम्पले कोरोनाभाइरसलाई “चिनियाँ भाइरस” भनी उल्लेख गरेकाले आलोचनाको सामना गरेका छन्, आलोचकहरूद्वारा यो पदलाई जातिवादी र चिनियाँ-विरोधी मानिन्छ।
en-mt: Us President Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as a "Chinese virus", a post considered racist and anti-Chinese by critics.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: युक्रेनका प्रदर्शनकारीहरूले युक्रेनी र विदेशी विस्थापित बोकेका वुहानबाट नोभी सान्जारी जाने बसहरूमा हमला गरे।
en-mt: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses from Wuhan to Novi Sanjari carrying Ukrainian and foreign displaced people.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: चीनसँग सीमा जोडिएको पूर्वोत्तर भारतबाट आएका र भारतका प्रमुख शहरहरूमा अध्ययनरत विद्यार्थीहरूले कोरोना भाइरस प्रकोपसँग सम्बन्धित उत्पीडनको अनुभव गरेका पाइएको छ।
en-mt: Students from northeast India bordering China and studying in major cities in India have experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: पश्चिम बङ्गालमा भारतीय जनता पार्टीको प्रदेश इकाईका अध्यक्ष दिलीप घोषले चिनियाँहरूले प्रकृतिलाई बिगारेका थिए र "यसकारण परमेश्वरले उनीहरूको विरुद्धमा बदला लिनुभएको" बताएका थिए।
en-mt: Dilip Ghosh, state unit president of the Bharatiya Janata Party in West Bengal, said the Chinese had spoiled nature and "that is why God has taken revenge against them".

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: यस टिप्पणीको पछि कलकत्तामा चिनियाँ वाणिज्य दूतावासले “गलत” भन्दै निन्दा गरेको थियो। चीनमा, ज़ेनोफोबिया र नस्लवाद गैर-चिनियाँ बासिन्दाहरूको विरुद्ध महामारीले बढाएको छ, विदेशीहरूलाई “विदेशी फोहोर” भनेर वर्णन गरिएको छ र “फाल्न” का लागि लक्षित गरिएको छ।
en-mt: The comments were later condemned by the Chinese Consulate in Calcutta as "wrong". In China, xenophobia and racism have been exacerbated by the pandemic against non-Chinese residents, with foreigners being described as "foreign waste" and targeted for "dumping".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: पे वाल भएका धेरै अखबारहरूले तिनीहरूलाई केही वा सबै कोरोनाभाइरस कभरेजका लागि हटाएका छन्।
en-mt: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all coronavirus coverage.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: धेरै वैज्ञानिक प्रकाशकहरूले प्रकोपसँग सम्बन्धित वैज्ञानिक कागजातहरू खुला पहुँचका साथ उपलब्ध गराए।
en-mt: Many scientific publishers made scientific documents related to the outbreak available with open access.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: केही वैज्ञानिकहरूले bioRxiv जस्ता प्रीप्रिन्ट सर्भरहरूमा आफ्ना परिणामहरू छिटो साझा गर्न छनौट गरे।
en-mt: Some scientists chose to quickly share their results on preprint servers such as BioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: उदाइरहेको सङ्क्रामक रोग – उदाउँदो रोगजनकको सङ्क्रामक रोग, प्राय: यसको प्रकोप दायरा वा प्रसार मोडमा नयाँ हुन्छ
en-mt: Emerging infectious disease – infectious disease of emerging pathogens, often new in its outbreak range or spread mode

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: विश्वव्यापीकरण र रोग – विश्वव्यापीकरण र रोग फैलावको अवलोकन
en-mt: Globalization and Disease – Observing Globalization and Disease Spread

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: महामारी तथा विश्वमहामारीहरूको सूची – सङ्क्रामक रोगको कारण मृत्यु हुनेहरूको सूची
en-mt: List of epidemics and pandemics – List of deaths due to infectious diseases

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: वन्यजन्तु तस्करी र जुनोसेस - विदेशी वन्यजन्तुको व्यापारसँग सम्बन्धित स्वास्थ्य जोखिम
en-mt: Wildlife trafficking and zoonoses - health risks associated with foreign wildlife trade

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: श्वासप्रश्वास कोरोना भाइरस रोग 2019 (COVID-19) र सम्बद्ध SARS-CoV-2 भाइरसको लागि गरिने प्रयोगशाला परीक्षणमा भाइरसको उपस्थिति र सङ्क्रमणको प्रतिक्रियामा उत्पादन भएका एन्टिबडीहरू पत्ता लगाउने विधिहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Laboratory tests for respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and associated SARS-CoV-2 viruses include methods to detect the presence of the virus and antibodies produced in response to infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: नमूनाहरूमा भाइरसको उपस्थिति RT-PCR द्वारा पुष्टि हुन्छ, जसले कोरोनाभाइरसको RNA पत्ता लगाउँदछ।
en-mt: The presence of the virus in the samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the RNA of coronavirus.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: यो परीक्षण SARS-CoV-2 भाइरसको RNA पत्ता लगाउनको लागि मात्र निर्दिष्ट र डिजाइन गरिएको हो।
en-mt: This test is only specified and designed to detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: यो एकदमै नयाँ वा सक्रिय सङ्क्रमणहरू पुष्टि गर्न प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
en-mt: It is used to confirm very new or active infections.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: एन्टिबडीहरूको पहिचान (सेरोलजी) पहिचान र जनसङ्ख्या निरीक्षण दुवैको लागि प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used for both identification and population inspection.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: एन्टिबडी परीक्षणले कतिजना मानिसहरूलाई यो रोग लागेको छ जसमा ती लक्षणहरू रिपोर्ट गर्न अत्यन्त थोरै थिए वा जो एसिम्प्टोमेटिक थिए भनि देखाउँदछ।
en-mt: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease who had too few to report symptoms or who were asymptomatic.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: रोगको सही मृत्युदर र जनसङ्ख्यामा सामुहिक प्रतिरक्षाको स्तर यस परीक्षणको नतिजाहरूबाट निर्धारण गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: The correct mortality rate and level of collective immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this trial.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: मार्च 2020 अनुसार, सीमित परीक्षणको कारणले कुनै पनि राष्ट्रसँग आफ्नो जनसङ्ख्यामा भाइरसको फैलावट सम्बन्धी विश्वसनीय तथ्याङ्क थिएन।
en-mt: As of March 2020, no nation had reliable data regarding the spread of the virus in its population due to limited testing.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: 23 मार्चसम्म, कुनै पनि देशले आफ्नो जनसङ्ख्याको 3% भन्दा धेरै परीक्षण गरेको थिएन, र देशभरि कति परीक्षण गरिएको छ भन्नेमा व्यापक भिन्नताहरू छन्।
en-mt: As of March 23, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and there are wide variations in how many tests have been conducted across the country.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: यो परिवर्तनशीलताले रिपोर्ट गरिएको सङ्क्रमणको मृत्युदरमा पनि ठूलो असर पार्ने सम्भावना हुन्छ, जुन केही देशहरूमा उल्लेखनीय रूपमा काफी बढी अनुमान गरिएको हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: This variability is also likely to have a major impact on reported infection mortality, which may have been significantly overestimated in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: वास्तविक-समयको विपरीत ट्रान्सक्रिप्सन पोलिमरेस चेन रियाक्सन (rRT-PCR) प्रयोग गरेर नेसोफ्यारिङ्गियल स्वाब वा स्पटम नमूना सहित विभिन्न विधिहरूद्वारा प्राप्त गरिएका श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी नमूनाहरूमा परीक्षण गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: The real-time contrast transcription can be tested on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including a nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample, using polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: परिणामहरू केही घण्टा देखि 2 दिन भित्र सामान्यत: उपलब्ध हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Results are usually available within a few hours to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: घाँटीका स्वाबको साथ गरिने RT-PCR परीक्षण रोगको पहिलो हप्तामा मात्र विश्वसनीय हुन्छ।
en-mt: Rt-PCR tests performed with throat swabs are reliable only in the first week of the disease.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: पछि भाइरस फोक्सोमा वृद्धि हुँदै गर्दा घाँटीमा हराउन सक्छ।
en-mt: Later, the virus can disappear in the throat as it grows in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: दोस्रो हप्तामा परीक्षण गरिएका सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरूका लागि वैकल्पिक रूपमा नमूना सामग्री त्यसपछि सक्सन क्याथेटरद्वारा भित्री वायुमार्गबाट लिन सकिन्छ वा खोकेर निक्लिने सामग्री (खकार) प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: Alternatively for infected people tested in the second week, sample material can then be taken from the inner airways by a suction catheter or coughing material (khakar) can be used.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: प्रारम्भिक PCR परीक्षणहरूमध्ये एक जनवरी 2020 मा बर्लिनको चारेटीमा वास्तविक-समयको उल्टो फैलावट पोलिमेरेज चेन प्रतिक्रिया (rRT-PCR) प्रयोग गरेर विकसित गरिएको थियो, र विश्व स्वास्थ्य संगठन (WHO) द्वारा वितरणको लागि 250,000 किटहरूको आधार बनाइएको थियो।
en-mt: One of the initial PCR tests was developed in Charetti, Berlin in January 2020 using a real-time inverse dispersal polymerase chain reaction (RRT-PCR), and was based on 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: युनाइटेड किंगडमले 23 जनवरी 2020 सम्ममा एउटा परीक्षण पनि विकसित गरेको थियो। दक्षिण कोरियाली कम्पनी कोगेनेबायोटेकले 28 जनवरी 2020 मा क्लिनिकल ग्रेड, पीसीआर-आधारित SARS-CoV-2 पहिचान किट (पावरचेक कोरोनाभाइरस) विकसित गर्‍यो।
en-mt: The United Kingdom had also developed a trial by 23 January 2020. South Korean company KogeneBiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerCheck Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: यसले सबै बिटा कोरोनाभाइरसहरूद्वारा साझा भएका "E" जीन र SARS-CoV-2 सँग सम्बन्धित RdRp जीनको खोजी गर्दछ। चीनमा, PCR-आधारित SARS-CoV-2 खोज कीटको लागि चीनको राष्ट्रिय चिकित्सा उत्पादन प्रबन्धबाट स्वीकृत आपतकालीन प्रयोग प्राप्त गर्ने सबै कम्पनीहरूमध्ये पहिलो कम्पनी BGI समूह थियो। संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा, रोग नियन्त्रण तथा रोकथाम केन्द्र (CDC) ले अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय अभिकर्मक संसाधनमार्फत् सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य प्रयोगशालाहरूमा आफ्नो 2019-कोरोनाभाइरस (2019-nCoV) वास्तविक-समय RT-PCR निदानात्मक प्यानल वितरण गरिरहेको छ।
en-mt: It searches for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses and the RdRp gene associated with SARS-CoV-2. In China, the first company among all companies to receive emergency use approved by China's National Medical Product Management for PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 search kits was the BGI Group. In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-coronavirus (2019-nCoV) real-time RT-PCR diagnostic panel to public health laboratories through an international transfection resource.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: परीक्षण किटहरूको पूरानो संस्करणहरूमा भएका तीन वटा आनुवंशिक परीक्षणहरू मध्ये एउटामा एट्लान्टाको CDC मा खराब अभिकर्मकहरूको कारणले अनिर्णायक नतिजाहरू निस्कियो; यसले पूरै फेब्रुअरी 2020 भरि सफलतापूर्वक प्रक्रिया गरिएका दिनको 100 औसत नमूनाहरूभन्दा पनि कममा परिणाम दियो।
en-mt: One of the three genetic tests conducted on older versions of the test kits yielded inconclusive results due to poor reagents in the CDC of Atlanta; This resulted in less than 100 average samples of days successfully processed throughout The Whole of February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: दुईवटा तत्त्व प्रयोग गर्ने परीक्षणहरू 28 फेब्रुअरी 2020 सम्म विश्वसनीय मानिएको थिएन र राज्य र स्थानीय प्रयोगशालाहरूलाई परीक्षण सुरु गर्नको लागि अनुमति नदिँदासम्म यसलाई मानिएको पनि थिएन।
en-mt: Tests using two elements were not considered reliable until 28 February 2020, and were not considered until state and local laboratories were allowed to start testing.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: यो परीक्षण एक आपतकालीन प्रयोग प्राधिकरण अन्तर्गत खाद्य र औषधि प्रशासनद्वारा अनुमोदन गरिएको थियो। अमेरिकी वाणिज्यिक प्रयोगशालाहरूले मार्च 2020 को सुरुमा परीक्षण थाल्यो।
en-mt: This trial was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authority. U.S. commercial laboratories began testing in early March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: 5 मार्च 2020 बाट LabCorp ले RT-PCR मा आधारित COVID-19 परीक्षणको राष्ट्रव्यापी उपलब्धता घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: From 5 March 2020, LabCorp announced the nationwide availability of RT-PCR-based COVID-19 testing.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: क्वेस्ट डायग्नोस्टिक्सले यस्तै रूपमा मार्च 9, 2020 देखी राष्ट्रव्यापी COVID-19 परीक्षण उपलब्ध गरायो।
en-mt: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available from March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: कुनै मात्राका सीमितताहरू घोषणा गरिएका छैनन्; CDC का आवश्यकताहरूअनुसार आवश्यक नमूना सङ्कलन र प्रक्रिया गर्नुपर्छ।
en-mt: No quantification limitations have been announced; The required sample should be collected and processed according to the requirements of the CDC.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: रूसमा, राज्य COVID-19 को परीक्षण भारोलोजी एन्ड बायोटेक्नोलोजी VECTOR अनुसन्धान केन्द्रद्वारा विकास र उत्पादन गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: In Russia, the test of state COVID-19 was developed and produced by the Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR Research Center.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: 11 फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा, परीक्षण संघीय स्वास्थ्य सेवा निरीक्षण सेवाद्वारा दर्ता गरिएको थियो। 12 मार्च 2020 मा, मायो क्लिनिक (Mayo Clinic) ले COVID-19 सङ्क्रमण पत्ता लगाउनको लागि परीक्षण विकास गर्नको लागि रिपोर्ट गरिएको थियो। 13 मार्च 2020 मा, रोची निदानले परीक्षणको लागि FDA स्वीकृति प्राप्त गर‍्‍यो जसबाट 3.5 घण्टा भित्र उच्च परिमाणमा सम्पादन गर्न सकिन्छ, यसर्थ एउटा मेसिनबाट 24 घण्टाको अवधिमा लगभग 4,128 परीक्षणहरू गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: On 11 February 2020, the trial was registered by the Federal Health Service Inspection Service. On 12 March 2020, the Mayo Clinic (Mayo Clinic) was reported to develop a test for detecting COVID-19 infection. On 13 March 2020, The Rochi Diagnosis received FDA approval for testing that could be performed in high quantities within 3.5 hours, so about 4,128 tests could be performed over a 24-hour period from a single machine.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: 19 मार्च 2020 मा, FDA ले Abbott को m2000 प्रणालीमा परीक्षणको लागि Abbott प्रयोगशालाहरूमा आपतकालीन प्रयोगको स्वीकृति (EUA) जारी गर्‍यो; FDA ले अघिल्लो पटक Hologic, LabCorp र Thermo Fisher Scientific मा समान स्वीकृति जारी गरेको थियो।
en-mt: On 19 March 2020, FDA issued Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) at Abbott Laboratories for testing on Abbott's M2000 system; FDA had last issued similar approvals to Hologic, LabCorp and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: 21 मार्च 2020 मा, सेफाइडले यसैगरी लगभग 45 मिनेट लाग्ने परीक्षणको लागि FDA बाट EUA प्राप्त गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Seyphide similarly received EUA from FDA for a trial that took about 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA ले PCR को सट्टामा समतापीय न्युक्लिक एसिडको एम्प्लिफिकेसन प्रविधि प्रयोग गर्ने परीक्षणको स्वीकृत दिएको छ।
en-mt: FDA has approved a test using the amplification technique of stratometric nucleic acids instead of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: यसमा वैकल्पिक तापक्रमका चक्रहरूको श्रृंखलाहरू आवश्यकता नहुने भएकाले यो विधिले पाँच मिनेट जतिको थोरै समयमा पोजेटिभ नतिजा र 13 मिनेटमा नेगेटिभ नतिजा वितरण गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: Since it does not require a series of alternate temperature cycles, this method can deliver a positive result in as little as five minutes and a negative result in 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: हाल U.S. मा यस्ता मेसिनहरू लगभग 18,000 वटा छन् र Abbott ले प्रति दिन 50,000 परीक्षणहरू वितरण गर्न उत्पादन तयार गर्ने अपेक्षा गर्छ। एक परीक्षण जसलेे द्रुत इन्फ्लुएन्जा परीक्षण जस्तै 15 देखि 20 मिनेटमा नतिजा उपलब्ध गराउन सक्ने आशासहित ताइवानमा विकास भएको नोभेल कोरोनाभाइरसको न्युक्लियोक्याप्सिड प्रोटिन (N प्रोटिन) मा विशेष गरी बाइन्ड हुने मोनोक्लोनल एन्टीबडी प्रयोग गर्दछ।
en-mt: Currently there are about 18,000 such machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to prepare the product to deliver 50,000 tests per day. A trial that uses monoclonal antibodies specifically binding to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus developed in Taiwan, with the hope of providing results in 15 to 20 minutes, such as a rapid influenza test.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: मार्च 2020 को एक साहित्य समीक्षाले "छातीको रेडियोग्राफहरू प्रारम्भिक चरणमा थोरै डायग्नोस्टिक मूल्यको हुन्छन्, जबकि सीटी [गणना गरिएका टोमोग्राफी] निष्कर्षहरू लक्षण देखा पर्नु अघि नै उपस्थित हुन सक्छ भनि निष्कर्ष निकाल्यो।"
en-mt: A Literature Review of March 2020 concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in the early stages, while CT [computed tomography] findings may be present before symptoms appear." "

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: CT को विशेष विशेषताहरूमा परिधीय, असममित र पोस्टरियर वितरण सहितका द्विपक्षीय मल्टिलोबार ग्राउन्ड-ग्लास अस्पष्टता समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Special features of CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacity including peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distributions.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: रोग बढ्नासाथ Subpleural (सबप्लेउरल) प्रभुत्व, पागलपना र एकत्रीकरण बढ्छ।
en-mt: As the disease progresses, subpleural dominance, insanity, and aggregation increase.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: वर्तमान विश्वमहामारीको मूल विन्दु वुहानमा PCR र CT को तुलना गर्ने अध्ययनले CT को कल्पना विशेषताहरू अन्य निमोनिया र रोग प्रक्रियाहरूसँग अतिव्यापित भएमा कम विशिष्ट भए पनि यो PCR भन्दा उल्लेखनीय ढङ्गले थप संवेदनशील छ भन्ने सुझाव दिएको छ।
en-mt: A study comparing PCR and CT in Wuhan, the epicentre of the current pandemic, suggests that while CT's visual features are less specific if they are overexpressed with other pneumonia and disease processes, it is significantly more sensitive than PCR.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: मार्च 2020 अनुसार, अमेरिकी रेडियोलोजी कलेजले "COVID-19 को निदान गर्न पहिलो-चरणको परीक्षणको लागि वा यसको जाँच गर्नको लागि CT प्रयोग गर्नुहुँदैन" भनी सुझाव दिएको छ। मार्च 2020 अनुसार, CDC ले प्रारम्भिक सुरक्षा जाँचको लागि PCR सिफारिस गरेको छ।
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology has suggested that "CT should not be used for first-stage trials to diagnose COVID-19 or to examine it." As of March 2020, CDC has recommended PCR for initial security checks.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: संक्रमण प्रतिरोधात्मक क्षमताको अंश IgM र IgG सहित एन्टिबडीहरूको उत्पादन हो।
en-mt: Part of the immune response is the production of antibodies, including IgM and IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: यिनीहरू प्रतिरोधात्मक क्षमता निर्धारण गर्न र जनसङ्ख्या निरीक्षणमा व्यक्तिहरूमा 7 दिनदेखि सुरु हुने सङ्क्रमण वा लक्षणहरूको प्रारम्भपछि सो पत्ता लगाउनको लागि प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ। जाँचहरू केन्द्रीय प्रयोगशालाहरू (CLT) मा हेरचाह बिन्दु (पोइन्ट-अप-केयर) ( (PoCT) द्वारा सम्पादन गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: They can be used to determine immunity and detect infections or symptoms that begin at 7 days in individuals in population inspections. Investigations can be edited by point-at-care (PoCT) at central laboratories (CLT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: धेरै क्लिनिकल प्रयोगशालाहरूमा भएका उच्च-प्रवाहका स्वचालित प्रणालीहरूले यी एस्सेहरू गर्न सक्नेछन् तर तिनीहरूको उपलब्धता प्रत्येक प्रणालीको लागि उत्पादनको दरमा निर्भर रहनेछ।
en-mt: High-flow automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: CLT को लागि प्रतिरक्षा प्रतिक्रिया फलो गर्न क्रमिक नमूनाहरू प्रयोग गर्न सके पनि, पेरिफेरलको एउटा नमूना सामान्य रूपमा प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
en-mt: Although successive samples can be used to follow the immune response to CLT, a sample of peripherals is commonly used.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: PoCT को लागि रगतको नमूना सामान्य रूपमा स्किन पन्चरबाट प्राप्त गरिन्छ।
en-mt: Blood samples for PoCT are normally obtained from skin punctures.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: पीसीआर विधिहरू भन्दा भिन्न एक निकाल्ने चरण परीक्षण भन्दा पहिले आवश्यक पर्दैन। मार्च 26, 2020 मा, FDA ले 29 संस्थाको नाम बतायो जसले एजेन्सीलाई आवश्यक अनुसार सूचना प्रदान गर्‍यो र अब उनीहरू एन्टिबडी परीक्षणहरूको वितरण गर्न सक्षम छन्।
en-mt: An extract step different from PCR methods is not required prior to the test. On March 26, 2020, FDA named 29 entities that provided the agency with information as needed and now they are able to deliver antibody tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: अप्रिल 7, 2020 सम्ममा, आपतकालीन प्रयोगको प्रमाणीकरण अन्तर्गत FDA द्वारा एउटा परीक्षण मात्र स्वीकृति भएको छ। मार्च 2020 को अन्तिममा, Euroimmun चिकित्सा प्रयोगशालाको निदान र Epitope निदानहरूले रगतका नमूनाहरूमा भाइरस विरूद्ध IgG र IgA एन्टिबडीहरू पत्ता लगाउन सक्ने परीक्षण किटहरूको लागि युरोपियन अनुमोदन प्राप्त गरे।
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, only one trial has been approved by the FDA under emergency use certification. At the end of March 2020, the Euroimmun medical laboratory's diagnostics and Epitope diagnoses received European approval for test kits that could detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: एक घण्टाभित्र सयौँ नमूनाहरूको परीक्षण गर्ने क्षमता छ र यसकारण भाइरल RNA को नियमित PCR मूल्याङ्कनभन्दा काफी छिटो छ।
en-mt: It has the capacity to test hundreds of samples within an hour and is therefore significantly faster than the regular PCR assessment of viral RNA.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: एन्टिबडीहरू सामान्यतया सङ्क्रमणको प्रारम्भपछि 14 दिन देखिन्छन्। अप्रिलको प्रारम्भमा, UK ले आफूले खरिद गरेका कुनै पनि एन्टिबडी परीक्षण सामग्री पर्याप्त उपयोगी नभएको पायो।
en-mt: Antibodies usually appear 14 days after the onset of infection. In early April, THE UK found that none of the antibody testing materials it purchased were useful enough.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: हङकङले शङ्कास्पद बिरामीहरू घरमै बस्न सक्ने व्यवस्था मिलाएको छ, "आपतकालीन विभागले बिरामीलाई नमूना ट्युब दिनेछ", तिनीहरूले त्यसमा थुकेर फिर्ता पठाउनेछन् र केही समय पश्चात नतिजा पाउनेछन्। ब्रिटिश NHS ले घरमा शङ्कास्पद सङ्क्रमणहरू परीक्षण गर्नको लागि एउटा व्यवस्था सञ्चालन गरिरहेको घोषणा गरेको छ, जसले बिरामीहरू अस्पताल आएमा अन्य व्यक्तिहरूलाई सङ्क्रमण हुने जोखिम हटाउँदछ वा प्रयोगमा रहेको एम्बुलेन्सलाई कीटाणुरहित बनाउँदछ। COVID-19 को शङ्कास्पद सङ्क्रमण लागि गरिने ड्रइभ-थ्रु परीक्षणमा, स्वास्थ्यसेवा पेशेवरले उपयुक्त सावधानीहरू प्रयोग गरी नमूनाहरू लिन्छन्।
en-mt: Hong Kong has made arrangements for suspected patients to stay at home, "the emergency department will give the patient a sample tube", they will spit on it and send it back and get results after some time. British NHS has announced that it is running an arrangement to test suspected infections at home, which eliminates the risk of infection to other people if patients come to the hospital or disinfects the ambulance in use. In a drive-through test conducted for suspected infection of COVID-19, a healthcare professional takes samples using appropriate precautions.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: ड्राइभ-थ्रु सेन्टरहरूले दक्षिण कोरियालाई कुनै पनि देशलाई सबैभन्दा द्रुत, एकदमै विस्तृत परीक्षण गर्न मद्दत गरेको छ। जर्मनमा, वैधानिक स्वास्थ्य बीमाको राष्ट्रिय सङ्घका चिकित्सकहरूले 2 मार्चमा बताए कि, यससँग एम्बुलेटोरी सेटिङमा प्रति दिन लगभग 12,000 परीक्षणहरू गर्ने क्षमता छ र यसले पूर्व हप्तामा 10.700 परीक्षणहरू गरेको थियो।
en-mt: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea conduct the fastest, most detailed testing of any country. In Germany, doctors from the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance reported on 2 March that, it has the capacity to perform about 12,000 tests per day in ambulatory settings and it did 10,700 tests the previous week.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: चिकित्सकले परीक्षण गर्न आदेश दिँदा लागतहरू स्वास्थ्य बिमाद्वारा बेहोरिन्छ।
en-mt: The costs are borne by health insurance when a doctor orders a test.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: Robert Koch संस्थाको राष्ट्रपति अनुसार, जर्मनसँग प्रति हप्ता 160,000 परीक्षणहरू गर्नको लागि समग्र क्षमता छ।
en-mt: According to the President of the Robert Koch Institution, The German has an overall capacity to perform 160,000 tests per week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: 19 मार्च सम्ममा धेरै ठूला शहरहरूमा परीक्षणहरू प्रस्ताव गरिएका थिए।
en-mt: By March 19, trials were offered in many large cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: 26 मार्च 2020 सम्म, सकारात्मक परिणामहरू मात्र रिपोर्ट गरिएकोले जर्मनीमा गरिएको परीक्षणको जम्मा संख्या अज्ञात थियो।
en-mt: As of 26 March 2020, the total number of tests conducted in Germany was unknown as only positive results were reported.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: पहिलो प्रयोगशाला सर्वेक्षणले क्यालेन्डर हप्ता 12/2020 सम्म कम्तिमा 483,295 नमूनाहरू परीक्षण गरिएको थियो र हप्ता 12/2020 सम्म र, 33,491 नमूनाहरू (6.9%) SARS-CoV-2 का लागि सकारात्मक परीक्षण गरिएको थियो भनि पत्ता लगायो। इजरायलमा टेक्शियन र रम्बाम अस्पतालका अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरूले एकैसाथ 64 बिरामीका नमूनाहरूको परीक्षण गर्ने विधि विकास गरे र परीक्षण गरे, नमूनाहरू पोखरी गरेर अनि मात्र परीक्षण गरे भने यदि संयुक्त नमूना सकारात्मक पाए भने। वुहानमा "हुओ-यान" (चिनियाँ: 火 眼, वा अंग्रेजीमा "फायर आई") नामको एक अस्थायी 2000 वर्गमीटर मिटर आपतकालिन पत्ता लगाउने प्रयोगशाला बीजीआईद्वारा 5 फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा खोलिएको थियो, जुन दिनमा 10,000 भन्दा बढी नमूनाहरू प्रशोधन गर्न सक्दछ।
en-mt: The first laboratory survey found that at least 483,295 samples had been tested by calendar week 12/2020 and, by week 12/2020, and, 33,491 samples (6.9%) had tested positive for SARS-CoV-2. Researchers at Texan and Rambaum Hospitals in Israel developed and tested a method to test samples from 64 patients simultaneously, pooling the samples and testing only if the combined sample was found to be positive. A temporary 2000 square meter emergency detection laboratory in Wuhan called "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火 眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened by BGI on February 5, 2020, which can process more than 10,000 samples a day.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: BGI-संस्थापक Wang Jian द्वारा निरीक्षण गरेको निर्माणमा र 5 दिनको प्रतिरूपणले यो परीक्षण क्षमता सीमारेखमामा आएन भने हुबेईका सङ्क्रमणहरू 47% ले उच्च हुने र क्वारेन्टाइनको सामना गरिरहेको अनुरूप लागत दोब्बर हुने देखाउँदछ।
en-mt: Construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and the 5-day impersonation show that if this testing capacity does not come to the limit, Hubei's infections will be 47% higher and the corresponding costs of facing quarantine will double.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: वुहान प्रयोगशालालाई शेन्जेन, टियानजिन, बेइजिङ् र शंघाईमा हुओ-यान प्रयोगशालाहरूको लगत्तै तुरून्त चीनको 12 वटा शहरहरूमा कार्यान्वयन गरिएको छ।
en-mt: The Wuhan laboratory has been implemented in 12 cities of China immediately after the Huo-Yan laboratories in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing and Shanghai.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: 4 मार्च 2020 सम्म प्रति दिन कुल नियमित प्रवाह 50,000 परीक्षण थिए। 93 एस्सेहरू मात्र प्रयोग गरेर COVID19 को लागि 1122 भन्दा धेरै बिरामीका नमूनाहरू परीक्षण गर्न सक्ने खुला स्रोत, ओरिगामी एस्सेहरूद्वारा प्रकाशन गरिएका मल्टिप्लेक्स डिजाइनहरू प्रकाशित गरिएको छ। यी ब्यालेन्स गरिएका डिजाइनहरू रोबोटिक तरल चालकहरूको आवश्यकता बिना साना प्रयोगशालाहरूमा चलाउन सकिन्छ।
en-mt: As of 4 March 2020, the total regular flow per day was 50,000 tests. Multiplex designs published by Origami Assays, an open source that can test more than 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays, have been published. These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid drivers.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: मार्चसम्म, अभिकर्मकको अभाव र अपर्याप्त मात्रा EU र UK र US मा आम परीक्षणका लागि मार्गावरोध भएको छ।
en-mt: As of March, the lack and insufficient amount of reagents has been a barrier to common testing in EU and UK and US.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: यसले केही आविष्कारकहरूलाई थप परीक्षणको लागि RNA जीनोम जारी गर्न 5 मिनेटसम्म 98 °C (208 °F) को ताप नमूनाहरू समावेश हुने नमूना तयारी प्रोटोकलहरू अन्वेषण गर्न निर्देशित गरेको छ। 31 मार्चमा, संयुक्त अरब इमिरेट्सले अन्य कुनै पनि राष्ट्रलेभन्दा र उसको जनसङ्ख्यभन्दा बढी व्यक्तिहरूको कोरोनाभाइरस परीक्षण गरेको घोषणा गरिएको थियो र जनसंख्याको ठूलो संख्यामा पुग्न परीक्षण स्तर मापन ट्र्याकमा थियो।
en-mt: It has directed some inventors to explore sample preparation protocols involving heat samples of 98 °C (208 °F) for up to 5 minutes to release the RNA genome for further testing. On March 31, it was announced that the United Arab Emirates had tested more people for coronavirus than any other nation and more people than its population and testing level measurements were on track to reach a larger number of the population.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: यो ड्राइभ-थ्रु क्षमता र समूह 42 र BGI (चीनमा रहेको तिनीहरूको "Huo-Yan" आपतकालीन अन्वेषण प्रयोगशालाहरूका आधारमा) बाट जनसङ्ख्या-मापन जनसङ्घ-प्रवाह क्षमता प्रयोगशाला खरिद गर्ने संयोजन मार्फत थियो।
en-mt: This was through a combination of buying drive-through capacity and population-measured population-through capacity laboratories from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency exploration laboratories in China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: 14 दिनमा स्थापना गरिएको प्रयोगशाला प्रति दिन दश हजारौँ RT-PCR सञ्चालन गर्न योग्य छ र चीन बाहिर यस स्केलको विश्वमा क्रियाशील भएको पहिलो प्रयोगशाला हो।
en-mt: The laboratory established in 14 days is capable of operating ten thousand RT-PCR per day and is the first laboratory in the world of this scale outside China to be operational.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: कोरोनाभाइरस आनुवंशिक प्रोफाइलका विभिन्न भागहरूलाई लक्षित विभिन्न परीक्षण विधिहरू चीन, फ्रान्स, जर्मनी, हङ्कङ्, जापान, र संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा विकसित गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: Different testing methods targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठनले कम-आम्दानी हुने देशहरूमा संसाधनहरू बिना उनीहरूलाई आफैँ बनाउन दिनको लागि उत्पादन किटहरूको लागि जर्मन रेसिपी अपनायो।
en-mt: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for production kits in low-income countries to let them make themselves without resources.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: जर्मन रेसिपी 17 जनवरी 2020 मा प्रकाशित गरिएको थियो; संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका रोग नियन्त्रण केन्द्रहरूद्वारा बनाइएको प्रोटोकल, यु.एस चीनमा उपलब्ध परीक्षणहरू ढिलो हुँदै 28 जनवरीसम्म उपलब्ध थिएन र संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकालाई प्रारम्भिक प्रकोपमा परीक्षण किटहरूको विश्वासनीयतामा समस्या थियो र यी देशहरू र अष्ट्रेलियाले स्वास्थ्य विशेषज्ञहरूद्वारा परीक्षणको लागि माग र सिफारिसहरू पूरा गर्न पर्याप्त किटहरू दिन असमर्थ थिए।
en-mt: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; According to the protocol created by the United States Centers for Disease Control, the tests available in the U.S. China were not available until January 28 and the United States had problems with the reliability of testing kits in the initial outbreak and these countries and Australia were unable to provide enough kits to meet the demands and recommendations for testing by health experts.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: यसको विपरित, विज्ञहरू दक्षिण कोरियाको परीक्षणको व्यापक उपलब्धताले नोभेल कोरोनाभाइरसको प्रसारलाई कम गर्न मद्दत गर्‍यो भनी भन्छन्।
en-mt: In contrast, experts say south Korea's widespread availability of testing helped slow the spread of the novel coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: अत्याधिक रूपमा परीक्षण क्षमता भएका निजी क्षेत्रका प्रयोगशालाहरू, दक्षिण कोरियाली सरकारले धेरै वर्षअधि निर्माण गरेको थियो।
en-mt: Private-sector laboratories with high testing capacity were built by the South Korean government several years ago.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: 16 मार्चमा, COVID-19 को महामारीको प्रगतिलाई कम गर्ने उत्कृष्ट तरिकाको रूपमा विश्व स्वास्थ्य संगठनलाई परीक्षण सम्बन्धी कार्यक्रमहरू तयार गर्न बोलाइएको थियो। भाइरसको व्यापक फैलावटले गर्दा परीक्षणको लागि उच्च मागको कारण निजी U.S. प्रयोगशालाहरूमा सयौँ हजारौँ परीक्षणहरूको थुप्रोहरू निम्त्यायो, र स्वाब र केमिकल अभिकर्मकहरूको आपूर्तिहरू कृत्रिम बनायो।
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization was called upon to prepare testing programs as an excellent way to slow the progression of the COVID-19 pandemic. The widespread spread of the virus led to piles of hundreds of thousands of tests in private U.S. laboratories due to high demand for testing, and artificialized supplies of swabs and chemical reagents.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: मार्च 2020 मा चीनले आफ्नो परीक्षण किटहरूको सटीकताको साथ समस्याहरू रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो।
en-mt: In March 2020 China reported problems with the accuracy of its test kits.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा, CDC द्वारा बनाइएका परीक्षण किटहरूमा "त्रुटिहरू" थिए; त्यसपछि सरकारले जटिल बाधाहरू हटायो जसले निजी परीक्षणलाई रोकेको थियो। स्पेनले चिनियाँ फर्म Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd बाट परीक्षण किटहरू खरिद गर्‍यो, तर नतिजाहरू गलत भएको फेला पार्‍यो।
en-mt: In the United States, test kits made by THE CDC had "errors"; The government then removed the complex hurdles that prevented private testing. Spain purchased test kits from the Chinese firm Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found the results to be inaccurate.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: फर्मले गलत नतिजाहरूले नमूनाहरू सङ्कलन गर्न वा किटहरू राम्रोसँग प्रयोग गर्न असफलता निम्त्याउन सक्ने व्याख्या गर्‍यो।
en-mt: The firm explained that incorrect results could lead to failure to collect samples or use the kits properly.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
