targetString: स्पेनी मन्त्रालयले गलत परिणामहरू निकाल्ने किटहरू फर्काउनेछ र तिनीहरूलाई शेन्जेन बायोइजीद्वारा उपलब्ध गराइएको विभिन्न परीक्षण किटले प्रतिस्थापन गर्नेछ भनी बताएको छ। चेक रिपब्लिकले चीनबाट खरिद गरेको 80% परीक्षण किटहरूले गलत नतिजा दियो। स्लोभाकियाले चीनबाट 1.2 मिलियन परीक्षण किटहरू खरिद गरेको थियो जुन त्रुटिपूर्ण फेला परेका थिए।
en-mt: The Spanish ministry said it would return the kits that produced the wrong results and replace them with various test kits provided by Shenzhen Bioezi. 80% of the test kits purchased by the Czech Republic from China gave wrong results. Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China that were found defective.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: प्रधानमन्त्री माटोभिचले यी कुराहरूलाई डेनुबमा फाल्न सुझाव दिए। टर्की स्वास्थ्य मन्त्रालय आटेस काराले टर्कीले चीनबाट खरिद गरेका परीक्षण किटहरूमा "उच्च त्रुटि दर" छ र "तिनीहरू प्रयोग गरिएको छैन" भन्ने कुरा बताए.” UK ले चीनबाट 3.5 मिलियन परीक्षण किटहरू खरिद गर्‍यो तर प्रारम्भिक अप्रिल 2020 मा यी उपयोगी थिएनन् भनी घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: Prime Minister Matovich suggested throwing these things into the Danube. Turkish Health Ministry Ates Kara said that the test kits purchased by Turkey from China have a "high error rate" and "they are not used". THE UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but announced in early April 2020 that these were not useful.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: पोजेटिभ रिपोर्ट निस्केका मानिसहरूले क्वारेन्टाइन पालना गरी परीक्षण गर्ने र SARS-CoV-2 को पोजेटिभ नतिजा निस्केका मानिसहरूसँग सम्पर्कमा रहेका मानिसहरूलाई ट्रेस गर्ने गर्दा नतिजा सकारत्मक आयो।
en-mt: The results came positive as people who tested positive followed quarantine and traced people who came in contact with people who tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: इटालियन सहर Vò को इटालीमा पहिलो COVID-19 बाट मृत्यु भएको साइटमा काम गर्ने अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरूले लगभग दस दिनको बीचमा करिब 3,400 मानिसहरूको समग्र जनसङ्ख्यामा परीक्षणको दुईवटा क्रम सञ्चालन गरे।
en-mt: Researchers working at the site of the Italian city of Vò the first COVID-19 death in Italy conducted two series of tests on an overall population of about 3,400 people over the course of about ten days.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: पोजेटिभ परिणाम निस्केका लगभग आधा मानिसहरूलाई कुनै लक्षणहरू देखिएका थिएनन् र पत्ता लगाइएका सबै सङ्क्रमणहरूलाई क्वारेन्टाइनमा राखिएको थियो।
en-mt: Nearly half of those who tested positive had no symptoms, and all detected infections were quarantined.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: कम्यूनको लागि प्रतिबन्धित यात्रा सहित यसले नयाँ संक्रमणलाई पूर्ण रूपमा हटायो।
en-mt: This completely eliminated the new infection, including restricted travel for the commune.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: आक्रामक सम्पर्क ट्रेसिङ, इनबाउन्ड यात्रा प्रतिबन्धहरू, परीक्षण र क्वारेन्टाइनको साथमा, सिङ्गापुरमा 2020 कोरोनाभाइरसको महामारी अन्य विकसित देशहरूमा भन्दा धेरै कम रूपमा, तर अधिक रोकावटहरू बलपूर्वक रेस्टुरेन्ट र रिटेल व्यवसायहरूको बन्दाबन्दी बिना भइरहेको छ।
en-mt: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing and quarantine, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore is much less than in other developed countries, but more disruptions are taking place without a forced lockdown of restaurant and retail businesses.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: धेरै घटनाहरू रद्द गरिएको छ, र सिंगापुरले बासिन्दालाई 28 मार्चमा घरमै बस्न सुझाव दिन थाले, तर 23 मार्चको बिदा छुट्टी पछि स्कूलहरू पुन: खुले।
en-mt: Many incidents have been cancelled, and Singapore began advising residents to stay at home on March 28, but schools reopened after the March 23 holiday holiday.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: अन्य धेरै देशहरूले पनि माहामारीको सम्पर्क ट्रेसिङ्, इनबाउन्ड ट्रान्सभेस्ट रोकावट, परीक्षण, र क्वारन्टिन सहित तर आइसल्याण्ड र दक्षिण कोरिया जस्ता कम आक्रामक लक-डाउनहरूको साथ महामारीको प्रबन्ध गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Many other countries have also managed the pandemic, including contact tracing, inbound transvest prevention, testing, and quarantine, but with less aggressive lockdowns such as Iceland and South Korea.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: एउटा तथ्याङ्कीय अध्ययनले मृत्युको संख्याको सापेक्ष जुन देशहरूले अधिक परीक्षण गरेका छन्, तिनीहरूको घातक सङ्क्रमण दर एकदमै कम भएको फेला पारेको छ, सम्भवतः किनभने यी देशहरू हल्का वा कुनै लक्षणहरू नदेखिएका व्यक्तिहरूमा सङ्क्रमण पत्ता लगाउन धेरै राम्रोसँग सक्षम छन्।
en-mt: A statistical study found that countries that have tested more have significantly lower fatal infection rates relative to the number of deaths, possibly because these countries are much better able to detect infections in people with mild or no symptoms.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: WHO ले परीक्षण क्षमता नभएका र COVID-19 बारे सीमित अनुभव भएका राष्ट्रिय प्रयोगशालाहरू भएका देशहरूलाई पुष्टिकरण परीक्षणको लागि 16 WHO सन्दर्भका प्रयोगशालाहरू मध्ये एउटा प्रयोगशालामा आफ्नो पहिलो पाँच पोजेटिभ र पहिलो दश नेगेटिभ COVID-19 का नमूनाहरू पठाउन सिफारिस गर्दछ।
en-mt: WHO recommends countries with no testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience about COVID-19 to send their first five positive and first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the laboratories of reference 16 WHO for confirmation testing.

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: 16 रिफरेन्स प्रयोगशालाहरू मध्ये, एसियामा 7, युरोपमा 5, अफ्रिकामा 2, उत्तर अमेरिकामा 1 र अस्ट्रेलियामा 1 वटा प्रयोगशाला छ।
en-mt: Of the 16 reference laboratories, there are 7 laboratories in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: तल दिइएको चित्रपटमा, "% को रूपमा पोजेटिभ परीक्षणहरू" स्तम्भ देशको परीक्षण नीतिद्वारा प्रभावित भएको छ।
en-mt: In the movie given below, the column "Positive tests as %" has been influenced by the country's testing policy.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: अस्पतालमा भर्ना भएका व्यक्तिहरूको मात्र परीक्षण गर्ने मुलुकमा एक अस्पताल सबै नागरिकहरूको परीक्षण गर्ने देशको तुलनामा उच्च प्रतिशत सकारात्मक हुन्छ, चाहे उनीहरूले लक्षणहरू देखाइरहेको छ वा छैन, अन्य कुराहरू समान छन्।
en-mt: In a country that tests only hospitalized people, a hospital has a higher percentage of positives than a country that tests all citizens, whether they are showing symptoms or not, other things being equal.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: हात धुने (वा हातधुने), हातको स्वच्छताको रूपमा पनि चिनिने यो माटो, ग्रिज, सूक्ष्मजीवहरू वा अन्य अनावश्यक पदार्थहरू हटाउने उद्देश्यको लागि आफ्नो हात धुने क्रिया हो।
en-mt: Also known as hand washing (or hand washing), hand hygiene, it is the act of washing your hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms or other unnecessary substances.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: दिनको केही "महत्त्वपूर्ण समयमा" लगातार रूपमा साबुनले हात धुनाले मलाशय-मुखको मार्गबाट प्रसारण हुने पखाला र हैजा जस्ता धेरैजसो रोगहरूको प्रसारण रोक्छ।
en-mt: Washing hands with soap continuously at certain "critical times" of the day prevents the transmission of most diseases, such as diarrhea and cholera, transmitted through the rectal-mouth route.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: मानिसहरू इन्फ्लुएन्जा र रुघाजस्ता श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी रोगहरूले सङ्क्रमित हुन पनि सक्छन्, उदाहरणको लागि, यदि उनीहरूले आफ्नो आँखा, नाक वा मुख (अर्थात्, म्युकस मेम्ब्रेनहरू) छुनुअघि आफ्नो हात धोएनन् भने।
en-mt: People may also be infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza and cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: दिनको अवधिमा रोगको मल-मुखबाट प्रसारण कम गर्न साबुनले हात धुने महत्त्वपूर्ण हुने पाँच नाजुक क्षणहरू छन्: मलत्याग गर्नुअघि र पछि, बच्चाको तलको भाग सफा गरेपछि वा बच्चाको डायपर बदलेपछि, बच्चालाई खुवाउनुअघि, खानुअघि र खाना तयार गर्नु र काँचो मासु, माछा वा कुखुरा चलाउनु अघि र पछि।
en-mt: There are five delicate moments when washing hands with soap is important to reduce the transmission of disease from the faeces during the day: before and after defecation, after cleaning the bottom of the baby or changing the baby's diaper, before feeding the baby, before and after preparing food, and before and after eating raw meat, fish or chicken.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: साबुन र पानी उपलब्ध छैन भने हातहरू खरानीले सफा गर्न सकिन्छ। विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठनले हात धुन सिफारिस गर्छ:
en-mt: Hands can be cleaned with ashes if soap and water are not available. The World Health Organization recommends handwashing:

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: खाना तयार गर्नुअघि, गर्ने समयमा र गरेपछि।
en-mt: Before, during, and after preparing food.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: बिरामी व्यक्तिको लागि स्याहार गर्नुअघि र गरेपछि।
en-mt: Before and after care for the sick person.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: डायपर परिवर्तन गरेपछि वा बच्चालाई सफा गरेपछि जसले शौचालय प्रयोग गरेको थियो।
en-mt: After changing diapers or cleaning the child who had used the toilet.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: नाक पुछेपछि, खोकेपछि वा हाच्छ्युँ गरेपछि।
en-mt: After wiping, coughing, or sneezing.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: जनावर, जनावरको खाना वा जनावरको मल छोएपछि।
en-mt: After touching animals, animal food, or animal feces.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: चिकित्सा हातको सरसफाईले चिकित्सा प्रक्रियाहरूसँग सम्बन्धित सरसफाई अभ्यासहरूलाई जनाउँछ।
en-mt: Medical hand hygiene refers to sanitation practices associated with medical procedures.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: औषधि वा चिकित्सकिय स्याहार दिनुअघि हात धुनाले रोगको प्रसार रोक्न वा न्यूनीकरण गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: Washing hands before medication or medical care can prevent or reduce the spread of the disease.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: हात धुनुको मुख्य चिकित्सकी उद्देश्य भनेको रोगजनक (रोग निम्त्याउन सक्ने ब्याक्टेरिया, भाइरस वा अन्य सूक्ष्मजीवहरू) र रसायनहरू भएका हातहरू सफा गर्नु हो जसले हानि वा रोग निम्त्याउन सक्छ।
en-mt: The main medical purpose of hand washing is to clean hands containing pathogens (disease-causing bacteria, viruses or other microorganisms) and chemicals that can cause harm or disease.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: यो ती व्यक्तिहरूको लागि महत्त्वपूर्ण हुन्छ जसले खाना चलाउँछन् वा चिकित्सकीय क्षेत्रमा काम गर्छन्, तर सर्वसाधारण जनताको लागि पनि महत्त्वपूर्ण अभ्यास हो।
en-mt: It is important for those who cook or work in the medical field, but is also an important practice for the general public.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: हात धुनाले इन्फ्लुएन्जा, कोरोनाभाइरस र अन्य सङ्क्रामक रोगहरूको फैलाउन कम गर्ने; पखालाको सङ्क्रामक कारणहरूको रोकथाम गर्ने; श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी सङक्रमण कम गर्ने लगायतका धेरै स्वास्थ्य लाभहरू हुन्छन्;
en-mt: Reducing the spread of influenza, coronavirus and other infectious diseases by washing hands; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; There are many health benefits, including reducing respiratory infections;

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: र घरमा हुने सुत्केरीहरूमा शिशु मृत्युदर कम गर्ने।
en-mt: and reduce infant mortality in home deliveries.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: 2013 को अध्ययनले सुधार गरिएको हात धुने अध्ययनहरूले पाँच वर्षभन्दा मुनिका बालबालिकाहरूको लम्बाइको विकासमा साना सुधारहरू निम्त्याउन सक्नेछ भन्ने कुरा देखायो।
en-mt: A 2013 study showed that improved handwashing studies could lead to small improvements in the length development of children under five years of age.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: विकासशील देशहरूमा, साबुनले हात धुने जस्ता साना व्यवहारात्मक परिवर्नहरूको सुरुवात गरेर श्वासप्रश्वास र पखाला सम्बन्धित बाल मृत्युदर कम गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: In developing countries, child mortality related to breathing and diarrhea can be reduced by introducing small behavioral changes, such as washing hands with soap.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: यो सामान्य कार्यले यी रोगहरूबाट हुने मृत्युदरलाई लगभग 50% ले घटाउन सक्छ।
en-mt: This general function can reduce the mortality rate from these diseases by about 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: हात धुने कार्यलाई प्रवर्द्धन गर्ने हस्तक्षेपले पखालाको प्रसङ्गलाई लगभग तीन तिहाईले घटाउन सक्छ र यसलाई कम आय क्षेत्रहरूमा सफा पानी उपलब्ध गराउने कार्यसँग तुलना गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: Interventions that promote handwashing can reduce the context of diarrhea by about three-thirds and can be compared to providing clean water in low-income areas.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: 48% कम पखालाका प्रसङ्गहरू साबुनले हात धुने कार्यसँग सम्बन्धित हुन सक्छन्। साबुनले हात धुने कार्य भनेको घर, विद्यालय र समुदाय व्यापक ठाउँहरूमा गरिने स्वत: व्यवहार अनुसार पखाला र गम्भीर श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी सङ्क्रमण (ARI) रोक्ने सबैभन्दा प्रभावकारी र सजिलो तरिका हो।
en-mt: 48% fewer diarrhea episodes may be related to washing hands with soap. Washing hands with soap is one of the most effective and easy ways to prevent diarrhea and severe respiratory infections (ARI) in accordance with the automatic behavior at home, school, and community.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: निमोनिया, एक प्रमुख ARI प्रत्येक वर्ष अनुमानित 1.8 मिलियन बालबालिकाहरूको ज्यान लिने प्रथम पाँच वर्ष मुनिका बालबालिकाहरूको बीचको मृत्युको कारण हो।
en-mt: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the cause of death among the first children under five years of age, killing an estimated 1.8 million children each year.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: पखाला र निमोनियाले करिब 3.5 लाख बच्चाको मृत्यु हुने गर्दछ।
en-mt: Diarrhea and pneumonia kill about 3.5 lakh children.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: UNICEF का अनुसार, इन्ग्रेन बानीमा खाना खानुअघि र शौचालय प्रयोग गरेपछि साबुनले हात मिची-मिची धुनुले कुनै प्रकारको भ्याक्सिन वा चिकित्सा हस्तक्षेपले भन्दा धेरै जीवनहरू बचाउन सक्छ, यसले पखालाबाट हुने लगभग आधा मृत्यु र तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सङ्क्रमणबाट हुने लगभग एक-चौथाई मृत्य हुनबाट रोकेको छ।
en-mt: According to the UNICEF, washing hands with soap before eating and using the toilet in ingrain habits can save more lives than any type of vaccine or medical intervention, preventing about half of all deaths from diarrhea and nearly one-quarter of deaths from acute respiratory infections.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: पानी, सफाई र स्वच्छता (WASH) कार्यक्रमहरूको भागको रूपमा हात धुनेलाई साधारणतया अन्य सफाईका हस्तक्षेपतहरूद्वारा एकत्रित गरिन्छ।
en-mt: Handwashing as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programs is usually collected by other sanitation interventionists.

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: हात धुनाले खटिराहरूको विरूद्ध पनि सुरक्षा गर्छ जुन प्रत्यक्ष शारीरिक सम्पर्कबाट प्रसार हुन्छ।
en-mt: Hand washing also protects against scabies that spread through direct physical contact.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: हात धुनुको एउटा सानो हानिकारक प्रभाव भनेको बारम्बार हात धुनाले छाला मरेर छालाको क्षति हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: One of the small harmful effects of washing hands is that frequent hand washing can cause skin damage by skin death.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: सन् 2012 मा गरिएको एक ड्यानिस अध्ययनले अत्यधिक हात धुनाले चिलाउने, ह्यान्ड एक्जेमा वा ह्यान्ड डर्मेटाइटिस भनिने छालाको पत्र निस्किने समस्या आउन सक्छ भन्ने पत्ता लगाएको छ। यो विशेष गरी स्वास्थ्यकर्मीहरूमा हुने गर्छ।
en-mt: A Danish study conducted in 2012 found that excessive handwashing can lead to irritation, hand eczema, or skin rashes called hand dermatitis. This is especially the case with health workers.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: ज्यादै छिटो हात धुने कार्य पनि अब्सेसिभ-कम्पल्सिभ डिसअर्डर (OCD) का लक्षणहरू मध्ये एक लक्षणको रूपमा देखिन्छ।
en-mt: Excessive hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: दिनको अवधिमा रोगको मल-मुखबाट प्रसारण कम गर्न साबुनले हात धुने महत्त्वपूर्ण हुने पाँच नाजुक समयहरू छन्: बाथरुमको प्रयोग गरेपछि (पिसाब, मलत्याग), बच्चाको तलको भाग सफा गरेपछि (बच्चाको डायपर बदल्ने), बच्चालाई खुवाउनुअघि, खानुअघि र खाना तयार गर्नु वा काँचो मासु, माछा वा कुखुरा चलाउनु अघि/पछि।
en-mt: There are five critical times during the day when washing hands with soap is important to reduce the spread of disease from feces: after using the bathroom (urination, excrement), cleaning the baby's bottom (changing the baby's diaper), preparing food before feeding the baby, before and after eating, or before/after eating raw meat, fish, or chicken.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: रोगको प्रशारण रोक्न सही हात धुने तरिकाहरू अपनाउनुपर्ने अन्य अवस्थाहरू काटेको वा घाउको उपचार गर्नुअघि र पछि; हाच्छ्युँ गरेपछि, खोकेपछि वा नाकबाट सिँगान पुछेपछि; जनावरको मल छोएपछि वा जनावरहरूलाई चलाएपछि; र फोहोर छोएपछि हुन्।
en-mt: Other conditions requiring correct hand washing methods to prevent the transmission of the disease before and after the treatment of amputations or wounds; After sneezing, coughing, or wiping the shingle from the nose; after touching the animal's feces or after driving the animals; And after touching the garbage.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: धेरै देशहरूमा, साबुनले हात धुनेको न्यून दर छ।
en-mt: In many countries, there are low rates of washing hands with soap.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: 2015 मा 54 देशहरूमा हात धुनेमा गरिएको अध्ययनले औसतमा साबुनले हात धुने अभ्यास गर्ने 38.7% घरधुरी पाइए। 2014 को अध्ययनले साउदी अरेबिया उच्चतम दर 97 प्रतिशत; संयुक्त राज्यमा लगभग मध्यम 77 प्रतिशत; र चीनमा सबैभन्दा कम 23 प्रतिशत रहेको देखायो। धेरै व्यवहार परिवर्तनका व्यवहारहरू नाजुक क्षणहरूमा साबुनले हात धुने व्यवहार अपनाउने वृद्धि भएको हाल देखिन्छ। बालबालिकाहरूमा हात धुने कुरा स्थापना गर्ने एक विकल्प विद्यालय बालबालिकाहरूको लागि दिनको कुनै निर्धारित समयमा समूहमा हात धुन लगाउने हो।
en-mt: A 2015 study on handwashing in 54 countries found that on average 38.7% of households practicing washing hands with soap. According to a 2014 study Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; about 77 percent in the United States; and showed the lowest 23 percent in China. Many behavior change behaviors currently appear to be an increase in the adoption of hand-washing behavior with soap in critical moments. One option to establish handwashing in children is to wash hands in groups at any scheduled time of the day for school children.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: फिलिपिन्सको शिक्षा विभागले कार्यान्वयन गरेको "महत्त्वपूर्ण स्वास्थ्य सेवा कार्यक्रम" बालबालिकाको स्वास्थ्य तथा शिक्षा प्रवर्द्धन गर्ने स्केल कार्यको उदाहरण हो।
en-mt: The "Vital Healthcare Program" implemented by the Department of Education of the Philippines is an example of scale work to promote children's health and education.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: वर्षमा दुईपटक जुकाको उपचार गर्ने, साबुनले दैनिक हात धुने कुरा आपूर्ति गराउने, फ्लोराइडले दैनिक दाँत माझ्ने यो राष्ट्रिय कार्यक्रमको मुख्य भाग हो।
en-mt: Treatment of lice twice a year, daily hand washing with soap and daily brushing of teeth with fluoride are the main parts of this national program.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: यो इन्डोनेसियामा पनि सफलतापूर्वक कार्यान्वयन भएको छ।
en-mt: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: छालाबाट सुक्ष्मजीवहरू हटाउने कार्यलाई पानीमा साबुन वा डिटरजेन्ट थपेर उन्नत बनाइन्छ।
en-mt: The removal of microorganisms from the skin is enhanced by adding soap or detergent to the water.

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: साबुन र डिटर्जेन्टहरूका मुख्य क्रियाहरू घोलमा बाधाहरू कम गर्ने घोल्यमात्रा बढाउने हुन्।
en-mt: The main functions of soaps and detergents are to increase the amount of solvents that reduce the barriers to the solution.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: पानी मात्र छाला सफा गर्न अपर्याप्त हुन्छ किनभने चिल्लो र प्रोटिनहरू, जुन जैविक माटोका तत्त्वहरू हुन्, ती पानीमा सजिलै घुल्दैनन्।
en-mt: Water alone is insufficient to clean the skin because fats and proteins, which are elements of organic soil, do not dissolve easily in water.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: यद्यपि, धुने कामलाई पानीको उल्लेख्य बहावद्वारा सघाइन्छ।
en-mt: However, washing is supported by a significant flow of water.

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: यसको पुनः प्रयोग गर्न सकिने प्रकृतिको कारणले ठोस साबुनले अघिल्ला प्रयोगहरूबाट प्राप्त गरिएको ब्याक्टेरिया होल्ड गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: Due to its reusable nature, solid soap can hold bacteria obtained from previous experiments.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: दूषित ठोस साबुनबाट ब्याक्टेरियल स्थानान्तरणको अध्ययन गरेका थोरै अध्ययनहरूले ब्याक्टेरिया फिँजसँगै पखालिने भएकाले स्थानान्तरण हुने सम्भावना नहुने निर्णय गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Few studies that have studied bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soaps have decided that the bacteria are not likely to be transferred as they are washed away with fins.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: CDC ले अझै भन्छ "व्यवस्थापनको लागि हात नलगाइ चलाउने तरल साबुन उपयुक्त छ"।
en-mt: CDC continues to say "handless liquid soap is suitable for management".

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.
targetString: स्वास्थ्य-सचेत जनताको लागि एन्टिब्याक्टेरियल साबुनको उच्च मात्रामा प्रचार गरिएको छ।
en-mt: High amounts of antibacterial soaps have been promoted for the health-conscious public.

sourceString: To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.
targetString: आजसम्म, सिफारिस गरिएको एन्टिसेप्टिक्स वा कीटाणुनाशक प्रयोग गर्नाले प्रकृतिमा एन्टिबायोटिक प्रतिरोधी जीवहरूका लागि छनोट हुन्छ भन्ने कुनै प्रमाण छैन।
en-mt: To date, there is no evidence that the use of recommended antiseptics or disinfectants leads to selection for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.

sourceString: However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms.
targetString: यद्यपि, एन्टिब्याक्टेरियल साबुनहरूमा ट्राइक्लोसन जस्ता साधारण एन्टिब्याक्टेरियल एजेन्टहरू हुन्छन्, जसमा जीवहरूको प्रतिरोधक प्रयासहरूको एक विस्तृत सूची हुन्छ।
en-mt: However, antibacterial soaps contain simple antibacterial agents such as triclosan, containing a comprehensive list of organisms' resistance efforts.

sourceString: So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be.
targetString: त्यसैले, यदि एन्टिबायोटिक साबुनहरूद्वारा एन्टिबायोटिक प्रतिरोधको प्रयास वयन नगरिएमा समेत, तिनीहरूलाई बजारीकरण गरिए अनुसारको तिनीहरू प्रभावकारी नहुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Thus, even if antibiotic resistance efforts are not made by antibiotic soaps, they may not be as effective as they are marketed.

sourceString: Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands.
targetString: सतही र छालाको सुरक्षा गर्ने एजेन्टहरूको साथै, परिष्कृत निर्माणहरूमा pH नियन्त्रकको रूपमा अम्लहरू (एसेटिक अम्ल, एस्कर्बिक अम्ल, ल्याक्टिक अम्ल), एन्टिमाइक्रोबायल्ली सक्रिय बेन्जोइक अम्ल र थप छालाका कन्डिसनरहरू (घ्युकुमारी, भिटामिनहरू, मेन्थल, बिरुवाबाट निकालिएका कुराहरू) समावेश हुन सक्छन्। युनिभर्सिटी अफ ओरिगन स्कुल अफ पब्लिक हेल्थको व्यापक विश्लेषणले विरामीपनाहरूको रोकथाम गर्ने र हातबाट ब्याक्टेरिया हटाउने ट्राइक्लोसन समावेश गरिएका ग्राहक-स्तरका एन्टि-ब्याक्टेरियल साबुनहरू जत्तिकै सादा साबुनहरू पनि प्रभावकारी हुने सङ्केत गरेको छ।
en-mt: In addition to surface and skin protection agents, sophisticated formulations can include acids (ascetic acids, ascorbic acids, lactic acids), antimicrobially activated benzoic acids and additional skin conditioners (gumberries, vitamins, menthols, plant extracts) as pH controllers. A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as customer-level anti-bacterial soaps that contain triclosan to prevent illness and remove bacteria from hands.

sourceString: Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.
targetString: हात धुन सकिने तातो पानी ब्याक्टेरिया मार्न पर्याप्त तातो हुँदैन।
en-mt: Hot water that can be washed hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.

sourceString: Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C).
targetString: ब्याक्टेरिया शरीरको तापक्रम (37 °C) मा छिटो बढ्छ।
en-mt: Bacteria grow rapidly at body temperature (37°C).

sourceString: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria.
targetString: यद्यपि, मनतातो, साबुन पानी माटो र ब्याक्टेरिया होल्ड गर्ने प्राकृतिक तेल हटाउन चिसो, साबुन पानीभन्दा प्रभावकारी हुन्छ।
en-mt: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water in removing natural oils that hold soil and bacteria.

sourceString: Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands.
targetString: यद्यपि, प्रसिद्ध विश्वासको विपरीत, वैज्ञानिक अध्ययनहरूले हातमा माइक्रोबायल लोड कम गर्न तातो पानीको प्रयोगको कुनै प्रभाव नहुने देखाएका छन्।
en-mt: However, contrary to the well-known belief, scientific studies have shown that the use of hot water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hand.

sourceString: A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent.
targetString: ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजर वा ह्यान्ड एन्टिसेप्टिक गैर-पानी-आधारित हातको सरसफाई गर्ने एजेन्ट हो।
en-mt: Hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand cleaning agent.

sourceString: In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.
targetString: गत 1990 मा र 21 औँ शताब्दीको प्रारम्भिक भागमा, अल्कोहल रब गैर-पानीमा आधारित हातको सरसफाइका एजेन्टहरू (जसलाई अल्कोहल-आधारित ह्यान्ड रब, एन्टिसेप्टिक ह्यान्ड रब वा ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजरहरू पनि भनिन्छ) ले लोकप्रियता प्राप्त गर्न सुरु गर्‍यो।
en-mt: In the last 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also called alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.

sourceString: Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol.
targetString: धेरैजसो प्रयोगको लागि सजिलो र अल्कोहलको सुख्खा हुने प्रभाव कम गर्न जेलमा कार्बोमर (एक्रेलिक अम्लको पोलिमर) जस्ता बाक्लो बनाउने एजेन्ट वा तरलमा ग्लिसिरिन जस्ता ह्युमेक्टेन्ट वा फोमको साथमा बनाइएका आइसोप्रोपाइल अल्कोहल वा इथानोलमा आधारित छन्।
en-mt: Most are based on alcohol or ethanol made with thickening agents such as carbomers (polymers of acrylic acids) in the gel or humectants such as glycerin in liquids or foam to reduce the effects of alcohol drying.

sourceString: Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.
targetString: फिक्का बनाइएको हाइड्रोजन-पेरोक्साइड अझै थप्नाले थप सूक्ष्मजीवि क्रियाकलाप बढ्छ। न्यूनतम 60 देखि 95% अल्कोहल भएका ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजरहरू रोगाणुहरू मार्नमा प्रभावकारी हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Adding faded hydrogen-peroxide further increases microbial activity. Hand sanitizers with a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are effective in killing germs.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.
targetString: अल्कोहल रब स्यानिटाइजरहरूले ब्याक्टेरिया, बहु-औषधि प्रतिरोधी ब्याक्टेरिया (MRSA र VRE), क्षयरोग र केही भाइरसहरू (HIV, हर्प्स, RSV, राइनोभाइरस, भ्याक्सिनिया, इन्फ्लुएन्जा र हेपाटाइटिस सहित) र फङ्गाई मार्छन्।
en-mt: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis and certain viruses (including HIV, harps, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza and hepatitis) and fungi.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.
targetString: 70% अल्कोहल समावेश भएका अल्कोहल रब स्यानिटाइजरको 30 सेकेन्डको प्रयोगपछि हातमा ब्याक्टेरिया 99.97% (3.5 लग कम, 35 डेसिबल कमसँग बराबर) मारेको र 1 मिनेटको प्रयोगपछि हातमा ब्याक्टेरिया 99.99% देखि 99.999% सम्म (4 देखि 5 लग कम) मारेको पाइयो। ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजरहरू ब्याक्टेरियाको विरुद्ध बढी प्रभावकारी र केही भाइरसको विरुद्ध कम प्रभावकारी हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Alcohol containing 70% alcohol was found to kill 99.97% (3.5 log less, equivalent to 35 decibels less) in the hands after 30 seconds of use of rub sanitizer and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log less) bacteria in the arm after 1 minute of use. Hand sanitizers are more effective against bacteria and less effective against certain viruses.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands.
targetString: अल्कोहलमा आधारित हाते स्यानिटाइजरहरू नोरोभाइरस (वा नरवाल्क) प्रकारका भाइरसहरू, सङ्क्रामक ग्यास्ट्रोइन्टेराइटिसको एकदमै सामान्य कारण विरूद्ध लगभग समग्रमा अप्रभावकारी छन्। दुवै हातहरूलाई राम्रोसँग भिजाउन वा ढाक्नका लागि पर्याप्त हाते एन्टिसेप्टिक वा अल्कोहल रब अनिवार्य रूपमा प्रयोग गर्नु पर्छ।
en-mt: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost overall ineffective against norovirus (or narvalk) type viruses, the most common cause of infectious gastroenteritis. Adequate hand antiseptic or alcohol rub should essentially be used to soak or cover both hands properly.

sourceString: The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.
targetString: दुबै हातको अगाडि र पछाडि र औँलाहरूको बीचमा र छेउ करिब 30 सेकेन्डसम्म तरल, फोम वा जेल सुख्खा नभएसम्म रगडिन्छन्।
en-mt: The front and back of both hands and between the fingers and the sides are rubbed for about 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.

sourceString: Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty.
targetString: औँलाको टुप्पोलाई दुवै हत्केलामा मिचेर तिनीहरूलाई अनिवार्य रूपमा राम्रोसँग पखाल्नु पर्छ। यु.एस. रोग नियन्त्रण तथा रोकथाम केन्द्रले सामान्यतया हातहरू फोहोर हुँदा ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजर रबले हात धुन सुझाव दिन्छ।
en-mt: The tips of the fingers should be rubbed in both palms and they must essentially be thoroughly washed. The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention generally recommends washing hands with hand sanitizer rubs when hands are dirty.

sourceString: The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable.
targetString: यी एजेन्टहरूको बढ्दो प्रयोग तिनीहरूको सहज प्रयोग र सूक्ष्म जीवहरूको विरूद्ध तीव्र मार्ने गतिविधिमा आधारित छ; यद्यपि, तिनीहरूलाई साबुन र पानी अनुपलब्ध नहुँदासम्म उचित हात धुने कार्यको प्रतिस्थापनको रूपमा प्रयोग गर्नुहुँदैन।
en-mt: The increased use of these agents is based on their spontaneous use and rapid killing activity against microorganisms; However, they should not be used as a replacement for proper hand washing until soap and water are unavailable.

sourceString: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.
targetString: उपसात्वक र/वा छालाका मोइस्चराजरहरू फर्मुलामा नथपिँदासम्म अल्कोहल-आधारित ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजरको बारम्बार प्रयोगले छालालाई सुख्खा बनाउन सक्छ।
en-mt: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizer can dry the skin until the subsertiles and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.

sourceString: The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.
targetString: अल्कोहलको सुख्खा गर्ने प्रभावलाई फर्मुलामा ग्लिसरिन र/वा अन्य इमोलिएन्टहरू थपेर कम गर्न वा हटाउन सकिन्छ।
en-mt: The effects of drying alcohol can be reduced or removed by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.

sourceString: In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents.
targetString: चिकित्सकीय परीक्षणहरूमा, साबुनहरू वा एन्टिमाइक्रोबियल डिटर्जेन्टहरू भन्दा इमोलिएन्टहरू भएका अल्कोहल-आधारित ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजरहरूले छालाको जलन र सुख्खापनलाई कम गर्छन्।
en-mt: In medical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients rather than soaps or antimicrobial detergents reduce skin irritation and dryness.

sourceString: Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur.
targetString: अल्कोहल ह्यान्ड रबमा उपस्थित अल्कोहल वा अन्य अवयवहरूमा एलर्जिक कन्ट्याक्ट डर्मेटाइटिस, कन्ट्याक्ट अर्टिसेरिया वा उच्च संवेदनशीलता विरलै हुने गर्दछ।
en-mt: Alcohol or other ingredients present in alcohol hand rub rarely have allergic contact dermatitis, contact artisaria or high sensitivity.

sourceString: The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing.
targetString: साबुन र पानीले हात धुनेको तुलनामा इरिटेन्ट कन्ट्याक्ट डर्मेटाइटिस गराउने कम सम्भावना भएकाहरू एक आकर्षण बने।
en-mt: Those less likely to develop irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction than those who washed their hands with soap and water.

sourceString: Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them.
targetString: तिनीहरूको प्रभावकारिताको बावजुद, गैर-पानीका एजेन्टहरूले हातहरूको अर्गानिक सामग्री सफा नगरेर, सामान्य रूपमा तिनीहरूलाई किटाणुमुक्त बनाउँछन्।
en-mt: Despite their efficacy, non-water agents make them germ-free in general, by not cleaning the organic contents of the hands.

sourceString: It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands.
targetString: रोगजनकहरू हातमा रहिरहने भएकाले धेरैजसो रोगजनकहरूको प्रसारण रोक्ने कार्यमा ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजर साबुन र पानी जस्तो प्रभावकारी नहुने कारण यही हो।
en-mt: This is the reason why hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water in preventing the transmission of most pathogens, as pathogens remain in hand.

sourceString: Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs.
targetString: अल्कोहल-रहित ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजरको प्रभावकारिता भारी रूपमा सामग्री र निरूपणमा आधारित हुन्छ र ऐतिहासिक रूपमा विशेषगरी कार्यात्मक अल्कोहल र अल्कोहल रबहरू रहेका छन्।
en-mt: The efficacy of alcohol-free hand sanitizers is heavily based on materials and representations and has historically been particularly functional alcohol and alcohol rubs.

sourceString: More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions.
targetString: हालसालै, सम्भावित रूपमा प्रगतिशील प्रतिकूल छालाका प्रतिक्रियाहरूको कारणले दोहोरिएको प्रयोगपछिको प्रभावकारिता घटाउन देखाइएको अल्कोहलको विपरीत, बेन्जाल्कोनियम क्लोराइड प्रयोग गर्ने निरूपणहरू अनुप्रयोगपछि निरन्तर र सञ्चित एन्टीमाइक्रोबियल क्रियाकलाप गर्न देखाइएको थियो।
en-mt: More recently, in contrast to alcohol that has been shown to reduce efficacy after repeated use due to potentially progressive adverse skin reactions, representations using benzalconium chloride were shown to perform sustained and accumulated antimicrobial activity after application.

sourceString: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead.
targetString: कम आम्दानी भएका समुदायहरूमा भएका धेरै मानिसहरूले साबुन खरिद गर्न सक्दैनन् र यसको सट्टामा खरानी वा माटो प्रयोग गर्छन्।
en-mt: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford to buy soap and use ash or soil instead.

sourceString: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap.
targetString: पानी मात्र भन्दा खरानी वा माटो बढी प्रभावकारी हुन सक्छन्, तर साबुनभन्दा कम प्रभावकारी हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but less effective than soap.

sourceString: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it.
targetString: एउटा चिन्ता भनेको यो हो कि माटो वा खरानी सूक्ष्मजीवहरूले दूषित भएमा यसले रोगको प्रसारणलाई कम गर्नुको सट्टामा झन बढाउन सक्नेछ।
en-mt: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms, it may increase the transmission of the disease rather than reduce it.

sourceString: Like soap, ash is also a disinfecting agent because in contact with water, it forms an alkaline solution.
targetString: साबुनजस्तै, खरानी पनि एक डिसइन्फेक्टेन्ट एजेन्ट हो किनभने पानीको सम्पर्कमा यसले अल्कालाइन घोल बनाउँछ।
en-mt: Like soap, ash is also a disinfectant agent because when exposed to water it forms an alkaline solution.

sourceString: WHO recommended ash or sand as alternative to soap when soap is not available.
targetString: WHO ले साबुन उपलब्ध नहुँदा साबुनको विकल्पको रूपमा खरानी वा बालुवाको सिफारिस गर्छ।
en-mt: WHO recommends ash or sand as an alternative to soap when soap is not available.

sourceString: Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps:
targetString: रोगको प्रसारणको रोकथामका लागि यु.एस. रोग नियन्त्रण केन्द्रहरूद्वारा सिफारिस गरिएको सही हात धुने तरिकामा निम्न कुराहरू समावेश हुन्छन्:
en-mt: The U.S. for the prevention of disease transmission. Proper hand washing methods recommended by centers for disease control include the following:

sourceString: Wet hands with warm or cold running water.
targetString: हातलाई तातो वा चिसो बगिरहेको पानीमा भिजाउनुहोस्।
en-mt: Soak your hands in hot or cold running water.

sourceString: Running water is recommended because standing basins may be contaminated, while the temperature of the water does not seem to make a difference.
targetString: अडिग बेसिनहरू दूषित हुन सक्ने भएका कारण बगिरहेको पानी सिफारिस गरिएको छ, जबकि पानीको तापक्रमले भिन्नता गर्ने जस्तो देखिँदैन।
en-mt: Running water is recommended because persistent basins can be contaminated, while water temperature does not seem to vary.

sourceString: Lather hands by rubbing them with a generous amount of soap, including the backs of hands, between fingers, and under nails.
targetString: साबुनको अधिक मात्राले हात पछाडि, औँलाहरूको बीचमा र नङहरूको मुनि सबैलाई समेटेर हातहरूलाई रगडेर फिँज निकाल्नुहोस्।
en-mt: Remove the fins by rubbing the hands with a high amount of soap, covering the back of the hands, between the fingers, and under the nails.

sourceString: Soap lifts germs from the skin, and studies show that people tend to wash their hands more thoroughly when soap is used rather than water alone.
targetString: साबुनले छालाबाट रोगाणुहरू निकाल्छ र अध्ययनहरूले देखाउँछन् कि मानिसले पानी मात्र प्रयोग गर्दा भन्दा साबुन प्रयोग गर्दा आफ्ना हात पूरै धुने सम्भावना बढी हुन्छ।
en-mt: Soap removes germs from the skin, and studies show that people are more likely to wash their hands completely when they use soap than when they use only water.

sourceString: Scrub for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: कम्तीमा 20 सेकेन्डसम्म मिच्नुहोस्।
en-mt: Mix for at least 20 seconds.

sourceString: Scrubbing creates friction, which helps remove germs from skin, and scrubbing for longer periods removes more germs.
targetString: मिच्नाले घर्षण सिर्जना गर्छ, जसले छालाबाट किटाणुहरू हटाउन मद्दत गर्छ र अझ लामो समयसम्म मिच्नाले अझ धेरै किटाणुहरू हटाउँछ।
en-mt: Mold creates friction, which helps to remove germs from the skin, and prolonged mixing removes more germs.

sourceString: Rinse well under running water.
targetString: बगिरहेको पानीले राम्ररी पखाल्नुहोस्।
en-mt: Rinse it thoroughly with running water.

sourceString: Rinsing in a basin can recontaminate hands.
targetString: बेसिनमा पखाल्नाले हातहरू पुन: दूषित हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Washing in the basin can contaminate the hands again.

sourceString: Dry with a clean towel or allow to air dry.
targetString: सफा तौलियाले सुख्खा राख्नुहोस् वा हावाले सुक्न दिनुहोस्।
en-mt: Keep it dry with a clean towel or let it dry with the air.

sourceString: Wet and moist hands are more easily recontaminated.The most commonly missed areas are the thumb, the wrist, the areas between the fingers, and under fingernails.
targetString: चिसो र ओसिलो हात अझ सजिलै पुनः दूषित हुन सक्छ। धेरैजसोले छुटाउने क्षेत्रहरू बुढी औँला, नाडी, औँलाहरूको बीचको क्षेत्र र नङको मुनि हुन्।
en-mt: Cold and damp hands can be more easily contaminated again. The areas that most people distinguish are the thumb, pulse, area between the fingers, and under the nails.

sourceString: Artificial nails and chipped nail polish may harbor microorganisms.
targetString: कृत्रिम नङ र काटिएका नङको पालिसले सूक्ष्मजीवहरूलाई आश्रय दिन सक्छ।
en-mt: Artificial nails and cut nail polish can harbor microorganisms.

sourceString: Moisturizing lotion is often recommended to keep the hands from drying out; dry skin can lead to skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of infection.
targetString: हातहरू सुख्खा हुनबाट जोगाउन अक्सर मोइस्चराइजिङ लोसनको सिफारिस गरिन्छ; सुख्खा छालाले छालाको क्षति गराउन सक्छ जसले सङ्क्रमणको प्रसारणको लागि जोखिम बढाउन सक्छ।
en-mt: Moisturizing lotions are often recommended to keep the hands from drying; Dry skin can cause skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of the infection.

sourceString: Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options.
targetString: धाराको पानी र/वा साबुन उपलब्ध नहुने स्थानहरूमा हात धुनेलाई सहज बनाउन कम-लागतका विकल्पहरू बनाउन सकिन्छ जस्तै झुन्ड्याइएको जेरीक्यान वा लौकाको उचित प्वालहरूबाट पानी खन्याउने र विकासशील देशहरूमा यदि आवश्यक भएमा खरानीको प्रयोग गर्ने। सीमित पानीको आपूर्ति भएका अवस्थाहरूमा (विकासशील देशहरूका विद्यालयहरू वा ग्रामीण क्षेत्रहरू), त्यहाँ पानीको संरक्षण गर्ने समाधानहरू छन्, जस्तै “अस्थिर धारा” र अन्य कम-लागतका विकल्पहरू।
en-mt: Low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing in places where tap water and/or soap are not available, such as pouring water from proper holes of hanging jerrycan or gourd, and using ash if necessary in developing countries. In situations with limited water supplies (schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are solutions to conserve water, such as "unstable streams" and other low-cost alternatives.

sourceString: A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap.
targetString: एक अस्थिर धारो एउटा डोरीले झुन्ड्याइएको जग, हातमा कम मात्रामा पानी खन्याउन खुट्टाले चलाउने उत्तोलक र साबुनको टुक्रा प्रयोग गरिएको एक सरल प्रविधि हो।
en-mt: An unsteady thread is a simple technique used by a rope-hung foundation, foot-mounted leverage, and soap pieces to pour a small amount of water into the hands.

sourceString: Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms.
targetString: हात धुने प्रक्रिया अन्तर्गत प्रभावकारी ढङ्गले हात सुकाउनु अनिवार्य छ। तर सार्वजनिक शौचालहरूमा हात सुकाउने सबैभन्दा प्रभावकारी विधि कुन हो भन्ने कुरामा केही विवाद छ।
en-mt: It is mandatory to dry hands effectively under the hand washing process. But there is some controversy as to which is the most effective method of hand drying in public toilets.

sourceString: A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.
targetString: अनुसन्धानको बढ्दो मात्राले धेरै वासरुममा पाइने इलेक्ट्रिक ह्यान्ड ड्रायरहरू भन्दा पेपर टावलहरू एकदम धैरै स्वस्थकर हुने सुझाव दिन्छन्।
en-mt: An increasing amount of research suggests that paper towels are much healthier than electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.

sourceString: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers.
targetString: 2008 मा, कागजको तौलिया, तातो-हावा ह्यान्ड ड्रायर र अझ आधुनिक जेट‍-एयर ह्यान्ड ड्रायरको तुलना गर्न वेस्टमिन्स्टर विश्वविद्यालय, लन्डनद्वारा एक अध्ययन गरिएको थियो र यसलाई कागजको तौलियाको उद्योग युरोपियन टिस्यु सिम्पोसियमद्वारा प्रायोजित गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London to compare paper towels, hot-air hand dryers and even more modern jet-air hand dryers and it was sponsored by the Paper Towel Industry European Tissue Symposium.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%.
targetString: हात धोएर तातो-हावाको ड्रायरले सुकाउनाले, ब्याक्टेरियाको जम्मा सङ्ख्याको औसतमा फिङ्गर प्याडमा 194% र हत्केलामा 254% ले वृद्धि भएको पाइयो।
en-mt: By washing hands and drying with a hot-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase by an average of 194% in the finger pad and 254% in the palm.

sourceString: Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%.
targetString: जेट‍-एयर ड्रायरले सुकाउनाले ब्याक्टेरियाको जम्मा सङ्ख्याको औसतमा फिङ्गर प्याडमा 42% र हत्केलामा 15% ले वृद्धि गरायो।
en-mt: Drying with jet-air dryers increased the total number of bacteria by an average of 42% in the finger pad and 15% in the palm.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method.
targetString: हात धोएर पेपर टावलले हात सुकाएपछि, फिङ्गरप्याडमा औसत 76% र हत्केलामा 77% ले ब्याक्टेरिया कम भएका थिए। वैज्ञानिकहरूले प्रत्येक प्रकारको सुकाउने विधिको परिणामस्वरूप अन्य वासरुम प्रयोगकर्ताहरू र वासरुम वातावरणको क्रम दूषित हुने सम्भावना पनि छ कि भन्ने थाहा पाउन पनि परीक्षणहरू गरेका छन्।
en-mt: After washing hands and drying hands with paper towels, the bacteria were reduced by an average of 76% on the fingerpad and 77% on the palm. Scientists have also conducted tests to see if each type of drying method is likely to contaminate the order of other washroom users and the washroom environment.

sourceString: The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away.
targetString: जेट-एयर ड्रायर, जसले 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph) को दाबी गरिएको गतिमा हावा फुक्छ, हातबाट माइक्रो-जीवहरू र एकाइ र सम्भावित रूपमा 2 मिटर टाढासम्मको अन्य शौचालयका प्रयोगकर्ताहरू र शौचालयका वातावरण दूषित गराउनेलाई उडाउन सक्षम थियो।
en-mt: The jet-air dryer, which blows air at a claimed speed of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was able to blow micro-organisms and units from hand and potentially other toilet users up to 2 meters away and those polluting the toilet environment.

sourceString: Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer.
targetString: तातो-हावाको ह्यान्ड ड्रायरको प्रयोगले सूक्ष्म जीवहरूलाई ड्रायरबाट 0.25 मिटरसम्म फैलाउँछ।
en-mt: The use of a hot-air hand dryer spreads microorganisms up to 0.25 meters from the dryer.

sourceString: Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated.
targetString: पेपर टावेलहरूले सुक्ष्म जीवाणुहरूको कुनै सार्थक प्रसार देखाएनन्। 2005 मा, TÜV Produkt und Umwelt द्वारा सञ्चालित अध्ययनमा भिन्न हात सुख्खा गराउने विधिहरू मूल्याङ्कन गरिएका थिए।
en-mt: The paper towels showed no meaningful proliferation of microorganisms. In 2005, different hand drying methods were evaluated in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt.

sourceString: The following changes in the bacterial count after drying the hands were observed:
targetString: हातहरूलाई सुख्खा गराएपछि जीवाणु सम्बन्धी गणनामा निम्न परिवर्तनहरू अवलोकन गरिएका थिए:
en-mt: The following changes in bacterial counts were observed after drying the hands:

sourceString: Many different hand dryer manufacturers exist, and hand driers have been compared against drying with paper towels.
targetString: धेरै ह्यान्ड ड्रायर उत्पादकहरू अवस्थित छन् र ह्यान्ड ड्रायरहरूलाई कागजको तौलियासँग तुलना गरिएका छन्।
en-mt: Many hand dryer manufacturers exist and hand dryers have been compared to paper towels.

sourceString: Hand washing using hand sanitizing wipes is an alternative during traveling in the absence of soap and water.
targetString: ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजिङ वाइपको प्रयोग गरी हात धुनु भनेको साबुन र पानीको अनुपस्थितिमा यात्रा गर्दाको विकल्प हो।
en-mt: Washing hands using a hand sanitizing wipe is an option when traveling in the absence of soap and water.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizer should contain at least 60% alcohol.
targetString: अल्कोहलमा आधारित ह्यान्ड स्यानिटाइजरमा कम्तीमा 60% अल्कोहल समावेश हुनु पर्छ।
en-mt: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers should contain at least 60% alcohol.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing became mandatory long after Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered its effectiveness (in 1846) in preventing disease in a hospital environment.
targetString: हङ्गेरियन चिकित्सक Ignaz Semmelweis ले अस्तपालको वातावरणभित्र रोगको रोकथाम गर्न मेडिकल हात-धुनेको प्रभावकारिता पत्ता लगाएपछि (1846 मा) यो अनिवार्य बन्यो।
en-mt: This became mandatory (in 1846) after hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered the efficacy of medical hand-washing in preventing disease within the atmosphere of the hospital.

sourceString: There are electronic devices that provide feedback to remind hospital staff to wash their hands when they forget.
targetString: अस्पतालका कर्मचारीहरूलाई उनीहरूले हात धुन बिर्सिएमा सम्झाउन प्रतिक्रिया प्रदान गर्ने इलेक्ट्रोनिक उपकरणहरू छन्।
en-mt: Hospital staff have electronic devices to provide feedback to remind them if they forget to wash their hands.

sourceString: One study has found decreased infection rates with their use.
targetString: एक अध्ययनले तिनीहरूको प्रयोगले सङ्क्रमण दर घटेको पायो।
en-mt: One study found that their use reduced infection rates.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing is for a minimum of 15 seconds, using generous amounts of soap and water or gel to lather and rub each part of the hands.
targetString: मेडिकल हात धुने कम्तीमा पनि 15 सेकेन्ड गर्नुपर्छ, जसमा हातको प्रत्येक भाग फिँज निकालेर माड्न पर्याप्त मात्रामा साबुन र पानीको प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
en-mt: Medical hand washing should be done for at least 15 seconds, in which enough soap and water are used to remove each part of the hand and beat it.

sourceString: Hands should be rubbed together with digits interlocking.
targetString: डिजिटहरूको इन्टरलकिङसँगै हातहरूलाई एकसाथ रब गर्नु पर्छ।
en-mt: Hands should be rubbed together with the interlocking of digits.

sourceString: If there is debris under fingernails, a bristle brush may be used to remove it.
targetString: औँलाका नङहरूको मुनि फोहोर भएमा, यसलाई हटाउनका लागि ब्रिस्टल ब्रश प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: If there is dirt under the fingernails, a bristle brush can be used to remove it.

sourceString: Since germs may remain in the water on the hands, it is important to rinse well and wipe dry with a clean towel.
targetString: किटाणुहरू हातको पानीमा रहन सक्ने भएकाले, यसलाई राम्ररी पखाल्न र सफा रुमालले पुछ्नु महत्त्वपूर्ण हुन्छ।
en-mt: Since germs can live in hand water, it is important to thoroughly wash them and wipe them with a clean handkerchief.

sourceString: After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open any exit door if necessary).
targetString: सुकाएपछि, कागजको तौलियालाई पानी बन्द गर्न प्रयोग गरिनुपर्छ (र आवश्यक भए बाहिर निस्कने ढोका खोल्नुहोस्)।
en-mt: After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open the exit door if necessary).

sourceString: This avoids re-contaminating the hands from those surfaces.
targetString: यसले ती सतहहरूबाट हात पुनः दूषित हुनबाट रोक्छ।
en-mt: This prevents the hands from being contaminated again from those surfaces.

sourceString: The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them.
targetString: स्वास्थ्य-स्याहार सेटिङमा हात-धुने उद्देश्य भनेको रोगजनक सुक्ष्मजीवहरू ("किटाणुहरू") हटाउनु र तिनीहरूको प;रसारण रोक्नु हो।
en-mt: The purpose of hand-washing in a health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and prevent their transmission.

sourceString: The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms.
targetString: द न्यु जर्नल अफ मेडिसिनले हात धुने कार्यको कमी धेरै चिकित्सा वातावरणहरूमा अस्वीकार योग्य स्तरहरू रहेका छन्, जबकि ठूलो सङ्ख्याका चिकित्सक र नर्सहरूले नियमित रूपमा बिरामीहरूलाई छोएपछि आफ्ना हातहरू धुन भुलिरहेका छन्, त्यसकारण सूक्ष्म जीवहरू प्रसार हुने गर्छन् भनेर रिपोर्ट गर्दछ।
en-mt: The New Journal of Medicine reports that the lack of hand washing remains at unacceptable levels in many medical environments, while a large number of doctors and nurses are forgetting to wash their hands after regularly touching patients, so microorganisms tend to spread.

sourceString: One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors.
targetString: एउटा अध्ययनले हात धुने र अन्य साधारण प्रक्रियाहरूले 66 प्रतिशतले क्याथेटर-सम्बन्धी रक्त प्रवाहका सङ्क्रमणहरूको दरलाई घटाउन सक्छ। विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठनले स्वास्थ्य-स्याहार क्षेत्रहरूमा मानक हात धुने र हात रब गर्ने कार्य प्रदर्शन गर्ने पाना प्रकाशन गरेको छ।
en-mt: One study found that hand washing and other simple procedures could reduce the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent. The World Health Organization (WHO) has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand washing and hand scrub in health care areas.

sourceString: The draft guidance of hand hygiene by the organization can also be found at its website for public comment.
targetString: सङ्गठनको हातको स्वच्छताको ड्राफ्ट निर्देशन सार्वजनिक टिप्पणीको लागि यसको वेबसाइटमा पाउन सकिन्छ।
en-mt: The organization's draft instructions on hand hygiene can be found on its website for public comment.

sourceString: A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al.
targetString: Whitby et al द्वारा एक सान्दर्भिक समीक्षा सञ्चालन गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al.

sourceString: Commercial devices can measure and validate hand hygiene, if demonstration of regulatory compliance is required.
targetString: यदि नियमनकारी अनुपालनको प्रदर्शन आवश्यक भएमा व्यापारिक यन्त्रहरूले हातको सरसफाइ मापन र मान्य गर्न सक्छन्।
en-mt: Merchant devices can measure and validate hand hygiene if a demonstration of regulatory compliance is necessary.

sourceString: The World Health Organization has "Five Moments" for washing hands:
targetString: विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठनसँग हात धुनका लागि “पाँच क्षणहरू” छन्:
en-mt: The World Health Organization has "five moments" to wash hands:

sourceString: after exposure to blood/body fluids
targetString: रगत/शरीरका तरल पदार्थहरूको सम्पर्कमा आएपछि
en-mt: After exposure to blood/body fluids

sourceString: before an aseptic task, and
targetString: एसेप्टिक कार्य अघि र
en-mt: before the aseptic action and

sourceString: after patient care.The addition of antiseptic chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) confers killing action to a hand-washing agent.
targetString: विरामीको स्याहारपछि। साबुन (“मेडिकेटेड” वा “एन्टिमाइक्रोबियल” साबुनहरू) मा एन्टिसेप्टिक रसायनहरू थप्नाले हात-धुने एजेन्टमा मार्ने क्रिया प्रदान गर्दछ।
en-mt: After taking care of the patient. Adding antiseptic chemicals to soaps ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) provides the action of killing to a hand-washing agent.

sourceString: Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails.
targetString: शल्यक्रिया गर्नुपूर्व वा एन्टीबायोटिक प्रतिरोधी जीवाणुहरू उच्च रूपमा प्रचलित भएका सेटिङहरूमा उक्त मृत्यु हुने कार्य इच्छा लाग्ने कार्य हुन सक्छ। शल्यक्रियात्मक अपरेशनका लागि व्यक्तिका हातहरू 'स्क्रब' गर्न, हातहरूले नछोइकन अन र अफ हुन सक्ने धारा, केही क्लोरोहेक्सिडाइन वा आयोडिन वास, धोएपछि हातहरू सुकाउनका लागि स्टेराइल टावेलहरू र स्क्रब गर्नका लागि स्टेराइल ब्रश र औँलाका नङहरूभित्र सफा गर्नका लागि अर्को स्टेराइल सामान हुन आवश्यक छ।
en-mt: In settings where antibiotic-resistant bacteria are highly prevalent before surgery or where antibiotic-resistant bacteria are highly prevalent, the act of dying may be a desired act. Surgical operations require a person to 'scrub' their hands, have a stream that can be on and off without touching the hands, some chlorohexidine or iodine wass, sterile towels to dry hands after washing, and a sterile brush to scrub, and another sterile accessories to clean inside the fingernails.

sourceString: All jewelry should be removed.
targetString: सबै गहना हटाउनु पर्छ।
en-mt: All jewelry should be removed.

sourceString: This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes.
targetString: यो विधिलाई हात र पाखुरालाई कुहिनासम्म साधारणतया 2-6 मिनेट धुनु आवश्यक छ।
en-mt: This method usually requires washing the hands and arms up to the elbows for 2-6 minutes.

sourceString: Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary.
targetString: लामो स्क्रब-समय (10 मिनेट) आवश्यक छैन।
en-mt: Long scrub-time (10 minutes) is not required.

sourceString: When rinsing, water on the forearms must be prevented from running back to the hands.
targetString: पखाल्दा, तपाईंका पाखुराहरूमा भएको पानीलाई हातको पछाडिबाट बग्नबाट रोक्नु पर्छ।
en-mt: When washed away, the water in your arms should be prevented from flowing from the back of your hand.

sourceString: After hand-washing is completed, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is donned.
targetString: हात धुने कार्य पूरा गरिसकेपछि, हातहरूलाई जीवाणुरहित कपडाले सुकाइन्छ र सर्जिकल गाउन लगाइन्छ।
en-mt: After completing the hand washing, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is applied.

sourceString: To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person.
targetString: रोगाणुहरूको प्रसार कम गर्न, बिरामी व्यक्तिको नजिक हुनुअघि र पछि हात धुनु वा ह्यान्ड एन्टिसेप्टिकको प्रयोग गर्नु राम्रो हुन्छ।
en-mt: To reduce the spread of germs, it is best to wash hands before and after approaching a sick person or use hand antiseptics.

sourceString: For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%.
targetString: अस्पतालहरूमा स्टाफाइलोकोक्कल सङ्क्रमणहरूको नियन्त्रणको लागि, हात-धुनेको सबैभन्दा बढी लाभ पहिलो 20% धुनेबाट आयो र हात धुने बारम्बारता 35% भन्दा माथि पुगेपछि थप लाभ धेरै कम भएको पाइयो।
en-mt: For the control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, the greatest benefit of hand-washing came from washing the first 20% and the added benefit was found to be greatly reduced when the frequency of washing hands exceeded 35%.

sourceString: Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap.
targetString: सादा साबुनले धुनाले एन्टिब्याक्टेरियल साबुनले धुँदाको तुलनामा खानामा ब्याक्टेरियल सङ्क्रामक रोग प्रसार हुने दर तीन गुणाभन्दा बढी हुने परिणाम ल्याउँछ। अल्कोहल-आधारित घोलले हात माड्नेलाई औसत 30 सेकेन्ड समयको लगि एन्टिब्याक्टेरियल साबुनले हात धुनेसँग तुलना गर्दा प्रत्येकले अल्कोहलले हात् माड्नेले एन्टिब्याक्टेरियल साबुनले भन्दा 26% बढी ब्याक्टेरिल दूषित हुने कम गरेको देखाए।
en-mt: Washing with plain soap results in more than three times the rate of bacterial infectious disease spread in food compared to washing with antibacterial soap. Comparing hand-waving with an alcohol-based solution with an average of 30 seconds of washing hands with antibacterial soap, each showed that hand-waxing with alcohol reduced bacteryl contamination by 26% more than antibacterial soap.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: तर हातबात एक भाइरस र क्लस्ट्रिडियम डिफिसाइल स्पोर्स H1N1 इन्फ्लुएन्जा कम गर्नको लागि अल्कोहल-आधारित ह्यान्ड रबहरूभन्दा साबुन र पानी बढी प्रभावकारी हुन्छ। स्वास्थ्यस्याहार सेटिङहरूमा हातको स्वच्छता सुधार गर्न प्रतिरोधहरूले हात धुनेमा कर्मचारीहरूलाई शिक्षा, अल्कोहल-आधारित ह्यान्ड रबको उपलब्धता वृद्धि गर्ने र कर्मचारीलाई लिखित र मौखिक चेतावनीहरू समावेश गर्छन्।
en-mt: But handwash a virus and Clostridium difficile spores are more effective with soap and water than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza. Resistances to improving hand hygiene in healthcare settings include educating staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rubs, and written and verbal warnings to employees.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: विभिन्न स्वास्थ्यस्याहार स्थानहरूमा यीमध्ये कुन हस्तक्षेप धेरै प्रभावकारी छ भन्ने बारेमा थप अनुसन्धानको आवश्यकता छ।
en-mt: More research is needed on which of these interventions is most effective in different healthcare locations.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: विकासशील देशहरूमा, साबुनले हात धुनेलाई लगत-प्रभावकारी, राम्रो स्वास्थ्य प्राप्त गर्नको लागि अत्यावश्यक उपकरण र राम्रो पोषण समेतको रूपमा चिनिन्छ.
en-mt: In developing countries, washing hands with soap is known as a laxative, essential tool for achieving good health and even good nutrition.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: यद्यपि, मानिसका घर, विद्यालय र कार्यस्थलहरूमा विश्वसनीय पानीको आफूर्ति, साबुन वा हात धुने सुविधाहरूको कमीले यसलाई सर्वव्यापी हात धुने व्यवहार प्राप्त गर्न चुनौतीपूर्ण बनाउँछन्।
en-mt: However, the lack of reliable water supplies, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, schools, and workplaces makes it challenging to achieve ubiquitous handwashing behavior.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: उदाहरणको लागि, धेरैजसो ग्रामिण अफ्रिकामा हात धुने स्टेसनहरूको निर्माण गर्ने सस्ता विकल्पहरू भएतापनि, हरेक निजी वा सार्वजनिक शौचालयको नजिक हात धुने धारा हुनु दुर्लभ छ।
en-mt: For example, although there are cheaper options for building handwashing stations in most rural Africa, it is rare to have a handwashing tap near every private or public toilet.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: यद्यपि, कम हात धुने दर पनि साबुन र पानीको कमीको कारणले नभई सक्रिय बानीहरूको परिणाम हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: However, low hand washing rates may also be the result of active habits rather than lack of soap and water.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: साबुनले हात धुनेको प्रचार र समर्थनले नीति निर्णयहरूमा प्रभाव पार्न, हात धुनुको फाइदाहरूको बारेमा जनचेतना जगाउन र जनसङ्ख्याको दीगो-समयमा व्यवहार परिवर्तन गराउन सक्छ।
en-mt: The promotion and endorsement of handwashing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of handwashing, and lead to sustainable-time behavior change in the population.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: यसले प्रभावकारी रूपमा काम गर्न, निगरानी र मूल्याङ्कन अनिवार्य हुन्छ।
en-mt: It makes it imperative to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: सामाजिक मार्केटिङ अभियानहरू कम प्रभावकारी हुँदा समुदायमा आधारित पहुँचहरू LMICs मा बढ्दो हात धुने प्रभावकारी हुन्छन् भनी 70 अध्ययनहरूको प्रणालीगत समीक्षाले फेला पार्‍यो। विद्यालयहरूमा हात धुने प्रवर्द्धनको उदाहरण भनेको विद्यार्थीहरूले अन्य सरसफाइका आवश्यकताहरू सँगै साबुनले आफ्ना हातहरू धुन्छन् भनी सुनिश्चित गर्नका लागि विद्यालयहरूलाई सामान्य, सजिलो कदम चाल्न प्रोत्साहन गर्ने UNICEF द्वारा दिइएको "तीन स्टार पहुँच" हो।
en-mt: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based access to LMICs is increasingly effective when social marketing campaigns are less effective. An example of promoting handwashing in schools is the "three-star access" given by the UNICEF to encourage schools to take normal, easy steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, along with other hygiene needs.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: जब न्यूनतम स्तरणहरू प्राप्त हुन्छन्, विद्यालयहरू एकबाट परम रूपमा तीन तारासम्म सार्न सकिन्छन्।
en-mt: When minimum levelings are achieved, schools can be moved from one to three stars.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: भवनका हात धुने स्टेसनहरू रोगहरू र बाल मृत्युदर घटाउनका लागि कार्यान्वयन गरिने हात धुने प्रचार अभियानहरूको एउटा भाग हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: The building's handwashing stations can be part of handwashing campaigns implemented to reduce morbidity and child mortality.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: विश्वव्यापी हात धुने दिन भनेको जागरूकता बढाउने अभियानको अर्को उदाहरण हो, जसले व्यवहारको परिवर्तनमा सफलता पाउने प्रयास गरिरहेको छ। 2019-20 कोरोना भाइरस महामारीको परिणाम स्वरूप, UNICEF ले हात धुने इमोजीको धारणलाई बढावा दियो।
en-mt: Global Handwashing Day is yet another example of an awareness campaign, which is trying to succeed in changing behavior. As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of handwashing emojis.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: केही विद्यार्थीहरूले DALYs खतराका सम्बन्धमा विकासोन्मुख देशहरूमा हात धुने समग्र लागत प्रभावकारिताको बारेमा विचार गरे।
en-mt: Some students considered the overall cost-effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relation to the DALYS threat.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: यद्यपि, साबुनले हात धुनेलाई प्रवर्द्धन गर्नु महत्त्वपूर्ण रूपमा अन्य पानी र स्वच्छता इन्टरभेन्सनभन्दा धेरै लागत-प्रभावकारी हुन्छ भन्ने एक समीक्षाले सुझाव दिन्छ।
en-mt: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and hygiene interventions.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
