targetString: मानव स्वास्थ्यको लागि हात धुनुको महत्त्व – विशेष गरी भर्खरै बच्चालाई जन्म दिएका आमा वा अस्पतालहरूमा भएका घाउ लागेका सैनिकहरू जस्ता जोखिम परिस्थितिमा भएका मानिसहरूका लागि – हातको स्वच्छताका दुई अन्वेषकहरूद्वारा सुरुमा 19औँ शताब्दीको मध्यमा पत्ता लगाइएको थियो: हङ्गेरियन चिकित्सक Ignaz Semmelweis जो भिएनामा काम गर्थे, अस्ट्रिया र फ्लोरेन्स नाइटिङ्गेल, अङ्ग्रेजी “आधुनिक नर्सिङको संस्थापक”।
en-mt: The importance of handwashing for human health – especially for people in risky situations, such as mothers who have just given birth or soldiers with wounds in hospitals – was initially discovered in the mid-19th century by two investigators of hand hygiene: Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, English "founder of modern nursing".

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: उक्त समयमा, धेरैजसो मानिसहरूले अझै पनि सङ्क्रमणहरू मियासमस भनिने फोहोर गन्धको कारण हुन्छ भन्ने विश्वास राख्थे।
en-mt: At the time, most people still believed that infections were caused by a filthy smell called miasmus.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: 1980 को दशकमा, खानाबाट आएका प्रकपहरू र स्वास्थ्यस्याहार-सम्बन्धित सङ्क्रमणहरूले रोग नियन्त्रण तथा रोकथामको लागि संयुक्त राज्य केन्द्रहरूलाई सङ्क्रमणको प्रसार रोक्न हातको स्वच्छतालाई थप सक्रिय ढङ्गले महत्त्वपूर्ण तरिकाको रूपमा बढावा दिन प्रेरित गरे।
en-mt: In the 1980s, food contagions and healthcare-related infections prompted the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to promote hand hygiene as a more actively important way to prevent the spread of infection.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: 2009 मा स्वाइल फ्लुको प्रकोप र 2020 मा COVID-19 विश्वमहामारीले धेरै देशहरूमा आफूलाई त्यस्ता सङ्क्रामक रोगहरूबाट बनाउन साबुनले हात धुनुको महत्त्वमा जनचेतना बढाएका छन्।
en-mt: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 have raised awareness in many countries about the importance of washing hands with soap to make themselves from such infectious diseases.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: उदाहरणका लागि, "सही हात धुने तरिकाहरू" भएका पोस्टरहरू सार्वजनिक शौचालयहरूमा भएका हात धुने सिङ्क र कार्यालय भवनहरूका शौचालयहरू र जर्मनीका विमानस्थहरू नजिकै झुन्डाइएका थिए।
en-mt: For example, posters with "right hand washing methods" were hung near hand washing sinks in public toilets and toilets in office buildings and airports in Germany.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: कुनै कुरामा “कसैले हात धुने” भन्ने वाक्यांशको अर्थ उक्त कुराका लागि जिम्मेवार हुनु वा यसमा जटिलता साझा गर्नका लागि कसैको इच्छा नभएको घोषित गर्नु हो।
en-mt: The phrase "someone washes their hands" in something means to be responsible for that or to declare that no one has a desire to share complexity in it.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: यो म्याथ्युको बारेको बाइबलको गद्यांशबाट सुरु भएको हो जहाँ पोनिटस पाइलेटले जिसस क्राइस्टलाई क्रुसमा झुन्ड्याउने निर्णय गर्दा हात धोएका थिए, तर यो केही अङ्ग्रेजी समुदायमा अझ व्यापक प्रयोग हुने वाक्यांश बनेको छ।
en-mt: It begins with biblical prose about Matthew where Pontus Pilate washed his hands when he decided to hang Jesus Christ on the cross, but it has become a more widely used phrase in some English communities.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: Shakespeare's Macbeth मा, Lady Macbeth ले आफ्ना श्रीमानलाई गिरफ्तार गरेका र प्रेरित भएका अपराधहरूको सम्बन्धमा उहाँको दोषी ठहर गर्दै कल्पना गरिएका धब्बा शुद्ध गर्ने प्रयासमा आफ्नो हात बाध्य भएर धुन सुरु गर्नुहुन्छ।
en-mt: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to wash her hands forcefully in an attempt to cleanse imagined blemishes by convicting her husband of crimes that have been arrested and inspired.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: सम्झाएपछि वा प्रयोगात्मक कार्यपछि मानिसहरूले अरूभन्दा धेरै बारम्बार हात धुन चाहेको र हात धुने उपकरणलाई धेरै मान्यता दिन चाहेको कुरा पनि फेला परेको छ।
en-mt: It has also been found that after reminders or experimental work, people want to wash their hands more frequently than others and want to give more recognition to hand washing equipment.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: साथै, यस्तो विचारपछि जसलाई उनीहरूको हात धुन अनुमति दिइन्छ उनीहरू स्वयंसेवा जस्ता अन्य “सफा गर्ने” प्रतिपूरक कार्यहरूमा कम संलग्न हुने सम्भावना हुन्छ।
en-mt: Also, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such considerations are less likely to engage in other "cleaning" compensatory tasks such as volunteering.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: धर्महरूले सफाई र लक्षणात्मक दुबै उद्देश्यका लागि हात धुने सुझाव दिन्छन्। लक्षणात्मक हात धुने, हात धुन पानी प्रयोग गर्ने तर साबुन प्रयोग नगर्ने धेरै क्षेत्रहरूमा संस्कृतिको रूपमा हात धुनेको एक हिस्सा हो जुन बाहाई आस्था, हिन्दू धर्म, यहुदी धर्मका तेवीलाह र नेतिलत यादाइम, क्रिश्चियनमा लाभाबो र इस्लाममा वुधू लगायत धेरै धर्महरूमा प्रस्तुत छन्। धर्महरूले विशेष प्रकारका कार्यहरूपछि स्वास्थ्यकर हात धुने कामको पनि सिफारिस गर्छन्।
en-mt: Religions recommend hand washing for both cleaning and symptomatic purposes. Symptomatic hand washing, using water to wash hands but not using soap, is a part of the culture that is presented in many religions, including the Bahá'i faith, Hinduism, Tavilah and Netilat Yadaim of Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity and Wudhu in Islam. Religions also recommend healthy hand washing after specific types of work.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: हिन्दु, यहुदी र मुसलमान धर्मले शौचालयको प्रयोग गरेपछि हातहरू धुने जनादेश दिन्छन्।
en-mt: Hinduism, Judaism and Muslims give a mandate to wash hands after using toilets.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: र हिन्दु धर्म, बौद्ध धर्म, सिख धर्म, यहुदी धर्म र इस्लास धर्ममा प्रत्येक पटक खाना खानुअघि र खाएपछि हात धुन अनिवार्य मानिन्छ।
en-mt: And in Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islas, it is mandatory to wash hands every time you eat and after eating.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: COVID-19 का लागि कार्यस्थलमा जोखिम नियन्त्रण
en-mt: Risk control in the workplace for COVID-19

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: COVID-19 को लागि कार्यस्थल जोखिम नियन्त्रणहरू कोरोनाभाइरस रोग 2019 (COVID-19) को रोकथामको लागि जोखिम नियन्त्रणको लागि व्यावसायिक सुरक्षा र स्वास्थ्य विधका अनुप्रयोग हुन्।
en-mt: Workplace risk controls for COVID-19 are applications of occupational safety and health facilities for risk control for the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: जोखिमका स्रोतहरूको जोखिम मूल्याङ्कन, समुदायमा रोगको गम्भीरता र COVID-19 मा सम्झौता गर्न असुरक्षित हुन सक्ने कर्मचारी व्यक्तिहरूका जोखिम तत्त्वहरूको आधारमा कार्यस्थानमा गरिने जोखिमका उचित नियन्त्रणहरू कार्यस्थल र कार्यमा आधारित छ।
en-mt: Risk assessment of sources of risk, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of employee individuals who may be vulnerable to compromise COVID-19 are based on the workplace and the appropriate controls of risk to be performed in the workplace.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: अमेरिकी व्यावसायिक सुरक्षा तथा स्वास्थ्य प्रशासन (OSHA) को अनुसार, कम जोखिम भएका कार्यहरूमा सर्वसाधारण र अन्य सहकर्मीहरूसँगको न्यूनतम व्यावसायिक सम्पर्क हुन्छ, जसका लागि हात धने, कर्मचारीहरू बिरामी भएमा उनीहरूलाई घर बस्न प्रोत्साहन दिने, श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी शिष्टाचार र काम गर्ने वातावरण सफा गरेर किटाणुरहित बनाउने तालिका कायम राख्न कार्यहरूसहित आधारभूत सङ्क्रमण रोकथामका उपायहरू सिफारिस गरिएका छन्।
en-mt: According to the U.S. Administration of Occupational Safety and Health (OSHA), low-risk tasks involve minimal occupational contact with the general public and other co-workers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including handshakes, encouraging employees to stay home if they fall ill, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining disinfection schedules by cleaning the working environment.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: मध्यम सम्पर्क जोखिमका कार्यहरूमा COVID-19 भएको पत्ता नलागेका वा यसको शङ्का लागेका, तर चलिरहेको समुदाय वा अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय यात्राको कारणले सङ्क्रमित हुन सक्ने मानिसहरूसँग बारम्बार वा नजिकको सम्पर्क आवश्यक पर्ने मानिसहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Moderate contact risk tasks include people who have not been diagnosed or suspected of having COVID-19, but who may be infected due to ongoing community or international travel that require frequent or close contact.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: यसले विद्यालय, उच्च जनसंख्या-घनत्व कार्य वातावरण र केही उच्च-खण्डको खुद्रा सेटिङहरूमा सर्वसाधरणसँग सम्पर्क राख्ने कामदारहरू समावेश गर्दछ।
en-mt: This includes workers who interact with the general public in schools, high population-density work environments, and some high-segment retail settings.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: यस समूहको लागि जोखिमका नियन्त्रणहरूका साथै आधारभूत सङ्क्रमण रोकथाम उपायहरूमा उच्च-प्रभावकारिताको वायु फिल्टरहरू प्रयोग गर्ने भेन्टिलेसन, हाच्छ्युँ गार्ड र COVID-19 भएको व्यक्तिको अवस्थामा व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षात्मक उपकरण उपलब्ध गराउने कार्य समावेश हुन्छ।
en-mt: Risk controls for this group, as well as basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficacy air filters, a sneeze guard, and providing personal protective equipment in the case of a person with COVID-19.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: OSHA ले COVID-19 लागेको वा शङ्कास्पद व्यक्तिको जोखिममा भएका स्वास्थ्यसेवा र मुर्दाघरमा काम गर्ने कामदारहरूको विचार गर्दछ, जसले COVID-19 भएका वा शङ्कास्पद व्यक्तिहरूबाट नमूनाहरू सङ्कलन वा सम्हाल्ने कामदारहरूले एरोसोल-उत्पादन प्रक्रिया प्रस्तुत गर्दा उच्च सम्पर्कको जोखिम वृद्धि गर्दछ।
en-mt: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers who are at risk of having or suspected COVID-19, which increases the risk of high contact when workers who collect or handle samples from people with or suspected of COVID-19 present an aerosol-production process.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: यी कामदारहरूको लागि उचित जोखिम नियन्त्रणहरूमा नकारात्मक चाप भेन्टिलेसन कोठाहरू र काम गर्दा उपयुक्त हुने व्यक्तिगत बचावटको उपकरण जस्ता इन्जिनियरिङ नियन्त्रणहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Appropriate risk controls for these workers include engineering controls such as negative arc ventilation rooms and personal protective equipment that are appropriate while working.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: COVID-19 को प्रकोपले कार्यस्थलभित्र विभिन्न प्रभावहरू पार्न सक्छ।
en-mt: The outbreak of COVID-19 can have various effects within the workplace.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: कर्मचारीहरू बिरामी भएर, अन्य व्यक्तिको स्याहार गर्न आवश्यक परेर वा सम्भावित सम्पर्कको डरले गर्दा काममा अनुपस्थित हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Employees may be absent from work due to illness, need to care for other people, or fear of possible contact.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: व्यवसायका ढाँचाहरू माग गरिएका सामानहरूा र यी सामानहरू (जस्तै अफ-पिक समयमा शपिङ वा डेलिभरि वा ड्राइभ-थ्रु सेवाहरू) प्राप्त गर्ने माध्यमका दुवै आधारमापरिवर्तन हुन सक्नेछन्।
en-mt: Business patterns may change both on both the basis of the goods demanded and the means of receiving these goods (e.g. shopping or delivery or drive-through services) during off-peak hours.

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: अन्तिममा, COVID-19 द्वारा अत्यधिक प्रभावित भौगोलिक क्षेत्रहरूबाट वस्तुहरूको सिपमेन्टमा बाधा भएको हुन सक्छ। सङ्क्रामक रोग तत्परता र प्रतिक्रिया योजना सुरक्षात्मक कदमहरू चाल्न मार्गदर्शनको लागि प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: Finally, shipment of items from geographical areas highly affected by COVID-19 may have been hampered. Infectious disease readiness and response planning can be used to guide taking protective measures.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: योजनाहरूले सम्पर्कको स्रोत, गृह र सामुदायिक सेटिङहरूबाट उत्पन्न हुने जोखिम तत्त्वहरू र वृद्धावस्था वा गम्भीर चिकित्सा अवस्थाहरू जस्ता व्यक्तिगत कार्यकर्ताहरूका जोखिम तत्त्वहरू सहित विभिन्न प्रकारका कार्यक्षेत्र र रोजगार कार्यहरूसँग सम्बन्धित जोखिमका स्तरहरूलाई सम्बोधन गर्दछन्।
en-mt: Plans address the levels of risk associated with a wide variety of workplaces and employment tasks, including the source of contact, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and individual workers' risk factors such as old age or serious medical conditions.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: उनीहरूले प्रोकोपहरूको नतिजास्वरूप उत्पन्न हुन सक्ने परिस्थितिहरूको लागि ती जोखिम र अनिश्चित योजनाहरू सम्बोधन गर्न रूपरेखा नियन्त्रणहरू पनि आवश्यक गर्छन्।
en-mt: They also require outline controls to address those risks and uncertain plans for situations that may arise as a result of procopes.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: सङ्क्रमणशील रोगका तयारी र प्रतिक्रिया योजनाहरू राष्ट्रिय वा उप-राष्ट्रिय सिफारिसहरूको अधिनमा हुन सक्नेछन्।
en-mt: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or sub-national recommendations.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: प्रकोपको प्रतिक्रियाको लागि उद्देश्यहरूमा कर्मचारीहरू बीच प्रसारण कम गर्ने, प्रतिकूल स्वास्थ्य सम्बन्धी जटिलताहरूको उच्च जोखिममा भएका मानिसहरूको सुरक्षा गर्ने, व्यावसायिक कार्यहरू व्यवस्थित गर्ने र आपूर्ति श्रृङ्खलामा अन्य संस्थाहरूमा हुने प्रतिकूल प्रभावहरू न्यून गर्ने कार्यहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Objectives for responding to the outbreak include reducing transmission among employees, protecting people at high risk of adverse health-related complications, organizing business operations, and reducing adverse effects on other institutions in the supply chain.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: व्यवसाय स्थित भएको समुदायमा भएको रोगको गम्भीरताले लिइने प्रतिक्रियाहरूमा प्रभाव पार्छ।
en-mt: The severity of the disease in a community where the business is located affects the responses taken.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: जोखिम नियन्त्रणहरूको पदानुक्रम भनेको प्रभावकारिताद्वारा जोखिम नियन्त्रणहरूलाई एकै समूहमा राख्न व्यावसायिक सुरक्षा तथा स्वास्थ्यमा व्यापक रूपमा प्रयोग गरिने रूपरेखा हो।
en-mt: The hierarchy of risk controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to put risk controls into one group by efficacy.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: COVID-19 का जोखिमहरू हटाउन नसकिँदा, एकदमै प्रभावकारी नियन्त्रणहरू भनेको प्रशासकीय नियन्त्रणहरूद्वारा पालना गरिएका इन्जिनियरिङ नियन्त्रणहरू र अन्तिममा व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षात्मक उपकरण हुन्।
en-mt: While the risks of COVID-19 cannot be overcome, the most effective controls are engineering controls followed by administrative controls and finally personal protective equipment.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: ईन्जिनियरङ् नियन्त्रणले कामदारहरूलाई श्रमिक व्यवहारमा निर्भर नगरी कामदारसँग सम्बन्धित खतराहरूबाट बेग्लै राख्ने काम गर्दछन् र कार्यान्वयन गर्नका लागि सबैभन्दा कम लागत प्रभावी समाधान हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: Engineering controls serve to keep workers separate from worker-related hazards without relying on worker behavior and may be the least cost-effective solution to implement.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: प्रशासनिक नियन्त्रणहरू कार्य नीति वा प्रक्रियाहरूमा भएका परिवर्तनहरू हुन् जुन कर्मचारी वा रोजगारदाताद्वारा कार्य गर्नु आवश्यक हुन्छ।
en-mt: Administrative controls are changes in work policies or procedures that require action to be taken by an employee or employer.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षात्मक उपकरण (PPE) लाई इन्जिनियरिङ र प्रशासकीय नियन्त्रणहरूभन्दा कम प्रभावकारी मानिन्छ, तर केही सम्पर्कमा आउनेलाई रोक्नमा मद्दत गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some contacts.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: सबै प्रकारका PPE कामदारलाई जोखिमको आधारमा चयन गरिएको हुनुपर्दछ, उचित रूपलेा लागू गरिनु पर्दछ (उदाहरणका लागि, श्वासयन्त्र), नियमित रूपमा र राम्रोसँग लगाइन्छ, नियमित रूपमा निरीक्षण गरिएको छ, मर्मत गरिएको र प्रतिस्थापन गर्नुपर्दछ, र हुनबाट जोगिन राम्रोसँग हटाइएको, सफा गरिएको र भण्डार गरिएको वा दूषित हुनबाट जोगियो।
en-mt: All types of PPE workers must be selected based on risk, applied appropriately (e.g., respiratory devices), regularly and well worn, regularly inspected, repaired and replaced, and well removed, cleaned and stored or avoided contamination to avoid happening.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: अमेरिकी व्यावसायिक सुरक्षा र स्वास्थ्य प्रशासन (OSHA) को अनुसार, न्यून सङ्क्रमणको जोखिम कार्यहरूको सर्वसाधारण र अन्य सहकर्मीहरूसँग न्यूनतम व्यावसायिक सम्पर्क छ।
en-mt: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), low infection risk functions have minimal occupational contact with the general public and other co-workers.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: सबै कार्यस्थलहरूको लागि सिफारिस गरिएको आधारभूत सङ्क्रमण रोकथाम उपायहरूमा बारम्बार र राम्रोसँग हात धुने, कर्मचारीहरू बिरामी भएमा उनीहरूलाई घरमा बस्न प्रोत्साहित गर्नेे, खोक्दा वा हाच्छिउँ गर्दा ढाक्ने, टिस्यु र फोहोर डब्बाहरू दिने सहित श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी शिष्टाचार, आवश्यक भएमा टेलिकम्युटिङ (घरमबटा काम गर्ने) वा क्रमबद्ध शिफ्टहरूको लागि तयार पार्ने, कर्मचारीहरूलाई अरूहरूको उपकरण तथा औजारहरू प्रयोग नगर्न भन्ने र काम गर्ने वातावरणलाई सफा गरेर किटाणुरहित बनाउने तालिका कायम राख्ने कार्य समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging employees to stay at home if they are sick, covering them while coughing or sneezing, respiratory etiquette, including giving tissues and garbage bins, preparing for telecommuting (housework) or sorted shifts if necessary, telling employees not to use others' tools and tools, and keeping the working environment clean and disinfecting the work environment.  they are.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: सम्भवत: सङ्क्रामक व्यक्तिहरूको तत्काल पहिचान र आइसोलेसन भनेको कर्मचारी, ग्राहक र कार्यक्षेत्रका अन्य व्यक्तिहरूको सुरक्षा गर्ने एक महत्त्वपूर्ण चरण हो।
en-mt: Perhaps the immediate identification and isolation of infectious people is an important step in protecting employees, clients, and other people in the workplace.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: संयुक्त राज्य रोग नियन्त्रण तथा रोकथाम केन्द्र (CDC) ले तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास बिमारीका लक्षणहरू भएका कर्मचारीहरू ज्वरो घटाउने वा अन्य लक्षण सतर्क गराउने औषधिहरू प्रयोग नगरीकन कम्तीमा 24 घण्टासम्म ज्वरो, ज्वरोका सङ्केत र अन्य कुनै पनि लक्षणबाट मुक्त नहुँदासम्म घरमै बस्न र बिमारी बिदा नीतिहरू लचिलो हुन्, कर्मचारीहरूलाई बिरामी परिवार सदस्यको स्याहारको लागि घरमा बस्ने अनुमति दिन र कर्मचारीहरू यी नीतिहरूदेखि सतर्क हुन् भनी सिफारिस गर्दछ।
en-mt: The United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees with symptoms of acute respiratory illness stay at home and sick leave policies are flexible until they are free of fever, fever signs, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without using medications that reduce fever or other symptoms, allow employees to stay at home to care for sick family members, and that employees be wary of these policies.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: OSHA अनुसार, मध्यम संक्रमण जोखिमका कार्यहरूमा COVID-19 भएको वा शङ्का लागेका बिरामीहरूको छ फिट (1.8 m) बारम्बार वा नजिकको सम्पर्कमा बस्न आवश्यक पर्ने, तर व्यवसाय स्थान वरिपरिको चलिरहेको समुदाय सङ्क्रमणको कारणले वा व्यक्तिले व्यापक COVID-19 को सङ्क्रमण भएको स्थानमा हालसालै अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय यात्रा गरेको हुनाले SARS-CoV-2 ले सङ्क्रमित हुन सक्ने व्यक्तिहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: According to OSHA, moderate infection risk actions include people who need to be in six feet (1.8 m) frequent or close contact with patients with or suspected COVID-19, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 because of ongoing community infection around the business location or because the person has recently traveled internationally to a place with widespread COVID-19 infection.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: यसमा विद्यालय, उच्च-जनसङ्ख्या-घनत्व कार्य वातावरणहरू र केही उच्च मात्राको खुद्रा सेटिङहरू जस्ता सामान्य जनतासँग सम्पर्कमा भएका कामदारहरू समावेश हुन्छन्। यसको लागि इन्जिनियरिङ नियन्त्रणहरू र उच्च जोखिममा भएका समूहहरूमा उच्च-प्रभावकारिताका एयर फिल्टरहरू स्थापना गर्ने, भेन्टिलेसन दरहरू बढाउने, स्पष्ट प्लास्टिकको हाच्छिउँ छेक्ने सामान जस्ता भौतिक अवरोधहरू स्थापना गर्ने र ग्राहक सेवाको लागि ड्राइभ-थ्रु विन्डो स्थापना गर्ने कार्यहरू समावेश हुन्छन्। यसको लागि प्रशासनिक नियन्त्रणहरू र उच्च जोखिमका समूहहरूमा बिरामी कर्मचारीहरूलाई घरमा बस्न प्रोत्साहन गर्ने, भर्चुअल कुराकानीहरूलाई आमुन्ने-सामुन्ने बैठकहरूले प्रतिस्थापन गर्ने, क्रमबद्ध आलो-पालोहरू स्थापना गर्ने, चलिरहेको COVID-19 को प्रकोपहरूमा स्थानहरूमा अनावश्यक यात्रा नगर्ने, कामदारहरूको सरोकारहरूको जवाफ दिनको लागि फोरमसहित आपतकालीन कुराकानीका योजनाहरू गराउने, कर्मचारीहरूलाई COVID-19 को जोखिम तत्व र सुरक्षात्मक व्यवहारहरू बारे नविनतम शिक्षा र प्रशिक्षण उपलब्ध गराउने, सुरक्षात्मक कपडा र उपकरण प्रयोग गर्नुपर्ने कर्मचारीहरूलाई यो कसरी प्रयोग गर्ने भन्ने बारेमा प्रशिक्षण दिने, व्यक्तिगत सरसफाइलाई प्रवर्द्धन गर्ने, संशाधान र काम गर्ने वातावरण उपलब्ध गराउने, नियमित हात धुन आवश्यक गर्ने, कार्य साइटमा ग्राहक र सर्वसाधारणको पहुँचलाई सीमित गर्ने र हात धुने र COVID-19 का अन्य सुरक्षात्मक उपायहरू बारे चिन्ह पोस्ट गर्ने कार्य जस्ता कामहरू समावेश हुन्छन्। कार्य परीक्षणको आधारमा, कम्तिमा मध्यम जोखिममा भएका कर्मचारीहरूले केही पञ्जाहरू, गाउन, फेस शिल्ड वा फेस मास्क वा चश्माहरूसहित व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षात्मक उपकरण लगाउन पर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: This includes workers exposed to the general public, such as schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings. This includes engineering controls and the actions of installing high-efficacy air filters in high-risk groups, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneezing accessories, and installing drive-through windows for customer service. This includes administrative controls and encouraging sick employees to stay at home in high-risk groups, replacing virtual conversations with face-to-face meetings, setting up arranged turns, avoiding unnecessary travel to locations during ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, making emergency communication plans, including forums to respond to workers' concerns, providing employees with innovative education and training on the risk elements and protective behaviors of COVID-19;  These include training employees on how to use protective clothing and equipment on how to use it, promoting personal hygiene, providing resources and working environments, requiring regular handwashing, limiting access to customers and the general public at work sites, and posting signs about hand washing and other protective measures of COVID-19. Based on the work test, employees at least moderate risk may have to wear personal protective equipment, including certain gloves, gowns, face shields or face masks or glasses.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: यस जोखिमको समूहमा भएका कामदारहरूलाई विरलै श्वासयन्त्रहरूको प्रयोग आवश्यक छ।
en-mt: Workers in this risk group rarely need the use of breathers.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: कुनै व्यक्ति विमानमा बिरामी भएमा, कर्मचारी र अन्य यात्रीहरूको सुरक्षा गर्नका लागि उचित नियन्त्रणहरूमा बिरामी व्यक्तिलाई अन्य व्यक्तिहरूबाट 6 फिटको दूरीमा राख्ने, बिरामी व्यक्तिको सेवा गर्न एउटा समूह सदस्य नियुक्त गर्ने र बिरामी व्यक्तिलाई फेस मास्क प्रस्ताव गर्ने वा बिरामी व्यक्तिलाई खोक्दा वा हाच्छ्युँ गर्दा टिस्युहरूले आफ्नो मुख र नाक छोप्न आग्रह गर्ने कार्य समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: If a person is sick on a plane, appropriate controls to protect staff and other passengers include keeping a sick person at a distance of 6 feet from other people, appointing a group member to serve the sick person and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues while coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: चालक दलले बिरामी यात्रीलाई छुँदा वा शरीरका तरल पदार्थहरू वा सम्भावित रूपमा दूषित सतहहरू छुँदा डिस्पोजेबल मेडिकल पञ्जाहरू लगाउनु पर्छ र बिरामी यात्रीलाई ज्वरो आएमा, निरन्तर खोकी लागेमा वा श्वासप्रश्वासमा कठिनाइ भएमा सम्भावित रूपमा थप व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षात्मक उपकरण लगाउनु पर्छ।
en-mt: The crew should wear disposable medical gloves when touching a sick passenger or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and potentially wear additional personal protective equipment if the sick passenger has a fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: पञ्जा र अन्य व्यवस्थापनयोग्य वस्तुहरूलाई बायोहाजार्ड झोलामा व्यवस्थापन गर्नुपर्दछ र त्यसपछि दूषित सतहहरूलाई सफा गरेर किटाणुरहित बनाउनुपर्छ। क्रुज शिप र अन्य यात्रु पानीजहाजहरूसहित व्यावसायिक शिपिङमा, बिरामी हुँदा यात्रा स्थगित गर्ने र स्वयं-आइसोलेट गर्ने र बोर्डमा कसैलाई ज्वरो आएमा वा अन्य लक्षणहरू देखिएमा तुरून्तै बोर्डमा भएको चिकित्सा केन्द्रलाई सूचना दिनेसहितका जोखिम नियन्त्रणहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Gloves and other manageable items should be managed in biohazard bags and then disinfected by cleaning contaminated surfaces. Commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger ships, includes risk controls, including suspending and self-isolating travel when sick, and immediately informing the medical center on board if someone on board has a fever or has other symptoms.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: आर्दश रूपमा, चिकित्सा फलो-अप आइसोलेट भएका व्यक्तिको क्याबिनमा हुनुपर्छ। विद्यालय र बाल स्याहार सुविधास्थलहरूका लागि, CDC ले सामुदायिक फैलावलाई ध्यानमा नराखी सङ्क्रमित व्यक्ति विद्यालय भवनमा रहेको छ भने सफा गर्न र कीटाणुरहित बनाउनका लागि अल्पकालीन बन्दको सिफारिस गर्दछ।
en-mt: Ideally, medical follow-up should be in the cabin of a person who is in isolation. For schools and child care facilities, the CDC recommends short-term closures to clean and disinfect if an infected person is in a school building, regardless of community spread.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: जब न्यूनतमदेखि मध्यम समुदाय सङ्क्रमण हुँदा, सामाजिक दूरी राख्ने रणनीतिहरू कार्यान्वयन गर्न सकिन्छ जस्तै, फिल्ड भ्रमणहरू, सभाहरू रद्द गर्ने र अरू ठूला समारोहहरू जस्तै शारीरिक शिक्षा वा कुनै क्याफेटेरियामा गायन कक्षा वा भोजन, डेस्कहरूबिच खाली ठाउँ बढाउने, आउने र जाने समयको बिचको अन्तर, गैर-सम्भावित आगन्तुकहरूलाई सीमित गर्नु र फ्लू जस्ता लक्षण भएका बालबालिकाको लागि छुट्टै स्वास्थ्य कार्यालय स्थानको उपयोग गर्नु।
en-mt: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented, such as canceling field visits, meetings and other large gatherings such as physical education or singing classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing space between desks, the difference between times to come and go, limiting non-potential visitors, and using a separate health office space for children with flu-like symptoms.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: स्थानीय समुदायमा उल्लेख्य रूपमा फैलिएमा, सामाजिक दूरी सम्बन्धी रणनीतिहरूका साथै विस्तारित विद्यालय बरखास्त गर्नको लागि विचार गर्न सकिन्छ। दैनिक गतिविधिहरू सम्पादन गर्ने कानून प्रवर्तन कर्मचारीका लागि, CDC द्वारा तत्कालीन स्वास्थ्य जोखिम कम भएको मानिन्छ।
en-mt: If significantly spread to the local community, social distancing strategies, as well as the dismissal of extended schools, may be considered. For law enforcement personnel performing day-to-day activities, the immediate health risks are considered to be reduced by the CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: व्यक्तिसँग सम्पर्क गर्न आवश्यक हुने कानून प्रवर्तन अधिकारीहरू वा COVID-19 भएको शंका गरिएका व्यक्तिलाई उचित व्यक्तिगत सुरक्षात्मक उपकरणहरू सहित आपतकालीन चिकित्सा प्राविधिक जस्ता मार्गनिर्देशनहरू अनुसरण गर्न सुझाव गरिन्छ।
en-mt: Law enforcement officers who need to contact the person or a person suspected of having COVID-19 are advised to follow guidelines such as an emergency medical technician with appropriate personal protective equipment.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: आशंकाको अवधिमा निकट सम्पर्क हुँदा, कामदारहरूले घर सफा गर्ने स्प्रे वा वाइप प्रयोग गरेर फेरि प्रयोग गर्नुपूर्व आफ्नो ड्युटी बेल्ट र गियर सफा गरेर किटाणुरहित बनाउनु पर्छ र प्रयोग गरिएको PPE नियन्त्रण गर्न र व्यवस्थापन गर्न र कपडाहरू राख्न र धुनको लागि मानक सञ्चालन कार्यविधिहरूको पालना गर्नुपर्दछ।
en-mt: When in close contact during the period of apprehension, workers must disinfect their duty belts and gears before reusing them using a home cleaning spray or wipe and comply with standard operating procedures for controlling and managing used PPE and placing and washing clothes.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA लाई केही स्वास्थ्यस्याहार र मुर्दाघरमा काम गर्ने कामदारहरू जोखिमको उच्च वा अति उच्च श्रेणीमा छन् भन्ने लाग्छ
en-mt: OSHA feels that some healthcare and mortuary workers are in a high or very high category of risk

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: उच्च सम्पर्क जोखिमका कार्यहरूमा स्वास्थ्यसेवा वितरण, समर्थन, प्रयोगशाला, र मेडिकल ढुवानी कामदारहरू समावेश छन् जो ज्ञात वा शङ्कास्पद COVID-19 बिरामीहरूको सम्पर्कमा छन्।
en-mt: High contact risk tasks include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transportation workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: यदि श्रमिकहरूले एयरोसोल उत्पादन प्रक्रियाहरू प्रदर्शन गर्छन् भने यी धेरै अत्यधिक जोखिममा पर्ने खतरा हुन्छ, वा ज्ञात वा शंकास्पद COVID-19 बिरामीहरूबाट नमूनाहरू सङ्कलन वा नियन्त्रण गर्छन्।
en-mt: These are at risk of being at very high risk if workers perform aerosol production procedures, or collect or control samples from known or suspected COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: एरोसोल-उत्पादक प्रक्रियाहरूमा इन्ट्युबेसन खोकी अनुगम प्रक्रिया ब्रोङ्कोस्कोपीहरू, केही दन्त प्रक्रिया र परीक्षणहरू वा आक्रामक नमूना सङ्कलन समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Aerosol-producing procedures include intubation cough persuasion procedure bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and tests or invasive sample collection.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: उच्च जोखिम भएको मुर्दाघरका कार्यहरूमा मृत्युको समयमा COVID-19 भएको पत्ता लागेको वा यसको शङ्कास्पद सङ्क्रमण भएका मानिसका शरीरहरूलाई तयार पार्ने कामदारहरू समावेश हुन्छन्; तिनीहरूले शव-परीक्षा गरेको खण्डमा यिनीहरू एकदमै उच्च जोखिममा हुन्छन्। यी जोखिमयुक्त समूहका लागि थप इन्जिनियरिङ नियन्त्रणहरूमा एरोसोल-उत्पादन प्रक्रिया गर्ने कार्यसहित COVID-19 भएको पत्ता लागेका वा शङ्कास्पद बिरामीहरूको लागि आइसोलेसन कक्षहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: High-risk mortuary functions include workers preparing the bodies of people diagnosed with COVID-19 at the time of death or suspected infection of it; They are at a very high risk if they undergo an autopsy. Additional engineering controls for these at-risk groups include isolation rooms for patients diagnosed or suspected of having COVID-19, including the task of performing aerosol-producing procedures.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: केही स्वास्थ्यसेवा र मुर्दाघरका सेटिङहरूमा विशेषीकृत नेगेटिभ चापको भेन्टिलेसन उपयुक्त हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: Ventilation of specialized negative pressure may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: बायोसेफ्टी स्तर 3 सावधानीहरूबाट नमूनाहरू सम्हालिनुपर्छ।
en-mt: Samples from biosafety level 3 precautions should be handled.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: विश्व स्वास्थ्य संगठन (WHO) ले आगन्तुक बिरामीहरू COVID-19 शङ्कास्पद छन् वा छैनन् भन्ने आधारमा उनीहरूलाई पृथक प्रतीक्षा क्षेत्रहरूमा छुट्याएर राखिन्छ। अन्य PPE का साथै, OSHA ले SARS-CoV-2 भएको पत्ता लागेका वा यसले सङ्क्रमित भएको शङ्का लागेका बिरामीहरूबाट 6 फिट भित्रको दूरीमा काम गर्ने मानिसहरू र एरोसोल-निर्माण गर्ने प्रक्रियाहरू गर्नको लागि रेस्पिरेटर यन्त्रहरूको प्रयोग गर्न सुझाव दिन्छ।
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) states that visitor patients are segregated in isolated waiting areas based on whether they are SUSPECTED of COVID-19. In addition to other PPEs, OSHA suggests using respirator devices to perform aerosol-forming procedures and people working within 6 feet from patients diagnosed with OR suspected of being infected with IT.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा, NIOSH-अनुमोदित N95 फिल्टेरिङ फेसपिस श्वासयन्त्रहरू वा सो-भन्दा राम्रो यन्त्र फिट-परीक्षण, प्रशिक्षण र चिकित्सा परीक्षणहरू समावेश हुने बोध सम्बन्धी, लिखित श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी सुरक्षा कार्यक्रमको सामाग्रीमा प्रयोग गरिनुपर्छ।
en-mt: In the United States, the NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece should be used in the contents of a comprehension, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical tests.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: अन्य प्रकारका श्वास यन्त्रहरूले धेरै राम्रो सुरक्षा दिएर कर्मचारीलाई सहज बनाउन सुधार गर्न सक्छन्। COVID-19 शरीरका तरल पदार्थहरू मार्फत सर्ने रोगभन्दा पनि श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी रोग हुनाले WHO ले कभरलहरू लगाउन सुझाव दिँदैन।
en-mt: Other types of breathing aids can improve the ease of the staff by giving them much better protection. SINCE COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than a disease transmitted through body fluids, WHO does not recommend wearing coveralls.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO ले कर्मचारीको प्रवेश विन्दु परीक्षणको लागि मात्र शल्य मास्क सिफारिस गर्दछ।
en-mt: WHO recommends surgical masks only for employee entry point testing.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: कुनै पनि एरोजल-उत्पादक प्रक्रियाहरू बिना COVID-19 बिरामीहरूबाट श्वासप्रश्वास नमूनाहरू सङ्कलन गरिरहेका, तिनीहरू स्याहार वा सवारी गरिरहेका व्यक्तिहरूका लागि, WHO ले शल्यक्रिया मास्क, चश्मा वा अनुहार ढाक्ने, गाउन र पन्जाहरू लागाउन सिफारिस गर्दछ।
en-mt: For people who are collecting respiratory samples from COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-producing procedures, they are caring or riding, WHO recommends wearing surgical masks, glasses or face coverings, gowns and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: एरोसोल-उत्पादन गर्ने प्रक्रिया पूरा गरियो भने, सर्जिकल मास्कलाई N95 वा FFP2 श्वासयन्त्रसँग प्रतिस्थापन गरिन्छ।
en-mt: If the aerosol-producing procedure is completed, the surgical mask is replaced with the N95 or FFP2 respirator.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: PPE को विश्वव्यापी आपूर्ति अपर्याप्त छ भन्ने कुराला ख्याल राख्दै, WHO ले टेलिमेडिसिन, स्पष्ट झ्यालहरू जस्ता भौतिक अवरोधहरू, प्रत्यक्ष स्याहारमा समावेश भएका व्यक्तिहरूलाई मात्र COVID-19 का बिरामीसँग कोठामा प्रवेश गर्न अनुमति दिने, विशेष कार्यको लागि आवश्यक हुँदा मात्र PPE प्रयोग गर्ने, समान निदान भएको बहु बिरामीहरूको स्याहार गर्दा यसलाई नहटाइकन एउटै श्वासयन्त्र प्रयोग गर्न जारी राख्दै PPE शृङ्खला चेनलाई निरीक्षण र समन्वय गर्ने, र स्पर्शोन्मुख व्यक्तिहरूको लागि मास्कहरूको प्रयोगलाई निरूत्साहित गर्ने कार्यमार्फत् PPE को आवश्यकतालाई कम गर्न सिफारिस गर्छ।
en-mt: Taking care that the global supply of PPE is inadequate, WHO observed that physical barriers such as telemedicine, clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter rooms with COVID-19 patients, using PPE only when necessary for specialized tasks, continuing to use the same respiratory device without removing it while caring for multiple patients with similar diagnoses, monitoring and coordinating the PPE chain,  And recommends reducing the need for PPE by discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic people.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: प्रेषक: क्याथरिन माहेर, विकिमेडिया फाउन्डेसन CEO
en-mt: Sender: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: प्रापक: विकिमिडिया फाउन्डेसनका सबै कर्मचारी
en-mt: Recipient: All employees of the Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: विषय रेखा: [Covid-19] भार हलुका गर्ने र भविष्यको लागि तयारी गर्ने
en-mt: Theme line: [Covid-19] Lightening loads and preparing for the future

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: पठाउने मिति/समय: 14 मार्च, 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: Date/Time to Send: March 14, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: इजाजतपत्र: CC0: सर्वाधिकार सुरक्षित छैन
en-mt: License: CC0: Not all rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: हामी यो महिना आफैंलाई उल्लेखनीय परिस्थितिमा भेट्छौं।
en-mt: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: COVID-19 महामारीमा केही कुरा हो जसले हाम्रो विश्वव्यापी मानवको परस्पर सम्बन्ध र एक-अर्काप्रति रहेको हाम्रो उत्तरदायित्वहरूलाई स्पष्ट पार्छ।
en-mt: There is something in the COVID-19 pandemic that clarifies the interconnectedness of our global human beings and our responsibilities to each other.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: हामीसँग यसका चुनौतीहरूको लागि अघिल्लो उदाहरण छैन, तर हाम्रा उत्कृष्ट जवाफ विश्वव्यापी समानुभूति, सहकार्य र समुदायिक भवनको श्रेणीमा भर पर्छन् जुन यस सङ्गठनको हृदयमा बस्दछ भनेर हामीलाई थाहा छ।
en-mt: We don't have previous examples for its challenges, but our best answers depend on the categories of global empathy, collaboration, and community building that we know reside at the heart of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: हामीले इमेल, कल र च्याटहरूमा हाम्रा सबै सहकर्मीहरू बीच देखेको सौहार्द र हेरचाह भनेको हामी अद्भुत मानिसहरूसँग काम गर्न पर्याप्त रूपमा भाग्यमानी भएको अविश्वस्नीय सत्य स्थापित हुनुहो।
en-mt: The camaraderie and care we see among all our colleagues in emails, calls, and chats is to establish the incredible truth that we are lucky enough to work with wonderful people.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: म तपाईँ सबैलाई सहकर्मीहरूको रूपमा पाउँदा यो भन्दा धेरै कृतज्ञ र आभारी हुन सक्दिन।
en-mt: I couldn't be more grateful and grateful to have all of you as colleagues.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: गत हप्ता, कसैले हाम्रो कामका लागि उसको प्रशंसा साझा गरेका थियो।
en-mt: Last week, someone shared his appreciation for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: अहिले संसारको लागि विकिपिडियातर्फ मोडिन कत्तिको अर्थपूर्ण छ र यो महत्त्वपूर्ण स्रोतको लागि अनलाइन रहिरहन र सबैको लागि उपलब्ध हुन यो कस्तो शक्तिशाली प्रतीक हो भनेर उनीहरूले मलाई सम्झाए।
en-mt: They reminded me of how meaningful it is for the world right now to turn to Wikipedia and how powerful it is to stay online for this important resource and be available to everyone.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: तपाईंको कामले तपाईं साइटहरू रहिरहनुभयो वा हाम्रा सहकर्मीहरूले भुक्तान गरे वा हाम्रो समुदायहरू सुरक्षित राख्नुहोस् भनि सम्भव बनाउँदछ।
en-mt: Your work makes it possible for you to stay on the sites or be paid by our colleagues or to keep our communities safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: अहिले संसारलाई विकिपिडियाले उपलब्ध गराउने जानकारीको आवश्यकता छ, अहिले पहिलेको भन्दा बढी।
en-mt: Now the world needs the information wikipedia provides, now more than ever before.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: यो एउटा यस्तो समय हो जहाँ हामीले के गर्छौँ भन्ने कुराले मात्र नभएर हामीले यो कसरी गर्छौँ भन्ने कुराले पनि विश्वमा अर्थपूर्ण प्रभाव पार्नेछ।
en-mt: This is a time where not only what we do but also how we do it will have a meaningful impact on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: यो लक्ष्य र यसमा तपाईँको भूमिकाको महत्त्वको कारणले, हामीले यो आउदो हप्ताबाट सुरु गरेर सँगै कसरी काम गर्दछौँ भन्नेमा केही महत्त्वपूर्ण समायोजनहरू गर्नछौँं।
en-mt: Because of this goal and the importance of your role in it, we will make some important adjustments to how we work together starting this coming week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: हाम्रो काम र अनुसूचीमा समायोजनहरू
en-mt: Adjustments to our work and schedule

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Robyn ले अघिल्लो पटक उल्लेख गरेअनुसार, हाम्रो पहुँच बारे छलफल गर्न र आउँदा दिन र महिनाहरूको लागि तालिका बनाउन c-टोली अघिल्लो राती भेट भए।
en-mt: As Robyn noted last time, the c-team met the previous night to discuss our access and make a schedule for the days and months to come.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: त्यस वार्तालापमा, हामीले विचार गर्‍यौँ कि हामीले जे सोच्छौँ त्यो हामीले सामना गरिरहेका कुराका लागि उचित प्रतिक्रियाहरू हुनेछन् र यस समयावधिमा सङ्गठनलाई दिगो राख्न उत्तम तरिका हुनेछ।
en-mt: In that conversation, we thought that what we think would be appropriate responses to what we were facing and would be the best way to sustain the organization during this time period.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: अत्यधिक रूपमा हामीले तनाव हटाउन चाहन्थ्यौँ र दीर्घकालको लागि हाम्रो लक्ष्यमा समर्थन गर्न चाहन्थ्यौँ।
en-mt: Overwhelmingly we wanted to relieve stress and support our goal in the long run.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: तपाईँले फेरि डायल गर्नुपरेमा, ठीक छ।
en-mt: If you have to dial again, all right.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: सबै कर्मचारी, ठेकेदार र सम्झौता गरेका कर्मचारीहरूका लागि:
en-mt: For all employees, contractors and contracted employees:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: हाम्रो नियमित काम गर्ने अपेक्षाहरू थप सूचना प्राप्त नगर्दासम्म दिनको लगभग 4 घण्टा वा हप्ताको 20 घण्टा हुनेछन्।
en-mt: Our regular working expectations will be about 4 hours a day or 20 hours a week until we receive further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: हामी बिदाको घोषणा गरिरहेका छैनौँ - तपाईँ थप सामान्य समय(घण्टा) को लागि काम गर्न सक्षम हुनुहुन्छ भने, लक्ष्यमा तपाईँलाई सामेल गराउन सकिन्छ।
en-mt: We're not announcing holidays – if you're able to work for more normal hours, you can be included in the goal.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: यद्यपि, हाल संसार अप्रत्यासित छ र चाहे तपाईँले आफ्नो मनपर्ने व्यक्तिको स्याहार गर्नुपर्छ, किराना सामानहरू ल्याउनु पर्दछ वा चिकित्सकलाई भेट्न पर्दछ, तपाईँको कल्याण हाम्रो प्राथमिकता हो।
en-mt: However, the world is currently unpredictable and whether you have to take care of your favorite person, bring groceries or see a doctor, your well-being is our priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: हामीले तपाईँको समय ट्रयाक गरेका छैनौं।
en-mt: We haven't tracked your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: तपाईँ बिरामी हुनुहुँदा, काम नगर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: When you're sick, don't work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: यो बताइरहनु पर्ने थिएन, तर हामी यसबारे बताउँदै छौँ।
en-mt: It shouldn't have been said, but we're talking about it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: कुनै बिरामी दिन वा PTO आवश्यक छैन - कामका मुख्य क्षेत्रहरू कभर गरिएका छन् भनी निश्चित गर्नको लागि आफ्नो व्यवस्थापकलाई बताएर टोलीलाई पात्रो र तालिकाहरू संशोधन गर्नमा मद्दत गर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: No sick days or PTO required - help the team revise calendars and tables by telling their manager to make sure the main areas of work are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (यदि तपाईंलाई COVID-19 को लागी सकारात्मक निदान गरिएको छ भने, कृपया T&C Ops भित्र ब्रायनलाई थाहा दिनुहोस् जसले गर्दा T&C ले सहयोगको साथ मद्दत गर्न सक्छ र तपाईंको अवस्थाले व्यवस्थापनबाट उचित ध्यान दिएको छ भनि सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस)।
en-mt: (If you have been diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Brian know within T&C Ops so that T&C can help with cooperation and make sure your condition receives proper attention from the management).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: घण्टाको हिसाबले काम गर्ने मानिसहरूलाई पूर्णरूपमा भुक्तान गरिनेछ।
en-mt: People who work hourly will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: हामीले हाम्रा करार र घन्टाको हिसाबले काम गर्ने कर्मचारी सहकर्मीहरूलाई हाम्रो प्रतिबद्धताहरूको सम्मान गर्ने कुरा पहिले नै भनिसकेका छौँ र यसमा पुन:प्रतिबद्ध गर्छौँ।
en-mt: We have already told our contractual and hourly staff colleagues to respect our commitments and recommit it.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: सामान्य परिस्थितिहरूको अवस्थामा सबैलाई उनीहरूले काम गरेको नियमित घण्टाको आधारमा भुक्तानी दिइनेछ।
en-mt: In normal circumstances, everyone will be paid based on the regular hours they work.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: यसले तपाईँ बिरामी हुँदा र काम गर्न असक्षम हुँदा समावेश गर्दछ।
en-mt: This includes when you're sick and unable to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: तपाईँ काम गर्न चाहनुहुन्छ भने, हामी तपाईँलाई साथ दिन्छौँ।
en-mt: If you want to work, we will support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: धेरैजसो मानिसहरूले कामलाई हाम्रो वरिपरिको विश्वमा आफ्नो तनाव च्यानल गर्ने तरिकाको रूपमा प्रयोग गर्छन्।
en-mt: Most people use work as a way to channel their stress into the world around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: विशेष गरी यस्तो समयको अन्तरालमा, हामीले गर्ने कार्य अविश्वसनीय रूपमा इनामदायी कार्य हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: Especially over such times, what we do can be incredibly rewarding.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: फेरि पनि, यो तपाईँको स्वयं-हेरचाहको बारेमा हो।
en-mt: Again, it's about your self-care.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: हाम्रो अनुरोध भनेको तपाईँ आफ्नो म्यानेजरसँग कुरा गर्नु हो, जसकारण हामीलाई के अपेक्षा गर्ने भन्ने बारेमा थाहा हुन्छ र त्यसै अनुसार समायोजन गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ
en-mt: Our request is that you speak to your manager so that we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: केही कार्यलाई अत्यावश्यक मानिन्छ।
en-mt: Some actions are considered urgent.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: हामीले गरिराख्नु पर्ने केही कुराहरू छन्।
en-mt: There are a few things we need to do.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, विश्वास तथा सुरक्षा र कोष सङ्कलन गर्ने टोलीहरू (अरू बीचमा) महत्त्वपूर्ण कार्य गर्छन् जसलाई थप समर्थन आवश्यकता हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: SRE, HR Ops, trust and safety, and fundraising teams (among others) perform important tasks that may require further support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: हामीले हालका उद्देश्यहरू मूल्याङ्कन गर्न सबै विभागहरूमा प्रक्रिया सुरु गर्छौँ र हाम्रो लक्ष्यको लागि आवश्यक पर्ने कुराको समर्थनमा हाम्रो ध्यान केन्द्रित गर्नछौँं।
en-mt: We will start the process across all departments to evaluate current objectives and focus our attention on supporting what is needed for our goals.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: हामी सबैको लागि गर्नुपर्ने पर्याप्त कार्य छ, हामी सबै अधिक अत्यावश्यक परियोजनामा मात्र ध्यान दिनछौँ।
en-mt: There is enough work to be done for all of us, we will focus only on all the more urgent projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: अहिले सुस्त गर्नाले पछि पीडा हुने छैन।
en-mt: Slowing down now won't hurt again.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: हामी विश्व महामारी सकिसकेपछि "फेरि दोस्रो पटक त्यो होस्" भन्ने चाहँदैनौँ।
en-mt: We don't want it to happen "a second time" after the pandemic is over.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: तपाईँले समय सीमाहरू पूरा गर्नको लागि थप समय काम गर्ने अपेक्षा गरिने छैन जुन अहिले अवास्तविक छन्।
en-mt: You won't be expected to work any more time to meet deadlines that are unrealistic right now.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: हामी परिस्थितिहरू परिवर्तन भएका छन् भनी स्वीकार गर्दछौँ र उपयुक्त स्थानमा नयाँ लक्ष्य र समयरेखाहरू निर्धारण गर्न काम गर्नेछौँ।
en-mt: We acknowledge that circumstances have changed and will work to set new goals and timelines in the appropriate location.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: APP (वार्षिक योजना) को साथ के हुन्छ?
en-mt: What happens with APP (Annual Plan)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: हाम्रो नयाँ वास्तविकता र दैनिक कार्य घण्टा अपेक्षाहरू समायोजन गर्नको लागि, हामी हाम्रो 2020-2021 को वार्षिक योजनाको वितरणका लागि समयरेखा समायोजन गर्न चाहन्छौँ।
en-mt: In order to adjust our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we want to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 annual plan.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: हाम्रो अभिप्राय भनेको हाम्रो 2019-2020 को योजनाको विस्तार प्रस्ताव गर्ने हो जसले अर्को केही हप्तामा एक कम समय निर्धारित गर्न आवश्यक हुने वा इच्छा गर्नेलाई समायोजन गर्दा बजेटले कर्मचारीहरूलाई आलोचनात्मक कार्य, स्वत: हेरचाह र प्रियजनको हेरचाह गर्दा आवश्यक पर्ने वा कम समयमै काम गर्न चाहनेलाई अनुमति दिन्छ।
en-mt: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan to accommodate those who need or wish to schedule a shorter time over the next few weeks while budgeting allows employees to work critically, automatically caring, and those who want to work in less time while caring for a loved one.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: यो समय सीमाको विस्तारले उत्कृष्ट रूपमा हालको योजनाका कार्यभारहरू र पूरै संस्थाभरीको चापलाई कम गर्छ।
en-mt: The extension of this deadline excellently reduces the current plan tasks and the pressure across the entire institution.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: हामी अर्को हप्ता बोर्डमा हाम्रो प्रस्ताव पेश गर्नेछौँ र हामीसँग अनुमोदन हुनासाथ अघिल्लो कदममा प्रतिनिधि र टोलीहरू अद्यावधिक गर्नेछौँ।
en-mt: We will submit our proposal to the board next week and update the delegates and teams in the next step as soon as we have approval.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: यसमा तपाईँको नेतृत्वको लागि APP टोलीलाई धन्यवाद।
en-mt: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this regard.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: कार्यालयको स्थिति, सम्पर्कमा आएको र सफाई
en-mt: Office status, contact and cleanliness

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: गत हप्ता, हामीले हाम्रो SF-आधारित सहकर्मीहरूमध्ये एकजनालाई COVID-19 भाइरसको जोखिम भएको हुन सक्छ भन्ने कुरा थाहा पायौं।
en-mt: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been at risk for the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: यद्यपि, सावधानीको प्रचुरता भन्दा बाहिर, हामीले सान फ्रान्सिस्को कार्यालयका सबै सतहहरूलाई संक्रमणरहित बनाउनका लागि भाइरस प्रतिरोधी सरसफाई समूहलाई काम दियौँ।
en-mt: However, beyond the abundance of caution, we hired a virus-resistant sanitation group to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: तिनीहरूले प्रत्येक सतहको साथै हाम्रो तलासम्म पुग्ने लबी र एलिभेटरलाई कीटाणुरहित पार्न अस्पताल-स्तरको एन्टी-भाइरल समाधानको प्रयोग गरे,
en-mt: They used a hospital-level anti-viral solution to disinfect the lobby and elevator that reached each surface as well as our floor,

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: भवनले आफ्नो कर्तव्य-हेरचाह प्रोटोकल प्रयोग गर्ने उत्पादनहरू नियुक्त गर्दैछ जसले उनीहरूको भाडावालहरूको सुरक्षा समर्थन गर्दछ।
en-mt: The building is hiring products that use its duty-care protocol that supports the safety of their tenants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: हामीले फर्कने निर्णय गर्दा यस कार्यालय राम्रोसँग तयार हुन्छ भनि महसुस गर्दछौं।
en-mt: When we decide to return, we feel that this office is well prepared.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: हाम्रो DC कार्यालय एक WeWork मा स्थित छ, जसलाई यसको COVID-19 प्रोटोकोल हामी र सबै DC- आधारित कर्मचारी सदस्यहरूसँग साझा गरेको छ।
en-mt: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which shares its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: गत हप्ता सम्म, हाम्रो DC कार्यालय स्यानफ्रान्सिस्कोसँग साझेदारी मार्गदर्शनमा पूरै दूर सेटअपमा गयो।
en-mt: Until last week, our DC office went into a completely remote setup under partnership guidance with San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: हाम्रा केही NYC-आधारित सहकर्मीहरूलाई थाहा पाएअनुसार, हामीले ब्रुकलिनमा एक स्थान भाडामा लिने बारेमा पनि छलफल गरेका थियौँ।
en-mt: As some of our NYC-based colleagues learned, we also discussed renting a location in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: यी छलफलहरू जारी छन् तर ढिला हुन सक्नेछन्।
en-mt: These discussions are ongoing but may be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: हाम्रा केही सहकर्मीहरूले पहिलो पटक टाढाबाट काम गरिरहेका छन्।
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: हाम्रो दीर्घकालीन रूपमा टाढाका सहकर्मीहरूलाई यो समायोजन हुन सक्छ भन्ने थाहा छ र तपाईँलाई केही सुझावहरू दिन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Our long-term distant colleagues know that this adjustment can happen and can give you some suggestions.

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: बैठकहरूको लम्बाइ अधिकतम एक वा दुई घण्टामा सीमित गर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: Limit the length of meetings to a maximum of one or two hours.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: लामो सत्रहरू आवश्यक परेमा, तिनीहरूलाई धेरै दिनको पाठ्यक्रममा कसरी विभाजन गर्न सकिन्छ भन्ने विचार गर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: If long sessions are needed, consider how they can be divided over a several-day course.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: बैठकबारे स्पष्ट रूपमा व्याख्या गर्नुहोस्, एजेण्डा प्राप्त गर्नुहोस् र अग्रिम रूपमा पाठ्य सामग्रीहरू पठाउनुहोस्।
en-mt: Explain the meeting clearly, get the agenda, and send text materials in advance.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: प्रत्यक्ष सहकार्य र जडानमा सुविधा प्राप्त गर्नको लागि Google Docs र Zoom जस्ता उपकरणहरूमार्फत पूर्वनिर्धारित भिडियो बनाउनुहोस्।
en-mt: Create a default video using tools such as Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: प्रत्येक बैठक सहज बनाउन, प्रश्नहरूको लागि च्याट निरीक्षण गर्न र बोल्नेको सूची ट्र्याक गर्न र कसैलाई नोटहरू लिनमा मद्दत गर्न (वा सहकार्यात्मक नोट लिने कार्य गर्न) कसैको नेतृत्व प्राप्त गर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: Get someone's lead in making each meeting easier, inspecting the chat for questions and tracking the list of speakers, and helping someone take notes (or collaborative note taking action).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: तपाईंलाई सहज हेडसेटको आवश्यकता भएमा प्रविधि सहायकमा इमेल पठाउँनुस्।
en-mt: Send an email to Technology Assistant if you need a smooth headset.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: खाजाको लागि तपाईंको कल्याण प्रतिपूर्तिको प्रयोग गर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: Use your welfare reimbursement for lunch.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: वितरण गरिएको कार्य बारे आफ्ना सहकर्मीहरूसँग कुरा गर्नको लागि Slack मा भएको #remoties च्यानलमा सामेल हुनुहोस्
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel at Slack to talk to your colleagues about delivered work

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: HR अपरेशन टीम फाउण्डेशनमा वितरित कामको वृद्धिलाई समर्थन गर्नको लागि वेबिनार-आधारित एर्गोनोमिक्स मार्गदर्शनमा देखिँदैछ।
en-mt: The HR Operations Team is appearing in webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the growth of distributed work at the Foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: यो गएको हप्तामा, हामीले सबै समुदायलाई WHO ले महामारीको अन्त्य हुँदैछ भनी घोषणा नगर्दासम्म एडिटाथोन्स जस्ता विकिमिडिया-प्रायोजित कार्यक्रमहरू रद्द गर्ने अनुमति प्रापकहरूलाई दिनका लागि आग्रह गर्‍यौँ।
en-mt: This past week, we asked all communities to give recipients permission to cancel Wikimedia-sponsored events such as Editathons until WHO announces that the pandemic is coming to an end.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: हामीले उनीहरूलाई बतायौँ कि रद्द गर्न वा अरू प्रतिबन्धको लागि हाम्रो अनुरोध उनको सहमति-गरिएको अनुदान गतिविधिहरूलाई पुरा गर्न असम्भव बनाउन सक्छ र उद्दे्श्यहरूलाई ढिला वा संशोधन गर्नको लागि कसैलाई सजाय दिइने छैन।
en-mt: We told them that our request for cancellation or other sanctions could make it impossible to meet his agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be punished for delaying or amending the objectives.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: यो आगामी हप्तामा हामी विकिमेनिया र अन्य क्षेत्रीय र विषयगत सामुदायिक सम्मेलनको साथ अतिरिक्त मार्गनिर्देशनको पालना गर्नेछौँ।
en-mt: This coming week, we will follow additional guidelines with Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: विश्वव्यापी समुदाय वरिपरिको सामान्य भावना अवरोधमा दुबै दुःखी भएको देखिन्छ तर आफ्नै समुदायहरू, विकिमिडिया र अन्यत्र ध्यान केन्द्रित गर्ने स्पष्टता र क्षमतामा राहत देखिन्छ।
en-mt: The general sentiment around the global community seems to be both sad at the disruption but seems relieved in the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and elsewhere.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: अगाडि बढ्दै, CRT ले समुदायलाई प्रभावलाई अनुगमन गर्न र उनीहरूसँग हाम्रो सञ्चारहरू अनुसरण गर्न ठाउँ दिन मेटा-विकीमा पृष्ठ सेट अप गर्न काम गरिरहेको छ।
en-mt: Moving forward, CRT is working to set up a page on meta-wikis to monitor the impact and give the community space to follow our communications with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: COVID-19 सँग सम्बन्धित समस्याहरूको बारेमा जानकारीमा रहन
en-mt: Stay alert about covid-19 related issues

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: हामीले विशेष कर्मचारी बैठकको लागि अर्को बिहीबार, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT सम्म तपाईँको पात्रोहरूमा आमन्त्रणा पठाउनेछौँ।
en-mt: We will send an invitation to your calendars for a special staff meeting until next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: हामी यस समयलाई थप अपडेटहरू साझा गर्न, तपाईँका प्रश्नहरूको जवाफ दिन र एक-अर्कासँग जोडिन केही समय बिताउछौँ।
en-mt: We spend some time sharing more updates, answering your questions, and connecting with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: हामी यसमा एक-साथ छौँ र हामीले गर्ने सक्ने मद्दतको लागि यहाँ छौँ।
en-mt: We're in this together and here to help what we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: यसैबीच, तपाईँले यस इमेलबाट जानकारी पाउन जारी राख्न सक्नुहुन्छ र Office Wiki मा अन्य सबै आवश्यक COVID-19 सम्बन्धी जानकारी फेला पार्न सक्नुहुन्छ।
en-mt: Meanwhile, you can continue to receive information from this email and find all the other necessary COVID-19 related information in Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT ले एउटै स्थानमा यी पृष्ठहरू र सबै जानकारीको अद्यावधिक जारी राख्नेछ।
en-mt: CRT will continue to update these pages and all information in one location.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: हामी वर्तमानमा उल्लेख्य रूपमा प्रभावित भएका देशहरूमा बस्ने कर्मचारीसँग नियमित सञ्चार कायम गर्न पनि काम गरिरहेका छौँ।
en-mt: We are also working to maintain regular communication with employees living in countries that are currently significantly affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: तपाईँको यात्रा, कार्यक्रम, प्रमुख कार्य प्रवाह वा कभरेज चुनौती वा तपाईँलाई मद्दतको आवश्यकता पर्न सक्ने अन्य कुनै पनि कुराको बारेमा प्रश्नहरू छन् भने, कृपया CRT लाई जानकारी गराउन वा CRT सँग कार्य गर्न नहिच्किचाउनुहोस्।
en-mt: If there are questions about your trip, schedule, major workflow or coverage challenge or anything else you may need help with, please do not hesitate to notify crt or work with crt.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: हामी आवश्यकता अनुसारको समर्थन र सम्पर्क प्रदान गर्न मद्दतको लागि तयार छौँ।
en-mt: We are ready to help provide support and contact as needed.
