sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: तपाईँसँग गोपनीय वा संवेदनशील समस्या छ भने, कृपया HR अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय ग्लोबल अपरेसनहरूको निर्देशक - Bryan Judan लाई इमेल गर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: If you have a confidential or sensitive issue, please email hr international director of global operations - Bryan Judan.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: यी मध्ये कुनै पनि परिवर्तनहरूलाई हाम्रो कार्य र दायित्वहरूको परित्यागको रूपमा हेरिनु हुँदैन।
en-mt: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our actions and obligations.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: बरू, तिनीहरू एक मान्यता हौ कि यो बेलामा हाम्रो काम र दायित्वलाई उस तरिकाबाट अनुकुलित गर्ने आवश्यकता हुनेछ जुन हामीले विगतमा गरेनौँ।
en-mt: Rather, they are a recognition that at this time our work and responsibilities will need to be adapted in ways that we have not done in the past.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: यी हामीलाई एक-अर्कालाई समर्थन गर्न आवश्यक लाग्ने कदमहरू हुन् जसकारण हामीले काम गर्न जारी राख्न, उनीहरूलाई चाहिएको समर्थनमा हाम्रो गतिविधि उपलब्ध गराउन र उनीहरू भर पर्ने सेवामा संलग्न हुन सक्छौँ।
en-mt: These are steps we need to support each other so that we can continue to work, provide our activities with the support they need, and engage in the service they rely on.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: समय आउँदा हाम्रो योजनाबद्ध कार्यले हाम्रो प्रतीक्षा गरिहेको हुनेछ।
en-mt: When the time comes, our planned actions will await us.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: अहिलेका लागि, एक-अर्कालाई समर्थन गर्ने र महत्त्वपूर्ण कार्यको लागि स्थान बनाउने समय हो जुन हप्ता र सम्भावित रूपमा महिनामा आउने वाला छ।
en-mt: For now, it's time to support each other and make room for important work that is coming week by week and possibly month.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: हामीलाई त्यो गराउनको लागि तपाईँहरू सबैको आवश्यकता छ र यसकारण हामी सबैलाई तपाईँको र तपाईँको परिवारको स्याहार गर्नु आवश्यक छ ताकि जब आवश्यकता बढ्दछन्, तपाईँ आफ्नो सर्वश्रेष्ठमा हुनुहोस्।
en-mt: We need all of you to do that and so we all need to take care of you and your family so that when the need increases, you are at your best.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: अब, कृपया आफ्ना हातहरू धुनुहोस् र आफ्नो मुहारमा नछुनुहोस्!
en-mt: Now, please wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M र Tony S) र नेतृत्व टोलीका बाँकी सदस्यहरू (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M र Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M and Tony S) and the remaining members of the leadership team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: बी’एन्जियोटेन्सिन-रूपान्तरित इन्जाइम 2 (ACE2) फोक्सो, धमनीहरू, मुटु, मृगौला, र आन्द्राको कोषहरूको बाहिरी सतह (कोशिका झिल्लीहरू) मा संलग्न इन्जाइम हो।
en-mt: B'angiotensin-transformed enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme involved in the outer surface (cell membranes) of lung, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestinal cells.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 ले कार्डियोभास्कुलर रोगहरूको उपचारका लागि आशाजनक औषधिको लक्ष्य बनाउँदै, एन्जियोटेन्सिन-II को मात्रा घटाउने र Ang(1-7) बढाउनेद्वारा एन्जियोटेन्सिन-रूपान्तरित एन्जाइम (ACE) सम्बन्धित गतिविधिको प्रतिरोध गर्दछ। ACE2 ले केही कोरोनाभाइरसको लागि कोषहरूमा प्रवेश विन्दुको रूपमा पनि सेवा गर्दछ।
en-mt: ACE2 resists angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) related activity by reducing angiotensin-II amounts and increasing Ang(1-7), making it a promising drug target for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases. ACE2 also serves as an entry point to cells for some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: इन्जाइमको मानव संस्करणले प्राय: hACE2 लाई जनाउँछ।
en-mt: The human version of the enzyme often refers to hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: एन्जियोटेन्सिन-रूपान्तरित एन्जाइम 2 एन्डोथेलियल र अन्य कोषहरूको सतहमा अवस्थित जिङ्क युक्त मेटलोइन्जाइम हो।
en-mt: Angiotensin-transformed enzyme 2 is a zinc-containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: ACE2 प्रोटिनमा एक N-टर्मिनल पेप्टाइड M2 डोमेन र एक C-टर्मिनल कलेक्टरिन रेनल अमीनो एसिड ट्रान्सपोर्टर डोमेन हुन्छ।
en-mt: The ACE2 protein consists of an N-terminal peptide M2 domain and a C-terminal collectorine renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 एकल पास प्रकारको आई झिल्ली प्रोटिन हो, यसको एन्जाइमेटिक रूपमा सक्रिय डोमेन फोक्सो र अन्य तन्तुका कोषहरूको सतहमा यसको सक्रिय डोमेन खुला हुन्छ।
en-mt: ACE2 is a single PASS type I membrane protein, its enzymatically active domain exposed to the surface of lung and other tissue cells.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: ACE2 को एक्स्ट्रासेलुलर डोमेनलाई शेड्डेस भनिने अर्को इन्जाइमद्वारा ट्रान्समेम्ब्रेन डोमेनबाट क्लिभ गरिन्छ र नतिजास्वरूप घुलनशील प्रोटिन रक्त प्रवाहमा छोडिन्छ र अन्ततः पिसाबमा निक्लिन्छ।
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme called shadedase and as a result soluble protein is released into the bloodstream and eventually drained into the urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: धेरै अङ्गहरूमा ACE2 स्थित हुन्छ: मुख्य रूपमा फोक्सोको प्रकार II को एल्भियोलर कोष, सानो आन्द्राका इन्टेरोसाइट, आर्टेरियल र भेनस इन्डोथेलियल कोष र धेरै अङ्गहरूमा आर्टेरियल सरल मांसपेशी कोषहरूमा ACE2 संलग्न हुन्छ।
en-mt: ACE2 is located in many organs: ACE2 is mainly involved in alveolar cells of lung type II, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells, and arterial simple muscle cells in many organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2 mRNA अभिव्यक्ति सेरेब्रल कोर्टेक्स, स्ट्रियटम, हाइपोथालामस, र ब्रेनस्टिममा पनि फेला पर्दछ।
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstim.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: ACE2 को प्राथमिक कार्य भनेको ACE मा काउन्टर ब्यालेन्सको रूपमा कार्य गर्नु हो।
en-mt: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance in ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE ले एन्जिओटेन्सिन I हर्मोनलाई भेसोकन्स्ट्रिक्टिङ एन्जिओटेन्सिन II मा टाँसिन्छ।
en-mt: ACE attaches the angiotensin I hormone to vesoconstricting angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: टर्नमा भएको ACE2 ले एन्जियोटेन्सिन II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) बाट कार्बोक्सिल-टर्मिनल एमिनो एसिड फिनाइलालानाइनलाई जोड्छ र यसलाई भेसोडाइलेटर एन्जियोटेन्सिन (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) मा हाइड्रोलाइज गर्छ।
en-mt: The ACE2 in the turn connects the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyzes it to the vasodilater angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ले पनि [des-Arg9]-ब्राडिकिनिन, एपेलिन, न्यूरोटेन्सिन, डाइनोर्फिन ए र घ्रेलिनसहित अन्य धेरै पेप्टाइडलाई विभाजन गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: ACE2 can also divide many other peptides, including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 ले निष्पक्ष एमिनो एसिडको परिवाहक SLC6A19 को झिल्ली तस्करीलाई पनि नियमन गर्छ र Hartnup's रोगमा संलग्न छ।
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates membrane trafficking of neutral amino acids to the carrier SLC6A19 and is involved in Hartnup's disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: ट्रान्समेम्ब्रेन प्रोटिनको रूपमा, ACE2 ले HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (SARS निम्त्याउने भाइरस); र SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19 निम्त्याउने भाइरस) सहित केही कोरोनाभाइरसहरूका लागि कोषहरूमा मुख्य प्रवेस पोइन्टको रूपमा सेवा दिन्छ।
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 induces HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (virus that causes SARS); and serves as the main entry point in cells for some coronaviruses, including SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: अझ विशेष रूपमा, कोषहरूको सतहमा रहेको ACE2 को इन्जाइमेटिक डोमेनमा SARS-CoV र SARS-CoV2 को स्पाइक S1 प्रोटिनको बन्धनले भाइरस र कोषहरू भित्र स्थित रहेको एन्डोसोम्स दुबैको एन्डोसाइटोसिस र ट्रान्सलोकेसनमा परिणाम हुन्छ।
en-mt: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 proteins of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both viruses and endosomes located within cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: यो प्रवेशको प्रक्रियालाई होस्ट सेरिन प्रोटिज TMPRSS2 द्वारा S प्रोटिनको प्राइमिङ आवश्यक हुन्छ, जसको अवरोध हाल सम्भावित चिकित्सकीयको रूपमा अनुसन्धान हुँदैछ। यसले केही कोषहरूमा ACE2 को स्तर घट्नाले सङ्क्रमणसँग लड्न मद्दत गर्न सक्छ भन्ने परिकल्पना ल्याएको छ।
en-mt: This admission process requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is currently being investigated as a potential therapeutic. This has led to the hypothesis that decreasing ACE2 levels in some cells may help fight infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: यद्यपि, विभिन्न पेशेवर समाजहरू र नियामक निकायहरूले मानक ACE अवरोधक र ARB थेरापी जारी राख्न सिफारिस गरेका छन्।
en-mt: However, various professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitors and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: जुलाई 11, 2012 मा प्रकाशन गरिएको व्यवस्थित समीक्षा र मेटा-विश्लेषणले "ACE अवरोधकको प्रयोग नियन्त्रणको तुलनामा विशेष रूपमा निमोनियाको जोखिममा 34% घटाउने कुरासँग सम्बन्धित थियो" भन्ने कुरा पत्ता लगायो।
en-mt: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012 found that "the use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a 34% reduction in the risk of pneumonia specifically compared to controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: यसबाहेक, "निमोनियाको उच्च जोखिममा भएका ACE प्रतिरोधक, विशेष गरी आघात र हृदय विफलता भएका मानिसहरूलाई उपचार गरिएका बिरामीहरूमा पनि निमोनियाको जोखिम कम भएको थियो।
en-mt: In addition, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE resistant, especially people with trauma and heart failure, who were at high risk of pneumonia."

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: ACE अवरोधकर्ताहरूको प्रयोग पनि निमोनियासँग सम्बन्धित मृत्युमा हुने कमीको साथ सम्बद्ध थियो, यद्यपि परिणाम निमोनियाको समग्र जोखिमको तुलनामा कम बलियो थियो।
en-mt: The use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia-related deaths, although the results were less robust than the overall risk of pneumonia.

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: पुन: संयोजन मानव ACE2 (rhACE2) तीव्र फोक्सोमा चोटपटकको लागि नोभेल थेरापी भएको सङ्केत गरिएको छ र लिपोपोलिसाक्काराइड-प्रेरित तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी कठिनाई सिन्ड्रोमले सुँगुरको बच्चाहरूमा पल्मोनरी हेमोडाइनामिक्स र अक्सिजन सन्तृप्तीकरण सुधारेको देखिन्छ।
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) has been indicated to be novel therapy for acute lung injury and lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory difficulty syndrome appears to improve pulmonary hemodinamics and oxygen saturation in piglets.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: मानिसहरूमा rhACE2 को आधा-जीवन लगभग 10 घण्टाको हुन्छ र कार्यको सुरुवात 24 घण्टाको प्रभाव (अवधि) को कोर्सका साथै 30 मिनेटको छ।
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is about 10 hours and the start of the task is 30 minutes along with a 24-hour course of impact (duration).

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: धेरै निष्कर्षहरूले पुरानो रेनिन-एन्जियोटेन्सिन प्रणाली प्रतिरोधक (RAS प्रतिरोधक) मा असहिष्णुता भएका वा एन्जियोटेन्सिन II को सञ्चालन बढ्ने रोग भएकाहरूको लागि rhACE2 आशाजनक औषधि हुन सक्छ भन्ने सुझाव दिन्छन्। भिजाइएको rhACE2 लाई तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास तनाव सिन्ड्रोमको उपचारको लागि चिकित्सकीय परीक्षणहरूमा मूल्याङ्कन गरिएको छ।
en-mt: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance in chronic renin-angiotensin system resistors (RAS resistant) or those with increased operant disease of angiotensin II. Soaked rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory stress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 एपहरू भनेका 2019-20 कोरोना भाइरस महामारीको सम्बन्धमा सम्पर्क ट्रेसिङ, अर्थात् सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिको सम्पर्कमा आउन सक्ने व्यक्तिहरू ("सम्पर्कहरू") पहिचान गर्ने प्रक्रियामा मद्दत पुर्‍याउन डिजाइन गरिएका मोबाइल सफ्टवेयर एप्लिकेसनहरू हुन्।
en-mt: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to assist in the process of contact tracing in relation to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. identifying people ("contacts") who may come in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: केही इलाका र अधिकार क्षेत्रहरूमा आधिकारिक सरकारी सहायताको साथमा असङ्ख्य अनुप्रयोगहरूको विकास वा प्रस्ताव गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: Numerous applications were developed or offered with official government assistance in some areas and jurisdictions.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: सम्पर्क ट्रेस गर्ने एपहरू निर्माण गर्नको लागि धेरै रूपरेखाहरू विकास गरिएका छन्।
en-mt: Several frameworks have been developed for building apps that trace contacts.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: विशेष गरी एप प्रयोगकर्ताहरूको भौगोलिक स्थान ट्र्याक गर्ने कार्यमा आधारित प्रणालीहरूको बारेमा गोपनीयताका चिन्ताहरू उठेका छन्।
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially regarding systems based on the task of tracking the geographic location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: कम दखल भएका विकल्पले अन्य सेलफोनमा प्रयोगकर्ताको नजिकमा लग गर्नका लागि ब्लुटुथ संकेतको प्रयोग समावेश गर्दछ।
en-mt: The less intrusive option involves the use of a Bluetooth signal to log in close proximity to the user on other cellphones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: 10 अप्रिल 2020 मा, Google र Apple ले आफ्ना Android र iOS सञ्चालन प्रणालीमा उक्त ब्लुटुथ-आधारित एपहरू सिधै समर्थन गर्ने प्रकार्यता एकीकृत गर्नेछन् भनी संयुक्त रूपमा घोषणा गरेका छन्।
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they will integrate the function that directly supports those Bluetooth-based apps into their Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: चीनमा, Alipay को संयोजनमा चिनियाँ सरकारले नागरिकहरूलाई आफू COVID-19 भएका मानिसहरूको सम्पर्कमा आएको वा नआएको जाँच गर्नको लागि एप विकास गरेको छ।
en-mt: In China, in conjunction with Alipay, the Chinese government has developed an app for citizens to check whether they have come in contact with people with COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: यो 200 भन्दा बढी चिनियाँ सहरहरूमा प्रयोगमा छ। सिङ्गापुरमा, TraceTogether भनिने एप प्रयोग भइरहेको छ।
en-mt: It is in use in more than 200 Chinese cities. In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: यो एप स्थानीय IT समुदायद्वारा विकास गरिएको थियो, जुन खुला स्रोतको रूपमा प्रकाशित छ र सरकारलाई हस्तान्तरण गरिनेछ। उत्तरी म्यासेडोनियाले "StopKorona!" लन्च गर्‍यो, जुन सम्भावित सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिसँग सम्पर्कमा आएको ट्रेस गर्ने र स्वास्थ्य सेवा अधिकारीहरूलाई छिटो प्रतिक्रिया प्रदान गर्ने एक ब्लुटूथ-आधारित एप हो।
en-mt: The app was developed by the local IT community, which is published as an open source and will be handed over to the government. North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app that traces contact with a potentially infected person and provides quick response to healthcare authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: यो एप सञ्चार तथा प्रविधि मन्त्रालय र स्वास्थ्य मन्त्रालयद्वारा विकास गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: This app was developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: 14 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, एपले गुगल प्ले स्टोर र एपल एप स्टोरको स्वीकृतिको प्रतीक्षा गर्दै थियो।
en-mt: As of April 14, 2020, the app was awaiting approval from the Google Play Store and The Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: 12 अप्रिलमा, सरकारले सम्पर्क ट्रेस गर्ने एप उन्नत विकासको चरणमा थियो र केही हप्ताभित्र परिनियोजनको लागि उपलब्ध हुनेछ। आयरल्यान्ड र फ्रान्समा एउटा उस्तै एपको योजना गरिएको छ ("StopCovid")।
en-mt: On April 12, the app where the government will trace contacts was in advanced development and will be available for deployment within a few weeks. A similar app has been planned in Ireland and France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: दुवै अष्ट्रेलिया र न्युजिल्यान्डले सिङ्गापुरको TraceTogether एप र BlueTrace प्रोटोकलमा आधारित एपहरू सोचिरहेका गरिरहेका छन्। रूसले मस्कोमा बस्ने COVID-19 को निदान भएका बिरामीहरूका लागि, उहाँहरूले घर छोड्नुहुँदैन भनी सुनिश्चित गर्न डिजाइन गरिएको जियोफेन्सिङ एपलाई परिचित गराउन चाहन्छ।
en-mt: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol. Russia wants to introduce a geofensing app designed to ensure that for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, they do not leave home.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: क्याम्ब्रिज विश्वविद्यालयका सुरक्षा ईन्जिनियरिङ्का प्रोफेसर रस एन्डरसनले यदि एपको प्रयोग जनसङ्ख्याको सानो अंशमा मात्र सीमित छ भने गलत सकारात्मक र प्रभावकारिताको सम्भाव्य अभावको साथै एपमा आधारित प्रणालीसँगै धेरै सम्भावित व्यावहारिक समस्याहरू सूचीबद्ध गरे।
en-mt: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at the University of Cambridge, listed a number of potential practical problems with an app-based system, including false positives and potential lack of efficacy if the app's use is limited to a small fraction of the population.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: गलत सूचना दिने वा हानिकारक "कोरोनाभाइरस" एप्सको प्रसारको बारेमा चासोहरूको सम्बोधनको लागि, एपल सेटले आफ्नो एप स्टोरमा कुन प्रकारका सङ्गठनहरूले कोरोनाभाइरस-सम्बन्धित एप्स थप्न सक्छन् भन्ने सीमित गर्छ, जसको लागि तिनीहरूलाई "आधिकारिक" मात्र वा प्रतिष्ठित सङ्गठानहरूमा सीमित गर्छ।
en-mt: To address concerns about the spread of misinformation or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple Set limits what types of organizations can add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to "official" only or reputable venues.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Google र Amazon ले समान प्रतिबन्धहरू कार्यान्वयन गरेका छन्।
en-mt: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: गोपनीयता अभियानकर्ताहरूले कोरोनाभाइरस एपहरूको प्रयोग गरी सामूहिक निगरानीको प्रभावको सम्बन्धमा आफ्ना चिन्ता व्यक्त गरे, विशेष गरी उनीहरूले कोरोनाभाइरस विश्वव्यापी महामारीसँग सामना गर्न सिर्जना गरिएको निगरानी पूर्वाधार खतरा टरिसकेपछि ध्वस्त पारिने छ कि पारिने छैन भन्ने बारेमा चासो देखाए।
en-mt: Privacy campaigners expressed their concerns about the impact of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, especially as they expressed concern about whether the surveillance infrastructure created to combat the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat is averted.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: एमनेस्टी अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय र 100 भन्दा बढी अन्य सङ्गठनहरूले यस्तो प्रकारको निगरानीमा सीमितहरूका लागि कथन आह्वान जारी गरे।
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations issued a statement call for limits to such surveillance.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: सङ्गठनहरूले सरकारी परियोजनाहरूमा आठ सर्तहरू घोषणा गरे:
en-mt: The organizations announced eight conditions on government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: निगरानी "कानुनी, आवश्यक र समानुपातिक" हुनु पर्नेछ;
en-mt: Monitoring must be "legal, necessary and proportionate";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: निरीक्षण र निगरानीका एक्सटेन्सनहरूमा सूर्यास्तको (समाप्तिको) दफाहरू हुनुपर्ने हुन्छ;
en-mt: Extensions of oversight and monitoring must contain clauses of sunset (cessation);

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: डाटाको प्रयोगलाई COVID-19 का उद्देश्यहरूमा सीमित राख्नु पर्नेछ;
en-mt: The use of data must be limited to the purposes of COVID-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: डाटा सुरक्षा र अनामिकतालाई सुरक्षित राख्नुपर्ने हुन्छ र प्रमाणको आधारमा सुरक्षित गर्नुपर्ने देखिन्छ;
en-mt: Data security and anonymity have to be protected and protected on the basis of evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: डिजिटल निगरानीले भेदभाव र सीमान्तकरणलाई तीव्र हुन दिनेछैन;
en-mt: Digital surveillance will not allow discrimination and marginalization to intensify;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: तेस्रो पक्षहरूसँग डाटाको कुनै पनि साझेदारी कानूनमा उल्लेख गरिएको हुनुपर्ने;
en-mt: Any sharing of data with third parties must be mentioned in the law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: दुर्व्यवहारको विरुद्ध सुरक्षा र दुर्व्यवहारहरू प्रति आवाज उठाउनको लागि नागरिकहरूमा अधिकार हुनेछन्।
en-mt: Citizens will have the right to protect against abuse and to raise their voice against abuses.

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: सार्वजनिक स्वास्थ्य विशेषज्ञहरू र सीमान्तकृत समूहहरूसहित, सबै "सान्दर्भिक सरोकारवालाहरू" द्वारा “अर्थपूर्ण सहभागिता” आवश्यक हुनेछ। The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) र Reporters Without Borders (संवाददाता ओने ग्रेन्जेन) (RSF) ले पनि जाँचसूचीहरू जारी गरे।
en-mt: "Meaningful participation" by all "relevant stakeholders" will be required, including public health experts and marginalized groups. The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (correspondent One Grenzen) (RSF) also released checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: प्रस्तावित Google/Apple योजनामा आफ्नो यन्त्रको सञ्चालन प्रणालीहरूबाट ट्रेसिङ प्रक्रिया अब उपरान्त आवश्यक नभएपछि यसलाई हटाएर दीर्घ स्थायी निरीक्षणको समस्यालाई सम्बोद्धन गर्ने अभिप्राय छ।
en-mt: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of long-term permanent inspection by removing the tracing process from its device's operating systems no longer necessary.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: केही देशहरूले एप डाउनलोड गर्ने आवश्यकता र ट्र्याकिङबाट बच्ने क्षमता दुबैलाई हटाएर, एपहरूको सट्टामा सञ्जाल-आधारित स्थान ट्र्याकिङ प्रयोग गरे।
en-mt: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download apps and the ability to avoid tracking.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: इजरायलमा, सञ्जाल-आधारित ट्रयाकिङ स्वीकृत भयो।
en-mt: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: कच्चा स्थान डाटामा पहुँच भएका नेटवर्क-आधारित समाधानहरूमा महत्त्वपूर्ण सम्भाव्य गोपनीयता समस्याहरू छन्।
en-mt: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy issues.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: यद्यपि, केन्द्रिय सर्भरहरू भएका सबै प्रणालीहरूमा व्यक्तिगत स्थान डाटा पहुँच गर्नुपर्ने आवश्यकता हुँदैन; धेरै गोपनीयता-सुरक्षित राख्ने प्रणालीहरू सिर्जना गरिएका छन् जसले केन्द्रिय सर्भरहरूलाई अन्तर-सञ्चारको लागि मात्र प्रयोग गर्छन् (तलको खण्ड हेर्नुहोस्)।
en-mt: However, not all systems with central servers require access to personal location data; Many privacy-protecting systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: दक्षिण कोरियामा, गैर-एप आधारित प्रणाली सम्पर्क ट्रेस गर्न प्रयोग गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: In South Korea, a non-app based system was used to trace contacts.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: एक समर्पित एप प्रयोग गर्नुको सट्टा, प्रणालीले मोबाइल उपकरण ट्र्याकिङ डाटा र कार्डको कारोबार डाटा लगायतका विभिन्न स्रोतहरूबाट ट्र्याकिङ जानकारी जम्मा गरियो र सम्भावित-सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरूमा पाठ सन्देशहरू मार्फत सूचनाहरू उत्पादन गर्न यिनीहरूलाई संयोजन गरियो।
en-mt: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system collected tracking information from a variety of sources, including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to produce information via text messages on potentially-infected individuals.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: यो जानकारीलाई सम्भावित सम्पर्कहरूलाई सजग गराउन प्रयोग गरिनुको साथै, सरकारले स्थानको जानकारी सार्वजनिक रूपमा उपलब्ध बनाएको छ, त्यो देशमा MERS प्रकोपपछि गोपनीयता नियमहरूको जानकारीमा परिवर्तनहरू कार्यान्वयनको कारणले केही कुरा अनुमति दिइएका छन्।
en-mt: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has made location information publicly available, with some things allowed due to the implementation of changes to the privacy regulations information following the MERS outbreak in that country.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: यो जानकारी केही एप र वेबसाइटहरू मार्फत सार्वजनिक मानिसहरूका लागि उपलब्ध छ। जर्मनी सहित अन्य देशहरूले दुबै केन्द्रीकृत र गोपनीयता-संरक्षण गर्ने प्रणालीहरू प्रयोग गर्ने विचार गरे।
en-mt: This information is available to public people through some apps and websites. Other countries, including Germany, considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: 6 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, विवरणहरू अझै खुलासा गरिएको थिएन।
en-mt: As of 6 April 2020, details were not yet disclosed.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: कम्तीमा 2013 अघि देखिको अनुसन्धान साहित्यमा पर्याप्त निकायसहित, गोपनीयता-संरक्षित सम्पर्क ट्रेसिङ राम्रोसँग स्थापित अवधारणा हो। 7 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, दर्जनौँभन्दा बढी विज्ञ समूहहरूले गोपनीयता-मैत्री समाधानहरूमा काम गरिरहेका थिए, जस्तै अन्य सेलफोनहरूमा प्रयोगकर्ताको निकटता लग गर्न ब्लुटुथ लो एनर्जी (BLE) प्रयोग गर्ने।
en-mt: Privacy-protecting contact tracing is a well-established concept, with substantial bodies in the research literature since at least pre-2013. As of 7 April 2020, more than dozens of expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log users' proximity to other cellphones.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: यद्यपि, PEPP-PT भनेको सह-कार्यात्मक प्रयास हो जसमा दुवै केन्द्रीकृत र विकेन्द्रीकृत पहुँच समावेश हुन्छन् र जुन एकल प्रोटोकल होइन। विकेन्द्रीकृत प्रोटोकलहरूमा विकेन्द्रीकृत गोपनीयता-संरक्षण गर्ने ट्रेसिङ (DP-PPT/DP-3T), अस्थायी सम्पर्क नम्बर (TCN, fka सम्पर्क घटना नम्बरहरू, CEN), गोपनीयता संवेदनशील प्रोटोकलहरू र मोबाइल सम्पर्क ट्रेसिङ (PACT) र अन्य कुराका लागि संयन्त्रहरू समावेश हुन्छन्।
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a co-functional effort that involves both centralized and decentralized access and which is not a single protocol. Decentralized protocols include mechanisms for decentralized privacy-preserving tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), temporary contact numbers (TCN, fka contact incident numbers, CEN), privacy sensitive protocols and mobile contact tracing (PACT) and more.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: यी प्रोटोकलहरूमा, पहिचान योग्य व्यक्तिगत डाटाले कहिले पनि उपकरण छोड्दैन, र सबै मिल्ने उपकरणमा हुन्छन्।
en-mt: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the tool, and all are on the matching device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: COVID-19 को फैलाव ट्र्याक गर्न स्थान वा बाटो प्रतिच्छेदन डाटा सङ्कलन गर्दा र प्रयोग गर्दा MIT मिडिया ल्याबमा गोपनीयता समूह गोपनीयता आरक्षण गर्ने उपायहरू प्रयोग गर्नको लागि प्लेटफर्म, SafePaths विकास गर्दैछ।
en-mt: SafePaths is developing a platform, SafePaths, to use measures that protect privacy group privacy at MIT Media Lab when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: यो मार्च 2020 मा जारी गरिएको ह्वाइटपेपर "एप्स गोन रोग: महामारीमा व्यक्तिगत गोपनीयता कायम राख्ने" भन्ने अनुसन्धानमा आधारित छ। यस्तै अर्को प्रयास भनेको गोपनीयता प्रविधिको विकास गर्ने कम्पनी एनिग्मा एमपीसीको सेफट्रेस प्लेटफर्म हो जुन मूलतः MIT मिडिया प्रयोगशालामा स्थापना भएको हो।
en-mt: This whitepaper released in March 2020 is based on research entitled "Apes Gone Disease: Maintaining Personal Privacy in the Pandemic." Another such effort is the safetrace platform of Enigma MPC, a company that develops privacy technology, which was originally set up at MIT Media Laboratory.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: सेफट्रेसले प्रयोगकर्ताहरूलाई संवेदनशील स्थान र स्वास्थ्य डाटा साझा गर्न अन्य प्रयोगकर्ता र अधिकारीहरूसँग डाटाको गोपनीयतामा सम्झौता नगरीकन सुरक्षित हार्डवेयर प्रविधिको प्रयोग गर्दछ।
en-mt: SafeTrace uses secure hardware technology to allow users to share sensitive locations and health data without compromising the privacy of data with other users and authorities.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: 5 अप्रिल 2020 मा, ग्लोबल TCN गठबन्धन समूहहरूद्वारा स्थापित गरिएको थियो जुन व्यापक रूपले अपनाई यस्तै दृष्टिकोण र ठूलो रूपमा ओभरल्यापिङ प्रोटोकलको वरिपरि पहुँच भएका, विखण्डन घटाउने लक्ष्यका साथ, र अनुप्रयोगहरूलाई ट्रेसिङ्ग र सचेत गर्ने विश्वव्यापी अन्तरक्रियाशीलता सक्षम गर्ने एउटा महत्त्वपूर्ण पक्ष।
en-mt: On 5 April 2020, the Global TCN Alliance was founded by groups that widely adopted a similar approach and largely accessible around overlapping protocols, with the goal of reducing fragmentation, and an important aspect of enabling global interactivity in tracing and alerting applications.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: 9 अप्रिल 2020 मा, सिङ्गापुरको सरकारले यसको आधिकारिक सरकारी एपद्वारा प्रयोग गरिएको BlueTrace प्रोटोकललाई खुला स्रोत बनाएको घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On 9 April 2020, the government of Singapore announced that the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app has been made open source.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: 10 अप्रिल 2020 मा, एन्ड्रोइडर iOS मोबाइल प्लेटफर्महरू नियन्त्रण गर्ने कम्पनीहरू, Google र Apple ले सम्पर्क ट्रेसिङको प्रस्ताव घोषणा गरे, जसमा तिनीहरूले ब्लूटुथ न्यून उर्जा प्रविधि र गोपनीयता सुरक्षित क्रिप्टोग्राफीको संयोजनाका आधारमा गोपनीयता सुरक्षित राख्ने दाबी गरे।
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Androider iOS mobile platforms controlling companies, Google and Apple, announced the proposal for contact tracing, in which they claimed to protect privacy based on a combination of Bluetooth low energy technology and privacy secure cryptography.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: तिनीहरूले प्रणालीमा प्रयोग गरिने मुख्य प्रविधिहरूका विशेषताहरू पनि प्रकाशन गरेका छन्।
en-mt: They have also published the characteristics of the main techniques used in the system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Apple र Google को अनुसार, यस प्रणालीलाई तीन चरणहरूमा सम्पन्न गर्ने अभिप्राय राखिएको छ:
en-mt: According to Apple and Google, this system is intended to be completed in three phases:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: आधिकारिक गोपनियता-संरक्षण गर्ने कोरोनाभाइरस ट्रेस गर्ने एपहरू सिर्जना गर्नको लागि सरकारहरू सक्षम गर्ने उपकरणहरूको रोलआउट
en-mt: Rollout of tools enabling governments to create apps that trace official privacy-preserving coronavirus

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: पहिले अपरेटिङ सिस्टम अद्यावधिकहरूको माध्यमले प्रणाली वितरित गरेर, र पछि एकपटक खतरा टरिसकेपछि यसलाई सोही तरिकामा हटाएर, यस कार्यक्षमताको सङ्घटनलाई प्रत्यक्ष रूपमा iOS र AndroidGoogle र Apple मा अँगाल्ने र लगातार निगरानीको समस्याहरू सम्बोधन गर्ने योजना।
en-mt: By first distributing the system through operating system updates, and then removing it in the same way once the threat has been averted, the organization of this functionality is planned to be directly embraced in iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple and to address the problems of continuous monitoring.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: b’औषधिको पुन: स्थिति (पुन: प्रयोजन, पुन: प्रोफाइलिङ, पुन: कार्य वा उपचारात्मक स्विचिङको रूपमा पनि चिनिन्छ) सुरुमा यो विकास गरिएको भिन्न रोग वा स्वास्थ्य अवस्थाको उपचार गर्नको लागि स्वीकृत औषधिको उद्देश्य बदल्ने हो।
en-mt: The re-status of the b'drug (also known as reuse, re-profiling, reworking or therapeutic switching) is to change the purpose of the approved drug to treat a different disease or health condition initially developed.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: यो वैज्ञानीक अनुसन्धानको एक लाइन हो जुन हालै COVID-19 उपचारको सुरक्षित र प्रभावकारी विकास गर्न अनुसरण गरिन्छ।
en-mt: This is a line of scientific research that is recently pursued to develop the safe and effective development of COVID-19 treatments.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: अन्य अनुसन्धानको निर्देशनहरूले COVID-19 भ्याक्सिन र कन्भेलेसेन्ट प्लाज्मा रक्तक्षेपणको विकास समावेश गर्दछ। SARS-CoV-2 मा लगभग 66 ड्रगेबल प्रोटिनहरू छन्, जसमध्ये प्रत्येकसँग बहु लिगन्ड बाइन्डिङ साइटहरू छन्।
en-mt: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusions. SARS-CoV-2 contains about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: COVID-19 सम्बन्धी प्रोटिनहरूका विरुद्धमा प्रभावकारी एन्टिभाइरल औषधि विकास गर्ने उचित परियोजना उपलब्ध गराउने बाइन्डिङ साइटहरूको विश्लेषण गर्ने।
en-mt: To analyze the binding sites that provide the appropriate project to develop an effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 related proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: सबैभन्दा महत्त्वपूर्ण SARS-CoV-2 लक्षित प्रोटिनहरू पेपेन-जस्ता प्रोटिज, RNA आश्रित RNA पोलिमरेज, हेलिकेस, S प्रोटिन र ADP राइबोफोस्फेटेस हो।
en-mt: The most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are pepen-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein and ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: हुसेन AA, et al ले धेरै उम्मेद्वार यौगिकहरूको अध्ययन गरे जुन उनीहरूको कंकाल समानताका लागि उच्चतम मिल्दो औषधिहरूसँग मिल्दोजुल्दो विश्लेषण गरिएको थियो जसमा एक शक्तिशाली एन्टी SARS-CoV-2 औषधि विकासलाई छिटो गर्न उसको क्लिनिकल अध्ययनको डिजाइनमा सुझाव गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: Hussain AA, et al studied several candidate compounds that were analyzed to match the most matched drugs for their skeletal similarity in which a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug could be suggested in the design of his clinical study to accelerate drug development.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: क्लोरोक्वाइन भनेको केही स्वत: प्रतिरक्षा रोगहरू विरुद्ध पनि प्रयोग गरिने एन्टी-मलेरियल औषधि हो।
en-mt: Chloroquine is also an anti-malarial drug used against certain autoimmune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: 18 मार्चमा, WHO ले क्लोरोक्वाइन र सम्बन्धित हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइन एकता क्लिनिकल परीक्षणको भागको रूपमा अध्ययन गरिएका चार औषधीहरूमध्ये एक हुनेछ भनी घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On March 18, WHO announced that chloroquine and related hydroxychloroquine would be one of the four drugs studied as part of a combination clinical trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: न्युयोर्क राज्यको गभर्नर एन्ड्र्यु कुओमोले घोषणा गरे कि न्युयोर्क राज्यको क्लोरोक्वाइन र हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइनका परीक्षणहरू 24 मार्चमा सुरु हुनेछन्। 28 मार्चमा, FDA ले आकस्मिक प्रयोग प्रमाणीकरण (EUA) अन्तर्गत हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइन सल्फेट र क्लोरोक्वाइन फोस्फेटको प्रयोग गर्न आधिकारिक बनायो।
en-mt: New York State Governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State's trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine will begin on March 24. On March 28, FDA made it official to use hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under emergency use certification (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: FDA को क्लिनिकल परीक्षणहरूको प्रक्रियाद्वारा उपचार स्वीकार गरिएको छैन र अस्पतालमा भर्ना भएका बिरामीहरूमा आकस्मिक प्रयोगको लागि परीक्षणात्मक उपचारको रूपमा मात्र EUA अन्तर्गत स्वीकृत गरिएको छ र क्लिनिकल परीक्षणमा उपचार प्राप्त गर्न सक्षम छैनन्।
en-mt: Treatment is not accepted by the process of clinical trials of FDA and is only approved under EUA as a trial treatment for emergency use in hospitalized patients and not able to receive treatment in clinical trials.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC ले भनेको छ कि "प्रयोग, मात्रा, वा प्रोफाइलेक्सिसको लागि हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइनको अवधि वा SARS-CoV-2 सङ्क्रमणको उपचार" अहिलेसम्म स्थापित छैनन्।
en-mt: CDC states that the "use, quantity, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" has not yet been established.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: चिकित्सकहरूले "त्यहाँ अन्य कुनै विकल्प नहुँदा" औषधि प्रयोग गरेको बताएका छन्।
en-mt: Doctors said they used the drug "because there was no other option."

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: इस्तानबुलमा एक टर्किस् अनुसन्धान टोलीले जिङ्क, भिटामिन A, भिटामिन C र भिटामिन D को संयोजनमा क्लोरोक्वाइनको प्रयोगमाथि सानो अध्ययन गरिरहेको छ।
en-mt: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: ड्युक विश्वविद्यालय र अक्सफोर्ड विश्वविद्यालयमा ठूला अध्ययनहरू प्रक्रियामा छन्।
en-mt: Large studies are in the process at Duke University and Oxford University.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: NYU Langone मेडिकल स्कुलले हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइनको रोकथाममूलक प्रयोगको सुरक्षा र प्रभावकारितामा परीक्षण गरिरहेको छ।
en-mt: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting trials on the safety and efficacy of the preventive use of hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: वुहान र शनचनका चिनियाँ चिकित्सकीय परीक्षणहरूले फेभिपिराभिर "स्पष्ट प्रभावकारी" भएको देखाएको दावी गरेको छन्।
en-mt: Chinese medical trials in Wuhan and Shanchan have claimed that Favipiravir is "clearly effective".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: 4 दिनको औसतमा शनचनका 35 बिरामीहरूको परीक्षण नकरात्मक आयो, जबकि 45 बिरामीहरूमा बिमारीको अवधि 11 दिनसम्मको थियो जसले यसलाई प्राप्त गरेनन्।
en-mt: The trial came negative in 35 patients with Shanchan at an average of 4 days, while the duration of illness in 45 patients was up to 11 days who did not receive it.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: निमोनिया भएको 240 बिरामीहरूमा वुहानमा सञ्चालन गरिएका अध्ययनमा, आधालाई फेभिपिराभिर दिइएको थियो र आधाले उमिफेनोभिर प्राप्त गरेका थिए।
en-mt: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenvir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: इटालियन फार्मास्यूटिकल एजेन्सीले जनतालाई लागूपदार्थको समर्थनमा रहेका प्रमाणहरू छोटो र प्रारम्भिक छन् भनी सम्झना गरायो।
en-mt: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the evidence in support of drugs is short and preliminary.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: 2 अप्रिलमा, जर्मनीले  घोषणा गर्‍यो कि, यसको स्टकपाइलको लागि जापानबाट औषधि खरिद गर्नेछ, र विश्वविद्यालय अस्पतालहरूमा औषधि डेलिभर गर्न सैनिक प्रयोग गर्नेछ, जहाँ COVID-19 का बिरामीहरूको उपचार गर्न औषधिको प्रयोग हुनेछ।
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug would be used to treat patients with COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: साउथ चाइना मर्निङ पोस्टको अनुसार, Shinzo Abe ले औषधि किन्ने बारेमा ट्रम्प प्रशासनलाई जानकारी दिएका छन्। यो औषधि भाइरस पहिले नै बढिसकेको गम्भीर केसहरूमा कम प्रभावकारी हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has informed the Trump administration about buying the drug. This drug may be less effective in severe cases where the virus has already grown.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: यो गर्भवती महिला वा गर्भधारण गर्ने प्रयास गरिरहेका महिलाहरूले प्रयोग गर्न सुरक्षित नहुन सक्छ।
en-mt: It may not be safe to use by pregnant women or women trying to conceive.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: एन्टिभाइरल लोपिनाभिर र रिटोनाभिरको संयोजन, लोपिनाभिर/रिटोनाभिर (कालेट्रा) को एक अध्ययनले "कुनै लाभ देखिएन" भन्ने निष्कर्ष निकाल्यो।
en-mt: A study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of antiviral lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "there was no benefit."

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: औषधिहरू HIV लाई प्रोटिजमा बाँधिएर प्रतिकृतिहरू बनाउनबाट रोक्न डिजाइन गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: The drugs were designed to prevent HIV from forming replicates by binding to proteases.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: कोलोराडो विश्वविद्यालयमा भएका अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरूको टोलीले SARS-CoV-2 को प्रोटिजले बाइन्ड गर्ने कम्पाउन्ड फेला पार्न औषधिहरू परिमार्जन गर्ने प्रयास गरिरहेका छन्। विशेष रूपमा HIV/AIDS का लागि बनाइएका औषधिहरूलाई पुन: विचार गर्न निर्देशन दिने संसाधनहरू बारे वैज्ञानिक समुदायभित्र आलोचनाहरू छन्।
en-mt: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that binds to the protease of SARS-CoV-2. There are criticisms within the scientific community about the resources that direct the reconsideration of drugs specifically designed for HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: WHO ले अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय एकता परीक्षणमा लोपिनाभिर/रिटोनाभिर समावेश गर्‍यो।
en-mt: WHO included Lopinavir/Ritonavir in the International Unity Test.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: रेमडेसिभिर इबोला भाइरस रोग र मार्बर्ग भाइरस संक्रमणको उपचारको रूपमा गिलियड विज्ञान‍द्वारा निर्माण र विकास गरिएको थियो। गिलियड विज्ञानले पछि रेमडेसिभिरले बहु फाइलो-, न्युमो-, प्यारामाइक्सो-, र कोरोना-भाइरसहरूको बिरूद्ध विट्रोमा एन्टिभाइरल गतिविधि थियो भनि फेला पार्यो।
en-mt: Remdesivir was developed and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infection. Gilead science later found that remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple phylo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and coronavirus-viruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: एन्टीभाइरल उपचारमा हुने एउटा समस्या भनेको थप गम्भीर रोग र प्रसारण निम्त्याउन सक्ने उत्परिवर्तनहरू मार्फत प्रतिरोधको विकास हो।
en-mt: One of the problems with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more serious disease and transmission.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: केही प्रारम्भिक पूर्व परीक्षणका अध्ययनहरूले रेमडेसिभिरमा प्रतिबन्धमा उच्च आनुवंशिक अवरोध रहेको हुन सक्ने देखाएको छ। क्लिभल्यान्ड युनिभर्सिटी हस्पिटलद्वारा सञ्चालित दुई सहित विभिन्न क्लिनिक परीक्षणहरू जारी रहेका छन्; एउटा मध्यमरूपमा बिरामी भएका मानिसहरूका लागि र अर्को थप गम्भीररूपमा बिरामी भएका मानिसहरूका लागि।
en-mt: Some early pre-trial studies have suggested that there may be a high genetic barrier to restriction on remdesivir. Various clinic trials, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospital, are ongoing; One for moderately ill people and the other for people who are more severely ill.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: COVID-19 भएका अस्पतालमा भर्ना भएका र गम्भीर रूपमा बिरामी भएका मानिसहरूको लागि इन्ट्राभेनस भिटामिन C को चलिरहेको तीन क्लिनिकल परीक्षणहरू छन्; दुईवटा प्लेसबो नियन्त्रण गरिएको (चीन, क्यानडा) र कुनै नियन्त्रण नभएको (इटाली)।
en-mt: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people hospitalized and critically ill with COVID-19; Two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and no control (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: न्युयोर्क राज्यले 24 मार्च 2020 मा एन्टीबायोटिक एजिथ्रोमाइसिनका लागि परीक्षणहरू सुरु गर्‍यो।
en-mt: The state of New York began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on March 24, 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: विश्वव्यापी स्वास्थ्य र औषधिको लागि जापान राष्ट्रिय केन्द्र (NCGM) ले नोवेल कोरोनाभाइरले सङ्क्रमित लक्षण देखाउने बिरामीहरूको उपचारको लागि Teijin's Alvesco (साइक्लेसोनाइड), दमको लागि तानिने कर्टिकोस्टेरोइडको लागि चिकित्सकीय परीक्षणको योजना गर्दैछ।
en-mt: The Japan National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning clinical trials for Teijin's Alvesco (cyclesonide), a corticosteroid pulled for asthma, for the treatment of patients showing symptoms infected with the novel coronavirus.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: उपचारको प्रभावकारिता निर्धारण गर्न डेनमार्क, जर्मनी र अस्ट्रियामा गम्भीर, अस्पतालमा भर्ना भएका सङ्क्रमणहरूबाट 200 बिरामीहरूको साथमा एन्जियोटेन्सिन-रूपान्तरित एन्जाइम 2, चरण II को परीक्षण चलिरहेको छ।
en-mt: Trials of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, phase II, are underway in Denmark, Germany and Austria with 200 patients from severe, hospitalized infections to determine the efficacy of treatment.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: क्यानडामा भएको मोनट्रियल हार्ट संस्थाका अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरू हाल COVID-19 को हल्का लक्षणहरू देखिएका बिरामीहरूमा हुने इन्फ्लेमेसन र पल्मोनरी जटिलताहरू कम गर्ने कोल्चिसाइनको भूमिका अध्ययन गरिरहेका छन्।
en-mt: Researchers at the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients with mild symptoms of COVID-19.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: COLCORONA नाम दिइएको अध्ययनले 40 वर्षभन्दा माथिका 6000 वयस्कहरू भर्ती गरिरहेको छ, जसमा COVID-19 को निदान गरिएको थियो र हल्का लक्षणहरूको अनुभव गरिए पनि अस्पतालमा भर्ना हुन आवश्यक थिएन।
en-mt: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults over the age of 40, who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and did not need hospitalization even if mild symptoms were experienced.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: गर्भवती भएका वा स्तनपान गराउने वा प्रभावकारी गर्भनिरोधक विधि नभएका महिलाहरू योग्य छैनन्।
en-mt: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or do not have effective contraceptive methods are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: इटालीमा विभिन्न एन्टिकोएगुलेन्टहरूको परीक्षण गरिँदैछ।
en-mt: Various anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: इटालियन औषधि एजेन्सीहरूलाई प्रयोगको निर्देशनहरू प्रकाशन गर्न प्रेरित गर्दै बिरामीहरूको उपचार गर्न कम-आणविक-भार भएको हेपारिन व्यापक रूपमा प्रयोग गरिँदैछ।
en-mt: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting Italian drug agencies to publish experiment instructions.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: अप्रिल 14 मा इटालीमा प्रोफाइलेक्सिस र थेराप्युटिक खुराकमा एनोक्सापेरिन सोडियमको प्रयोगबारे अनुसन्धानमा रहेका 300 बिरामीहरू सम्बन्धी बहु केन्द्र अध्ययन बारे घोषणा गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: On April 14, a multi-center study involving 300 patients in research on the use of enoxaparin sodium in prophylaxis and therapeutic doses in Italy was announced.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 भाइरस भएदेखि, विचार गर्न सकिने वैज्ञानिक ध्यानाकर्षण स्वीकार गरिएका एन्टि-भाइरल औषधिहरू पुनः विचार गर्नमा केन्द्रित भएको छ जुन MERS, SARS र पश्चिम नाइल भाइरस जस्ता पूर्व-प्रकोपका लागि विकास गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: Since the SARS-CoV-2 virus, the scientific attention that can be considered has been focused on rethinking accepted anti-viral drugs that were developed for pre-outbreaks such as MERS, SARS and West Nile viruses.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: रिबाभिरिन: चिनियाँ 7औं संस्करण मार्गनिर्देशन अनुसार COVID-19 उपचारको लागि रिबाभिरिन सिफारिस गरिएको थियो
en-mt: Ribavirin: Ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th Edition guidelines

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: उमिफेनोभिर: उमिफेनोभिर चिनियाँ 7औँ संस्करण दिशानिर्देशहरू अनुसार COVID-19 को उपचारका लागि सिफारिस गरिएको थियो
en-mt: Umifenvir: Umifenvir was recommended for the treatment of COVID-19 according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: केही एन्टिबायोटिकहरूलाई COVID-19 उपचारको रूपमा सम्भावित पुन: प्रस्ताव अनुसार पहिचान गरिएका छन्:
en-mt: Some antibiotics have been identified according to a potential re-proposal as a COVID-19 treatment:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: टोसिलिजुमाब (एन्टी-IL-6 रिसेप्टर): चीनद्वारा स्वीकृत गरिएको।
en-mt: Tocilizumab (anti-IL-6 receptor): approved by China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: साथै इटाली र चीनका परीक्षणहरू। र Tocilizumab#COVID-19 हेर्नुहोस्।
en-mt: as well as trials in Italy and China. And see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: b'ACOVID-19 को खोप भनेको कोरोनाभाइरस रोग 2019 (COVID-19) विरुद्ध काल्पनिक खोप हो।
en-mt: The b'ACOVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: कुनै पनि खोपले क्लिनिकल परीक्षणहरू पूरा नगरेता पनि, त्यस्ता खोप विकास गर्नका लागि धेरै प्रयत्नहरू प्रगतिमा छन्।
en-mt: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, many efforts are in progress to develop such a vaccine.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: फेब्रुअरी 2020 को अन्तमा, विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठन (WHO) ले भन्यो कि उसले SARS-CoV-2, कारक भाइरस विरुद्धको भ्याक्सिन 18 महिनाभन्दा कम समयमा उपलब्ध हुने आशा गरेको छैन।
en-mt: At the end of February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect the SARS-CoV-2 vaccine against the causative virus to be available in less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: पाँच खोप उमेद्वारहरू अप्रिलमा चरण I को सुरक्षा अध्ययनहरूमा थिए।
en-mt: Five vaccine candidates were in phase I safety studies in April.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: COVID-19 लाई डिसेम्बर 2019 मा पहिचान गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: 2020 मा विश्वभरि भएको प्रकोपको प्रसारले विचारयुक्त लगानी र खोप बनाउन अनुसन्धान क्रियाकलाप निम्त्याउँदैछ।
en-mt: The spread of the outbreak around the world in 2020 is leading to thoughtful investment and research activity to make vaccines.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: धेरैजसो सङ्गठनहरूले SARS-CoV-2 विरूद्ध सम्भावित खोपहरू बनाउन प्रकाशित जिनोमहरू प्रयोग गरिरहेका छन्।
en-mt: Most organizations are using published genomes to create potential vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: अप्रिलमा उल्लेख गरिए अनुसार, खोप विकासका लागि CEPI पहलको लागि अत्यावश्यकीय भनेको गति, निर्माण क्षमता, ठूलो सक्केलमा डिप्लोयमेन्ट र विश्वव्यापी पहुँच हुन्।
en-mt: As mentioned in April, essentials for the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment in large volumes, and global access.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: अप्रिलमा, CEPI वैज्ञानिकहरूले 2020 को सुरुमा 10 विभिन्न प्रविधि प्लेटफर्महरू COVID-19 विरूद्ध प्रभावकारी खोप सिर्जना गर्न अनुसन्धान र विकासमा थिए भनि रिपोर्ट गरे।
en-mt: In April, CEPI scientists reported that in early 2020 10 different technology platforms were in research and development to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: प्रमुख प्लेटफर्म लक्ष्यहरू पहिलो चरणको सुरक्षा अध्ययनमा निम्न समावेश हुन्छन्:
en-mt: Major platform targets Phase I security studies include the following:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: न्युक्लिक एसिड (DNA र RNA) (चरण I विकासकर्ता र खोप लगाउने व्यक्ति: मोडर्ना, mRNA-1273)
en-mt: Nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Stage I developer and vaccinator: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: भाइरल भेक्टर (चरण I विकासकर्ता र खोप उम्मेदवार: CanSino बायोलोजिक्स, एडिनोभाइरस प्रकार 5 भेक्टर)
en-mt: Viral vector (phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: अप्रिलमा CEPI वैज्ञानिकहरूद्वारा जानकारी दिइएअनुसार, 115 कुल खोपका उम्मेदवारहरू सक्रिय परियोजनाहरूको रूपमा 78 पुष्टि गरिएको (79, मिल्कन संस्था अनुसार) र 37 अन्य घोषणा गरिएको, तर थोरै सार्वजनिक उपलब्ध जानकारीको साथमा (योजना बनाउने वा डिजाइन गरिएको अनुमान गरिएको) प्रारम्भिक विकासको चरणमा छन्।
en-mt: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in the early development stage of early development as active projects 78 confirmed (79, according to the Milkon Institution) and 37 others announced, but with little publicly available information (estimated to have been planned or designed).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: थप यथार्थ, प्रभावकारी मात्राहरू निर्धारण गर्दा चरण I-II ट्रायलले आरम्भिक सुरक्षा र प्रतिरक्षाजनत्व परीक्षण सञ्चालन गर्छ, जुन सामान्य रूपमा अनियमित गरिएको, प्लेसबो-नियन्त्रित र बहु स्थानहरूमा हुन्छ।
en-mt: Determining more accurate, effective doses, phase I-II trials conduct preliminary safety and immunogenicity trials, which are normally randomized, placebo-controlled, and multi-location.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: अधिकतम खुराकमा हुने विपरीत प्रभावहरूका लागि निरीक्षण गर्दा चरण III परीक्षणहरूमा विशेष रूपमा नियन्त्रण समूह र खोपको परीक्षण प्रभावकारिता सहित थप सहभागीहरू संलग्न हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Phase III trials specifically involve additional participants, including the control group and the trial efficacy of the vaccine, when inspected for the opposite effects that occur at the maximum dose.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: सक्रिय विकासमा 79 खोप उम्मेदवारमध्ये (अप्रिल 2020 को सुरुवातमा पुष्टि गरिएको), 74 जना अझै मानव मूल्याङ्कनमा थिएनन् (अझै पनि “पूर्वचिकित्सकीय” अनुसन्धानमा छ)।
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed in early April 2020), 74 were not yet on human evaluation (still in "premedical" research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: अष्ट्रेलियामा 24 जनवरी 2020 मा, क्विन्स्ल्यान्डको विद्यालयले घोषणा गर्‍यो कि यसले प्रतिरक्षा प्रतिक्रिया उत्प्रेरित गर्ने भाइरल प्रोटिनलाई आनुवंशिक रूपमा परिमार्जन गर्दछ भनी यसले आणविक क्ल्याम्प खोपको सम्भावनालाई अनुसन्धान गरिरहेको छ ।
en-mt: In Australia on 24 January 2020, the School of Queensland announced that it was investigating the possibility of a molecular clamp vaccine to genetically modify viral proteins that stimulate an immune response.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: 24 जनवरी 2020 आसपासमा क्यानडामा, सास्काचेवान विश्वविद्यालय रहेको अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय भ्याक्सिन सेन्टर (VIDO-InterVac) ले 2021 मा मानव परीक्षण सुरु गर्ने लक्ष्य राख्दै भ्याक्सिनमाथि काम सुरु गर्ने घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Center (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced that it would begin work on the vaccine, aiming to start human trials in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: 26 जनवरी 2020 मा चिनको रोग नियन्त्रण तथा रोकथाम केन्द्रमा र 28 जनवरीमा हङकङ विश्वविद्यालयमा खोप विकासका परियोजनाहरू बारे घोषणा गरिएको थिोयो।
en-mt: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Center for Disease Control and Prevention of China on 26 January 2020 and at the University of Hong Kong on 28 January 2020.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: 29 जनवरी 2020 मा, Hanneke Schuitemaker द्वारा नेतृत्व गरिएको, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies ले भ्याक्सिन विकसित गर्ने काम सुरु गरेको घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On 29 January 2020, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies announced that it had begun work on developing the vaccine.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: जानसेनले यसको बायोटेक्नोलोजी साझेदार भाक्सार्टसँग मौखिक भ्याक्सिनको सह-विकास गरिरहेको छ।
en-mt: Janssen is co-developing the oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner Vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: 18 मार्च 2020 मा, Emergent BioSolutions ले खोप बनाउनको लागि Vaxart सँग उत्पादन गर्ने साझेदारीको घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a production partnership with Vaxart to make the vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: 8 फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा, रोमानियाको OncoGen प्रयोगशालाले क्यान्सर नियोयान्टिजन भ्याक्सिनेसन थेरापीको लागि प्रयोग गरिने जस्तै समान प्रविधिको साथमा भ्याक्सिनको डिजाइनमा एउटा लेख प्रकाशित गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On 8 February 2020, Romania's OncoGen Laboratory published an article on the design of vaccines with the same technique as those used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: 25 मार्चमा, अनुसन्धान मुख्य संस्थाले खोपको संश्लेषणको निर्णय लिएका थिए भनी उनीहरूले घोषणा गरे।
en-mt: On March 25, they announced that the research main institution had decided to synthesize the vaccine.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: 27 फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा, जेनेरेक्सको सहायक कम्पनी, नुजेनेरेक्स इम्युनो-ओन्कोलॉजीले उनीहरूले COVID-19 विरूद्ध Ii-key पेप्टाइड खोप तयार पार्न खोप परियोजना सुरु गरिरहेका थिए भनी घोषणा गर्‌यो।
en-mt: On 27 February 2020, Generex's subsidiary, Nugenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced that they were launching a vaccination project to prepare a Ii-key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: उनीहरू भ्याक्सिन परीक्षार्थी उत्पादन गर्न चाहन्छन् जुन "90 दिन भित्रमा" मानवमा जाँच गर्न सकियोस्।
en-mt: They want to produce a vaccine examinee that can be tested in humans "within 90 days".

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: 5 मार्च, 2020 मा, सेन्ट लुइसको वासिङ्टन विश्वविद्यालयले खोप विकास गर्ने आफ्ना परियोजनाहरू घोषणा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, The University of Washington in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: 5 मार्च 2020 मा, दुवै पश्चिमी मेरिल्यान्डका फोर्ट डेट्रिकमा भएको संयुक्त राज्यको सेनाको चिकित्सा अनुसन्धान र मेटेराइल आदेश र सिल्भर स्प्रिङमा भएको वाल्टर रिड आर्मी अनुसन्धान संस्थानले उनीहरू खोपमा काम गरिरहेका थिए भनी घोषणा गरे।
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, both the United States Army's Medical Research and Material Order in Fort Detrick, western Maryland, and the Walter Reed Army Research Institute at Silver Spring announced that they were working on the vaccine.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: लगभग 10 मार्च 2020 तिर, आकस्मिक बायोसोलुसनले तिनीहरू Novavax Inc. सँग मिलेको कुराको घोषणा गर्‍यो
en-mt: Around 10 March 2020, accidental biosolution announced that they had met with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: खोपको विकास र उत्पादनमा।
en-mt: In the development and production of vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: साझेदारहरूले जुलाई 2020 सम्ममा पूर्वक्लिनिकल परीक्षण र चरण I क्लिनिकल परीक्षणको लागि योजनाहरू घोषणा गरे।
en-mt: Partners announced plans for preclinical trials and phase I clinical trials by July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
