targetString: प्रारम्भिक केसहरूको अध्ययनमा, छ देखि 41 दिनको पूर्ण दायराभित्र प्रारम्भिक लक्षणहरूबाट मृत्युमा पुर्‍याउने मध्यम समय भनेको 14 दिन थियो।
en-mt: In the study of early cases, the median time from initial symptoms to death within the full range of six to 41 days was 14 days.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: चीनको राष्ट्रिय स्वास्थ्य आयोग (NHC) अनुसारको अध्ययनमा, महिलाको मृत्युदर 1.7% हुँदा पुरुषको मृत्यु दर 2.8% थियो।
en-mt: According to the National Health Commission of China (NHC), the mortality rate of men was 2.8% while the mortality rate of women was 1.7%.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: पोस्ट-मार्टम फोक्सोका नमूनाहरूको हिस्टोप्याथोलजिकल परीक्षणले दुबै फोक्सोमा सेलुलर फाइब्रोमाइक्साइड एक्जुडेटसँग फैलिएको एल्भिओलर क्षतिलाई देखाउँछ।
en-mt: Histopathological examination of post-mortem lung samples shows alveolar damage spreading with cellular fibromyoxide exudate in both lungs.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: न्युमोसाइट्समा भाइरल साइटोप्याथिक परिवर्तनहरू देखिएका थिए।
en-mt: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in pneumocytes.

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: फोक्सोको तस्विर तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी कठिनाइ सिन्ड्रोम (ARDS) संग मिल्दो थियो।
en-mt: Lung images were similar to acute respiratory difficulty syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: चीनको राष्ट्रिय स्वास्थ्य आयोगद्वारा रिपोर्ट गरिएका 11.8% मृत्युहरूमा, ट्रोपोनिन वा हृदय घातका उच्च स्तरहरूद्वारा मुटु खराब भएको नोट गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: In 11.8% of deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart failure was noted by high levels of troponin or heart attack.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: संयुक्त राज्यको मार्चको डाटा अनुसार, अस्पतालमा भर्ना भाकामध्ये 89% व्यक्तिहरूको विद्यमान अवस्था रहेको छ। यस क्षेत्रको चिकित्सा संसाधनहरू उपलब्धता र सामाजिक-आर्थिक व्यवस्थाले मृत्यु दरलाई पनि असर गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: According to data from March in the United States, 89% of hospitalized people have existing conditions. Availability of medical resources and socio-economic arrangements in the region can also affect mortality.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: क्षेत्रीय भिन्नताले, साथै विधिगत कठिनाइहरूले गर्दा यस अवस्थाबाट मृत्यु हुनेको अनुमान भिन्न हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: Due to regional differences, as well as methodological difficulties, estimates of death from this condition may vary.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: मन्द केसहरूलाई न्यून-गणना गर्नाले मृत्युदर अन्दाजभन्दा उच्च हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: Under-counting slow cases could lead to higher-than-expected mortality.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: यद्यपि, मृत्युहरु विगतमा हुन सक्ने सम्झौता गरिएका केसहरूको नतिजा हुन् भन्ने तथ्यको अर्थ हालको मृत्युदर बेवास्ता गरिएको छ भन्नु हो।
en-mt: However, the fact that deaths are the result of compromised cases that may occur in the past means that the current mortality rate is ignored.

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: धूम्रपान नगर्नेहरूको तुलनामा धूम्रपान गर्नेहरूमा 1.4 गुणा बढी COVID-19 को गम्भीर समस्या हुने सम्भावना हुन्छ र 2.4 गुणा बढी सघन स्याहार आवश्यक हुने वा मृत्यु हुने सम्भावना हुन्छ। रोगको दीर्घकालीन क्रम हुने बारेमा चासोहरू बढेका छन्।
en-mt: Compared to non-smokers, smokers are 1.4 times more likely to have severe COVID-19 problems and 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die. There has been growing concern about the long-term order of the disease.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: हङकङ अस्पताल प्राधिकरणले रोगबाट निको भएका केही मानिसहरूमा 20% देखि 30% सम्म फोक्सोको क्षमता घटेको र फोक्सोको स्क्यानले अङ्गको क्षति भएको फेला पार्यो।
en-mt: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found that some people who recovered from the disease had reduced lung capacity by 20% to 30% and lung scans had organ damage.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: यसले निको भएपछि सघन स्याहार सिन्ड्रोम पनि गराउन सक्छ।
en-mt: It can also lead to intensive care syndrome after recovery.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: मार्च 2020 सम्ममा, विगतको सङ्क्रमणले रोगबाट मुक्त भएका व्यक्तिहरूलाई प्रभावकारी र दीर्घकालीन प्रतिरक्षा प्रदान गर्दछ भन्ने कुरा थाहा थिएन।
en-mt: As of March 2020, it was not known that past infections would provide effective and long-term immunity to people recovering from the disease.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: अन्य कोरोनाभाइरसहरूको व्यवहारमा आधारित रहेर प्रतिरक्षा पनि सम्भावित देखिन्छ, तर पछिल्लो मितिमा कोरोनाभाइरसहरूका लागि पोजिटिभ केसहरू फलो गरिएको COVID-19 बाट निको भएको अवस्थाहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएका थिए।
en-mt: Immunity also appears to be potential based on the behavior of other coronaviruses, but cases positive for coronaviruses that were followed at a later date were reported to have recovered from COVID-19.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: यी केसहरूलाई पुनः सङ्क्रमण भन्दा पनि त्यही सङ्क्रमण रहिरहने खराब कुराको रूपमा लिइन्छ।
en-mt: These cases are considered to be worse off than reinfection.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: भाइरसलाई प्राकृतिक मानिएको छ र स्पिलओभर सङ्क्रमण, मार्फत जनावरबाट उत्पत्ति भएको मानिन्छ।
en-mt: The virus is believed to be natural and originated from animals through spillover infection.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: वास्तविक मूल अज्ञात छ, तर डिसेम्बर 2019 सम्म सङ्क्रमणको प्रसार लगभग समग्रमा मानव-देखि-मानव प्रसारणद्वारा सञ्चालित थियो।
en-mt: The actual origin is unknown, but as of December 2019 the spread of the infection was driven almost overall by human-to-human transmission.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: द लान्सेटमा जनवरी 2020 मान प्रकाशित, पुष्टि भएका पहिलो 41 COVID-19 का केसहरूको अध्ययनले सबैभन्दा पहिले लक्षण देखा परेको मिति 1 डिसेम्बर 2019 थियो भनी खुलासा गर्‍यो।
en-mt: Published January 2020 in The Lancet, a study of the first 41 CONFIRMED COVID-19 cases revealed that the date on which the first symptoms appeared was December 1, 2019.

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: WHO का आधिकारिक प्रकाशनहरूले 8 डिसेम्बर 2019 अनुसार लक्षणहरूको प्रारम्भिक अनसेट बारे रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो।
en-mt: WHO's official publications reported an early onset of symptoms as of 8 December 2019.

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: धेरै उपायहरू मृत्युदरको मापन गर्न साधारणतया अपनाइन्छन्।
en-mt: Many measures are commonly used to measure mortality.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: यी सङ्ख्याहरू क्षेत्र र समयअनुसार भिन्न हुन्छन् र परीक्षणको मात्रा, स्वास्थ्य स्याहार प्रणालीको गुणस्तर, उपचार विकल्पहरू, प्रारम्भिक प्रकोपको समय र उमेर, लिङ्ग र समग्र स्वास्थ्य जस्ता जनसङ्ख्याका विशेषताहरूद्वारा प्रभावित हुन्छन्।
en-mt: These numbers vary by region and time and are influenced by population characteristics such as the amount of testing, the quality of the health care system, treatment options, the time and age of the initial outbreak, gender, and overall health.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: 2019 को अन्त्यमा, WHO ले ल्याब पुष्टि भएको SARS-CoV-2 सङ्क्रमणबाट भएको मृत्युका लागि U07.1 र ल्याब पुष्टि नभएको SARS-CoV-2 सङ्क्रमणको चिकित्सकीय वा इपिडेमियोलोजिकल्ली निदान गरिएको COVID-19 मृत्युका लागि U07.2 गरी आपतकालीन ICD-10 रोग कोडहरू निर्दिष्ट गर्‍यो। मामिला-को-मृत्यु हुने अनुपातले दिइएको समय अन्तरालभित्र निदान गरिएको मामिलाहरूको सङ्ख्याद्वारा विभाजन गरिएको मृत्युको सङ्ख्या प्रतिबिम्बित गर्छ।
en-mt: At the end of 2019, WHO specified emergency ICD-10 disease codes, including U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for medically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 deaths of lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection. The case-to-death ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of cases diagnosed within a given time interval.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: जोन्स होप्किन्स विश्वविद्यालयको तथ्याङ्कको आधारमा, 17 अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, विश्वव्यापी केस-मा-मृत्यु अनुपात 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) छ।
en-mt: Based on Johns Hopkins University data, as of 17 April 2020, the global case-to-death ratio stands at 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191).

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: सङ्ख्या क्षेत्र अनुसार भिन्न-भिन्न हुन्छ। अन्य उपायहरूमा केस मृत्युदर (CFR) जसले रोगको कारणले मृत्यु भएका निदान गरिएका व्यक्तिहरूको प्रतिशत प्रतिबिम्बित गर्छ र सङ्क्रमण मृत्युदर (IFR), जसले रोगले मृत्यु भएका सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरू (निदान गरिएको र निदान नगरिएको) को प्रतिशत प्रतिबिम्बित गर्छ जस्ता समावेश हुन्छ।
en-mt: Numbers vary from region to region. Other measures include case fatality rate (CFR) which reflects the percentage of people diagnosed with death due to the disease and infection mortality rate (IFR), which reflects the percentage of infected people (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who died of the disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: यी तथ्याङ्कहरू समयमा आधारित छैनन् र केस रिजोल्युसन मार्फत सङ्क्रमणबाट निश्चित जनसङ्ख्या पालना गर्दैनन्।
en-mt: These data are not based on time and do not follow a certain population from infection through case resolution.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: सबै सङ्क्रमित मानिसहरूले एन्टिबडीहरू विकास नगरे पनि, एन्टिबडीहरूको उपस्थितिले कति मानिसहरू सङ्क्रमित भएका छन् भन्ने बारे जानकारी उपलब्ध गराउन सक्छ।
en-mt: Even if not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies can provide information about how many people have become infected.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: इटालीमा भएको प्रकोपको इपिसेन्टर, Castiglione d'Adda, 4600 को एउटा सानो गाउँमा, 80 (1.7%) को पहिले नै मृत्यु भइसकेको छ।
en-mt: Castiglione d'Adda, the epicenter of the outbreak in Italy, in a small village of 4600, has already killed 80 (1.7%).

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: ग्याङलेटमा, कार्निभल उत्सवहरूद्वारा रोग फैलिएको थियो, र कम उमेरका मानिसहरूमा फैलियो, जसले सापेक्षित न्यून मृत्युदर गरायो र सबै COVID-19 मृत्युहरु औपचारिक रूपमा त्यस्तोमा वर्गीकरण नगरिएका हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: In The Ganglet, the disease was spread by carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, which led to relatively low mortality rates and all COVID-19 deaths may not have been formally classified as such.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: यसका साथै, जर्मन स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली पूर्णतया अभिभूत भएको छैन।
en-mt: In addition, the German health system has not been completely overwhelmed.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: नेदरल्यान्डमा, रक्तदाताहरूबाट आँकलन गरिए अनुसार, करिब 3% सँग एन्टिबडी हुन सक्छ।
en-mt: In the Netherlands, as estimated from blood donors, about 3% may have antibodies.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 (जनसङ्ख्याको 0.004%) COVID-19 बाट मृत्यु भएको पुष्टि भएको छ।
en-mt: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: महामारीको प्रभाव र यसको मृत्युदर पुरुष र महिलाहरूका लागि भिन्न हुन्छन्।
en-mt: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality varies for men and women.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: चीन र इटालीमा सञ्चालन गरिएका अध्ययनहरूले पुरुषमा मृत्युदर उच्च रहेको छ।
en-mt: Studies conducted in China and Italy have shown high mortality rates in men.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: पुरुषहरूमा उच्चतम जोखिम उनीहरूको 50 को दशकमा हुन्छ, जसमा पुरुष र महिलाको अन्तराल 90 मा मात्र अन्त्य हुन्छ।
en-mt: The highest risk in men occurs in their 50s, with the gap between men and women ending only in the 90s.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: चीनमा पुरुषको मृत्यु दर 2.8 प्रतिशत थियो र महिलाको 1.7 प्रतिशत।
en-mt: The male mortality rate in China was 2.8 percent and that of women was 1.7 percent.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: यो लिङ्ग-भिन्नताको ठ्याक्कै कारण थाहा छैन, तर आनुवंशिक र व्यवहारात्मक कारकहरू कारण हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: The exact cause of this gender-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioral factors may be the cause.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: लिङ्ग-आधारित रोग प्रतिरोधात्मक भिन्नता, महिलामा धूम्रपानको कम प्रचलन र महिलाहरूमा भन्दा पुरुषहरूमा कम उमेरमा उच्च रक्तचापको सह-रुग्ण अवस्थाहरूको विकास हुनाले पुरुषहरूको उच्च मृत्युदरमा योगदान पुर्‍याएको हुन सक्छन्।
en-mt: Gender-based immune differences, a lower prevalence of smoking in women, and the development of co-morbid conditions of hypertension at a younger age in men than in women may have contributed to the higher mortality rate in men.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: युरोपमा, सङ्क्रमित व्यक्तिहरू मध्ये 57% पुरुष थिए र COVID-19 ले मृत्यु भएका मध्ये 72% पुरुष थिए।
en-mt: In Europe, 57% of infected people were male and 72% of those who died of COVID-19 were male.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: अप्रिल 2020 अनुसार, US सरकारले COVID-19 सङ्क्रमणहरूको यौन-सम्बन्धी डाटा ट्र्याक गरेको छैन।
en-mt: As of April 2020, the US government has not tracked sex-related data on COVID-19 infections.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: इबोला, HIV, इन्फ्लुएन्जा र SARS जस्ता भाइरल बिरामीहरूले पुरुष र महिलालाई फरक तरिकाले प्रभाव पार्दछन् भनेर अनुसन्धानले देखाएको छ।
en-mt: Research has shown that viral diseases such as Ebola, HIV, influenza, and SARS affect men and women differently.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: स्वास्थ्यकर्मीहरूको उच्च प्रतिशत, विशेष गरी नर्सहरू महिलाहरू हुन् र तिनीहरू भाइरसको सम्पर्कमा आउने उच्च सम्भावना हुन्छ।
en-mt: A high percentage of healthcare workers, especially nurses, are women and have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठनले 11 फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा रोगको आधिकारिक नाम "COVID-19" हुनेछ भन्ने घोषणा गरेको थियो।
en-mt: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: WHO का प्रमुख टेड्रोस अधानम गेब्रेयसस ले CO भनेको कोरोना, VI भनेको भाइरस, D भनेको डिजिज र 19 भनेको सुरुमा प्रकोप पहिचान भएको समय: 31 डिसेम्बर 2019 भनी वर्णन गरे।
en-mt: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus described CO as corona, VI as virus, D as disease and 19 as the time when the outbreak was initially identified: 31 December 2019.

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: यसको नाम विशेष भौगोलिक क्षेत्र (जस्तै चीन), जनावरको प्रजाति वा मानिसको समूहमा सन्दर्भ नलिने गरी, गलत धारणालाई रोक्न लक्षित नाम राख्नको लागि अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय सिफारिस अनुसार रोजिएको छ। COVID-19 गराउने भाइरसको नाम गम्भीर तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सिन्ड्रोम कोरोनाभाइरस 2 (SARS-CoV-2) अनुसार राखिएको छ।
en-mt: Its name has been chosen in accordance with international recommendations for placing a target name to prevent misconceptions, without reference to a particular geographical region (such as China), animal species or group of humans. The virus that causes COVID-19 has been named according to severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: WHO ले यसको साथै सार्वजनिक सञ्चारहरूमा "COVID-19 भाइरस" र "COVID-19 का लागि जिम्मेवार भाइरस" प्रयोग गर्छ।
en-mt: WHO also uses the "COVID-19 virus" and "virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: दुवै रोग र भाइरसलाई सामान्यतया "कोरोना भाइरस" भनेर चिनिन्छ।
en-mt: Both diseases and viruses are commonly referred to as "coronaviruses".

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: वुहान, चीनमा प्रारम्भिक प्रकोपको अवधिमा, भाइरस र रोगलाई साधारणतया “कोरोनाभाइरस” र “वुहान कोरोनाभाइरस” को रूपमा सन्दर्भित गरिन्थ्यो।
en-mt: During the initial outbreaks in Wuhan, China, viruses and diseases were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: जनवरी 2020 मा, WHO ले रोग र भाइरसको नाममा स्थानहरू प्रयोग गर्ने विरूद्ध 2015 मार्गदर्शन अनुसारको अन्तरिम नाम जस्तै 2019-nCov र 2019-nCoV तीव्र श्वासप्रश्वास सम्बन्धी रोग र भाइरस सिफारिस गर्‍यो।
en-mt: In January 2020, WHO recommended interim names such as 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease and virus according to the 2015 guidance against using places in the name of disease and virus.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: आधिकारिक नामहरू COVID-19 र SARS-CoV-2 11 फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा जारी गरिएका थिए।
en-mt: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were released on 11 February 2020.

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: मानक आपूर्ति श्रृङ्खलाहरूमा क्षमताका सीमितताहरूको कारणले, केही डिजिटल उत्पादकहरूले नेजल स्वाब र भेन्टिलेटरका भागहरू जस्ता स्वास्थ्य स्याहार सामग्री प्रिन्ट गरिरहेका छन्।
en-mt: Due to capacity constraints in standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing health care materials such as nasal swabs and parts of ventilators.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: एक उदाहरणमा भन्नुपर्दा, इटालियन अस्पतालमा तुरुन्तै भेन्टिलेटर भल्भको आवश्यकता हुँदा, र आपूर्तिकर्ताले समयमा आवश्यक कुरा पुर्‍याउन नसक्दा, स्थानीय स्टार्टअपले रातभरिमा आवश्यक भएका 100 भल्भहरू रिभर्स‍-इन्जिनियर गरी बनाएर प्रिन्ट गरेका थिए।
en-mt: In one instance, when an Italian hospital urgently needed a ventilator valve, and the supplier could not deliver what was needed in time, the local startup made 100 valves that were needed overnight by reverse-engineering and printed them.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: COVID-19 को प्रारम्भिक प्रकोपपछि, रोगको मूल, स्केल, रोकथाम, उपचार र अन्य पक्षहरू सम्बन्धी षड्यन्त्र सिद्धान्तहरू, छुटेका र गलत जानकारी प्रकट भयो र द्रूत रूपमा अनलाइनमा फैलियो।
en-mt: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories concerning the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease, missing and misinformation were revealed and rapidly spread online.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: मानिसहरू अन्य जनावरहरूमा भाइरस फैलाउन सक्षम देखिन्छन्।
en-mt: Humans seem to be able to spread the virus to other animals.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: अध्ययन सुँगुर, हाँस, कुखुरामा भएको भाइरल प्रतिकृतिको प्रभाव फेला पार्न असफल भयो।
en-mt: The study failed to find the effect of viral replication in pigs, ducks, chickens.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: रोगको उपचारका लागि कुनै पनि औषधि वा खोप अनुमोदित छैनन्।
en-mt: No drugs or vaccines are approved to treat the disease.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: सरकारी सङ्गठनहरू, शैक्षिक समूहहरू र उद्योग अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरूद्वारा COVID-19 का भ्याक्सिन र औषधिहरूमा अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय अनुसन्धानहरू भइरहेका छन्।
en-mt: International research on vaccines and drugs for COVID-19 is being carried out by government organizations, academic groups and industry researchers.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: मार्चमा, विश्व स्वास्थ्य सङ्गठनले प्रभावकारिताको सबैभन्दा बढी आशामा विद्यमान चार एन्टिभाइरल यौगिकहरूको उपचार प्रभाव आँकलन गर्न “परस्पर परीक्षण” प्रारम्भ गरेको छ।
en-mt: In March, the World Health Organization began "intertwined trials" to assess the treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the highest hope of efficacy.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: त्यहाँ कुनै खोप उपलब्ध छैन तर विभिन्न निकायहरूले सक्रियताका साथ खोप उम्मेदवारहरूको विकास गर्दै छन्।
en-mt: There is no vaccine available but various bodies are actively developing vaccine candidates.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: SARS-CoV मा पहिले गरिएका कार्यहरूको उपयोग गरिँदै छन् किनभने SARS-CoV र SARS-CoV-2 दुबैले मानव कोषहरूमा प्रवेश गर्न ACE2 प्रापक प्रयोग गर्छन्।
en-mt: Previously done works on SARS-CoV are being used because both SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 use the ACE2 recipient to enter human cells.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: त्यहाँ तीन वटा खोप लगाउने रणनीतिहरू अनुसन्धान गरिँदै छन्।
en-mt: There are three vaccination strategies being researched.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: सुरुमा, अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरू पूर्ण भाइरसको खोप निर्माण गर्न लक्षित हुन्छन्।
en-mt: Initially, researchers are aimed at building a complete virus vaccine.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: यस्तो भाइरसको प्रयोग, यो निष्क्रिय वा मृत हुँदा, मानिसको शरीरलाई नयाँ COVID-19 को सङ्क्रमण हुँदा तुरुन्त प्रतिरोधात्मक प्रतिक्रिया दिनको लागि लक्षित हुन्छ।
en-mt: The use of such a virus, when it is inactive or dead, is aimed at giving the human body an immediate immune response when infected with the new COVID-19.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: दोस्रो रणनीति, सब युनिट खोपहरूले, भाइरसका केही सब युनिटहरूमा प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालीलाई संवेदनशील बनाउने खोप सिर्जना गर्ने लक्ष्य राख्छन्।
en-mt: The second strategy, sub-unit vaccines, aims to create vaccines that sensitize the immune system in some sub-units of the virus.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 को अवस्थामा, उक्त अनुसन्धानले भाइरसलाई ACE2 इन्जाइम रिसेप्टर पसाल्नमा मद्दत गर्ने S-स्पाइक प्रोटिनमा ध्यान-केन्द्रित गर्छ।
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, that research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus digest the ACE2 enzyme receptor.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: तेस्रो रणनीति न्युक्लिक एसिड खोपको (DNA वा RNA खोपहरू, खोप लगाउन सिर्जना गर्नका लागि नोवेल प्रविधि) हो।
en-mt: The third strategy is the nucleic acid vaccine (DNA or RNA vaccines, the novel technique for creating vaccines).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: यीमध्ये कुनै पनि रणनीतिहरूबाट परीक्षणात्मक खोपहरू सुरक्षा र प्रभावकारिताको लागि परीक्षण गरिनुपर्थ्यो। 16 मार्च 2020 मा, सियाटलका चार स्वयंसेवकहरूको साथमा खोपको पहिलो चिकित्सकीय परीक्षण सुरु भयो।
en-mt: Testable vaccines from any of these strategies should have been tested for safety and efficacy. On March 16, 2020, the first clinical trial of the vaccine began with four volunteers from Seattle.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: खोप रोग लगाउने भाइरसबाट प्रतिलिपि गरिएको हानिरहित आनुवंशिक कोड हुन्छ। एन्टिबडीमा आधारित सुधार SARS-COV-2 को सम्भावित खोपको लागि सम्भावित चुनौतीको रूपमा सुझाव गरिएको थियो, तर यो विवादास्पद छ।
en-mt: Vaccination contains a harmless genetic code copied from the disease-causing virus. Antibody-based improvement was suggested as a potential challenge to a potential vaccine of SARS-COV-2, but this remains controversial.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: अप्रिल 2020 अनुसार 300 भन्दा धेरै सक्रिय क्लिनिकल परीक्षणहरू भइरहेका छन्।
en-mt: More than 300 active clinical trials are taking place as of April 2020.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइन वा क्लोरोक्वाइनमा चार अध्ययन लगायत मलेरियाको लागि पहिल्यै स्वीकृत सात परीक्षणहरू उपचारहरूको मूल्याङ्कन गर्दै थिए।
en-mt: Seven previously approved trials for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine, were evaluating treatments.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: अप्रिलको अन्त्यसम्मको रिपोर्टको कारणले विभिन्न देशहरूमा रेमडेसिभिरमा नौ चरण III परीक्षणहरूको साथमा चिनियाँ अनुसन्धानले पुन: प्रस्ताव गरिएका एन्टिभाइरल औषधिहरू बनाउँछन्।
en-mt: Chinese research, along with nine phase III trials on remdesivir in different countries due to reports by the end of April, makes re-proposed antiviral drugs.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: अप्रिल 2020 सम्म, COVID-19 खोप र परीक्षण उम्मेदवारहरूको लागि चिकित्सकीय विकासको समीक्षा राखिएको छ। COVID-19 को लागि विद्यमान धेरै औषधिहरूको मूल्याङ्कन गरिँदैछ, जसमा रेमडेसिभिर, क्लोरोक्वाइन र हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइन, लोपिनाभिर/रिटोनाभिर र इन्टरफेरोन बेटाको साथमा संयोजन गरिएको लोपिनाभिर/रिटोनाभिर समावेश छन्।
en-mt: As of April 2020, a review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and trial candidates has been kept. Several existing drugs are being evaluated for COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and interferon beta combined with lopinavir/ritonavir.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: मार्च 2020 सम्म रेमडेसिभिरद्वारा प्रभावकारिताका लागि अस्थायी प्रमाण हुन्छ।
en-mt: As of March 2020 there is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: करूणामय-उपयोग गरिने रेमडेसिभिरले उपचार गरिएका बिरामीहरूमा चिकित्सकीय सुधार देखिएको थियो।
en-mt: Patients treated with compassionately-used remdesivir showed clinical improvement.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: US, चीन र इटालीमा मा चरण III चिकित्सकीय परीक्षणहरू सञ्चालन गरिँदैछन्। पहिले मलेरियाको उपचार गर्न प्रयोग गरिएको क्लोरोक्वाइनलाई फेब्रुअरी 2020 मा चीनमा प्राम्भिक परिणामहरूको साथमा अध्ययन गरिँदैछ।
en-mt: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in US, China and Italy. Chloroquine previously used to treat malaria is being studied in China in February 2020 with preliminary results.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: यद्यपि, यिनीहरु अनुसन्धानका सहपाठी समीक्षाको लागि आह्वान हुन्।
en-mt: However, these are calls for peer review of research.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: कोरियाली र चिनियाँ स्वास्थ्य निकायहरूले क्लोरोक्वाइनको प्रयोग गर्न सिफारिस गर्छन्।
en-mt: Korean and Chinese health agencies recommend the use of chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: यद्यपि, वुहान भाइरोलोजी संस्थानले, एक ग्राम दैनिक मात्राको सिफारिस गर्दा, ध्यान राख्यो कि दोब्बर मात्रा उच्च रूपमा खतरनाक र घातक हुन सक्थ्यो।
en-mt: However, the Wuhan Virology Institute, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, noted that twice the dose could have been as dangerous and deadly as high.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: 28 मार्च 2020 मा, FDA ले COVID-19 को उपचार गराइरहेका मानिसहरूमा चिकित्सकको सहमतिमा हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइन र क्लोरोक्वाइनको आपतकालिन प्रयोग प्रमाणीकरण जारी गर्‍यो। चिनियाँ सातौँ सँस्करण निर्देशिकाले COVID-19 को विरुद्ध प्रयोग गर्नको लागि इन्टरफेरोन, रिबाभिरिन वा युमिफेनोभिर पनि समावेश गर्‍यो।
en-mt: On March 28, 2020, FDA issued emergency use certification of hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine with the consent of a physician in people undergoing treatment for COVID-19. The Chinese Seventh Edition directory also included interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: भिट्रोमा SARS-CoV-2 मा अवरोध गर्नका लागि रिबाभिरिनका उच्च मात्राहरू जनाउने प्रारम्भिक डाटा आवश्यक पर्छ।
en-mt: Disrupting SARS-CoV-2 in vitro requires preliminary data indicating high amounts of ribavirin.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: निटाजोक्सानाइडलाई SARS-CoV-2 को न्यून गाढापन रोकावट देखाएपछि भाइभो अध्ययनमा अगाडि बढ्नको लागि सिफारिस गरिएको छ। अध्ययनहरूले देखाएका छन् कि ट्रान्समेम्ब्रेन प्रोटिज सिरिन 2 (TMPRSS2) द्वारा प्रारम्भिक स्पाइक प्रोटिन प्राइमिङ ACE2 सँगको अन्तरक्रिया मार्फत SARS-CoV-2 को प्रवेशको लागि अत्यावश्यक छ।
en-mt: Nitazoxanide has been recommended to proceed in the Vivo study after showing low thickening inhibition of SARS-CoV-2. Studies have shown that early spike protein priming by the transmembrane protease sirin 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for the penetration of SARS-CoV-2 through interaction with ACE2.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: एजिथ्रोमाइसिन भएको वा नभएको क्लोरोक्वाइन र हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वाइनका अध्ययनहरूमा थप अध्ययनबिना यी थेरापीहरूलाई स्वीकार गर्नबाट चिकित्सा समुदायलाई रोकेका धेरै सीमितताहरू छन्। ओसेल्टामिभिरले SARS-CoV-2 लाई भाइट्रोमा अवरोध गर्दैन र COVID-19 को उपचारमा कुनै ज्ञात भूमिका छैन।
en-mt: Studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without having azithromycin have several limitations that prevent the medical community from accepting these therapies without further studies. Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: साइटोकाइन आँधी गम्भीर COVID-19 का पछिल्ला चरणहरूमा एक जटिलता हुन सक्दछ।
en-mt: Cytokine storms can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: हाइड्रोक्सिक्लोरोक्वीनमा एन्टी-साइटोकिन गुणहरू हुन सक्ने प्रमाण रहेको छ। टोसीलिज़ुमाब एक सानो अध्ययन पूरा भएपछि चीनको राष्ट्रिय स्वास्थ्य आयोग द्वारा उपचार दिशानिर्देशमा सामेल गरिएको छ।
en-mt: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine properties. Tocilizumab has been included in the treatment guidelines by the National Health Commission of China after the completion of a small study.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: गम्भीर रोग भएका मानिसहरूमा सकारात्मक परिणामहरू देखाएपछि इटालीमा राष्ट्रिय स्तरमा चरण 2 गैर अनियमित परीक्षण भइरहेको छ।
en-mt: Phase 2 non-randomized testing is taking place at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: साइटोकाइन आँधीहरू पहिचान गर्न सिरम फेर्रिटिन रगत परीक्षणमा संयोजन गरियो, यो उक्त विकासहरू उल्टाउनका लागि हो, जसलाई केही प्रभावित मानिसमा मृत्युको कारण का रुपमा विचार गरिन्छ।
en-mt: Serum ferritin was combined with a blood test to identify cytokine storms, to reverse those developments, which are thought to cause death in some affected people.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: 2017 मा CAR T कोष थेरापी, एक भिन्न कारणद्वारा देखिएको स्टेरोइड रिफ्र्याक्ट्री साइटोकिन रिलीज सिन्ड्रोमको उपचारको लागि रेट्रोस्पेक्टिभ केस अध्ययनहरूमा आधारित FDA द्वारा इन्टरल्युकिन-6 रिसेप्टर एन्टागोनिस्ट स्वीकृत गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: In 2017, interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by FDA based on retrospective case studies for the treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome seen by CAR T cell therapy, a different cause.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: अहिलेसम्म, CRS को लागि टोसीलिज़ुमाब एक प्रभावकारी उपचार भएको कुनै अनियमित, नियन्त्रित प्रमाण छैन।
en-mt: So far, there is no randomized, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an effective treatment for CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: COVID-19 बाट निको भएका मानिसहरूको प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालीद्वारा उत्पादन गरिएका शुद्ध पारिएको र मिश्रित एन्टिबडीहरू ती कुरा आवश्यक पर्ने व्यक्तिहरूलाई स्थानान्तरण गर्ने कार्यलाई निष्क्रिय खोपको गैर-खोप विधिको रूपमा अनुसन्धान गरिएको छ।
en-mt: The act of transferring purified and mixed antibodies produced by the immune system of people who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need those things has been investigated as a non-vaccination method of inactivated vaccination.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: यो रणनीतिलाई अनिर्णायक नतिजाहरूको साथमा SARS का लागि प्रयास गरिएको थियो।
en-mt: This strategy was attempted for SARS with inconclusive results.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: भाइरल निष्प्रभावीकरण कार्यको अपेक्षित कार्यविधि हो जसद्वारा निष्क्रिय एन्टिबडी थेरापीले SARS-CoV-2 विरूद्ध रक्षा गर्न सक्छ।
en-mt: Viral neutralization is the expected procedure of action by which inactivated antibody therapy can protect against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: यद्यपि, एन्टिबडी-आधारित सेलुलर साइटोटक्सिसिटी र/वा फागोसाइटोसिस जस्ता अन्य प्रक्रियाहरू सम्भावित हुन सक्नेछन्।
en-mt: However, other processes such as antibody-based cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis may be possible.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: निर्मित मोनोक्लोनल एन्टिबडीहरू प्रयोग गर्ने जस्ता निष्क्रिय एन्टिबडी थेरापीका, अन्य स्वरूपहरू विकासमा छन्।
en-mt: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, such as using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: निको भएका बिरामीहरूको रगतको तरल भागबाट बनेको र भाइरससँग विशिष्ट एन्टिबडीहरू समावेश हुने कन्भ्यालेसेन्ट सिरमको उत्पादन अझ छिटो तैनाथ गर्न वृद्धि गर्न सकिन्छ।
en-mt: The production of convalescent serum made from the liquid part of the blood of recovered patients and containing specific antibodies with the virus can be increased to be deployed more quickly.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: कोरोनाभाइरस रोगहरू, घनिष्ट सम्बन्धित सिन्ड्रोमहरूको एक समूह
en-mt: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: ली वेनलियाङ, वुहान केन्द्रीय अस्पतालका एक चिकित्सक, जो भाइरसको प्रसारको जनचेतना जगाएपछि COVID-19 को सम्पर्कमा आए र उनको मृत्यु भयो।
en-mt: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Wuhan Central Hospital, who came into contact with COVID-19 after raising awareness about the spread of the virus and died.
